62a4(rgyud): stong par 'di ni rjes brtags min// rmi lam bzhin du gzugs mthong 'gyur// rtag tu gzugs de bsgom par bya// dngos med gzugs la sgom pa de// rnal 'byor
62a5(rgyud): pa yi sgom ma yin// dngos po dngos med sems kyi mon// stong par ma brtags mthong phyir ro// ji ltar pra phab me long la// gzhon nu mas mthong dngos med skyes//
62a6(rgyud): bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs chos// mkha' la de nyid rnal 'byor pas// 'di la dngos po dngos med 'gyur// dngos po stong pa'i don mtho phyir// dngos po dngos med don
62a7(rgyud): yod pa/ sgyu ma rmi lam mig 'khrul bzhin// med pa'i chos can dag la chos// skye ba 'di ni rab tu mthong // ying bzhin nor ltar mtha' yas pa'i// sems can bsam pa
62b1(rgyud): yongs rdzogs byed// bya bab pa mi gnon dums/ ma mthong ba yi rkun po mthong / sbyiche ba yi mig dag gis/ sod nas sgrub pa po yis mthog gal yod pa'i gzus/
62b2(rgyud): mthong na// rang gi gdong pa cis mi mthong // gal te med pa'i gzugs mthong na// ri bong rwa ni ji ltar min// gzhan gyi mig gos mi mthong zhing // rang gi mig gis mthong minag/
62b3(rgyud): skye ba med pa mthong ba ni// gzhon nu ma yi bu ji bzhin// gzugs brnyan mthong na de nas ni// bar ma chad par srog rtsol bya// steng 'og rtsa gsum po rnams la// lus ngag sems/
62b4(rgyud): ni 'gog pa las// zla nyid sgra gcan bshang gci dang // khu ba 'bab pa'i lam rnams su// chu me stong pa sa rlung dang // ye shes khams rnams skyes rnams la// gang zhig zla nyi mun can
62b5(rgyud): dang ba shang gci khu ba 'bab ma rnams// sgrog dang thur sel rim pa las// lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams so// zla ba thabs kyi sku yin te// nyin mor byed pa shes rab gsung // shes
62b6(rgyud): rab sku ni bshang ba'i rtsa// gci ba 'bab ma gtso bo'i gsung // steng 'og thugs kyi rtsa gnyis dag/ mun cam khu ba 'bab ma'o// thabs kyi thugs ni mun pa can// khu ba 'bab ma shes rab
62b7(rgyud): kyi steng 'og rigs drug 'di rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor las// shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// lus can kun la yang dag gnas// 'chi ltas lus ngag rtsa dag la/
63a1(rgyud): ste 'og sdug pa'i rlung rnams kyis// sun rgyamathab 'bab sal// skye ba dang ni 'tshab gnas/ skye dpa 'chi dang 'ag pa sa// dus su mapa'ab pa'o//
63a2(rgyud): can ma yang steng du 'bab// nyi ma'i 'pho ba mnyam pa las// dus sbyor 'char ba'i mngon mtshams su// dbu ma nas ni mnyam pa 'bag/ rkang pa dang bcas lnga bcu drug/ 'byung dang
63a3(rgyud): 'jug pa'o mi yi bdag/ bdun cu rtsa lnga lhag pa yi// drug brgya nyin dang mtshan la'o// drug brgya rnams kyis lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig po// 'di yis dman pa gang de
63a4(rgyud): rnams g.yon dang g.yas pa'i rtsar 'bab bo// phyogs gsum dang bcas lo gsum rnams// lo brgya rnams las dbu ma'o// steng du g.yon g.yas zla nyi ma// brkyang ma lug dang
63a5(rgyud): ser skya gzhan// chu dang me yi rang bzhin can// pad+ma rin chen 'dzin 'dod pa// 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dag/ sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin can// dbu ma'i rtsa dang g.yon pa yang //
63a6(rgyud): 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin par 'dod// steng dang 'og tu dbum g.yas// sgra gcan khu ba rab 'bab pa// stong pa ye shes rang bzhin can// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod// zla ba'i lam gyis
63a7(rgyud): bshang ba'i rtsa// gnyi mas gcib 'bab pa ste/ skye 'chi mnyam pa chags pa la// sgra gtsam thu ba rab tu 'bab// lte ba'i steng du gur 'dar ma// gang nga ming bzang mun pa 'bag/ 'og
63b1(rgyud): zhu ba 'ad bgang // mapa' 'gros dong dang du ma ma// se ba na byug zhing sabyin dang // dmyal ba bcus tor 'angs skyes pa/ A rgyas rlung stod ba d+ha k+Sha/ ragatu'abab brgya
63b2(rgyud): sa 'byung 'gyur de ni 'jug pa dag/ bsgreng bas 'jug skye sa la'o// lce ba nas ni sde ba'i dbus// a badz+rA tI 'gro drang 'ong // stsogs nor bu'i chu smras la// lum
63b3(rgyud): sems rnams 'bab pa ni// 'byung dang de ni 'jug pa dag/ sdud dang skyed pa'i rang bzhin can// dung can skye bo thams cad kyi// thur sel rlung ni 'bab pa'o// 'di rnams bung med
63b4(rgyud): bde ba las// khu ba khrag 'bab dus dag tu// shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// steng du g.yas dang g.yon dag dang // 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dang // rdul dang khung 'bab pa dag
63b5(rgyud): rdul 'bab phyir de gtum mo ste// khu ba 'bab phyir mkha' 'gro gdong // steng du brjod dus bud med kyis// g.yung mo skyes bu'i kun 'dar ma// rnam shes la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga/
63b6(rgyud): rtag tu g.yon pa'i rtsa la'o// sa sogs g.yas pa'i rtsa la ste// dbus su drug pa 'bab pa'o// lte ba'i pad+ma'i 'dangab mo la// dkyil 'khor drug cu rnams rim bzhin// g.yon dang g.yas
63b7(rgyud): ba'i dus sbyor ni// lug sogs glang la sogs pa la// rtsa ba g.yon dang de nas g.yas// steng dang dbus su rim pas rlung // sa sogs dkyil 'khor re re zhing // dbyug gus lnga
64a1(rgyud): bug dgala'o// risra pas rgya chong 'bab pa ni// drug cu dang bcas sum brgya'i dbugs// bad+ma phyag bco brgya dathugs de rnams// chu chod sngar ni 'babya ba'o//
64a2(rgyud): chu tshod drug cu nyin mtshan du// lus la dkyil 'khor rnams zhes pa'o// 'dab ma'i dbus dang de nas shar// g.yas g.yon gzhan du rim pa yis// g.yon pa rtag tu mam mkha' sogs/
64a3(rgyud): g.yas par sa sogs gzhan las so// g.yon par rnam shes sogs 'byung ba// g.yas par sa sogs sdud pa'o// nub dang shar du 'dzin ma rlung // phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te/
64a4(rgyud): mthe bong ming med dag gis ni// gang phyir kha la dbang bskur ba// g.yas dang g.yon du me dang chu// phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te// gung mo mdzub mo gnyis dag gis// gang phyir
64a5(rgyud): ral grir 'gyur ba'o// zla phyed rnam pa'i phyag rgya ni// mche ba gri gug mthe'u chung ste// stong pa mi 'gyur steng 'og tu// phan tshun thabs dang shes rab bo// dkyil 'khor bcu po yang
64a6(rgyud): ngag sbyor// sor mo rnams ni phan tshun du// mgo bor lag mthil sbyar ba la// gri gug dang bcas rtse gcig go// dbu ma'i rtsa la mnyam pa de// skyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa po//
64a7(rgyud): phung po khams dang rdo rje gsum/ gcig nyid dbu mar son pa na'o// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa 'gags na// bshang pa gci ba'i rtsa 'gag go// sgra gcan rtsa mi 'gags pa ma// 'og tu khu ba 'bab
64b1(rgyud): 'gag 'gyur// sgyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa can// 'di rnams grol na grol bar 'gyur// srog dang gyur sel lam gsum gyis// 'di ming yi kur spyod do// g.yon pa 'am ni g.yas pa la/
64b2(rgyud): mtshan mo gcig dang de bzhin lngar// lhag pa'i rlung ni rab 'bab pa// de las lo gsum na 'chi'o// g.yas pa nyi ma'i 'chi ltas la// lha dang phyogs chos nyi shu dang // de nyid gcig lhag
64b3(rgyud): gzhan rim pas// nyi ma zhag sum cu gsum rgyu na// gsum gnyis gcig lo zla ba ni// drug gsum zung zla nyin zhag tshes// phyogs lnga yon tan gnyis gcig gis// lus can rnams
64b4(rgyud): kyi tshe 'gro'o// rtsa ba nas gcig lhag pa yis// g.yon par zla ba'i rgyu bar 'gyur// nyi zla nyin zhag zla ba dag/ nyin zhag gsum rnams zla ba gsum// nyin la 'tsho ltas zla bar dge/ 'phel/
64b5(rgyud): 'grib de nas 'di dag la// dbu ma'i 'chi ba'i rgyu ba ni// lo brgya yongs su rdzogs pa yis// mnyam dang mi mnyam nyin zhag rnams// skye bar skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// de rgyu
64b6(rgyud): thams dang gsonas mang // phyogs gnyis rnam par nyams bralas// gzhan du 'chi bar myi 'gyur te// phyogs gnyis yang dag gnas pa na// goyas dang g.yon pa'i bur spyod dpe
64b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snga rnams 'bab pa'i phyir// 'chi ltas mtshan nyid shes nas ni// srog ni thig ser gzug par bya// a ba d+hA tI'i nabs brten nas// mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom par bya/
65a1(rgyud): #rtag tu rdo rje bslang bar bya// b+hU nyi'i bgrong pa 'joms pa las// gzham du kun 'dar yan lag la// srog gi rlung ni 'jug pa med// 'og tu'ang dung can mthur sel/
65a2(rgyud): de ma zhugs las 'chi ba'o// 'chi ltas slu ba rnal 'byor pa'i// 'di ni dga' ba rnams kyis 'gyur// mgo bo'i pad+mar gtsug tor las// khu ba 'ongs pa dga' ba ste// mgrin pa snying khar
65a3(rgyud): mchog dga' 'o// dga' bral dga' ba de nas 'gyur// sna tshogs dga' ba lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad+mar gang 'ongs pa'o// gsang nas rdo rje nor bu'i bar// lhan cig skyes dga' mi
65a4(rgyud): 'pho ba// rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa min// chags chen mi 'gyur khyab bdag po// 'dod chags bral las 'pho med bde// de ni mya ngan 'das rab gnas// khu ba zla 'char gtsug
65a5(rgyud): tor du// rdzogs pa'i gsang ba'i mtsho skyes la// bcu drug cha gang de nor bu'i// pad+mar rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas// de steng 'pho ba'i dus su 'gyur// nag po'i tshes gcig 'ongs pa na//
65a6(rgyud): 'dod chags bral bas gnam stong la// nyi ma mdzod spu'i gnas su 'gro// de yi cha shas bcu drug la// gtsug tor pad+mar son pa'o// zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod do// chags pa'i bde la
65a7(rgyud): chags bral phyir// lus can thams cad 'tshob ma// zla ba bdud rtsi'i 'og tu 'gro// steng du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid la// de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni/ steng
65b1(rgyud): su da bya sa nga // ga sa smran/ sa gyu med 'du sa rnas kyim / d+hA sa / sa stong
65b2(rgyud): bcus tar nor tha dag go// rnas paston pa'i rdo rje tshig/ sgras can kun blon ci log// rab gnas mya ngan 'das phyi mim/ khams rjems rgyun ci mig tu 'gyur// don nu
65b3(rgyud): drung gsang bar gsung/ skye bar smraskye bya chen las// chos dang mongs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ 'di rnams dag pa'i sulas s+ho// khyabyas kyi 'og tu rgyal mo dib ga/ ge kyi
65b4(rgyud): ni steng du 'gyur// 'di yi dpral bar sku rdo rje// mgrin snying lte ba'i 'angam skyes la// gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje rnams// sprul pa la sogs 'di rnams spro// phung po khams sogs
65b5(rgyud): spro ba ni// sgrib pa med pa'i bde ba las// las kyi phyag rgya'o snyoms 'jug dang // ye shes phyag rgya'i dmigs pa dang // phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas// mi 'gyur ba de 'phel bar
65b6(rgyud): 'gyur// 'phel ba'i 'phel bar 'gyur ba med// nyams pa'i nyams pa nyid kyang med// nub pa de yi nub pa med// 'char ba yi ni 'char ba med// rab tu gsal ba'i rab
65b7(rgyud): gsal med// bkab pa'i bkab pa yang med do// skye ba'i skye bar 'gyur nyid med// 'tshe ba'i 'chi ba yang med do// grol ba'i grol bar 'gyur ba'ang med// mi gnas pa yi mi gnas
66a1(rgyud): med dngos po med pa'i dngos med myed// dngos po'i dngos po nyid kyang myed// 'gyur ba'i 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'ang med// 'gyur ba'i yang mi 'gyur me pa//
66a2(rgyud): rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams kyi// skye 'jig sgyu ma de bzhin no// 'byung rnams 'jig par 'gyur min te// rang bzhin nyid kyis skye mi 'gyur// sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med//
66a3(rgyud): dngos po dngos med mtshan nyid gcig/ rang gi shes rab la 'khyud sems// rdo rje nor bu'i pad+mar son// der son zla ba g.yo ba dang // mi g.yo ba dang mi 'gyur sgom// lus ngag sems kyi
66a4(rgyud): rtsarnarnams su// sku gsung thugs rnams sgom pa ste// rdo rje gsum rnams legs bsdud pa// ye shes dung can mar sgom pa'o// shes rab chags pas zhu ba yi// thig le rim pas mgo
66a5(rgyud): bo las// rdzogs pa'i gnas su zhugs rnams kyang // 'ching ba dam pa'i don gyis so// ji ltar zla shar rim pa yis// chu rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// grib ma nyams
66a6(rgyud): pa rdzogs pa ste/ zla brgya dang rdzogs pa mim// de bzhin ye shes shar rim pas// sa rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs la sogs nyams pa rdzogs// ye shes chang
66a7(rgyud): dang rdzogs pa min// ji ltar ri bong mtshan mas dbus// rdzogs par ri bong can mi gnas// de bzhin 'gyur med bde bar sems// 'khor ba'i bag chags mtshan ma yis// bskyed dang
66b1(rgyud): rab tu nyams pa'i phyogs// dkar po nag po rab tu gnas// de dag dbus su rdzogs pa gang // de ni rdzogs par mi gnas so// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdzogs pa/
66b2(rgyud): la ni g.yo mi 'gyur// gang tshe rdo rje nor bur sems// de ni skad cig thams cad rdzogs// dkar po'i phyogs la 'di mi gnas// res 'ga' dkar min la mi 'gro// phyogs gnyis
66b3(rgyud): po yi dbus gnas pa// rdzogs pa la gnas gnyis su med// gtsug tor las ni shar ba de'i// rdo rje nor bur rdzogs par 'gyur// de chags bral las cha nyams pa// rdo rje nas nyams
66b4(rgyud): la rab rdzogs// slar yang gtsug tor du shar ba// slar yang rdo rje nor bur rdzogs// de chags bral las cha nyams pa// lus can ye shes nyams pa mim// 'di yi bde ba che rang bzhin//
66b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i ska mas brjod par bya// dngos po bar ma gzhan thams cad// 'byung dang sdud pa'i rgyu yin no// skyong las mya ngan 'angs par 'gro// de las slar yang srid par
66b6(rgyud): 'od rang phyogs dgasas zla bzhin dang // bgrod pa dgu las snang byed bzhin// rdzogs par mi gso ba 'dzin// sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzogs nyid// n-i khri brgya gnyis
66b7(rgyud): brgya mi thugs// 'bru me ga cin thos mas kyis// phyogs ga nyis yang dag pa pa ma// sa rnams kyis ni mings su rdzogs/ dzin la chus nyis pa ma
67a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba med// rnam pa bcu gnyis sa rnams kyis// rdzogs pa gags ma pa 'jog/ cha shas sa kyi sas pa'as//
67a2(rgyud): don gcig gnyis su med pa chos// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs son pa'i sems// kun mas rab tu rdzogs pa'o// chags bral dang po chags pa che/
67a3(rgyud): rdo rje lus med mi 'gyur che// yongs su rdzogs pa phyogs nyid kyi// bag chags rnams kyis ma 'khyud pa'o// ji ltar chu bo'i chu zhugs pa// de ni rgya mtsho'i chur mtshungs pa// de bzhin
67a4(rgyud): dngos po'i tshogs 'di de// 'gyur ba med par 'gyur med mtshungs// ji ltar khams kyi tshogs pa 'di// zos pa las ni ro nyid 'gyur// sa bon rang bzhin sa bon gyis// 'bras
67a5(rgyud): bu'i dus su nga rgyal spangs// de ltar dngos po'i tshogs pa yang // mchog tu mi 'gyur zos pa yis// mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid 'gyur// rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin 'dzin
67a6(rgyud): mche ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ni// dug rdzogs gnas skabs gyur pa na// rmal rig min gzhan du min// yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// de bzhin rnal 'byor dam pa'i bde/
67a7(rgyud): sems rdzogs cher 'gyur na rdo rje// nor bur rig min gzhan du min// yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// ji ltar ro chen lcags rnams kyi// phyogs gcig yang dag gnas
67b1(rgyud): ban+d+ha dalcags sa dras po'i mis gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'phags par byed// de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med pa// phyogs gcig yang dag gnas smras pa/ mas dod/
67b2(rgyud): pa'i mes gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed// ji ltar phug pa'i lcags rnams ni// 'ga'i zhig tu yang dri ma med// de bzhin du ni thug pa'i sems// 'ga' jig tus /
67b3(rgyud): bag chags med// lcags ni gser nyid du gyur pa// me yos dri ma med par 'gyur// de bzhin yang dang yang du sems// 'dod chags me yis dri ma med// ji ltar nor bu che reg las//
67b4(rgyud): rdo ni rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'gyur med bde reg las// sems ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur// 'dir ni mang po brjod pas ci// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa yis// lcags
67b5(rgyud): rnams rab tu 'bugs byed pa// ro yi mthu ni brtag bya min// ci zhig slar yang don dam pas// glo bur dri mas g.yogs pa yis// sems ni rab tu 'bugs byed pa// ye shes mthu
67b6(rgyud): ni brtag bya mon// sems la blo bur dri ma med// sems las yun ring dus can mim// sems meng par ni skye ba med// sems la mi zang gnas pa min// gal te 'di nyid glo bur rab
67b7(rgyud): de tshe sngon du sems dri med// gal te sems las dus ring can// de tshe de ni tsi las skyes// gal te sems med par skye na// de tshenam mkha'i me tog mtshungs// gal te sems la
68a1(rgyud): rtag tu gnas// de tshe kun tu thar pa min// ji ltar zangs kyi dri ma ni// ro yi sbyor bas nyams par 'gyur// de yi yong nyid nyams pa med// dri med nyid kyis
68a2(rgyud): yang dag gnas// de bzhin sems kyi dri ma ni// stong nyid sbyor bas rnam nyams 'gyur// de yi ye shes nyid nyams med// dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// ji ltar bcud kyis phug
68a3(rgyud): pa'i lcags// lcags nyid du ni rjes 'gro min// de bzhin bde bas phug pa'i sems// sdug bsngal nyid du rjes 'gro min// chags bral las gzhan sdig pa med// bde ba las gzhan
68a4(rgyud): bsod nams med// de phyir 'gyur med bde bar sems// mi bdag rtag tu gnas par bya// gzhon nu ma yi dga' ba ni// med par bde ba smra mi nus// lang tsho'i dga' ba thob pa na//
68a5(rgyud): bde ba chen po rang gis rig/ de bzhin ting 'dzin dang bral ba'i// bde ba smra bar nus ma yin// 'gyur med ting 'dzin thob pa na// rnal 'byor pa yis rang rig 'gyur// 'gyur
68a6(rgyud): med las skyes pa de rig pa// thams cad mkhyen la'ang the tshom za// de lta na yang yid bde min// chags bral nyid du mi bya'o// 'phos pa las ni chags bral 'gyur// chags
68a7(rgyud): bral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung // sdug bsngal skyes bu'i khams zad byed// zad pa las ni 'chi bar brjod// shi nas slar yang de rnams kyi// srid pa'o srid las slar
68b1(rgyud): 'chi 'pho// de ltar sems can gyi srid pa// chags bral las 'byung gzhan du min// de phyir 'bang ba thams cad kyis// 'gro ba'i chags pa rnam par spang // gang gis 'gyur med
68b2(rgyud): bde bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor 'khor bar bcings pa yis// 'dod ldan yang ni chags bral bar// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos su mi 'dod// bdag gis brjod pa'i rgyung ngu slar// rdul
68b3(rgyud): 'byor pa tsas sdug bsngal 'dod// khu ba mi 'gyur rang bzhin gyis// mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgrub par bya// rjen ni 'pho ba thob pa na// brten pa'i 'dod chags bral ba nyid// rten
68b4(rgyud): dang brten pa logs rdzogs pa// ji srid 'gyur med nyid du 'gro// sems kyi 'gyur me nyid thob na// rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid meng // 'gyur med las byung sku yi ni// mdzod
68b5(rgyud): spu'i 'khor lor son pa'i yang // A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba// hUM yig mi 'dod mi yi bdag/ stong pa las byung gzugs brnyan rgyu// mi 'gyur las skyes bde ba 'bras// rgyu ri 'bras
68b6(rgyud): khrus rgyas btab pa// 'bras bu rgyu yis rgyas btab pa'o// stong nyid gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa rgyu// snying rje 'gyur med 'dzin pa 'bras// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems
68b7(rgyud): de mi 'pho ba'o// mya ngan 'das pa bral ba'i gzugs// 'khor ba las 'das mi 'gyur ba// de dag sbyor ba gnyis med mchog/ rtag dang chang las nges par grol// dngos med las byung
69a1(rgyud): mtshan nyid phyir// gzugs ni dngos po med pa min// dngos po las byung mtshan nyid phyir// 'gyur ba med pa dngos po min// dngos po dngos med yang dag sbyor/
69a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog/ gzugs dang gzugs min rnam par grol// pra phab me long la bzhin no// gzugs ni srid par mi 'ong ste// 'gyur med mya ngan 'das mi 'gro// ban
69a3(rgyud): tshun 'khyud pa zhi ba ste// ma ning gi ni go 'phang mchog/ shes rab rgyu las ma byung zhing // shes rab rgyu las byung ba 'bras// shes rab rgyu las ma skyes phyir// shes rab la skyes rgyu
69a4(rgyud): skyes min// de phyir ye shes rgyu skyes min// shes rab ye shes bla na med// 'bras bu rgyu yis gzhan dang gzhan// phan tshun du ri rgyas btab med// rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad gang /
69a5(rgyud): de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung // phan tshun rgya yis btab pa'i gzugs// skye mi ni mya ngan 'das pa'ang min// shes rab kun nas mya ngan 'das// skye ba mchog tu 'gyur ba
69a6(rgyud): med rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam nges grol// phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'i// shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong ba// de ni rang sems gzhan ma yin//
69a7(rgyud): phyi yi shes bya rnam 'byed phyir// de phyir bdag gis bdag nyid la// 'gar yang rgyas gdab nus ma yin// ral gri chen po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid so yi gcod dam ci// mo gsham
69b1(rgyud): bu mo dang 'grogs pas// rmi lam du ni bde 'gyur ltar// nam mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan ni// bsten pas bdag la de bzhin no// shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min// 'ang na//
69b2(rgyud): lhan skyes shes rab bcas// kun nas bde ba rdzogs pa las// sgrub pa thams cad spangs pa ste// nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// yul dang dbang po spangs pa ni// kun nas
69b3(rgyud): 'byung po kun la gnas// gcad du med pa dbye ba spangs// rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' 'di// don chen mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams
69b4(rgyud): cad dga' bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang che// nyon mongs zad pa dgra chen po// dam tshig sems dpa' gti mug cha// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor khro ba che//
69b5(rgyud): lha min khro bo dgra chen po// dus kyi 'khor lo chags pa che// 'pho ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// rdo rje mi phyed ces par brjod// 'dir ni don chen bcom ldan 'das// sems
69b6(rgyud): dpa' sring gsum gcig pa nyid// mchog tu mi 'gyur brjod par bya// mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba rdzogs// sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yis// 'dod chags chen po
69b7(rgyud): sems dpa' che/ sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ byang chub la gnas sems dpa' ni// mi g.yo da phyir byang chub sems/ nyon mongs la sogs zhe
70a1(rgyud): sdang tshogs// zhe sdang chen po dgra che ba// dam tshig zla ba bdud rtsi yi// khu ba 'pho med de zab// dam tshig sems dpa' 'o rigs pa 'dis// kaN+Di
70a2(rgyud): bug blo ste gti mug sel// rdo rje thams cad gcig pa nyid// shes rab sku dang mi 'gyur bcas// khro bo chen po dgra chen po// khro bo'i gzugs car bdud rnams kyis// 'gyur med bde
70a3(rgyud): pa che thabs las// nam yang sems can don mi 'dor// sems can grol nas chags chen po// 'gyur ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// 'di rnams rnam pa drug tu brjod// mi 'gyur
70a4(rgyud): shes tshor ba dang // rnam shes gzugs dang 'du byed dang // 'du shes de rnams phung po'i rigs// ye shes me dang nam mkha' sa// rlung chu rnams kyi rim pa bzhin// yid mig rna ba
70a5(rgyud): lus dang sna// lce rnams kyi yang de bzhin nyid// sgra ro chos kyi dbyings dang dri// reg bya kha dog rnams kyi yang // khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// rigs drug rnams kyi yongs
70a6(rgyud): dag pa// lus ngag gsang ba dbang po sems// rtag tu dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum// shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje gsum// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni dbang gi
70a7(rgyud): sgrub thabs te// mchog tu mi 'gyur sgrub pa'i thabs// rtsa dang rigs dang yang dag ldan// zla ba mdor bstan pa yis bshad// ces pa 'jig rten khams kyi le'ur le'u lnga pa'i
70b1(rgyud): mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gi sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs so// / 'di ni kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dad / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'bro dge sbyong shes grags pas
70b2(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ slar yang rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis/ dpal rA ro pa'i 'grel bshad dang mthun par bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas pa'o//
70b3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma A da~M bud+d+ha ud d+hi ta shrI kA la tsakra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las byung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus
70b4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan// sangs rgyas seng
70b5(rgyud): ge'i khro la bzhugs pa lha mchog rnams kyis btung la rgyal po zla ba bzang po yis// mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal leg pa'i bong+ga sbyar ba yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa no//
70b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor dpam ldan dus 'khor ka 'phreng ldan pa'i a 'dus la ste ma rnams dgrol ba'i don du'o// stong pa ye shes byung ste thig le mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas kyi dang wa min
70b7(rgyud): yang phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang // lus la sna tshogs tshad dang srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi
71a1(rgyud): longs spyod dang // dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol// zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu gang zhig
71a2(rgyud): khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rab mchog lha rnams dang // mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bral thub mchog rigs rnams ngag gis shes pa min pas so// mya ngan 'das pa la sogs
71a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag ni// lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya yis mi yi bdag po bzang po nyon// dus kyi stong pa
71a4(rgyud): rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang // rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang // dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa
71a5(rgyud): bzhi dang sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang // stong pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste chu la lan tshwa dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su sgong skyes bzhin// lus dang ye shes nam
71a6(rgyud): mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang g.yo ba dang // lha ni mthong ba skyed min dag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni lus dag las// sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung
71a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te// de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs min sems kyi kun tu rtog pa dag las grol// g.yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba 'grol ba'i
71b1(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i cha dang g.yas su dmar po'i mdog/ skrag can dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang // mjug rings dman pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar
71b2(rgyud): ba rnams ni zung bdun po// 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o// rgyab tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha gzhus ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis kyi
71b3(rgyud): dbye bas so// srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o// dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tu gnas//
71b4(rgyud): kun tu ye shes dang ni stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol// a sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed kyang //
71b5(rgyud): ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed// ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha min gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas
71b6(rgyud): ngag kyang sngags shes pa// a sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges par skyed 'gyur mi yi bdag/ dbyangs ni ka tsa Ta pa ta ra ldan b+ha la sogs pa yang
71b7(rgyud): ngag sbyar ba rnams kyis skye ba'i gnas/ mgrim rkan steng gi cha ni mkhar rlung bsreg bya las skyes mchu dang son chu dang sa dag go// a sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin
72a1(rgyud): mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste// sna tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i sgra dang ldan pa la'o// rlung gi mtha'
72a2(rgyud): nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis// lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza' yi tshogs kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga/
72a3(rgyud): mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'phang g.yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga// de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o//
72a4(rgyud): rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzir ma'i gzhi la gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams// bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag
72a5(rgyud): gnyis dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste// cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba
72a6(rgyud): dag las rab tu skyes// 'jig rten khams kyi kun nas khor yug tu ni thang ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste// sa yi khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni
72a7(rgyud): drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so// mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa// de ni sa yi steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi
72b1(rgyud): tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo // phra rab brgyad rnams ngag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra mo ste// 'di rnams kyis ni ske che shig dang nas te ltos 'gro nas kyi sor
72b2(rgyud): te sor mo nyi ma ni// zung gi khyu'o khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur// rgyang grags bzhi rnams ngag gis dpag tshad de yis lha yul sa
72b3(rgyud): dang nam mkha' dag la tshad yin no// dang por chos bzang bskal bzung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang // dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa
72b4(rgyud): yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go// gzugs med dag ni a sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te i la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs// ha sogs la mtha'
72b5(rgyud): yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig bka sa'o// sring pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo// srid gsum
72b6(rgyud): ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te a sogs ka sogab tu dbye bas so// rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o// 'dam gyi
72b7(rgyud): chu dang mi bzang du bdag dang me dang mun pa dang ni ngu 'bod 'dun pa dang // lan tshwa chang dang chu dang 'o mazho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo no// 'od sngon man da ra ba ri ni Sha
73a1(rgyud): nor bu'i 'od dang dro Na bsil ri rdo rje'o// gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag dang rab mchog ku sha dang ni ma'i rtsa ci dang khrung khrung dag/ drag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste
73a2(rgyud): bdun pa 'dzam bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyis// shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lho ru me ni gru gsum mo// byang du chu ni byed kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser
73a3(rgyud): mchogs ni chu yi gter gyi zur// ri rab lhun po stong pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste// sa yi steng du dbag tshad stong phrag rnams ni raM dang klu dang
73a4(rgyud): gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur// lhun po yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phrag ni// lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi
73a5(rgyud): la khor yug dag gi yang dag ste// rA ni lnga po rnam dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun tu ni khor yug go// de yi phyi rol gling dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs
73a6(rgyud): kun tu ni me dang rlung // chu gter drug po thams cad dag kyang zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste// gling rnams dang nor rgyud mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i stong zag nyi shu rtsa snga mi
73a7(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshwa'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te// srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhin no// tshangs
73b1(rgyud): ba'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste// lhun po la ni tshig mnga'i tshogs dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'o//
73b2(rgyud): dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun tu sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas// zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni me dang rlung gi mtshams
73b3(rgyud): kyi mthar// shar du brgya byin mer ni me lhagashin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu// rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu
73b4(rgyud): sang tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshom ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyong ba ste// de dag dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa
73b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku// lhun po'i rgyub kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor// gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod pa 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu
73b6(rgyud): bgrod par byed// kla klo rnams kyang g.yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod par byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu// rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi
73b7(rgyud): sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur// dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can te rab tu zhugs pa der mi rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de/ rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldam rtsod pa'i
74a1(rgyud): dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no// dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste// re re dag gi
74a2(rgyud): tshad ni dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams ngag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o// phra dbugs d+hU dang chu tshod nyin zhag d+hu dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // drug brgya rnams
74a3(rgyud): ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag gcig gi tshad de sa gzhi dag la dus bzhi nus pa'i tshad du 'jug/ dum bu dum bur
74a4(rgyud): zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrod nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so// phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis// rgyal po le ni
74a5(rgyud): mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srang rnams te// 'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso
74a6(rgyud): kho'i zhag re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no// lo 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa sham b+ha la zhes bya bar 'gyur// de nas
74a7(rgyud): klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par ma ga'i yul du kla klo'i chos ngag rab tu 'jug/ de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par bya// mtha'
74b1(rgyud): dag sa gzhi la grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur// me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kyu klo'i lor ni rab tu
74b2(rgyud): grub dgra klo'i dbang po'i lo ni lag pa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i lhag ma ngag kyang nyams bsgyur// nag pa la sogs zla ba bsres te 'og tu dus kyis bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam par
74b3(rgyud): dbyer rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mo yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur/
74b4(rgyud): rtsa ba dag la drug gis chas rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang bar bya// steng 'og dag las mig dang sum cu'i nor ni bsres pa gsal bar bya ste drug cu'i cha dag gis// rnyed pa
74b5(rgyud): steng du rab bsras thub pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur// gnas nyid nyi zla ba sres pa dag las dus dang nyi mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni
74b6(rgyud): de yi steng gi phung por sbyin te dang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshogs// gnas gsum dbus ma dag ni dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis ma thob
74b7(rgyud): par gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshod dag gis thob pa nor te steng gi phung por gnyis kyis ni// bsgyur nas byin la skar mas bgos lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma la sogs
75a1(rgyud): longs spyod dag tu 'gyur// gza' la gza' ri rab sbyin mi bdag nyid 'gyur chu tshong rnams te 'og tu tshogs dag la yang gnyis// skar mar gnyis dang chu tshong drag
75a2(rgyud): po nor du rab gsal nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin// 'di dag zla ba'i nges par 'gyur te slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tu sbyin par gsungs// chos rnams sbyin dang dor dang slar yang
75a3(rgyud): sbyin pa dag ni gza' dang chu tshod rkang pa rnams su ste// tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob pa dag la sbyin ngor rkang pa'i don// stong la stong po rnam dag bcu gsum zla ba'i
75a4(rgyud): rkang par lnga ste mig dang nyi ma dag la phyogs// bcu gcig me la tshes zhes bya ste bcu dang chu gter rkang par nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o// lnga dang bug par nyi shu rtsa gnyis dus dang nor la
75a5(rgyud): rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// de la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas gsal byas nyi ma'i rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur// 'byung dang 'byung ba mda' dang rog byed me lag ri bong can ni
75a6(rgyud): snga ma'i cha dang gzhan la yang // tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam tho ba la rgyu ba rnams ni sbyin dang dor// rgyu zhing yod pas lhag ma bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas cha
75a7(rgyud): thob dag kyang de bzhin no// de nyid la ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i chu tshod sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur// gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis tshes bsgyur gsal bar nor te de yi sum cha dag/
75b1(rgyud): gis bsres pa'o// dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu lon dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya// bya ba lhag ma mig dmar ji bzhin ro dus ri bong can rnams ngal ba'i las
75b2(rgyud): la nang ba ste// longs spyod kyis ni chu chod bsgyur nas zla dang yon tan zla bas ma thob longs spyod dang bcas pa// bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis nyi ma la ni sbyin dang dor te gzhan du dag pa yod ma yin/
75b3(rgyud): nyi ma la ni dus ro sbrul dang bcu dang 'phrog byed drag po phyogs dang klu dang drug/ me dang nam mkha' dag kyang bgrod pa'i mthar te byang dang lho ru nor dang bu lon dag tu 'gyur/ zla ba 'pho
75b4(rgyud): ba'i dbye ba dag las phyogs kyi dbye bas zla ba drug ni nyon mor byed pas spyod// nyi ma la byin tshes grangs dag kyang 'og tu ro yis bsgyur la gza' yis longs spyod bsres pa dag/ dman par
75b5(rgyud): gyur pa ri bong mtshan mar 'gyur te mau yi bdag po nyi zla bsres pa sbyor ba'o// byed pa dag ni chos la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral gang zhig bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma'o// dag pa'i lo la klu bsres mkha'
75b6(rgyud): dang nam mkha' chu gter gyis bsgyur klu bsres rnams kyis sbyangs pa dag/ ri zla me yis rab tu phye ste nam mkha' ros bsgyur ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu tshod de// gnyis dang sum cu'i
75b7(rgyud): gza' dang chu tshod nges pa 'dir ldan zla ba dag la lo yi 'pho ba'o// lug sogs rnams kyi snon byed dag la gza' dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste// zla ba ri 'byung
76a1(rgyud): rig byed dag dang yon tan mnga' ste ri bong can dang ri zla gsum pa la'o// rig byed me 'byung zla ba mig dang lag pa dus dang rig byed mig ni drug pa dag la'o// drug dang /
76a2(rgyud): zla ba mda' dang zla ba ri dus me dang drug zla rig byed ri dang 'jig rten dang // drug dang rig byed stong pa dag ste stong pa mig mda' nyi ma'i go 'phang nya yi khyim la'o// zla drug 'phel dang 'grib
76a3(rgyud): par 'gyur te nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so// chu gter srog dang chu srang me ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gi/ lho phyogs su ni mtshan
76a4(rgyud): mo dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te kha ba'i ri yi byang du nyin mo'o// zla ba dag la mig dang nyi ma bsres pa mig gis rnam bsgyur zla ba'i tshig la gcig bsres te// mkha' dus chu yis rab phye
76a5(rgyud): thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba las kyang mkha' sogs cha yis skar ma'o// lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba gang yin de la sa chu tshod slar yang de bsgyur ba las chu srang ste// thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo
76a6(rgyud): gdong du 'gyur te muni can mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar phyed bsres pa'o// zla ba sum cus bsgyur ba nyin zhag so so dag dang bcas pa las ni ri mkha' ris thob pa// gnas gsum dbus su rnam par
76a7(rgyud): bsres pa las kyang chu gtor ros thob dman pa mi na gsal nyi ma nag go// ri dus gcig gis bsres pa dag kyang gsal ba'i nyi ma nag tshogs te ri klu dus kyis bgos pa yi// lhag ma skar mas bskur
76b1(rgyud): thob slar yang nam mtha' rnams bsgyur las la sogs pas gos pa rgya tshong // mig dmar la ni byed bcas pakra sbyang gal te bu lon sdug na 'khor so bsas la rnam par spyad/ byeng bas
76b2(rgyud): lhag par gyur na 'khor lo phyed ni dor bar bya ste dor ba'i lhag ma rim min 'gyur// skar ma drug cus bsgyur te chu tshong dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa 'byung me zla bas bgo// gang thob dal ba'i
76b3(rgyud): las ngag la yang nor dang bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so// de nyid bco brgyad ri ni rab tu gsal bar ro nang 'khor lo phyed la steng dang 'og tu ste// longs spyod kyis ni chu tshong bsgyur
76b4(rgyud): las mnga' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa// snga ma phyed la gzung byar 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur// zos pa tshogs gcig byas nas
76b5(rgyud): gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshod la'o// de nas nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o// zla skyes dkar po la yang nyi ma dag
76b6(rgyud): ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur/ sbyangs pa'i lhag mas 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste gza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshong bskur// drug cu'i cha yis thob pa
76b7(rgyud): gza' rgyu rkang pa dag las gzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid// zos pa dag ni tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag ste// sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal
77a1(rgyud): ba sogs te rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la mtha' dag gzhag par bya// de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brtsi ba rig par bya'o ma yi dbang // zla
77a2(rgyud): skyes dkar po las ni nyin mor byed pas rnam dag zla skyes dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur// stong dang nam mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' dag nyin zhag tshogs la me dang nyi ma ri yis dman//
77a3(rgyud): r-i nas bug pa ri dang klu yis bgo ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye bas bsgyur// rab brjod cha yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu tshod rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod dag tu 'gyur// zla
77a4(rgyud): skyes dor te nyi ma'i dbus nas mi bdag bzang po mi bdag skar ma phyed kyang yang dag spring // lhag ma'i bya ba nor dang bu lon dal dang myur ba'i las kyang mig dmar ji lta bzhin du 'gyur// zla
77a5(rgyud): skyes rkang pa ngal ba'i las la bcu ri me ste myur ba'i las la mi bdag la sogs so// nyin zhag tshogs ni mkha' mkha' ro dang mig gis dman pa byas nas so me chu gter dag gis bgo// lhag ma
77a6(rgyud): skar mas bsnun las skar ma slar yang chu tshod bla ma yi yang ngal ba'i las la'o// rgyu skar nyi ma sbyang ste 'phrog byed dgu dang rtse mo can ni ngal ba'i las la rkang pa'o// slar yang myur ba dag la rkang
77a7(rgyud): pa rab gsalam nu'i gnas la phyogs rkang la sogs de dag go// nyin zhag mkha' dang zla bas bsgyur nas chu gter nor gyis dman pa ri dang rgyal ba mig gis bgo/ skar mas bsgyur ba las
77b1(rgyud): kyang skar ma'i longs spyod slar yang chu tshong myur ba'i las la bla sangs kyi// rgyu sbyar dus ni nyi ma la sbyang zla dus ri bong can ni ngal ba'i las la rkang pa ste// myur la de nyid la sogs dbye bas rab
77b2(rgyud): gsal ma nu'i gnas dag las te sbyin dor mig dmar bzhin// mkha' mig klu dang rig byed kyis dman gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs ni drug ro re mkha' zla ba yis// bgo zhing skar mas
77b3(rgyud): bsgyur las skar mar 'gyur te sper pa yin dor bya dag kyang bco brgyad do// rkang pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis chos dus rab gsal ro yi gnas la'o myur ba'i las la ro la sogs// myur ngal rgyu ba dag
77b4(rgyud): kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa lnga ste 'khyog po nyid ni rim min gyis// phyed snga ma dang phyed phyi mar yang nyi mar 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza' rnams kyis ni 'byung ba yang // sum cu rtsa bdun lag
77b5(rgyud): pas bsgyur ba'i zla ba rnams kyis mjug rings dag ni myur dang 'khyog por 'gyur// gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur// nyi ma
77b6(rgyud): btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te de yi lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bas so// g.yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g.yon nas 'gro ba ste// g.yas
77b7(rgyud): la gnas pa dag ni g.yas kyis slar yang gsal bar 'di ni phan tshun 'thab ste dgra yin phyir// rang gi zhing la yang dag gnas rnams gal te de la dgra dag gyur na nges par 'thab pa'o// skar ba
78a1(rgyud): la ste gzhan la 'thab pa min par nges shing 'dir ni phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldan// gal te nyi ma yi ni g.yon du zla ba rab bzhugs gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g.yon pa yis/
78a2(rgyud): byang gi rwa ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig tu ni bgrod pa'i dbang gis sgo ru g.yas pa yang // tshogs mtshams su yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par 'gro ba mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o//
78a3(rgyud): g.yon du rgyu ba dag la g.yas min du ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis g.yas la g.yas pa'i char// de ltar sgra gcan gyis ni phyogs mtshams su 'dzin ri bong 'dzin pa 'byung ba dag ni rgyab
78a4(rgyud): tu yang // tha skar la sogs nag pa phyed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su 'go la'i ri mo'o// rgyu skar g.yas dang g.yas min dag la nges par srid pa'i gnas su khyim gyi dbye bas yang
78a5(rgyud): ngag gnas// gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la 'go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug
78a6(rgyud): dang srang sogs la'o// me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mda' ri'o// dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri mo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag
78a7(rgyud): kyang mtshan mo gcig ni mnyam pa la'o// phyis nas g.yas dang g.yas min ngag tu rgyu ste nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis// lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba 'dor zhing nyin dang
78b1(rgyud): mtshan mo dag kyang ji srid bgrod padag gi mthar// nyi ma ri bong can gyi nying mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so// gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam/
78b2(rgyud): par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o// de phyir gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par grang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no// bug pa zhes bya me grangs dag lnga 'khrig pa gzhur
78b3(rgyud): gnas phyogs kyi tshad dang bzhi pa dag la ni// nyi ma karka Ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang // seng ge bum par rab zhugs bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni nya dang bu mor
78b4(rgyud): gnas pa dag la'o// 'dir ni g.yon bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma chu srin gnas pa la ste bum par nyi mas gnyis pa la// nyal dum bu gsum par mi rnams kyi na bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas
78b5(rgyud): bzhi par ro// 'byung ba zhes byar nyi ma glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nyi ga nas sa ni drug pa bdud par yang // nyi ma karka Ta la gnas pas 'gyur te seng ge la gnas sa yi dum bu brgyad
78b6(rgyud): par ro// bu mos bug par srang gi nyi mas bcu par 'gyur te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o// gzhu la gnas pas bcu gnyis par 'gyur mi rnams bgrod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis
78b7(rgyud): rtsibs kyi sa la'o// de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma bgrod pa'i dbang gis karka Ta sogs khyim rnams dag la'o// steng du drug dang klu yi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod
79a1(rgyud): pa dag gi mthar// de nas g.yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mda' ni btu
79a2(rgyud): dang bral bar gyur pa dbus nas 'go la'i ri mo ste// de las gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mda' dang mda' ni byang dang lhor yang ngo // lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho 'gongs
79a3(rgyud): nas nyin mor byed pa dag ni lho ru me yi bar du 'gro bar byed// kai la sha yi byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ri la byang du yang ri byang la gnas pa'o// mda' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad
79a4(rgyud): stong phrag rnams ni phyogs kyis bgrod pa dag la 'gro bar byed// phyed bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin la 'dor ba lnga dang sa 'dzin stong phrag dag las so// khyim gcig la ni nyi ma
79a5(rgyud): gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed// dum bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rim pas so// tshad gang dum bu
79a6(rgyud): gang du nyin mo'i dbang gis yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la'o// lam phyed 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o// ri yi rgyal po dag ni
79a7(rgyud): skye bo thams cad kyi yang byang ngan gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag/ nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur te ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang de ni nub pa nub// dus dang thun mtshams bzhi dang
79b1(rgyud): zur tshong nyin dang mtshan mo dus kun tu ni yang dag d+hA ba rnams// dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur pa lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni rab gsal nyi ma'i sal 'khor// chu tshong dus la dbyug
79b2(rgyud): tshad stong phrag drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste// drug cu la ni me 'bum drug dang snga dang ri bo'i stong phrag nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor// nyin dang mtshan mor 'gro
79b3(rgyud): la phyed la mkha' ma chu tshod bgrod de 'go la dag la g.yas dang ni// g.yas min ngag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum// lug gi dus sbyor
79b4(rgyud): la ni chu srang du 'gyur mkha' dgu lag ste mkha' dus mig ni glang la 'gyur// zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mda' ro'i chu tshong du 'gyur ku li'i rwa dang seng ge la'o// bu mo
79b5(rgyud): la ni phyed bcas drug ste nges par srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur// dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char ba dag kyang de bzhin nyi rgyu skar dbye bas so// stong
79b6(rgyud): phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya ldan pa dag las so yi cha yis nges par phyung gyur pa// lus la dbugs lcags gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung ba ri dang dus rnams ngag gi grangs/
79b7(rgyud): stong phrag sum cu cu drug dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang lo brgya'i tshad du rab tu grags pa ste// stong du me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu chong du 'gyur drug cu'i cha yos nyin zhag kyang //
80a1(rgyud): ba'i phyogs te nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag dang sa skyes zla ba dgu rnams ngag gi mtshan mo'o// bla ma'i lo drug tu gyur pa sangs kyi yang bgrod par 'gyur te zla skyes kyi
80a2(rgyud): yang bgrod pa'o// tshes zhes bya ba'i lo ni nyo skyes kyis te de bzhin mun can gyi dgu rgyal po mjug rings dman// de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i
80a3(rgyud): dus kyi lo dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum// phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag grangs dag las kyang lo brgyar 'gyur te dus kyi 'khor los dman no 'dir// srog ni snying stobs la 'bab
80a4(rgyud): rdul gyi bar dang mun pa la yang lus ngag sems kyi dbye bas so// lha mi lag 'gro rnams ni de nas lnga pa nyid 'gyur zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mo dag gis kyang // grangs ni shin tu nges
80a5(rgyud): pa 'di dag dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags pa yin no mi yi dbang // ma bcad dus kyi 'khor lo'i bgrod pa dag la bu lon dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams// bkra
80a6(rgyud): shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyis myur ba'i las dag la yang rkang pa'i chu tshod de// sa skyes la ni rig byed dus mer rab 'gyur srid pa'i gnas rnams dag la rgyu ba'i dbye ba
80a7(rgyud): yis snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par bu lon nor gyi bgrod pa dag las gnas kyi dbye bas nges par sbyar// dang por rgyal dbang grangs kyi chu tshod dag ste me dang mig ni rnam gsum dag tu
80b1(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur// gnas gnyis dag la gcig dang mig ste bco brgyad chos dang drag po me dang rtsa bar drag po dang // sum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad cu dag dang brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la 'dir ni
80b2(rgyud): gsum bcas lnga bcu'o// de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur la bu lon dag dang nor yang rim pa min dang rim pas so// rig byed dag dang bug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag myur
80b3(rgyud): ba'i las la chu tshod dag tu 'gyur// gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug gzhan la tshes dang ma nu myos byed drag po ri dang dbang po mkha'// rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni rab gsal
80b4(rgyud): nges par bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu ste/ nyi shu brgyad dang sum cu rtsa bzhi dag kyang ma nu'i gnas la rgyu ba'i dbye bas yang dag gnas// chu gter nam mkha' dag dang zla ba'i grangs te 'di
80b5(rgyud): dag rnams ni bla ma'i chu tshod tshogs su 'gyur// gnas gnyis dag la phyogs kyi chung dang dgu nor dus drug lag pa zla ba dag dang rtsa bar ni// me drug bug pa dang ni drag po mi bdag thub
80b6(rgyud): ba rnams te rgyu ba thams cad rim pas so// myur ngal 'khyog po la yang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par nyi ma'i dbye ba dag gis rgyu bar byed// drug dang zla ba chu gter grangs kyi chu tshod dag
80b7(rgyud): ni ba sangs kyi yang myur ba'i las la 'gyur// gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes dang de bzhin lag mig rnam pa gnyis// skyon dang chos dang brgyad de rtsa bar
81a1(rgyud): drug dang nam mkha' yon tan ngag dang gcig gis dman pa'i brgya// mthar ni me dang ri yi grangs te brten pa srid pa'i gnas la ba sangs rgyu ba rim pas so// nyi
81a2(rgyud): ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs kyi chu tshod tshogs pa 'di dag tu 'gyur mi yi dbang // drug dang 'byung ba dag dang 'byung ba rig byed chu gter mig dang zung dang stong pa rtsa bar ni/ phyogs
81a3(rgyud): dang rig byed dag dang 'byung ba ro dang nor dang rtse mo can ni rim pas gzhag par bya// de ltar gza' rnams kyi ni rgyu ba mtha' dag dus kyi 'khor lo dag las shin tu nges par 'gyur// sum
81a4(rgyud): cu rtsa drug phyed bcas zla ba nges par nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ni bkra shis la sogs pa// gza' rnams ngag gi dal ba'i las la rkang par 'gyur te mig gi grangs kyi chu tshod do// de nyid
81a5(rgyud): bco brgyad ri dag brtan pa sa yi bu yi phyi ma dang ni snga ma'i cha la ste// phyogs ri me ni gza' lhag gi 'o dbang phyug dgu me bla ma'i snga cha dag dang gzhan la yang // dkar po'i mda' dang /
81a6(rgyud): gter zla ba spen pa yi yang mig bcas mig dang nyin zhag dus su 'gyur// zla ba la ni sa skyes longs spyod chu tshad dgu bcu dag ste lnga dang 'jig rten zla ba'i grangs/ pa sangs kyi ste de
81a7(rgyud): bzhin gza' lag gi yang gcig tu bsdus pa kha ro sreg za dag tu 'gyur// 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis los nyim nag bu lon chu tshodang longs spyod 'di ni gsum gyi'o// zla bar bla ma'i longs
81b1(rgyud): spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu chong drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te// chu srang sum cu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu chong dag ni nyi ma'i bul longs spyod do// gcig tu gyur
81b2(rgyud): nyon zhug ces bya gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mor bcas// gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyi ma nag rnams kyi nyon bzhin bu lo dgaza' drug gi yang longs spyod do/
81b3(rgyud): zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig dal ba'i las la khyab bdag rjes su gza' rnams kyis ni longs ma spyad// daM las rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi rgya tshong dgra ni zla ba 'di nyid la spyod
81b4(rgyud): de sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman// nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag la zla ba'i
81b5(rgyud): chu tshod lnga// gang zhig ma spyad phyed kyi chu tshod de ni dus kyi nyin zhag dus la cha dman zla ba ste// de ni nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur te nges par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyin
81b6(rgyud): zhag de'o// sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyod dag gis bgos pa las/ thob pa dag ni mjug rings chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i
81b7(rgyud): dus su sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod las// chu srang bdun dang byed phrogs nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la sbyang bar bya// mjug rings nyi ma dag
82a1(rgyud): dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag la mdun dang rgyab nas so// rgyu bar chu srang phyed bcas gnyis spyod nyin dang nyin la nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la
82a2(rgyud): rim pa ste// rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis de rgyu chu tshod dag kyang 'jig rten gyis ni tshes grangs bsgyur// phyed bcas zla bar chu tshod gnyis ni nyin zhag so sor 'char te myur 'khyog
82a3(rgyud): dag la mdun rgyab tu'o// phyed bcas zla ba'i bar dag tu ni de yi 'char ba mi yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong bar 'gyur// slar yang dpal dus 'khor lor rab 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi
82a4(rgyud): longs spyod dag la mthong mi 'gyur// de yi 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes par 'gyur// lo yi nyin zhag lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang
82a5(rgyud): mangs bsnun bgrod pa'i nyin zhag dag gis rab tu dman// bug pa bsres pa rnams ni rang gis bgrod pa'i yon tan dbang gis gza' rnams dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// sa
82a6(rgyud): skyes la ni ri klu drug gi nyin zhag tshogs su 'gyur te ri bug ri klu zla skyes la'o// lha yi bla ma dag la so ma rig byed du 'gyur ba sangs la ni rI dang rgyal ba mig/ nyi ma'i bul drug drug/
82a7(rgyud): ri dang nam mkha' gcig gi nyin zhag tshogs ni dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro// sa skyes la ni ri dus gcig kyang nges par nor du 'gyur te zla ba'i bu la brgyas bsnun pa// me dang
82b1(rgyud): ma mis dam ma ring bsangs dag la nyimasas 'acus pasgyur chu ga ter brgyad kyis dman/ gongs su'adus mis dag dang mkha' lag gangs pa dus rnams rmong sa
82b2(rgyud): bu lan 'gyur// sa skyes la ni byung bcas dbu sgyul zhes byed lag sa byungag tu m+WAr nyi ma thas la'o// pasangs la drug ni skyes la ston bu la nas gyur mtha dun marjes spyod
82b3(rgyud): dbus nas snang bar bya// byi nas de dag rnams me dag par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po skye ba'i rgya gar rtsu ba las// dma'ab rang gi yan lag dag las dag 'gyur ba snod pa'ing rje
82b4(rgyud): gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnas so// zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo yi zla ba yis// cha thob dag kyang bu lon du 'gyur nyis ri bong cang
82b5(rgyud): gyis rjes su ma spyad chu tshod byed// slar yang mjug rings kyi ni gang zhig lhag po nyi ma nag so so'i dus su zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur// drug cu'i cha yis chu tshod nyin nag so so'i dus
82b6(rgyud): su myur dang 'khyen par 'char ba dag la yang // zla skyes blon po myur ba dag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur tes skyes mjug rings 'khyog po la// dmun pa bsangs dal bras
82b7(rgyud): ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med// myur la shar du kha phyogs 'gyur te slar yang 'khyog por rgyu la rab zhugs gzhan du mngon par phyogs// ngal la lho ru
83a1(rgyud): bzhi phyogs 'gyur te rang bgrod yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba la yang byung du gdong // zla ba'i nyim nag sum cu gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur kha mig zla ban
83a2(rgyud): ba'i rkang pa ste// khyim ni bcu gnyis po rnams dus kyis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed drug kyang nyi ma'i rkang pa'o// de yi nang du 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang ba grong pa 'gro ba'i
83a3(rgyud): dbang gis rim min rim pa ste// 'khor lo byed phyed dag lo mtha' dag nor dang dus kyi grangs rnams rig par bya'o mi yi dbang // tshigs mtshams su ni ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor
83a4(rgyud): dag la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang // rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin te ri bong ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu'o// phyed dag gyur na
83a5(rgyud): phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste// gnag dang dkar ba'i tshogs mtshams dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzom// mi rnams
83a6(rgyud): kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams ngag gi lo yi longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya// gnas gnyis phyogs kyi chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar
83a7(rgyud): bya 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed la'o// slar yang phung po gnyis kyis nges par bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs
83b1(rgyud): dag tu ni rab tu 'gyur// stong pa stong pa nam mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad// gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang
83b2(rgyud): dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangs su rab tu grags// stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan lhor ni yang dag ste// stong pa nam mkha' mkha'
83b3(rgyud): mig yon tan chu gter rnams kyi lo yi grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur// lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas// slar
83b4(rgyud): yang tha skar la sogs dag dang rab byung zhes dang de bzhin nag pa'i zla ba la sogs dang // gza' dang sbyor ba tshes dang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste de yi dus su ni//
83b5(rgyud): lha rnams dag dang lha min rnams kyis 'khrug pa drug po sa gzhi'i gnas rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas rgyu skar rnams kyis nyin zhag gcig ni bsgyur bar 'gyur te chu tshod drug
83b6(rgyud): cu rnams kyis kyang // gza' rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dag gis nges par tshan rab tu thob par gyur pa longs spyod 'gyur// zla ba rdzogs na nges par 'gyur te smrar yang
83b7(rgyud): gza' dang chu tshod dang ni rkang pa rnams su 'gyur// rgyu skar la ni nyi ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur nyin zhag tshogs las dag pa zla ba gcig gi'o// sde pa drug na nyi ma'i dbyangs
84a1(rgyud): n+d+ha/ bcas nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur lo gsumanyim dgal ste// a sogs zung du nyi ma nag ces byas ma 'gyur ro 'ong can ma byed bcas zlab zlab la/ chu chong
84a2(rgyud): hA sogs dbyangs bcas sum 'gyur gang yin de dag rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni mtshan mo gsum// dpal ldan stong pa gzhom meng la sogs sum 'gyur gang de rnams kyang sgra gcan
84a3(rgyud): gyi ni dus sbyor gsum// 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs ni mi yi bdag po phyed bcas zla ba dag dang lo gsum mo// phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dor nas thub mchog rnams kyis bcad pa dag ni
84a4(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lor 'gyur// zla bar bsre ba gza' gcig dag ni mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod tshogs la gnyis dang rkang pa mda'// 'khor lo dag las nges par lha mo drug cu rnams kyis
84a5(rgyud): rnam par phye ba dag ni gzar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang chu tshong thub pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i lha mo rnams las tshogs la gnyis// sbyin dor sbyin pa dag dang ri bong can
84a6(rgyud): gyi rkang pa dang po lnga ste 'dir ni drug gis so// zla ba'i phyogs gsum nyin zhag rnams ni sum 'gyur dag kyang nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab tu grags// drug cus phye ba'i skar ma gnyis
84a7(rgyud): dang nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang por spyod ldan dbang phyug chu chod do// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag phyi dang lus la dbyer med par// bsdu ba
84b1(rgyud): dang ni spro ba'i snang du srid pa gsum gyi gnas su nyi ma dus kyi gzugs dang ni/ shes rab thabs kyi rabang bye dang ni mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba ste/
84b2(rgyud): chags bral dang ni thub mchog rigs dang tshangs dang drag po la sogs lnga rnams kyis ni shes ma yin// a sogs lnga yis dbyangs gang dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis dga' ba la sogs
84b3(rgyud): snga dang lngar gyur pa/ de dag 'dir ni 'char byed mi bdag gal te de las skyes la sogs gza' dag ma gyur na'o// sa skyes mi shi shar bar gyur cing gal te slar yang sngon
84b4(rgyud): drug dag dang ldan pa nyid gyur pa// de la gal te g.yul dang nang du gyur na mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur te dang po'i dbyangs kyi'o// bzang po zla skyes dag gis gza'
84b5(rgyud): 'di la ni gal te margya nyid ldan na gnyis pa 'chi bar 'gyur// rgyal ba bla ma dag la gal te skrag tu gyur na gsum pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// stong pa'i tshes dang
84b6(rgyud): ba sangs dag la gal te mon grur gyur na bzhi pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur// rdzogs pa spen pa dag dang lhan cig tu ni bra nyer gyur na lnga pa 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// nyi ma dag la
84b7(rgyud): dga' ba 'char ba rnams kyi rmar yang 'gyur te gzir ba rnams ni nyon mongs nyid// zla ba la ni bzang po 'char ba rnams kyi nges par g.yul dang nad dag la yang de bzhin 'gyur//
85a1(rgyud): bden par 'char ba lnga po rnams kyi 'bras bu mang por 'chi ba'i sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur// nad dang g.yul dang yul du bgrod dang bag mu dag
85a2(rgyud): la dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu shes par bya// de ltar rgyu skar gza' ste dbyangs tshogs tshis rnams dag ni de nyid lnga yi rab tu dbye ba yis// phyogs dang zla ba bgrod pa dag dang lo dang
85a3(rgyud): drug cu'i lo rnams la yang 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur// nag pa sogs la 'dir ni yan lag bcu gnyis dag gis 'char 'gyur phyogs kyi dbye bas de nyid do// nyin zhag dbyangs rnams bdun cu rtsa
85a4(rgyud): gnyis dag gis 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te zla ba'i dbye ba la'o// zla ba drug gis bgrod pa'i yan lag dag ste rab byung la sogs bcu gnyis lo rnams dag gi lo// de ltar dbyangs ni lnga po rnams
85a5(rgyud): dag 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te de ni phyi nas nub pa'o// dang po la ni dbyangs rnams byis pa rang tshes yon tan dbang gis dpal ldan gzhon nu gnyis pa la// dar babargan po rim pas me dang
85a6(rgyud): chu gter nyin zhag la ste lnga pa la ni nub par 'gyur// a sogs dbyangs lnga gang dag nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur de dag rnams ni rnam gnyis sum cu nyid// ka sogs sde pa'i yi ge rnams
85a7(rgyud): la rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis mtha' dag sbyar bar bya ba ste// thung ngu rims ni 'dir yang dkar po'i phyogs la 'char bar 'gyur te de nyid lnga yi dbye bas so// ring po rnams ni nag po'i phyogs
85b1(rgyud): la shin tu nges par 'gyur te sgo dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so// nyi shu rtsa bdud rgyugar de la gsal bar mda' mi mu chod nyi ma'i dus sbyor cha dgub// lug gi dus sbyor la sogs 'di dag rnamapa
85b2(rgyud): kyang 'dir ni rang bzhin gsum ste brtan g.yo shin tu mnyam// lug dang kanaT srang chu srin 'dir ni g.yo ba dag ste de las gnyis pa brtan pa'o// lhag ma gzhan ni gnyis kyi rang
85b3(rgyud): bzhin de dag nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su rtag pa nyid du 'char// de la yud tsam sum cu rnams dang nyin zhag dus la chu tshod dag kyang drug cu kho na ste// dang por sum cu'i dbyangs rnams
85b4(rgyud): 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur ba nyid de yud tsam yud tsam dag la'o// sde pa'i yi ge sum cu chu tshong rnams la rab tu 'gyur te zung dang ring por rab dbye bas/ zla ba'i dbus su chos kyi chal
85b5(rgyud): 'char bar brjod de de dag rub ba dag kyang de nyid la'o// stong pa rlung ma chu dang sa rnams dag kyang a la sogs pa dbyangs ni lnga po rnams kyi rigs// sgra gcan me dang zla'i zla skyes mig
85b6(rgyud): dmar ba sangs bla ma mjug rings spen pa 'dir lhag lnga// sngar brjod dus sbyor re re de la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis chu tshod rnams ni bsgrub par bya// de yi dbus su dbyangs
85b7(rgyud): gang byung ba'i gza' zhes bya ba stobs ldan de yi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// g.yon pa dag ras zung ngu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir mi 'char bar 'gyur te galas pa nas kyang gzhan dag gi
86a1(rgyud): g.yon la stong pa la sogs de nyid dag dang gza' tshogs rgyu ba sgra gcan la sogs mtha' dag ste// g.yas la de nyid 'dzin ma sogs dang gza' yi tshogs ni nges
86a2(rgyud): par nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa nyid// phyi rol du yang dus kyi chu tshod gza' yi gnas dang mnyam pa dbyangs bcas dag ni bsgrub par bya// dris na g.yul gyi slad du 'chi bar 'gyur te stong pa la ni
86a3(rgyud): dus dag shar bar gyur pa na'o// rlung du nyi ma dag la 'pham zhing me las skyes shar ba dag la rma ru 'gyur ba yin// chu dang bla ma la ni 'dum par 'gyur te sa la spen pa shar la 'khrug par mi
86a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'chi dang nyon mongs rmar 'gyur bde ba dag dang mnyam pa nyid ni 'dri byed nad pa rnams kyi'o// g.yul du dgra ni nges par rab tu nyams par 'gyur te sgra gcan stong pa dag
86a5(rgyud): la shar na yang // rlung dang zla ba dag la 'pham dang g.yul du rma yang zla skyes me la shar ba dag la'o// tshul pa sangs la ni don rnyed sa la mjug rings shar ba dag la dgra yang dbang du
86a6(rgyud): 'gyur// de bzhin bgrod pa bag ma dag la g.yon gyi lam la gza' rnams kyi ni dge ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur// pho nyas brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams gang dag nges par bcu yis bsgyur te
86a7(rgyud): khyim gyi 'khor lo dag gis bsre// slar yang de dag 'byung bas bsnun te nye ba'i skye bo dang ldan bdun gyi cha yis lhag ma mi// zla ma mnga' dang ri bo mi mnyam gnas su gyur na mi rnams la ni
86b1(rgyud): rnyed pa yong ma yin// migu dang rig byed ro ste shin tu mnyam pa'i gnas su gyur na bya ba dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur// lo dang zla ba phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus ni dus sbyor dbus bu/
86b2(rgyud): rab tu zhugs pa ste// dus sbyor gcig ni lha yi dbye bas gza' tshogs dang ldan dbyangs dang bcas pa'i de nyid tha dad do// de nyid gcig ni dbugs rnams drug cus mngon lhag yon tan
86b3(rgyud): brgya yi dus kyi chu tshong dag la gnas// chu tshod cha shas chu srang drug cu de yi cha shas zhes pa dbugs drug rnams so mi yi dbang // dbugs 'byung 'jug pa'i dbus su mi dge dge ba'i
86b4(rgyud): 'bras bu dag kyang rnal 'byor ldan pas shes par byed// lha shes rnams kyis nyin zhag 'das pa'i dbang gis nyi ma zla ba bsgrubs nas dus kyi chu chod do// da ltar byung ba shes pa min par
86b5(rgyud): dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'jig rten 'dir ni gang brjod pa// de ni long ba yis kyang long ba bzung nas glang chen seng ges gtams pa'i thabs por rab tu 'jug/ phra mo'i rnal
86b6(rgyud): 'byor mi shes pa la gza' yi stobs dang bcas pa'i dus sbyor sbyor ba sbyin pa ni// skye dang bdun par gnas pa'i khyim la dus me nyi mas skyes nyin mor byed pa'i bu rnams kyis// de la
86b7(rgyud): 'tsho dang nang dang tha dang nges par mtha' dag nor ni rnam par nyams pa dag kyang byed// de phyir spang bar bya ste nges par bdag gi tshig gis dus sbyor gzhan ni rab tu sbyin par bya// skye dang
87a1(rgyud): bdun par gnas pa'i khyim la sgra gcan zla ba zla skyes bla ma pa sangs dang bcas pas// dgra nyams rang nyid rgyas shing g.yul du rnam par rgyal te dga' ma dang bcas
87a2(rgyud): nor dag 'thob par 'gyur// yang dag dus sbyor thams cad kyis te slar yang gal te rang lus g.yon gyi rtsa las gyur pa na// nges par don ni thams cad 'grub ste mtha' dag sa yi steng du
87a3(rgyud): dag pa'i gza' dang tshes la'o// rgyu skar rnams ni dgu dang dgu dang dgu yis cha gsum byas te skyes pa'i rgyu skar dang po las// gdug pa rnams ni zla ba dag dang lhan cig mi mnyam gnas
87a4(rgyud): gyur nang pa rnams ni 'chi ba nyid// tha skar la sogs rnams kyis rtsa gsum sbrul yang smras par gyur pa nam gru nyid kyi bar du ste// sdig zla skyes pa'i rgyu skar gal te rtsa gcig dag la gyur
87a5(rgyud): nA mi rnams dag ni rnam par nyams// drug dang tshes dang brgyad dang ri zla bcu dang bcu dgu nyi ma nyi shu gcig gi lo bzang rnams// nyi zla mig dmar gza' lhag nyi skyes bla ma lag 'gro dkar po rnams
87a6(rgyud): kyis de dag rim pas spyod// de dang rang gi gnas skabs la yang de las sde pa brgyad po rnams kyi yi ge dag la ni// drag po rnams kyis zhi ba min pa byed cing mchog tu bde byed zhi ba'i
87a7(rgyud): rang bzhin gza' gang dag/ rgyal gyi zla bar nyi ma chu srin la son ma rig pa ste bum par nyi ma mchu la yang // 'du byed du 'gyur mi yi bdag po nya ru nyi ma dpo dag la ni rnam par shes pa ste/
87b1(rgyud): lug tu 'i mnag pa lan ming dang gzugs so glang la khrig la monas gasngon dag la// mig sogs dang ni rig pa dag sa nyi ma klan gnas rgya thul mtshor bar 'gyur// se ger
87b2(rgyud): mthu ba mas yang snang ba bu ma dang ni mang du tsun pa grums dang ni// bkrir zlab dag la len pa nyid dmang par 'gyur te sbyin dru thig pa 'i nyims// skye ba dang ni gdus nyis rna
87b3(rgyud): mgo ga la yang de bzhin ma sho rimI pa ste// de ltar ni zla'i dbye ba dag las gnyis ka bzod pa'i dbang gis rgyal po yan lag bcu gnyis so// rgyal dang maN+Da yi mtshams su chu sri ngam
87b4(rgyud): mnyis gnas pa'i gza' de la ni ma rig pa// de nas gnyis pa la mi shi bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin skye ba gsum pa la'o// de bzhin srid pa la sogs thams cadaman
87b5(rgyud): lag bcu gnyis par du rim pa dag gis yongs su 'gyur// de nas me dang chu ga ter mnga' ste chu srin bgrod pa'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag drug pa'o// chos nas bya ba'i bza'/
87b6(rgyud): spos phyogs te nyi ma rgyu ba'i dbang gis res 'ga' yang lag bcu drug gis// 'du byed ma chu la mtshams ngag tu ste bum par nyis ston pa de lta 'du byed khona'o// de nas gnyis pas
87b7(rgyud): ni rnam par shes par 'gyur te nyin zhag gsum pa la ni ming dang gzugs// de ltar zla ba gnyis la yan lag tu 'gyur nyi ma'i dbang gis spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so// de la
88a1(rgyud): ma rig la sogs yan lag mi mnyam pa yang bya ba kun la dge bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang zhig 'du byed la sogs mnyam pa dag kyang rtag tu dbang bgrod bag ma dag
88a2(rgyud): la dge ba min// de bzhin phyogs kyi dbye ba dag la ri bong can gyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis gang // dkar dang nag po'i phyogs la dbang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis spro dang
88a3(rgyud): bsdu ba'i sbyor ba dag gis so// nyi ma mig dmar mjug rings spen pa g.yas sam rgyab tu yang dag gnas pas dgra ni 'chi bar byed// g.yon dang mdun du zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' tshogs mtha'
88a4(rgyud): ngag g.yul gyi sar ni de bzhin kho na'o// rnal 'byor ma dang biSh+Ti drag po rlung dang bcas pa g.yas dang rgyab tu bde ba sbyin pa ste// g.yon dang mdun du 'tsho ba'i rang bzhin mnyam dang mi mnyam
88a5(rgyud): gyur pas gnyis ka'i dpung ni 'joms par 'gyur// tshangs ma drag mo gzhon nu ma dang mkha' 'gro'i bdag gis 'gro ma phag mo rdo rje lag ma dang // tsa mur+N+Na nyid dpal mo dag ni nor gyi chos
88a6(rgyud): la 'gyur te dang po'i tshes dang dgu pa la// brgya byin du ste gnod sbyin me zur lha min gshin rje chu lha rlung dang dbang ldan sa la'o// 'di ni 'char ba dag tu byed de slar yang tshes rnams la ni
88a7(rgyud): brgyad gnyis dbye bas tha dad // biSh+Ti rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs la brgya byin gshin rje chu dang gnod sbyin du yang 'dir 'char 'gyur// slar yang nag po'i phyogs la rtse mo can dang
88b1(rgyud): lha min rlung dang dbang ldan zur du rim pas so// drag po shar nas gnan byed du 'gro nyin zhag dbang gis byang du yang ste byang gi nyi ma la'o// chu nas me ldan dag tu de ni nges par 'gro ste lho
88b2(rgyud): ru lho yi nyi ma dag la'o// shar nas thun phyed dag la rlung du rab tu 'jug ste de bzhin du ni lho ru 'gro bar byed// dbang ldan chu dang me dang gnod sbyin lha min grong khyer du 'gro rlung ngu nyi ma nub par
88b3(rgyud): 'gyur// dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan dor nas rlung dag las kyang rnam par rgyal 'gyur mtshan ma'i 'thab mo dang // 'khrug pa dag la rtse ba'i sgra gcan gyi ni dgra yi stobs 'joms
88b4(rgyud): de dang mtshungs pa gzhan yod min// dbyangs dmar 'thab mo pa ni mnyam dang mi mnyam g.yul la lhag pa dag gis 'joms par byed pa ste// dbugs la gnyis kyi min gang
88b5(rgyud): snying la rab tu 'jug na de ni 'khrug pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// pho nyas brjod pa dang po'i ming de rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te phyis kyi ming ni pham par 'gyur// 'du ba kha dog
88b6(rgyud): dbyangs la sogs pa mnyam drang mi mnyam gyur pa rnams kyi 'bras med ston pa nyid// dus ni 'thab mo'i sa la mi bdag rnams kyi g.yas dang gal te g.yas min dag la bun can
88b7(rgyud): gyur g.yul du lha yi mgon po dag ni 'phrog byed drag po dang bcas mi rnams kyis kyang 'joms par 'gyur// de phyir dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan 'khyog po drag po lha min
89a1(rgyud): rnams las srid gsum rnam rgyal ba// g.yul gyi dus su sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shes par bya ste gzhan du dgra ni nyams pa med// sa la rgyu skar byas
89a2(rgyud): nas thub pa dus kyis bsgyur ba dbang po gnod sbyin chu dang gshin rjer ni// de yi 'khor lo 'khor bar byed de nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis mtha' dag rnams ni rig par bya// rgyu skar gang
89a3(rgyud): la dus dang mun can du yang rab gyur lta ba lhung na gnyis po dag la yang // g.yul du dgra yi sde rnams ngag ni 'phral la nges par ltung ste sgo yi dbus su rgyal bar 'gyur// sgra gcan dus la
89a4(rgyud): gnas pa rnams ni 'chi dang bcas par 'gyur zhing dpung rnams mnyam du lhung ba ni// lta ba'i cha la nges song rnams te brang 'gro 'gro ba'i dbang gis der ni sde rnams bcom par 'gyur//
89a5(rgyud): lta ba'i cha ni spangs pa rnams dag rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te lto bar zhugs la gnyis po yang // de ltar dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra can bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa dus kyi 'khor lor shes
89a6(rgyud): bar bya// rnal 'byor ma dang biSh+Ti drag po gza' tshogs dang bcas dbyangs ni 'char ba dag dang bcas gyur pa// de dag thams cad btang nas rgyal rigs rnams kyis srid gsum
89a7(rgyud): rnam rgyal gcig pu gzung bar bya ba ste// gang gis zla ba nyi ma za zhing skabs gsum pa dag 'jigs byed drag po'i gzugs can mig sman mdog sa la gang zhig nyin dang mtshan
89b1(rgyud): mor shar dang nub dang lho dang byang du yang ni 'khor ba'o// g.yul du 'pham pa'i dgra bo dag ni gal te 'phral la rdzong gi nang du zhugs par gyur pa na/ phyi rol tu ni 'khrul 'khor
89b2(rgyud): bya ste rgyun chad med par rdo dang me mda' rab tu 'bab pa dang // ral gri la sogs gcod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dag dang sa gzhi'i gnas la gur dang cog ni dbye ba yis// de yi rdzong ni
89b3(rgyud): phyi mar byas te nyin zhag nyung zad dag gis gdug pa de ni bsgrub par bya// ka ba bzhi ni brgyad gnyis khru ldan mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas nas gnas brgyad du ni phrug gyur pa/ tha dad
89b4(rgyud): rnams ni ga dang bu chu gter dus dang dus rnams kyis te rgyab tu yang ni gcig gis so// rtsa bar 'khrul 'khor tshad ni lag pa bcu ru 'gyur te steng gi cha dag la ni de yi byed/ sgyogs mda'
89b5(rgyud): khru gnyis ngag gis dman par 'gyur te oM log bcu yi steng gi cha ni lhag pa'o// zlum por phyed bcas khru gnyis dag ste sor mo thub pa ma nur nges pa'i bug pa gcig tu ni// khru gang dor
89b6(rgyud): nas sgyogs mda' rab tu gzhugs ste o log bcu yi rgyab kyi cha la gzer gyis gdab// mgo bor a long dag la thag pa lnga bcu gdags par bya ste steng gi tshad ni zlum po phyed// sgrogs
89b7(rgyud): mnga'i mthar ni mdzub mo dang bcas rab tu 'jug ste gnya' non zlum po dag ni mtho gang ngo // sgyogs mda'i mdzub mo la ni 'ur mthil thag par bcas pa dag las nges par khru gsum dag tu
90a1(rgyud): 'gyur// de yi nang du rdo ba rab tu bcug ste stobs ldan 'then byed rnams kyis 'then par gyur pa dag/ btang ba myur du nam mkhar 'gro ste 'phral la nges par
90a2(rgyud): ltung zhing khang steng sogs dang lam srang du// mtha' dag phye mar byas nas sa yi 'og tu 'gro ste rdo rje 'bab pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin// de yi mdzub mo zla ba phyed pas sa gzhi'i gnas su tshangs pa'i ri mo
90a3(rgyud): nges gnyis dag tu ni// brgyad gnyis btang ba'i gnas rnams dag ste lag pa gnyis ka'i khu tshar bcings pa las ni gtang bar bya// gtong ba sa la reg pa nyid de mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa
90a4(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor nang du gnas pas ni// rang 'dod rdo ba ltung ste rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis rdzong gi rnam par gzhom pa'i don du'o// gang zhig bsnun pas glang chen 'phral la nges par
90a5(rgyud): ltung ba de la srog chags phra mo dag ri tsi// rdzong gi steng khang la gnas dgra dpung ma lus gang dag phyi rol gnas par ltung bar byed pa ste// sa stengs gnas su rdzong gi 'thab mo la ni gzhu 'dzin
90a6(rgyud): rnams kyis de dang lhan cig su zhig 'gram gang du 'khrul 'khor rab bsnun rdzong der dgra bo su zhig zhugs pa dag ni gshin rje'i kha ru'o// ka ba dpung pa drug drug dag gis gnyis ka'i
90a7(rgyud): nang ni mnyam pa khru ni zung gi bar dag la// snying po re re'i nyi ma'i khru ru 'gyur te gnyis ka nang ni mnyam pa lhag bcas med pa nyid// so so'i re mig kun la spang leb dag dang
90b1(rgyud): pags pa spra tshil gos rnams kyis kyang g.yogs pa ste// snying po dus dang brgyad dang skyon dang sum 'gyur nyin byed kyis kyang 'khrul 'khor gcig ni rab tu bya// gnyis gnyis
90b2(rgyud): snying po'i bar du 'khrul pa dag kyang dpung pa rnams kyis brgya yis btab pa 'am kun nas so// rgyab tu skye ba 'dzin pa drug ste mdun nas dpung pa gnyis ka mnyam pa 'khrul
90b3(rgyud): 'khor 'dren pa 'am// ka ba'i khung bur rab tu gtsugs pa g.yo ba'i rlung gi drar rnams kyis ni rlung gis bskyod pa ste// de la zhon pa rang gi sde ni chu yi rdzong dag nyams pa'i don du
90b4(rgyud): chu yi gter la 'gro// chu gter zur ldan stegs bu gcig la g.yo ba'i rlung gi dar dang rgyal mtshan bcas pa ka bar gdags// rgyab kyi phyogs nas mi rnams dag gis drangs shing
90b5(rgyud): sa las thag pa dag gis steng du 'gro ba ni// rlung gis rab tu bskyod par gyur pa nges par brag gi rdzong gi steng du mkha' la 'gro ba ste// de nas me yi 'bru mar 'phangs pas dgra yi dpung
90b6(rgyud): dang rdzong ni thams cad kun nas sreg par byed// 'khor lo'i rtsa bar gnam gdan rtse gcig pa ni gzhug cing steng du yang ni 'khor lo dag la ni// sor mo gnyis gnyis bar du rtsibs su 'gyur
90b7(rgyud): te zlum po'i mtha' ma ma lus par ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo khru ni phyed dang gsum par 'gyur zhing gnam gdan steng du gzhan yang der ni srog shing ste// srog shing steng du ral gri
91a1(rgyud): rnon po myur bar 'khor te 'khrul 'khor gyi ni rtsa ba 'khor bas so// zag pa yis ni rlung gi 'khrul 'khor nam mkha' dag la 'gro ste rang gi phyogs nas rim pas so//
91a2(rgyud): rdzong gi steng dang dgra yi khyim du so sor 'gro bar nges pa nyid du thag pa drangs byas nas// sa la tshad kyang de yis brjod par 'gyur te dgra rnams kyi ni rdzong gi rtse mo 'byed pa yis// rtse la bkod/
91a3(rgyud): de dgra yi khang pa'i gzhi dang 'dun sa dag la me ni rab tu sbyin par bya// 'khor lo rnams kyi steng gi cha la lcags dang shing rnams dag gis khang pa chen po bkod pa ni// spang leb dang ni ma he'i
91a4(rgyud): pags pa rnams kyis kun nas g.yogs par gyur pa zlum po'i rnam pa ste// mi rnams dag gis bskyod par gyur pa mnyam pa'i sa la 'obs ni ji srid nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur// 'obs
91a5(rgyud): de bkang nas mkhar gyi rtsig pa dang ni lam srang dag tu 'phral la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// stegs bur phur pa gnyis la nges par rgyud dang bcas pa'i gzhu ni g.yo ba med par btags
91a6(rgyud): byas nas// rgyab tu lcags kyi phur pa gnyis la legs bkod 'khrul shing la ni sor mo lta bur phyed 'khyogs rnams// sor mo'i rtse mo dag la gzhu rgyud kyis ni mang zhing mnyam pa'i
91a7(rgyud): mda' 'am lcags mnga' rnon po rnams// g.yul gyi dus su 'phangs pas go cha dang bcas glang chen lus po phug nas rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur// ka ba gnyis ni sa yi nang du brtan
91b1(rgyud): par btsugs pa zag pa rnams kyis dkris par gyur pa ste// zag pa'i dbus su ral gri'i chang gzung chung ba zlum po dang bcas bskor ba du mas bskor gyur pa// de yi dbus su ral gyi'i
91b2(rgyud): chang gzung nges par g.yo ba med par gzer gyis btab par rab tu 'gyur// gzer dang thag par bcas pa g.yog par bya zhing ral gri'i so yi rtse mo'i cha yang mnan par bya// de yi steng du
91b3(rgyud): bug pa'i re khA can gyi spang leb las ni bskul bar 'gyur ba 'thon pa'o// ral gri'i steng du zla ba'i dbus kyi cha la lcags las byas pa'i chung ngu gcig kyang gzhag par bya// zla ba'i
91b4(rgyud): steng du gang gi rkang pa bzhag pa de ni 'phrul la ral gri yis kyang gcod par byed// mkhar gyi sgo yi mtha' rnams dang ni mo yi bdag po'i khang par 'khrul 'khor kho na mtshon cha'o//
91b5(rgyud): sdig shing steng du nyi ma'i lag pas rtsa ba'i gnas su 'gyur te 'khor lo'i tshad la dgu cha'o// zur du ka ba 'phreng gdang mnyam dang mi mnyam shing rta gnas las gnyis dang byed kyi tshad
