121b3(rgyud): bA'i las las grol ba gang zhig 'jig rten steng na gnas pa bde ba dag gi gnas su 'gro// 'jig rten gsum yang phra rab dag gis gang zhig bkod pa de ni dus kyos rtag tu rtag pa
121b4(rgyud): smin zhes pa la sogs ye shes skad du dus kyi 'khor los sa la bstan pa rab tu gsal mdzad pa// 'jam dang sra dang gzhan pa'i bag chags stobs kyis skyes bu rnams
121b5(rgyud): kyi sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste// sems ni nges par dngos po'i tshon gyis nye bar gzhag pa dag las shel bzhin tshon ldan nyid 'gyur ba// gang yin de phyir bzhin rigs
121b6(rgyud): su gyur pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang rnal 'byor pa yis sun mi byung // chos ni sems can phran pa yul dang rnam par bral ba dag ste chos min dag kyang gnod pa'o// 'tshe ba rig byed
121b7(rgyud): tshad ma can ni bde ba'i 'bras bu mi ster dus kun tu ni sdug bsngal ster// dam pa'i byams ldan rmod pa'i tshig las mchog gi bde ba byed cing sems can bde la rjes su chags//
122a1(rgyud): de phyir sems can don ni gcig pu dag dang mi bdag yid kyi rang bzhin med pasgom byar gyis// lha mi bla ma ni mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu dbang po
122a2(rgyud): sa steng du ni 'khor lo sbyar// sa 'og dag tu klu yi rgyal po gdengs can rigs kyis btud dang kun tu 'gro dang mchog nga ste// ye shes sangs rgyas thub dbang 'gyur ming mchog
122a3(rgyud): dang khyab bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor dang // rig byed oM gyi yi ge gtsang ma dag ste rgyal po dngos po kun gyis bdag la skyabs su song // khyod ni ma dang khyod ni pha
122a4(rgyud): ste khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla ma khyod ni gnyen dang grogs bzang yang // khyod ni mgon po khyod ni byed po phan dang sdig 'phrog khyod ni go 'phang phun sum tshogs pa yang // khyod ni 'ba'
122a5(rgyud): zhig gnas dang khyod ni yon tan mchog gi gnas te skyon rnams bcom pa khyod nyid do// khyod ni dman pa rnams kyi mgon dang yid bzhin nor bu rgyal ba'i dbang po khyod la bdag skyabs
122a6(rgyud): mchi nga bal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas las byung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo chen po las// nang nges pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // lus la sna
122a7(rgyud): tshogs tshad dang nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams dang ri// rtsa rnams kyi ni phra mo'i grangs dang rang bzhin dag las skyes bu mu stegs rnams kyi 'dod pa dang /
122b1(rgyud): rig byed dang ni byed po la sogs dbye ba bdag gis thos pas dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan du gsol// zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas bde bar gshegs pas dus kyi
122b2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsungs// dang por yang dag bsten bya bla ma dag kyang dam tshig ldan zhing rdo rje theg par lhag par gnas// de nyid bsgoms shing ma chags dri
122b3(rgyud): ma dag dang rnam par bral zhing bzod pa'i ngang tshul lam la zhugs// slob ma rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog cing de nyid las ni tshangs spyod ldan// bdud
122b4(rgyud): rnams la ni rdo rje dbyug pa de yang 'dzin ma'i gzhi la rdo rje sems dpar rab grags pa'o// nga rgyal dang ldan khro bas zil mnan dam tshig rnam bral rdzas la brkam zhing thos pa dag kyang
122b5(rgyud): med/ slob ma rnams ni sru ba don du gnyer zhing mchog gi bde ba'i gnas las sems nyams dbang ma bskur// longs spyod dag la kun chags bag med rtsub mo'i tshig
122b6(rgyud): dang bcas shing dbang po'i don du 'dod ldan pa// de nyid dmyal ba banan slob ma mkhas pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni spang bar bya// zab cing rgya tshal sems pa
122b7(rgyud): ma'i nges pa la dga' gtong ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan yon tan shes/ thar pa don gnyer rgyud la gus shing g.yo ba min pa'o sems ldan de nyid thob pa shin tu spong // gdug pa
123a1(rgyud): rnams kyi grogs nyams slob ma de nyid bla ma shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyis bsdu byug// shes rab dbang la sogs pa'i rgyur te gzhan zhes bya ba slar yang 'bring /
123a2(rgyud): po bsod nams ngag gi rgyur// nag pa'i mthar ni dkar po'i tshigs la gzhan la phan pa'i blams dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs byas nas// sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bdun rnams
123a3(rgyud): ni bsod nams don du bu rnams dag la sbyin par bya// yang na mtha' dag yon tan gter ni bstan pa'i slad du rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la mchod pa bya// mchod pa med na lo
123a4(rgyud): gcig tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal po dag las bla mas bstan par mi bya'o// dbang gi don du sa ni yongs brtag nags dang grong khyer grong rdal grong gi phyogs kyi cha dag dang // thab khung rnams
123a5(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid dang ni bum pa dang bcas rdul tshon sbyir sreg phur bu la sogs dang // slob ma rnams ni bsdu ba dag dang gang yang rgyal ba'i bdag po mchog gi dkyil 'khor bri ba dag
123a6(rgyud): shes nas slob dpon gyis ni dge dang mi dge'i 'bras skad ni ba la sogs mtha' dag rab tu bya// sa mi rigs ni yon tan dbang gis rnam bzhir 'gyur ba dmangs rigs rje
123a7(rgyud): rigs rgyal po bram ze ste// gnag dang ser dang dmar ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa dkar ba'i kha dog rnams kyis rig par bya// rul ba chu skyes pad+ma'i dri dang mchog gi dri rnams
123b1(rgyud): rim pas nor gyi blo gros dag tu 'gyur// sbyar dang lan tshwang mangs rigs mngar dang tsha ba rde'u rigs mi bdag gzhan pa dag ni gnyis skyes so// dkar po dag ni ni ngang rgyas pa
123b2(rgyud): ste sprin tshig dang mtshungs gsang dang bskrad pa dag la yang // dmar po dbang dang dgug pa la se mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa rings dang rmongs pa la yang 'gyur// las
123b3(rgyud): kyi cha ni thams cad dag la ljang khur gyur te lnga pa dang ni mtha' ma dag gi rigs// ro dang dr-i rnams thams cad dang ldan mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig
123b4(rgyud): par bya// dbang ldan dang ni byang gi sa gzhi dag la zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dag tu 'gyur ba ste// me yi mtshams dang shar gyi char ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par gsad pa dag dang bskrad
123b5(rgyud): ba'o/ bden bral dang ni lho phyogs su yang gsal bar rtag tu dbang du bya dang dgug pa dag kyang ngo // rlung gi mtshams dang nub kyi phyogs su nges par mchog gi mi bdag rengs
123b6(rgyud): pa dang ni rmongs pa'o// thab khung grong gi phyogs brgyad dag tu nges par rab tu 'gyur te zlum po dang ni chu gter zur// zla kham zur lnga pa dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zur
123b7(rgyud): bdun pa dang zur ni gsum pa dang // zur drug pa dang zur brgyad par 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis de dag rnams kyi snying po'i mtshan ma ni// pad+ma 'khor lo gri gug ral hri
124a1(rgyud): mnga' zhes bya dang rdo rje lcags kyu lcags sgrog dag dang sbrul// gcig gnyis byed dang gcig ni khru ste mkha' dus mkha' mig mkha' ma mkha' dus dag ni
124a2(rgyud): sor du 'gyur// phyed kyi yan lag drug gi cha shas nyi mo nyi ma'i cha shas dag gis zabs dang kha khyer dang // mchu dang mtshan ma'i 'greng bar 'gyur te kha khyer dag gi steng du rigs kyi
124a3(rgyud): dbang gis kun nas so// kha khyer phyi rol du yang chu skyes 'dab ma rnams mdzod mi bdag zhi rgyas la ste gzhan la min// yang na las ni thams cad la yang rdo rjer 'gyur te sa la
124a4(rgyud): phur pa dag gi dbye ba brgyad/ n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad tha ka rus lcags seng ldeng las skyes tsU ta bil ba arma skyes// de bzhin shel gyi bum pa dang ni dngul mchog rang bzhin dpal/
124a5(rgyud): ldamathod pa dag dang lcags kyi dang // zangs zhes bya dang gser gyi bum pa rab gsal nges par shing las skyes dang sa yi rang bzhin no// zlum po brgyad gnyis sor du brjod
124a6(rgyud): de gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis dpangs dang sor gnyis dag gi mchu// drug gi mgrin pa sor brgyad kha ste ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zhi rgyas dag la'o gzhan la min// sna
124a7(rgyud): nas ni zlar brgyad po rnams nyim nag so so'i dus su ni dang rgyas pa sogs la 'gyur// de bzhin de yi blan byeng ngag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su las brgyad dag ni rab tu bya/ nyas
124b1(rgyud): zung dang mdun byed dgan nyim dang mtsham mo'i dus su zhi ba dgas snang bar bya// dus sbyor gdug pa'i gaba' rnams gnas pa dag ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byeng de bzhin nyid du ba
124b2(rgyud): grags// 'o ma dang bcas lam shing mnga' rgyu'ini dang rgyas pa dag la gas pol mi mi nus so// dbye ba la ni bya rog mjug ma seng ldeng las skyes keng shu ka ni dgug dang dbang la'o//
124b3(rgyud): bil ba smyo byed dag ni khru phyed mnga' brgya'i grangs rnams rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa dag la ste// 'o ma mar dang khrag dang zhag dang rdul dang rdo rje'i chu dang mchil ma chung
124b4(rgyud): rnams bsreg bya ste// dur ba 'bru dang sha dang dug dang bcas pa dag dang de bzhin ske tshe me tog dmar po dang // bil ba brnyings pa'i 'phreng ba dang ni gser bzang me tog rnams
124b5(rgyud): nyid zhi ba la sogs rnams la'o// gshin rje bden bral zur dang chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyin drug po dbang po dag dang me ru ni// slob dpon ngag gi gdan du 'gyur te mi yi
124b6(rgyud): bdag po zhi ba la sogs las rnams ngag la'o// tshon ni las gnyis drag la 'gyur te gtso bo'i pad+ma la yang dkar na gnyi ma ser po'o// phyi rol du ni sangs rgyas dbye bas lnga
124b7(rgyud): dang ga shin rje chu dang byang rnams dag tu tshon gyis// thab khung dag gam dkyil 'khor la ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyogs rnams su yang tshon ni gdab par 'gyur// dgod pa la
125a1(rgyud): sogs pasang gtor la sogs rang gi snying kha'i rdo rje dag las lha rnams spro ba'o// shel la sogs pa'i mchod yon sdong la pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma pa
125a2(rgyud): bong dag ni bcu gnyis kyang // yu ba'i rtse mor snyim pa'i snod de khyor ba dag kyang sreg blugs sbyin sreg bya ba dag la'o// zhi dang drag po chags dang bcas par 'gyur te rigs kyi
125a3(rgyud): dbang gis lha ni rengs pa dag gi sku// de bzhin las gnyis dag la rab tu gsal zhing nges par dkyil 'khor la yang lhag pa'i lhar 'gyur ro// rnam pa lnga ni rgyal ba'i dbang
125a4(rgyud): po gang phyir rnam gsum srid pa la gnas phung po khams sogs kyi// dbye ba yis te de las kyang ni lha rnams dkyil 'khor dag la rdul tshon rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// thig skud
125a5(rgyud): khru ni brgyad par 'gyur te sum sgril slob dpon gyi ni lag pa'i mthe bong nas gcig gis// sboms su 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum gyi lam na gnas pa thig skud gcig ste gzhan pa ma
125a6(rgyud): yin no// zhi ba la sogs dag la rim pa yongs su bkod pa skyil krung rdo rje lha min tsog pu dang // skyil krung phyed par dbye ba gnyis dang bshang lam rkang par gnas pa dag kyang
125a7(rgyud): las kyi dbye bas gdan// shel dang mu tig dang ni mi dang bong bu'i so 'am rus pa dag dang po de tse dang ni// pad+ma zhes bya dbang mig lung tang bde gshegs rigs kyi dbang gis
125b1(rgyud): sngags bzlas pa la 'phreng bar 'gyur// dri zhim me tog dkar po dang ni tsha ba dang bcas nag po dag dang dmar dang ser pos mchod// bsil dang bshang ba sha yi spos ni sbrang
125b2(rgyud): rtsi khrag ldan dag dang drag po'i spos dang bska ba'o// 'khrul 'khor n+ya gro d+ha 'ang ba dur khrod ro yaM ras dang gro ga'i 'dab dang arka'i 'dab ma la// shi rI khaN+Da sA li btags pa dag
125b3(rgyud): dang dur khrod sar gnas sol ba khrag dang dug dang ni// kha che tsan dan dmar dang 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba yung ba ba blas bri bar 'gyur ba ste// dUr ba bsil rus mjug sgro gser dang
125b4(rgyud): seng ldeng las skyes bil ba skyes dang arka'i sbu gu'o// kham phor dpal ldan thod par mngar gsum khrag dang spra tshol gong bu so phag dag gi dbus su ni// rlan dang bcas pa'i gnas ni
125b5(rgyud): gtsang ba dag dang ro khang sa gzhi me yis gdung dang sa dag la// 'khrul 'khor gzhag par bya bar 'gyur te dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis sngags pa yis ni rig par bya// zla ba glang chen yi
125b6(rgyud): dgas rnga mo ri dgas rta dang phyugs dang rus sbal lus la rim pas so// dpal ldan rdo rje rnams kyis phyogs kun tu gnas mtha' dag bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg bya ste// phyi
125b7(rgyud): nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu dag la phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tshogs ni bsgom par bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang dus kyi zhal ldan khro bo'i
126a1(rgyud): dbang po rdo rje shugs// de nas bla ma'i nges pa dang ldan gang zhig cung zad 'dod pa sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya// rdo rje gsum gyis sa yi dkyil 'khor la
126a2(rgyud): gnas rab gsum ni ring du mthong ba'i mtha' ru ste// tho rangs nas ni grib ma'i mtha' ru sa gzhi'i gnas las nam mkha' dag la rdo rje brtsegs pa'o// dbus su chu skyes nyi ma'i
126a3(rgyud): khru ste lte ba gdan dang bcas pa dag dang dus kyi khru 'gyur ro// de yi steng du bdag nyid nyes pa dag dang rnam par bral ba rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// sa yi phyogs rnams su
126a4(rgyud): 'dir dang po rdo rje gsum gyis zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin bya ste// phyi nas rdo rje bzhi yis phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg par bya// sa yi lha
126a5(rgyud): mo spyan drangs chu dang bcas pa'i me tog dag gis 'di la mchod yon rab tu sbyin// de la gsol ba btab ste phyi nas sa yi gnas la dag pa dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa mdzod// rgyal bas
126a6(rgyud): lha yi bdag po dang bcas bdud ni bcom pa dag la lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur// de phyir khyod ni mchod par bya zhing lha mchog gis btung ba zhes shig bzhes shig bdag gi mchod
126a7(rgyud): yon no// ji ltar rgyal bas byang chub slad du bdud kyi sde ni stobs ldan dag kyang rab tu bcom gyur pa// de bzhin bdag gis kyang ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur slad du bdud rnams
126b1(rgyud): nyams pa dag tu bya// gang dag phyogs rnams kun na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa rnam bral btsun mo dang bcas pa// de dag rnams kyi mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor/
126b2(rgyud): nguni dbang bskur smang du bdag la bskyang du gsol// de dag kun la gsol ba btab nas sreng ldeng rang bzhin sba ba'i phur bu dag gis sa la gdab// phyogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha ldan pa
126b3(rgyud): rnams ni phyogs kyi cha ru bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya// zug rngu sol ba dang bcas rA ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed sa yi snying por nges par zhugs gyur na// gnas de dag tu yon tan
126b4(rgyud): dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'gyur te de yi phyir ni sbyang bar bya// sa la rin chen dung dang mching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gi don du ste// khang bzang don dang
126b5(rgyud): khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod sbyin la sogs slad du'o// rdzogs pa dag la sa ni sbyang dang gzung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu// bcu
126b6(rgyud): gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin zhag dag la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid// dbang la sogs pa nyal mchog gi bla mas sbyin te bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la
126b7(rgyud): yang / de yi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas mir// dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo
127a1(rgyud): gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur// srog dang pa sangs nub par gyur na de tshe nges par bag ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro// slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i
127a2(rgyud): gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni// bya ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu byin par 'gyur// slob ma'i mgo bo
127a3(rgyud): snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor lte ba mgrin pa dpal ldan gsang ba'i pad+mar ni// rgyal ba la sogs gnyis ka'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba dag gis bsrung byas shing /
127a4(rgyud): de bzhin ska gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni reb gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te// sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge bdag kyang gtso
127a5(rgyud): kho'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid// dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin tu mnyam par bkod pa rus sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba dag/ khru tshad gcig la
127a6(rgyud): sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag de bzhin stong phrag dag gi tshad la ni// thig skud rdo rje rdul tshon lha dang gshin rje chu bdag tu ste byang du rdo rje dril bu dag/ bkod nas mtshan
127a7(rgyud): ma rnyed na dang po dang ni phyi ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// thig skud chad par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs 'joms 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams dag
127b1(rgyud): kyang ngo // gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na 'jigs pa gsal byed yul 'khor dag tu rtul po 'jig pa yang // mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas slar yang gtso bo dag gi
127b2(rgyud): sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya// slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya// shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus su yongs 'jom
127b3(rgyud): su 'gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya// sa la g.yul gyi dus su rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde yi dbus su gdengs can bzhin// g.yul du sde ni nyams par 'gyur te/
127b4(rgyud): sa gzhi dag tu mtshan mo'i 'thab mo la ni bsnun pa'o// de phyir g.yul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu stobs dang ldan par sngags pas rig par bya// a sogs ka/
127b5(rgyud): sogs rdo rje ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar zla nyi me steng du// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i g.yas brkyang zhabs ni bsgoms byas
127b6(rgyud): shing shes rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i pad+ma nyi zla sbyar ldan la ste rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis// sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam bkod cing thig skud la
127b7(rgyud): yang bsgom par bya// thig ni ro dang dgu bcu 'di dag tshangs pa'i thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams dag tu rab sbyin bya// sor phyed brjod pa nor dang dus kyi thig rnams dag gis dbus su snying
128a1(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// snying po las ni phyi rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo yi mtshams// rab tu/
128a2(rgyud): khabs la sogs rtse mo can de g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa la bralta bar bya// gtso bo'i 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las sum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas
128a3(rgyud): su ni/ nyi ma'i re mig ngag gis 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyi ka ba rdo rje'i 'phreng bar 'gyur// bzhi yis sangs rgyas la sogs pad+mar rab 'gyur ri bong can gyi phyi rol rdo rje 'phreng bar
128a4(rgyud): yang lha mo sangs rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa 'am ni thod pa'i gdan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur// gnas de nas 'dir ji srid re khA'i bar du nyon mor byed pa dag gis tshon gyi sar
128a5(rgyud): 'gyur te// phyogs zur rnams su chu gter re mig dag gis dri la sogs pa rnams kyi zla nyi pad+ma nyid// phyed dang bcas pa'i gcig gis re khA gsum ste dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sgo dang
128a6(rgyud): sgo khyud dang // de bzhin logs dang 'gram pa dag skye gsum gyis kyang ni kha khyer chen po dag dang ka ba phyed// de nas phyed dang gnyis dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni ngo
128a7(rgyud): shal sa ru 'gyur// sgo yi rtsa ba'i dang po nas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis rta babs ka bar bcas par 'gyur// thig phyed steng du dor nas do shal byed pa dag gi mthar ni hA
128b1(rgyud): ku lIr yang rab tu 'gyur// re mig drug gi rta babs 'og tu nor gyi pad+ma dang ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams sngam bu'o// de nas ro yis bsgyur ba'i dus kyis dpal sman tshor gyis ste
128b2(rgyud): r-I khA lnga yi bar du'o// phyogs zur rnams su nyi ma'i pad+ma nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab sngan nyi ma'i re mig dag gis bya// snying po'i sgo ni nyos 'gyur rnam pa gsum gyi yon tan ba
128b3(rgyud): gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgro dag kyang // rab sogs dang de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyis rab tu bya// de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha la nyi zla'i/
128b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang ni phyi rol rdo rje'i 'phreng ba yang // de phyed re mig dag gis bya ste 'khor lo gang yin dkyil 'khor mthar yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// ka ba'i 'og tu gdengs can
128b5(rgyud): rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni// nyi ma dag gis sgo yi dbus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la shar gyi cha dang rub la yang // rdo rje la sogs rim chen lnga dang /
128b6(rgyud): gser dang ma ra ka ta b+hu ru mu tig la sogs dang // dbye ba lnga yi 'bru'am rnam mang nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshon dag gis// phyogs kyi cha la tshon gyi sar ni mi yi bdag
128b7(rgyud): po sangs rgyas dbye bas rdul tshon gdab par 'gyur// ser dang dkar dang dmar ba sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rlung dag la rim pas so// shar du dpal ldan nag
129a1(rgyud): po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyis mtshungs pa dag ste nub tu yang // gser mdog byung du gan nA c-i bong 'dzin pas dkar rdo rje can gyi nal gyi dbyabs so//
129a2(rgyud): dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongs su bkod pa'i snam bu dang ni do shal dag gis// pad+ma b+hU nyaM'i kha dog gis te dri med ri bong can mtshungs dmar dang nag pa'i ro mo gsum//
129a3(rgyud): dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad ljang khu dag ste bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje 'phreng bar 'gyur// dbang ldan lha mon me rlung dag tu zla ba nyi ma'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yis// dung dang
129a4(rgyud): gaN+DI nor bu dag dang ljon pa zhes bya de bzhin bum pa dkar po mtshams brgyad du// zla ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed pad+ma dkar po'i steng du yang // rgyu skyes dmar
129a5(rgyud): po'i lte ba la ni lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa dag gi gdan du 'gyur// chu skyes dkar po'i lte ba dag la lha rnams kyi yang nyin mor byed par 'gyur te phyogs su'o// phyi rol du ni gtso
129a6(rgyud): bo'i pad+ma'i dbang gis rdo rje 'phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer kha dog dkar// ka ba ser po bA ku lI ni kha ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta babs kha dog sna tshogs so// dkar po'i mdog ste rnal
129a7(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams ngag gi nor gyi pad+ma'i snam bu dag kyang phyogs kun tu'o// phyogs kyi char ni pad+ma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i dbang gis pad+ma dkar po zur du yang / zla ba nyi mas rnam
129b1(rgyud): dman de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ma ru'i 'dab ldan no// mkha' sogs re khA lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sum cha bar du gnas// ka ba'i 'a
129b2(rgyud): b+h+yo yi mtshams su gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs dkyil 'khor dag tu rab tu 'gyur// dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur dus mi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag go mi yi dbang /
129b3(rgyud): phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char ni ri dgas dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur// g.yas su bum pa dmar por 'gyur te nor sbyin dang bcas chur ni rnga bo che dang byang chub shing /
129b4(rgyud): dril bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta babs dag las 'phyang bar gyur pa dang // do shal phyed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis shing rta sgo yi dbus su'o//
129b5(rgyud): 'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis rlung la sgo yi phyi rol du// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje 'greng ba dag tu'ang 'gyur/
129b6(rgyud): sbom pas nang dag byed cing za dang re khA ngan pas rdzas ni nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed// chang bas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdul de bzhin nyid du skyong
129b7(rgyud): mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chad na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med// rnam par 'dres pas rigs brgyud 'chang de rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul tshon dkyil 'khor
130a1(rgyud): dag la rig par bya// gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur// dkyil 'khor dag la dgod par mi bya de
130a2(rgyud): nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la ro// de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o//
130a3(rgyud): ngo shal phyed pa'i mthar ni sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi la pad+ma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya// nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul tshon dpangs te nas gcig
130a4(rgyud): dag nas kyang // ra ba rnams ni sum 'gyur nyin mor byed pa ri bong can dang chu skyes re khA nyis 'gyur ro// snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur mi yi bdag/
130a5(rgyud): bo dkyil 'khor 'di la ste// do shal byed pa'i mthar ni nas gcig sa chu sreg za rlung dang rdo rje 'breng ba rnams la'o// dbus nas sgo yi dang po'i mtshams ni nor
130a6(rgyud): gyi blo gros mar 'gyur 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la// sgo ngas tsartsi ka mthar sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis lan tshwa'i rin chen gnas su 'gyur//
130a7(rgyud): de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i re mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur// de yi phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas sa chu sreg za rlung rnams blta
130b1(rgyud): bar bya// gtsug tor zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis dkyil 'khor la ni sbyang bar bya// de nas spyan po mtha' dag sum 'gyur gdengs
130b2(rgyud): can re mig dag gis sa ni ji srid nyid du ste// re mig drug drug dag gis rim pas gsal bar klu yi srid pa dang ni sa 'og bdun po nyid// de ltar sa la sogs pa thams
130b3(rgyud): cad sngar yang de bzhin rang gi lus ngag la na sbyang bar bya// gnyis dang chu gter gcig dang chu gter gcig nyi dus ro rtse mo can gnyis du khyed dus phyed dang // dus dang
130b4(rgyud): dus ni rab phye dag dang dus dang ro dag kyang ste skyon gyi cha rnams rim pa yis// snying por lte ba rtsibs sam pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag dang de nas ka ba rdo rje'i 'phreng ba dang /
130b5(rgyud): pad+ma rdo rje'i 'phreng bar 'gyur te sa dag dang ni de nas sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs dang // ka ba ra ba kha khyer dag dang slar yang de nas snam bu dang ni do shwa la sa dag dang // me
130b6(rgyud): longs yi snam bur 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po rta babs rab tu gsungs pa'i cha rnams kyis// phyi rol du ni sgo sogs thams cad nyis 'gyur du 'gyur phyi rol du yang de yi nyis
130b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// phyi rol du ni pad+ma 'khor lo rnams dang shing rta'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni nyi byed dag gis so// oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba
131a1(rgyud): nyis dag gi gdan med du// a sogs gsogs stong par bcas bdag dang sring gsum skyed par byed pa'i yum ni gnag par bya// stong pa ma ma/
131a2(rgyud): rnam par bcad pa dbyangs dang bral ba mchog la sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// yang dag 'byung ba sngags kyi skye gnas mchog gi bde byed ye shes rdo rje dag ni bzhi pa'o// rnal
131a3(rgyud): ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma sna tshogs mdog la zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du hUM yig ste// phyogs 'dab rnams la a sogs stong pa phyogs bral 'dab ma la yang ha sogs stong pa rnam pa ba'i/
131a4(rgyud): dbang ldan bden bral zur dang rtse mo can dang rlung du sku dang gsung dang thugs dang chags pa ste// hI yig la sogs bum pa rnams kyi bcu ru 'gyur te haM haHzhes pa dag gi mtha' 'dir
131a5(rgyud): ro/ shar gyi chu skyes steng du i yig rtse mo can du pad+ma la gnas I yig ring po nyid// ga shin rje lha min du ni ri yig dag ste nor sbyin 'phrog byed du gnas thung ring u yig dag
131a6(rgyud): chu dang rlung gi zur dag tu yang pad+ma la gnas thung ngu ring po dag gi l-i yig ste// nag po dmar po dag dang dkar po gser mchog dang mtshungs zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis dgod par
131a7(rgyud): bya shar gyi sgo yi lho dang me yi pad+ma la gnas thung dang ring ba dag ni de bzhin nyid// de bzhin ar yig zung ni gshin rje lha min dag tu gnas te nub tu a la yig zung dag go/
131b1(rgyud): ma o gnod thun drug po chu seM su drug shin rje gnod ston dang bcas mo mi byang dun// a a sogs te rim pa yis ni slar yang yar wal lha sogs so yi bad+mala'o// shar nga
131b2(rgyud): byung gi sgor ni ri bong 'dzin pa dag kyang khro bo dag gi gdan du 'gyur ba ste// lho dang nub tu pad+mar nyi ma dag ni gnyis pa dag gi gdan du nges par rab tu 'gyur// shes rab thabs
131b3(rgyud): kyi rab tu dbye ba dag gis pad+mar zla ba nyi ma dag kyang gdar du 'gyur// g.yas dang rgyab tu nyi mar 'gyur te lha yi bdag po nor sbyin du yang zla ba'i gdan du 'gyur// thig le'i
131b4(rgyud): rnam pa dag gis rnam bye nges par pad+ma la gnas ka sogs sde yi yi ge yang // rtsa ba sdong bu 'dab ma dang ni ge sar lte ba dag la rim pas yongs su bkod pa ste// sa sogs
131b5(rgyud): nam mkha'i mtha' ni ka kha ga g+ha nga zhes thung ngu ring po rang gi sa la'o// thig le zla ba rnam par bcad pa nyid byed du 'gyur gdan yang lte ba dag gi steng du'o// sde drug thung dang ring
131b6(rgyud): rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis kha khyer dag la ka ba'i ngos su ni// dri la sogs rnams rim pas rang rigs sa la gnas te shar gyi chanas rang gi phyogs rnams su'o//
131b7(rgyud): rol du ri thig le sogs kyis phye ba sum 'gyur nyi mas kha khyer dag la de bzhin nyid// 'dod ma thams cad kun nas rang rigs phyogs su gnas te rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog dbye
132a1(rgyud): bas so// thung dang ring ba'i ha yig dag ni lha dang nor sbyin nub dang lho ru tsartsi ka sogs kyi// khyab 'jug ma sogs dag gi kA yig a sogs kyis phye me dang /
132a2(rgyud): 'phrog byed rlung dang lha min du// hi la sogs dang kI la sogs pa grangs brgyad pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas mdun rgyab rang phyogs su// ya sogs thung dang ring ba drug rnams lha yi
132a3(rgyud): par 'dab me yi pad+ma dag la rim pa yis// de bzhin gshin rje lha min pad+ma'i 'dab mar thung ngu ring po'i rab tu dbye bas ra sogs te// gnod sbyin drag por wa la sogs dang chu gter
132a4(rgyud): dang bcas rlung gi bad 'ad ba rnams la la la sogs// shar gyi sgo yi lho dag tu yang pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas dbyangs kyis phye ba tsa yi ste// thung ngu lha min gyi ste ring po rnams kyang
132a5(rgyud): me yi zur na gnas pa rlung gi yin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshin rjer me dang ro mi gdong ba dag gi Ta sde zung dang ring po'i rab dbye yis// g.yon dang dbang ldan du yang bster 'gyur
132a6(rgyud): te chu gter dang ni ring po 'o dbye bas tshogs kyi'o// brgya byin dang mi tshangs pa dag gi chur bcas rlung du thung ngu ring po ta mi sde ba'o// shar rgyu sgro yi byang du pad+ma'i 'dab mar lha min dam
132a7(rgyud): ya~M ka sde thung ngur 'gyur ba ste// lho rug shin rje dag gi ring por 'gyur te mi yo bdag po byang dag da ni nub tu yang / phyugs kyi bdag po che b+ha la yi zung dang ring bas sder 'gyur
132b1(rgyud): pa nyid do rgyal bste// lha mam la sogs rnams kyi rang gas bon du 'gyur 'dab ma lan rang rang ma mtha'ang bas// 'das ma nyi shu brgyang la yang ni tsam nag bdugs
132b2(rgyud): bdag gi yi ge rnams// yA rA wA lA haM hAHdrug kyang nges par shing rta dag la steng dang rtsa ba la sogs su// sgo las g.yas dang g.yon du gdengs can rnams kyis sogs la
132b3(rgyud): gnas ha yi ga dag tu rab tu 'gyur// sde drug brtsegs pa'i gzugs dang slar yang ha yA ra wa la dang k+Sha sogs ldan pa'i ya sogs ni// phyogs kyi 'khor lor ka sogs sde rnams
132b4(rgyud): g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas tsa sogs gzhan la lugs mthun te// shar dang gshin rje byang dang chu dang me dang lha min dang ni dbang ldan rlung gi zur du'o// aM aHzla ba nyi ma dag gi/
132b5(rgyud): dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams so// hUM gi yi ge chos kyi 'khor lo dang ni de bzhin aHyig bum pa'i sa bon dag tu 'gyur// oM yig rnga bo che yir
132b6(rgyud): 'gyur te chu ru ho yang byang chub shing dag gir ni rab tu 'gyur// zhes pa de ltar dbyangs ldan rnams ni rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor dag la sngags kyi dbye bar 'gyur// phyag
132b7(rgyud): rgya mtshan ma rnams kyi kha dog mtha' dag rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis 'gyur// zab tu sbyin sreg dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur te slar yang 'jug ngogs pa rnams spyan drang bdag dang /
133a1(rgyud): #dpal snyan sa la bsang ba dang ni mchod stomacho ga de bzhin bdud ni gnom pa dag kyang ngo // sgornams srung bya'i don du brtum zhugs nges pa dang ldan dag
133a2(rgyud): pa'i slob ma rnams ni rab dgod bya// dpal ldan bum pa dag gi rnal 'byor ma rnams me dang lha min rlung dbang zur du rim pas so// slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang por
133a3(rgyud): 'gyur te mi bdag las kyi rdo rje can dag rab byas nas// slob ma med na tshogs kyi dbang po rang gis kyang ni sbyin sreg las la sogs pa dag kyang bya// zlum po 'am ni rig byed zur dag
133a4(rgyud): rigs kyi dbang gis zhi dang rgyas pa dag gi zab tu 'gyur// byang ngam drag po'i zur dang gzhan yang dkar po'i sa la rtsa ba'i pad+ma dag ni nyis 'gyur ro// zabs ni pad+ma'i tshad du 'gyur//
133a5(rgyud): te de yi nang du rtsa ba'i pad+ma mtshan mar bcas pa'o// pad+ma phyed la pad+ma'i phyi ru bum pa dang bcas ral gri rin chen sogs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur// de yi phyed kyis kyang ni mchu ste de las
133a6(rgyud): nyis 'gyur dag kyang 'khyer dag gi rgya yi che// steng du rdo rje 'phreng ba dag kyang mchu yi phyed kyis dpangs dag tu ni nges par rab tu 'gyur// phyi rol 'og tu pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams
133a7(rgyud): dang ku shi'i bkod pa phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu bya// de yi mthar ni nub phyogs dag tu nges par re khA gsum gyi sgo gcig tu ni rab tu 'gyur// slob dpon ngag gi gdan ni nges
133b1(rgyud): bar mnyam par 'gyur te snying po'i pad+ma dag las nyis 'gyur ro// g.yon du mchod mon gangan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sbyin sreg snong dag gi yang g.yas su 'gyur/ kur gyi
133b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i yang na mkha' yi pad+ma yum gyi'o// zhal dang gsang ba dag kyang zab khung rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te rgyal po phyi dang lus la'o//
133b3(rgyud): thab kyi phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la khro bo'i rgyal po lha mor bcas pas bsrung ba byas nas ni// dpal ldan rdo rje dag gis bsang ba sogs dang chur bcas me tog rnams
133b4(rgyud): kyis me la mchod yon nyid// de yi rnal 'byor ldan pas sbyin par byas te rang snying pad+mar zla ba'i steng du bsgoms nas so// zhal gcig kha dog dkar po dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma g.yon
133b5(rgyud): na ril ba chu skyes dag dang ni// g.yas na dbyug pa bgrang 'phreng ral pa shin tu ser skya dmar ser mig ldan gos dang bcas pa ste// mi yi snying khar zla ba'i steng du dri med
133b6(rgyud): 'phrog byed dzaHlas sngags kyu nges par bsgom par bya// de yis bkug pa'i kun 'gro ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la shin tu ro mnyam dag tu mdzod// de ltar
133b7(rgyud): thab la yang ni yang dag 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin me ni spyan drang ngo // mchod sbyin lag pa dag gi mthe bong gis kyang me yi zhal du sbyin sreg dag ni rab tu bya//
134a1(rgyud): bo'i rdo rje yan lag gis kyang mda' brgya'i yam shing 'bru dang dUr ba mar dang 'o ma yis// skyil krung du gnas rab tu zhi zhing g.yo ba med pa'i sems ldan gsang
134a2(rgyud): sngags rig pa sngags kyi sku// slob dpon las kyi rdo rje can gyis slar yang me la sreg blugs dag ni nges par sbyin par bya// rim pa yis ni sbyin sreg byas nas 'thor 'thung dag
134a3(rgyud): kyang de bzhin me dang bdag nyid dag la yang // dri la sogs dang spos dag phul nas rang snying pad+mar ye shes me ni gshegs su gsol bar bya// phyi nas slob ma la ni dbang bskur dpal ldan
134a4(rgyud): bla ma mtha' dag yon tan gter gyis nges par sbyin// dang por bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa dag pa'i slad du'o// rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg grub cing
134a5(rgyud): rdul tshon btab ste sngags kyi mtshan ma rab tu bkod pa na// zur du shel gyi bum pa dkar po skud pa lnga yis dkris pa rnams ni yang dag gzhag par bya// slob dpon shar gyi zhal du rdo rje
134a6(rgyud): pad+ma la sa skyes rab bgrod khro bo'i rgyal po rnam dag gis// spyan drangs nas ni ye shes 'khor lo rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam du bya dbang gi don du'o// lha dang lha mo rnams ni thams cad bdag gi ming
134a7(rgyud): gi sngon du au zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ste// sbyin sreg la ni swA hA'i mtha' sngags snying po de bzhin nyid de mchod pa dag la na maH'i mtha'// dzaHhUM baM hoHlcags kyu la sogs rim par yongs su bkod rnam
134b1(rgyud): spyan drang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // mnyes la'o mchod yon sbyin pa la yang i daM grih+Na grih+Na an+ta kaM me zhes par 'gyur// rgyas pa la ni swA hA'i mtha' yi sngags su 'gyur te mi bdag
134b2(rgyud): zhi ba la 'di na maH'i mtha'// dgugs pa la ni bau Sha wa mtha' ru 'gyur te gaShaT mtha' yang dbang la'o de bzhin nyid du ni// hU~M yig mtha' can mngon spyod la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang
134b3(rgyud): gis phaT mtha' phur bus gdab sogs la'o// dkar dang dmar deng dag po mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa dag ste las kyi dbyeb dag gis sngags// shar du dpal ldan thugs kyi
134b4(rgyud): rdo rje dag ni sprin nag dang mtshungs byang du sku yi rdo rje dang // lho ru gsung gi rdo rje nub tu yang ni rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa ye shes rdo rje ste// dkar dang dmar dang ser po dag ni rigs kyi
134b5(rgyud): dbang gis sa yi cha la khyab par byed par 'gyur// rlung me chu dang sa yi lha rnams ngag gi skye ba'i gnas ni mo bdag i ra~M u la'o// oM AHhUM ni phyag rgya gsum ste swA hA'i chog dang bcas
134b6(rgyud): pa ring po'i dbye ba las kyang lnga// hUM AHoM ho rang gi zhal rnams gzhan pa dag kyang de bzhin gzhob du med pa lnga par 'gyur// a sogs dang bcas hr-i yig drug ste ro rkang ra baHsogs
134b7(rgyud): kyis dpal ldan yan lag drug tu 'gyur// tho gyi mo ge sna tshogs yum gyir 'gyur te rnam bcu brtsegs pa'i sngags ni rgyal ba dag gi'o// hUM yig ye shes sa bon snying po dag kyang brtse
135a1(rgyud): pa chen po'i sngags ni zhal dang bcas pa ste// hUM yig la sogs yan lag drug po sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan pa 'di ni nye snying ngo // lha dang lha mo rnams kyi
135a2(rgyud): 'phreng ba'i sngags ni de bzhin gzhan te las kyi dbye ba du ma yis// rnam mang du 'gyur shes par bya ste dus 'khor dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so//
135a3(rgyud): rin chen gser zla me tog dang ni rnam pa mang po'i gos dang dri dang spos dang mar me dang // dril bu me long bla re dang ni rnam mang 'bras bu ba dan sogs dang gar dang rol mo yis//
135a4(rgyud): rnam bkra mchod pa byas te gzhan pa rnam bcu dag kyang bdag nyid nus pas ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin// slob dpon dag gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar mchog gi bu yis yon ni dag
135a5(rgyud): pa'i slad du dbul bar bya// dag pa gsum gyi rdzas dang bdag nyid bu dang bu mo dang bcas rigs las skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma// de ring nyid nas mi zad 'khor bas
135a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa bdag ni rgyal ba rnams la skyabs su lhag par mchi// khyed kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes nges par srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog dag la lus ngag sems ni dag pas so//
135a7(rgyud): zhes pa gser bcas me tog dag gis maN+Dal byas nas bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rdo rje la ni rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma dag kyang spyi bos gzung
135b1(rgyud): bar bgyi// rin chen la ni sbyin pa sbyin bgyi 'khor lo 'di la rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// ral gri la ni mchod pa bgyi ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs/
135b2(rgyud): la sdom pa dag ni bskyang bar bgyi// sems can rnams ni thar pa'i srang du rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la byang chub bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// slob ma khrus byas dri yis
135b3(rgyud): rjes byugs brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan shar gyi sar ni bzhag byas te// dngos grub don du so shing rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rje dag gis mngon par bsngags pa rab sbyin bya// lce
135b4(rgyud): la'ang bdud rtsinges par rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig dag gis spos ni dbab pa'i don du'o// sngags ni hUM gi yi ge gcig ste a ra la dang bcas pa khro bo'i gtso bo bskul ba'o//
135b5(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po bebs na mtshon chas mdzes pa'i lag pa dag gis bdud kyi tshogs la bsdigs byed cing // g.yon brkyang la sogs stabs rnams dang ni rnam mang bcing ba dag gis
135b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i gar gyi gar byed de// bzhad dang hUM gi yi ge 'dres pa dgra la 'jigs pa ster ba dang rdo rje'i glu yang byed// ngo tsha med cing dogs pa med par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha gzhan
135b7(rgyud): dag kyang zhi ba'o// sku phebs pas ni rnal 'byor ldan pa rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sku yi bya ba byed pa ste// gsung phebs pas ni lha dang 'byung po lha min rnams las rnam
136a1(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i smra ba po ru 'gyur// thugs phe bla bas ni gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa dag dang byung dang 'byung ba thams cad shes par 'gyur// ye shes phebs
136a2(rgyud): pas sangs rgyas bla ma yi yang bla ma rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i ston pa gcig pur 'gyur// sa phebs pas ni rnal 'byor pa dag ri dang mtshungs par 'gyur te chus kyang bsil bar rab
136a3(rgyud): tu 'gyur// me phebs pas ni sreg par 'gyur te rlung gis kyang ni de bzhin skam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur// stong pa phebs pas mi snang bar 'gyur so steng du ni mkha' la spyod pa nyid
136a4(rgyud): du rab tu 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rim pa yis ni rig par bya// dbab pa la ni nges par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sngags/
136a5(rgyud): pa rnams kyis bsgom pa'i stobs dang ni// bsnyen pa'i dbye ba dang ni rnam mang dam tshig sngags kyis bzlas pa sogs kyis 'ga' zhig dag gi tshe// sangs rgyas ro myang byed pas
136a6(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i dbang las dkyil 'khor 'ga' zhig tu ni mchog gi bu la'o// rang byin brlab pas dman pa rnam mang srid pa dag gis sngags pa rnams la dngos grub yod pa min// phebs
136a7(rgyud): par btang ste phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying kha spyi gtsug lte ba dag dang mgrin pa dang // gsang bar rgyal ba dang ni rang gi rigs kyi sar gnas rang gi rdo rje gsum gyis bsrung bar bya//
136b1(rgyud): lus la ser po'i gos dag byin te mig ni bsgribs par gyur pa'i slob ma 'dir ni gzhug par bya// kun rdzob don du brtul zhugs rab mchog bgrod ba dag la bgyod pa de dag nyid ni sbyin
136b2(rgyud): par bya// 'tshe dang mi bden gzhan gyi bud med spang bya gzhan gyi nor dang chang gi btung ba de bzhin nyid// 'khor bar rdo rje'i zhags pa dag ste rang gi dge ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po
136b3(rgyud): de dag go// gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba lnga dang mi yo bla ma de yi mtshan gyis rab sbyor bya// sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' 'di srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dag ste khyod kyis kyang ni bskyang
136b4(rgyud): bar bya// cho lo kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min dbang po'i chos// ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha mi'i bla ma gsod pa lnga ni mi bya'o//
136b5(rgyud): grogs po rje bo rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la 'khu ba yang // dbang po rnams ni chags pa dag dang de ltar srid pa'i bdag po dag gi brtul zhugs nyi shu lnga// dpal
136b6(rgyud): lngalda sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar bar me tog gcig ni rab sbyin bya// dang por lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar ba dag las dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor//
136b7(rgyud): gang gi gnas su me tog bzang po lhung ba de ni mi yi bdag po de yi rigs su nges// phyi nas dbang ni bdun po ngag dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji bzhin pa meng yang dag rab sbyin bya// klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser
137a1(rgyud): gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas// sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis lha mo rnams kyi khrus bya'o// sangs rgyas
137a2(rgyud): rab tu dbye bas cod pan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyi dar dpyangs nyid// rdo rje dril bu nyi zla las te brtul zhugs dag kyang dbang por bcas pa'i yul gyis sbyar bar bya/
137a3(rgyud): khro bo rnams kyis byams sogs ming ste gsal bar rgyal ba'i bdag pos rjes gnang 'dogs bcas rab tu sbyin// rdo rje dril bu rab tu byin nas rab mchog snying rje dag gis dag pa'i chos ni
137a4(rgyud): bstan par bya// nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag la ni srog gcod bya ste ral gri la yang bden pa min pa'i tshig/ rin chen la ni gzhan nor dbrog bya mchog gi pad+ma'i rigs nyid la yang gzhan gyi/
137a5(rgyud): bud med dbrog/ chang dang sgron ma sangs rgyas rnams dang bzang po'i yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor lo la ni bsten par bya// gdol ba mo sogs mtha' dag bud med rnams ni gri gug la
137a6(rgyud): yang mkha' yi pad+mar smad mi bya// sems can don gyi slad du nor dang bcas pa'i lus 'di sbyin par bya ste khyod kyis bsrung mi bya// rigs kyi bu kye sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba gzhan du
137a7(rgyud): mtha' yas bskal pas min par rgyal bas gsungs// chu ni sgron ma la sogs lha mo cod pan zhes brgyal ba dpa' bo'i dar dbyangs nus ma rnams// rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dag dang brtul
137b1(rgyud): zhugs dag kyang yul te ming ni byams sogs sbyor ba'o// rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal mo srid pa'i 'jigs 'jobs dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa ste// sdig pa'i
137b2(rgyud): dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bskur bdur po 'di dag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab spyir bya// dbang bdun ngag gis mngon par dbang bskur dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdur gyi ni dbang phyug
137b3(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur// bum pa gsong bas mngon par dbang bskur slar yang phyir mi ldog pa sogs su nges par rab tu 'jug/ shes rab ye shes dag gis mngon par dbang bskur srid pa'i
137b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur// gal te g.yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dmyal bar 'gro ste 'di dag sdug bsngal lo// rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnam par
137b5(rgyud): dag par 'gyur te yon tan ldan pa dbang bdun la gnas dag gi'o// bu mo pa gsang ba la ni gal te brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang gis gong ma la ni dag pa med// rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung
137b6(rgyud): ba gang zhig dag pa'i slad du slar yang dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya ste// rjes su gnang ba thob nas slar yang tshogs kyi 'dus par thu bo'i ming ni chung ba nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan
137b7(rgyud): bla ma'i thugs dkrugs pa las bu rnams kyi ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur// de yi bka' la 'gongs pas gzhan du 'gyur te nges par de bzhin spun la khros pas gsum
138a1(rgyud): ba'o/ byams pa btang bas bzhi par 'gyur te byang chub sems ni rab tu nyams pa las kyang mnga' ru 'gyur// drug pa grub pa'i mtha' la spyod pa'o ri bo
138a2(rgyud): dag kyang ma smin mi la gsang ba byin las so// phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te slar yang dgu pa dag pa'i chos la ma dang gang // sgyu yi byams pa dang ni ming sogs bral ba
138a3(rgyud): bde ba ster la rtog pa phyogs dang drag po'o// dag pa'i sems can dag la skyon brjod pa las nyi ma'o dam tshig thob pa gtong ba las kyang gzhan// bud med thams cad la smod nges par
138a4(rgyud): ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje'i theg par gnas pa rnams la'o// klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas// sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal
138a5(rgyud): dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis gdan gyi dbus su khrus byas te// klu dag gis ni dpal ldan cod pan bcings te nor 'dab pad+mar bzhi yis dar dbyangs bcing bar bya// phyag rgya la
138a6(rgyud): ni dpal ldan bum pa yis te 'dir ni pad+ma dang bral re khA lnga po spangs// dang por chu dag la ni dge bsnyen nyid du 'gyur te bum pa la yang dge tshul dag tu 'gyur// gsang ba'i
138a7(rgyud): dbang la dge slong dang ni gong ba'i byed pa la yang gnas brtan nas par 'gyur ba ste// phyag rgyang rang byangs tsong bar dag dang rdo rje mchod phyira'i thogs ni bla ma mchog gis sbyin par
138b1(rgyud): byang de dag slob dpon slad du rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis phyag rgya rnam par dag pa nyid// steng du b+ha re bkod cing sa yi mthil gyi gnas dag tu yang ri mo gsupa ni
138b2(rgyud): kun nas so// de rnams zur du nor bu gser gyi bum par chur bcas skud pa dang ldan pad+ma'i kha rnams so// dung sogs gser gyi snod dang yang nA dngul gyi rang bzhin dag tu dri mi
138b3(rgyud): chu ni bsgrub par bya// snying por gser gyi rang bzhin gsal ba'i gdan dag rab tu bkod de de la khrus ni brtsam par bya// me tog sogs dang dri yo til mar nyi ma me yis smin pa
138b4(rgyud): ngag gis lha la byug par bya// phye ma rnams kyis dril phyis byas nas sbrang rtsi mar dang zho dang 'o ma chu yis bkru bar bya// don grub rnams dang mar me dag dang rnam mang 'bras bu
138b5(rgyud): mchog gis 'di la nges par byabs nas ni// de yi gnas nas bskyod par bya ste sku yang dmar po'i gos dag gis ni yang dag g.yogs pa'o// dpal ldan dkyil 'khor
138b6(rgyud): mtha' ni mnyam pa'i sa yi gnas la rgyal ba'i cha yis re khA lnga byas te// dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa'o//
138b7(rgyud): de yi dbus su gzhag par bya ba zhal gyi pad+ma nub tu phyogs pa'i lha dang lha mo 'am// mchod rten sogs dang glegs bam dag gam thang sku zhes pa'ang de bzhin de la mngon phyogs
139a1(rgyud): sngags pa'o// rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje stong pa'i rang bzhin dag tu byas nas ni// phyi nas sngar brjod sbyor ba dag gis zla nyi
139a2(rgyud): rje las skyes dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rig pa'i lha mo sogs dang sangs rgyas A li kA li'i rigs skyes rang rang sa bon gyis bskyed rnams// snying mgrin lte ba gsang ba
139a3(rgyud): mgo dang gtsug tor 'khor lo dag la rigs kyi dbang gis bsgom par bya// de ltar nges pa nyid du bsgom par bya ste slar yang mtha' dag lha rnams dag gi lus la yang // khro bo'i rgyal po dag
139a4(rgyud): gis sring med srid mnyam ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste gzhug pa dag dang ni// bcing dang mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag kyang lha rnams kyi ni rang gi lus la bya// de nas slob dpon
139a5(rgyud): nyid kyis zhal ni rab tu gsal bar byas pa'i lha la phyag dag 'tshal bar bya// a sogs ka sogs dag las lha dang lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs yon tan la gnas sa bon gang // rang gi sa bon
139a6(rgyud): de ni snying gi dbus su zla nyi kha sbyor la gnas sku gsung thugs ldan par// mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi yan lag dpe byad mkha' dang brgyad kyis te// yi ge rnams
139a7(rgyud): gyis phye ba de nyid rab gsal 'dab mar glegs pam rnams la bsgom par bya// mchod rten snying por dpal ldan 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu pad+ma dag dang byang du ral gri nyid// bgrang 'theng la
139b1(rgyud): ni hU~M gi yi ge nor bu yongs su bgrang ba rnams ni mtshan dang dpe byad rnams// dril bu'i sku la dbyangs ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu rnams ngag dang ka sogs sde rnams rdo rje la// de dag
139b2(rgyud): kho na mchod phyir thogs la bcu yis bsgyur ba nor gyi dpe byad rnams ni stod g.yogs la// ka sogs sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa mkha' ro yon tan rnams ni pus 'khyud dag la bsgom
139b3(rgyud): bar bya// haM haHdpal ldan rna cha la ste oM aHzhes pa zung ni mgul rgyan ska rags dag la'o// de bzhin du yang a yig zung ni gdu bu dag la 'gyur te rkang gdub dag la ha hA yang /
139b4(rgyud): mtha' dag lus la gnas pa stong pa'i rnam pa lnga po dag ni thal ba dag la bsgom par bya// rang lus ye shes rnam par dag las rdo rje gsum dang bcas pa'i phung po khams la sogs pa kun//
139b5(rgyud): lha rnams kyi ni rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar rang rang sa bon dag gis rim pas dgod par bya// sa bon bkod na rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mchod rten sku gzugs sogs la'o//
139b6(rgyud): nye bar bsdu ba'i dus su lag pa'i rdo rje dag gis rang gi lus las bon gzhug par bya// 'di dang dang po ru yang ri mor bris pa'i thang sku rnams kyi me long la ni khrus su 'gyur// phyi nas dri dang /
139b7(rgyud): spos dang shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams dang glu dang rol mo dag dang ni// gar dang rnam mang mchog gi gos dang rnga yab dang ni gdugs rnams dag gis lha la mchod par bya// de ltar rab gnas/
140a1(rgyud): byas nas rnam mang mchog gi ro rnams dag gis dge 'dun mchod skyon rab tu sbyin// khror pa rjing dang mtshe'ur phyogs dang phyogs bral du ni klu yi rgyal po ra
140a2(rgyud): rnams dgod par bya// chu gter bdun po rang gi sa bon gyis te sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa'i dri lnga gzhug par bya// sbyin sreg mthar ni rdzing bu la sogs dag la chu lha dkar po phyag na
140a3(rgyud): zhags pa bsgom par bya// skyed mos tshal du shing gcig dpag pas ma ljon pa mtha' dag shing la gnas par dbang ni bskur nas so// cod pan dar dbyangs dag dang do shal gdu
140a4(rgyud): bu dang ni de bzhin rna cha ska rags la sogs pa// slob dpon la ni rab tu sbyin byar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po yon yang bdag nyid nus pas so// sbyin bdag gis ni bsod nams spyad du
140a5(rgyud): mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs la gzhan don don du gnyer bya ste// bsod nams 'di yis rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub thob par shog/ ji srid phyogs
140a6(rgyud): kyi lo ni gcig pu rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te blta ba dang ni reg par bya// de nas 'khyud par bya ste ro dang bcas pa'i chu gter g.yo ba la sogs rnams ni bsten par bya// lo ni nyi shu yan chad
140a7(rgyud): phyag rgya mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste khro bo 'byung po lha min cha// dbang gi don du drug dang bzhi ste bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o// dpal ldan shes rab nu ma la yang /
140b1(rgyud): dang por reg pa gang yin bum pa'i dbang ni de nyid do// gsang ba dag las ri bong 'dzin pa myang ba dang ni blta ba dag gis gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur// shes rab ye shes dbang la mtha'
140b2(rgyud): dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi yan lag zhal gyis sbyang ba byas nas ni// rgyal ba dag kyang 'dir ni bla mas dbang por byas nas slob ma la ni phyag rgya sbyin par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan
140b3(rgyud): zhun ma'i gser dang mtshungs shing bcu gnyis lo lon mdzes pa'i bu mo ni// khrag dang ldan la shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid dag gis rang gi rdo rje nor bus 'dod spyad nas// sa bon dang
140b4(rgyud): bcas rdo rje dag kyang slob ma dag par shes nas kha ru 'phang ba byas nas ni// phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya de nas slar yang gzhan ni ngu ba'i lam sogs ldan pa'o// skrag dang rnam par
140b5(rgyud): 'khrul pa'i sems ldan g.yo sgyu gzhan dbang 'gro ma nang dang ldan dang bu skyes ma// khro khengs nor la sred dang mi bden rtsod pa la dga' rang gi yan lag dman dang rnam dag min//
140b6(rgyud): shes rab 'di dag dbang la shin tu mkhas pa'i bla ma dag gis spang bar bya'o mo yi dbang // sngar brjod sangs rgyas la gus bla ma'i dam tshig 'dzin ma rnams ni phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya//
140b7(rgyud): 'dod pa skyod par byed pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la'o gang ba dag ni gang ba nyid du 'gyur// gang ba yan lag mchog dag las ni ri bong 'dzin pa khu bar byas nas thig le bzang po 'dzag/ o n+d+ras
141a1(rgyud): bkug pa mchog gi bde ba rang bzhin gyis ster thig le grol ba dag ni gsum gyi mthar// bas+t+ra dang reg dang 'grogs la 'dzag pa'i bde ba 'di dag dga' ba'i da
141a2(rgyud): ba la sogs dag gis so// 'dod pa dga' bar byed de dang po dag kyang mi rnams kyi ni mig gis blta ba dag la'o// phyi nas gang ba rab tu sbyar ba la ste slar yang mchog gi dga' ba nyid do
141a3(rgyud): rang lus la// 'bar ba thig le 'dzag pa dang ni dga' ba yang ste khyad par dga' ba rdo rje pad+ma la// oMn+d+ra thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru 'gyur ba la gnas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rdo rje byed//
141a4(rgyud): 'dod dang dga' ba dang ni 'dar dang 'gyur med dag dang bzhi po yis ni sbyor ba de gcig ste// gang ba dang ni nus dang skye ba dag dang mchog gi dga' ba nyid ni gnyis par nges par 'gyur//
141a5(rgyud): 'bar ba dang ni thig le brgyal ba dag dang slar yang khyad par dga' ba nyid ni gsum pa'o// oT+Ta dang ni nA da dag dang gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid ni bzhi par 'gyur// sems
141a6(rgyud): kyi bsam pa yis ni ma ru 'gyur te reg pa dang ni blta ba dag gis sring mo'o// rdo rje zhugs pas bu mor byed pa dang bcas shin tu dga' bas tsha mo dag ni de bzhin nyid// thig le lhung na/
141a7(rgyud): chung ma gzhan gyi rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni 'dod chags nyams las so// 'di dag rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste sa chu sreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i dngos rnams so// chu skyes
141b1(rgyud): lan rdo rje rab zhugs rtse mo cam la rlung dang thig se me rlung gsum pa'o// 'di dag rnal 'byor gas ma gyis rab tu gsal zhing nges par gru dang gsang dang thugs kyi zug rgya// chanas
141b2(rgyud): dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po mchog bde'i gter ni rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa'o// phyag rgya rnams las de ni legs pa'i ma ru 'gyur te rnam bcu dpal ldan bla ma'i
141b3(rgyud): zhal 'di'o// shes rab yum ni mchog gi yum ste srid gsum bskyed ma spyan la sogs pa rnams ni sring mo'o// rdo rje drug ni tsha mo rnams te phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs ster tsartsi kA
141b4(rgyud): sogs yang tsha mo// 'khor lo la gnas dus kun tu ni rang rigs sa la gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsten par bya// zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par
141b5(rgyud): nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad ming po'o// spyan la sogs pa ming po'i bu ste gzhan ni rnam mang
141b6(rgyud): yang tsha rnams dang yang tsha'i bu rnams so// 'khor lo la gnas rang rigs sar gnas rab dga' rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gis bsten par bya// zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo
141b7(rgyud): dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// bud med zla ba'i bzhin dang ut+pal mig can mchog gi dri yis rjes su byugs pa gang su dag/ bsod nams dag gi rgyu ru dag pa gsum
142a1(rgyud): gyis slob dpon la ni rdo rje mchod pa 'bul byed ma// sa gzhi sbyin dang glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang / bsod nams de dag
142a2(rgyud): thams cad de las 'gyur te mi bdag mkhar gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su'o// sgrol ma dmangs mo rnam pa bzhi ru sa yi steng du 'gyur te gos dkar mo ni rgyal rigs ma// sa ni rje'u rigs
142a3(rgyud): ma rnams rnam gsum mA ma kI ni gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes rnam bdur 'gyur// sgra zhes bya ba 'khar ba mkhan mo nges par ro yi rdo rje chang 'tshong gzugs kyi rdo rje ma// yang dag nges
142a4(rgyud): par gser mkhan par 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'dzin ma dag la dri yi rdo rje ni// 'phreng ba mkhan du rab tu grags te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis reg bya rdo rje thags mkhan ma// rdo rje
142a5(rgyud): mtha' can chos kyi dbyings ni nor bu mkhan mor 'gyur bar 'jig rten du ni rab tu grags// tsA mud+d+hA ni sha 'tshong mar 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan sa/
142a6(rgyud): phag mo 'khur ba mkhan du nges 'gyur gdong drug ma ni smad 'tshong ma ste dbang mo tshem bu ma// tshangs mi nya ba mor 'gyur sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu yang dbang phyug ma ni gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur/
142a7(rgyud): dpal mo zla ba gang ba'i zhal ni brgyad pa chos mkhan mar yang 'gyur te 'byung po'i skyes gnas so// rmugs byed ma ni rgya skyegs mkhan mor 'gyur te mi bdag rengs byed ma ni srin
142b1(rgyud): bal mkhan po'o// khengs ma zhes bya til mar 'chir ma rab phye shin tu stobs ni lcags mkhan mo ste bzhi pa'o// 'od zer can ni ko lpags mkhan mar rab 'gyur khro gnyer can
142b2(rgyud): ni shing mkhan ma dag de bzhin nyid// dpal ldan tsun+d+ra 'breg mkhan ma ste sa yi srid pa la gnas lcags sgrog ma ni smig ma mkhan// drag spyan ma ni khron pa byed mar 'gyur te bcu
142b3(rgyud): pa 'od ma'i gar ma shin tu sngon mo'o// khro bo'i cha shas khro bo las skyes bud med bcu po rnams ni rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// dpal ldan khyi gdong ma ni kla kro mar 'gyur mi
142b4(rgyud): yi bdag po phag gdong ma ni 'phyag pa mo// ce spyang gdong ma gtum mo dag dang sa yaM gzhi yi gnas la stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma// bya rog gdong ma bsnyon thabs ma ste rab tu
142b5(rgyud): gsal zhing nges par bya rgod gdong ma ro sreg ma// mkha' lding gdong ma dpal ldan b+hil+lIr 'gyur te brgyad pa 'ug pa'i gdong ma dag kyang ri khrod ma// sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa
142b6(rgyud): gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams ngag gi rigs rnams te// zhing dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yul dang grong mchog dpal ldan nags su yang dag gnas pa ni// rmongs rnams
142b7(rgyud): 'ching bar byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la dngos grub ster// bzhi dang drug dang de bzhin brgyad dang bcu dang bcas pa'i nor dang gcig pu gcig ni rim
143a1(rgyud): pas so// bzhi ni sangs rgyas dbye ba rnams te slar yang dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams// khro bo rnams ni phyogs kyi rab dbye sa stengs gnas
143a2(rgyud): su yi dgas dbye ba rnams ni de bzhin brgyad// lha min ngag kyang brgyad kyi dbye ba gdongs can sring bar gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// gcig pu gcig ni sna tshogs
143a3(rgyud): gtso bo srid gsum gnas su dpal ldan rigs rnams ngag gi khyab byed do// sa 'og rnams su gtum mo brgyad de mi yi 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes gnas/
143a4(rgyud): yi dgas zhes bya yi dgas 'jig rten tu ste lha mchog gnas su sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug/ tshangs pa'i yul sar dpal ldan bzhi ste rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du khams gsum dag gi
143a5(rgyud): yum gcig ma// rab tu khros pa'i zhal rnams sna tshogs yang dag sdud byed dgyes pa rnams ni skyong bar byed pa nyid// bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams dang lus ni dri ma dang bcas bram ze
143a6(rgyud): mo dang rgyal rigs mo// rje'u mo dmangs mo mthar skyes rnams sam mig dang lag pa dang bral rna ba mchu sna tshad ma rnams// mtha' dag byang chub rgyu ru shes rab thabs kyis mchod par
143a7(rgyud): bya ste rgyal po slob dpon snying rje dang // bcas pa'i thugs ldan dri ma dag dang rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su zhon pas so// dang por bud med gsang ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur
143b1(rgyud): te dam tshig la ni dpal ldan skyes pa mchog phyag rgya// rtsed mo'i yan lag las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te dbang po gnyis kyi bde mnyam dag gis chos phyag rgya// pho nya mo rnams ngag gi ji
143b2(rgyud): lnga lus dang pad+ma la gnas de dag rnams kyi rigs lnga ste// rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis gla rtsi dang ni pad+ma gcin dang shwa dang rul ba'i dri rnams so// dpal ldan bzang mo pad+ma n+dan
143b3(rgyud): du nges 'gyur chu la rgyum sna tshogs ma dang glang cher ma// dpal ldan sgrol mya gos dkar zhes byar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis mA ma kI dang spyan ma yang // rnal 'byor pa ni se
143b4(rgyud): ge'i ri dgas rta ru 'gyur te khyu mchog glang po rigs kyi dbye ba las// mi bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa dri med nor bu'i phyag dang phyag na pad+ma 'khor lo can// yan lag phra ldan skra rnams
143b5(rgyud): phra zhing rkang lag 'jam pa mnyes gshin dpal ni shin tu bzang mo'o// cung zad phra ba dang ldan ring zhing mig ni g.yo ba med la sgra ni 'khyog pa pad+ma can// ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag
143b6(rgyud): la rtsod mang la dga' sga ni shin tu chung ba dung can ma// ring zhing yan lag thams cad rdzogs la nges par yang ba'i yul dang skra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma// sbom zhing thung la yan lag
143b7(rgyud): brtan ldan shin tu sra ba'i yul dang sgra ni sbom pa glang chen ma// pho nya mo rnams dag pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig dag tu 'dir 'gyur dus kun tu ni 'dres pa'i rigs// seng ge dag
144a1(rgyud): kyang 'brog na gnas shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med la gtong ba'i ngang tshul can// ri dgas mgyogs 'gro dang ldan 'gyur zhing yang ba'i yul dang
144a2(rgyud): skrag pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o// rta ni nges par 'dod la sred par 'gyur te gzhan dbang gcin gyi dri dang gzhan don gnyer ba'o// khyu mchog rengs pa'i mig dang dman
144a3(rgyud): par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya yi dri ru 'gyur// glang chen 'dod ldan nges par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te rul pa'i dri dang shin tu rmongs pa'o// sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas
144a4(rgyud): phye ba sa yi steng gi gnas su rigs kyi dri yi rang bzhin no// mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// shin tu dga'
144a5(rgyud): ba byas kyang rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis mchim dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur// mdzes ma lha mo dang ni sha za mo dang mi mo dang ni srin mo klu mo dag tu 'gyur// mdzes
144a6(rgyud): madrabs ldan chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha mo sgra yi rdo rje ma// sha za mo ni rdo yo rdo rjer 'gyur te mi mo dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma yi dbang // gdug
144a7(rgyud): pa srin mo gang yin de ni nges par ro yi rdo rje glu mo reg bya rdo rje ma// mdzes ma sems can phan pa byed ma brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' sdom dang bsam gtan ngang tshul can//
144b1(rgyud): lha mo longs spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri ma ldam ning lhag ma la chags shab mo// mi mo 'dod la rjes su chags ma srin mo mi yi khrag la dga' zhing gsod pa'i sems ma skye/
144b2(rgyud): klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// de bzhin gzhan du rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rnal 'byor
144b3(rgyud): po yis rig par bya// sa yi steng gi gnas su mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba'o// chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sdang rtsi dang bcas bu ram las skyes
144b4(rgyud): 'bras las skyes sam shing skyes te// phyag rgya dang bral gang zhig 'thung byed de ni yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig
144b5(rgyud): pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub sbyin par bya// phyag rgya gang su rung ba 'dir ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba btung ba'i slad du rab tu bya// rgyal po ri bong mtshan ma
144b6(rgyud): gcig pu thams cad dus su bsten pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog byed na// shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas rnal 'byor ldan pa dag ni spros ci dgos/
144b7(rgyud): mi bskyod don yod grub pa rgyal ba mchog bcas khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang po dang ldan pa// nyon mongs rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs sbyin brgyad pa gzhan ni shin tu drag/ khyi rta/
145a1(rgyud): ba lang glang mo lug dang ra dang ri dgas bong bu phag dang rnga mo 'di dag phyogs// kuM b+hI ra dang 'gron bu ku lI ra dang nya dang ma kar dang sbal pa rus sbal dung // bse ru
145a2(rgyud): stag dang dom dang ne'u le bcas 'bri dang ce spyang dang ni sram dang byi la dang // 'brog dgon khyi dang seng ge dang bcas nor dang bcu ste 'di ni 'byung po skyes dang khro bo skyes// go d+hA byi ba
145a3(rgyud): shA la dzI ta spre'u dang ni ri bong gzugs mo i shu rtsangs pa brgyad// khengs ldan 'dab chags dang ni re tso khu byug dag dang ri skegs rab tu gsal bar chu yi gter// lA ba phug ron gzhan/
145a4(rgyud): ni bya dkar zhes bya tsa Ta ka dang ngur pa dang ni ngang pa dang // dpal ldan khrung khrung khu byug mig dang ra dza ka dang b+ha ga ba ti ti ti ri dang bzhad// chu la 'jug pa dang ni chu skyar ro dang bcas pa'i/
145a5(rgyud): nor rnams rim pa yis ni rig par bya// bya rog bya rgod 'ug pa ri dgas dgra dang gtsug bud can dang bya gag b+he dra g+ha ra dang // hor ba sngon shing dgra ni gzhan te bcu po khro bo las skyes khro bo yin
145a6(rgyud): rigs su 'gyur// mig sngon dpal ldan tsa ko ra dang a ni la dang gu da mu kha bug gi rkang steng nyal// b+he ru NA dang aM ba ri ka brgyad pa mchog gi 'dab chags su 'gyur mi yi bdag po kye/
145a7(rgyud): sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa la gnas sa spyod mkha' la spyod rnams kyis// rigs su gyur pa'i dam tshig mtha' dag rnams ni mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa
145b1(rgyud): yis bza' bar bya// rmongs pa sa gti mug dag las gal te spangs na mi yi bdag po myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur// so dang sgra dang pags pa la sogs sha bcas chu rgyus dang
145b2(rgyud): bcas rus pa snying dang pad+ma dang // shig dang ba spu sprin bu dag dang rab mchog mi yi bdage bo glo brgyu ma chu so dang // bang kan mkhris pa chu dang rnag dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa
145b3(rgyud): khrag dang rdul dang tshil bu dang // mchi ma dag dang mtshol ma snabs dang dri chu chu ser zhag dang kha dog dri dang bshang ba dang // lce dang mig dang rna ba sna dang ri bong can bcas nyin byed rnam
145b4(rgyud): kyis lha rnams mchod par bya// sum cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang // sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba mtha' dag
145b5(rgyud): lus la gnas pa'i rigs dang mtshan ma phyag rgya dang // sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni sa gzhi dag la gnas rnams 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// chu dang mchod yon dri dang spos dang
145b6(rgyud): me tog dang ni 'bras bu ma nyams pa dang mar me dang // lha bshos dag dang 'dir ni na bzar 'gyur te bcu po rnams ni 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang // khu ba gcin dang rkang dang bshang ba dag
145b7(rgyud): dang sha dang mchin ba dag dang mkhris pa khrag dang ni// rgyu ma pags pa rnams ni rgyal po rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang // rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang pad+ma 'dab ma
146a1(rgyud): brgya pa lnga pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste// rgyud mangs dang ni me long snod du 'gyur te pi yi bdag po me tog 'phreng ba dag dang gos// drug pa chos 'byung nges par
146a2(rgyud): lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur te sgra yi rdo rje la sogs mtshan pa'o// de bzhin gri gug la sogs bum pa zhes dang de bzhin du ni bcu gzar gos ni ser po dang // khab bam yang na tho ba rab tu gsal
146a3(rgyud): zhing nges pa dag tu nya yi rgya dang rtse gsum ste// dpal mo'i mtshan ma brgyad pa rdo bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi'o// rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyi dmar
146a4(rgyud): snod nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang // chu gri dang ni mthil lham dag dang spu gri zhes bya de bzhin shing lham dag dang gdugs dang ni// tog tse dang ni 'od ma'i dbyug
146a5(rgyud): pa khro skyes rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma bcu ru rab tu 'gyur// ba lang ra dang kham por rgyud ldan 'phang dang sha yi gsal shing lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur ba ste// rgyud mangs nye ba'i yan lag
146a6(rgyud): dang ni mnga' dang gtsug pud can gyi mjug ma 'dir ni brgyad par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa drug mtshan ma'i dbye ba rab mchogs yi steng du ral 'byor pa yos mchod par bya// slar yang dmangs
146a7(rgyud): rigs la sogs mtshan mar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis ut+pa la'am mthong gshol lo// rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar dpyangs su 'gyur mi yi bdag po stu gu rin chen 'phreng ba ni//
146b1(rgyud): rje'u rigs ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu na rgyu ba dang bcas zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i// yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi sde Da ma ru dang rnga chen cod pan nyid dang bgrang 'phreng ngo // bshang
146b2(rgyud): ba gci ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang bcas pa lha mo rnams ni bzhi por 'gyur ba ste// rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang ni b+ha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug/ rnag dang bad kan dang ni
146b3(rgyud): shig dang srir bu chu ser zhag dang ba spu skra dang brgyad po yang // rgyu ma mkhris pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang // rtsa dang pags pa rnams dang snying dang
146b4(rgyud): tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur ro mo yi dbang // rna ba dang ri sna dang mig dang kha dang bshang lam dbus dang b+ha ga dag dang mchan khung sogs// lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i
146b5(rgyud): dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams brgyad du 'gyur// sen mo dang bcas so dang yan lag bcu gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur// bshang ba gcig khrag
146b6(rgyud): dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi// rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dag dang b+ha ga'i zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug/ rnag la sogs pa sgra yi bar ni
146b7(rgyud): sa yi steng gi gnas su tshan do ha yi dbye ba brgyad// rgyu ma la sogs tshol gyi bar ni phyogs zhes bya ba mi bdag 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams// rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la
147a1(rgyud): nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab dbye rnams// dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing nges par gnas kyi dbye ba dgal bzhi// sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa/
147a2(rgyud): pabasangs spen pa gdengs can rnams ni zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes chu skyes me skyes rlung las skyes pa dag/ brgyad na tshan do ha yi dbye ba
147a3(rgyud): rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog dang // reg bya sgra ni de bzhin nyid du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni zad pa dag kyang
147a4(rgyud): mdun dang g.yon dang g.yas dang rgyab tu ste// kha dog la sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye ba rnams// gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste gas la b.raH
147a5(rgyud): yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod// tshan do ha ni tsartsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur to mi bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs// dur khrod khyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar
147a6(rgyud): gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni// yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de dag rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma// gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i pad+mar
147a7(rgyud): rab 'gyur dam tshig la rdo rje nyid ni nye ba'i gnas// zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go// gnas ni g.yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te
147b1(rgyud): gzhan dang de bzhin g.yas pa dag kyang nye ba'i gnas// de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang /
147b2(rgyud): lha mo chu gter du 'gyur dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags// shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan pa dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug/ chu gter yang dag spong ba rnams dang
147b3(rgyud): gzhan ba chu gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur// khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag sgra rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do// yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam
147b4(rgyud): ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te// de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor
147b5(rgyud): ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang ni de bzhir 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa dang ni ba'am
147b6(rgyud): gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gtsang gnas bram ze'am// thod pa can dang skra 'bab dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang // smyon pa'i gzugs can
147b7(rgyud): ngag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang nig pa nyid 'gyur te// rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' deg yon tan gter te de nyid thob pa'o mi yi dbang // mthe bong dag ni mdzug/
148a1(rgyud): mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin du ni gung mo dang ni ming med dang // de yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gter du rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya//
148a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so// bcing ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no// khu tshur
148a3(rgyud): brla yi steng du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// skyil krung la ni lag pa g.yon par 'gyur te g.yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la son gyur pa// sa
148a4(rgyud): la reg pa mi bskyod phyag rgya'o slar yang lag pa g.yas pa mchog skyon phyag na rin chen gyi// g.yon gyi steng du lag pa g.yas pa gan rkyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na pad+ma dag gir 'gyur/
148a5(rgyud): g.yon pa skyil krung steng du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil ni 'jigs pa med pa phyag na ral gri yi// g.yas kyi khu tshur g.yas mi la ste nges par slar yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcings pa
148a6(rgyud): la gsal bar snying khar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur pa dang ni gung mo la sogs brkyang ba'o//
148a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzir pa g.yas la rdo rje nyi ma ste// nyi ma zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo las skyes rtse mo lnga pa ni// bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg
148b1(rgyud): bya cod par dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mtha' nyid du'o// 'di na rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgya sdig pa'i drim 'phrog pa'o// gang zhig cung zad gzung /
148b2(rgyud): bar bya ba'i dngos pos skyes du skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang // bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg par bya// gang gang bya
148b3(rgyud): ba nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya// sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsnun par bya// lag pa dag
148b4(rgyud): gis rdo rjes bcings pa yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba
148b5(rgyud): yo/ mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g.yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can
148b6(rgyud): rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur// mthe bong dag dang mthe'u chung sbyar ba pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs gung mo dag ni brkyang ba dang // mdzub mo gnyis ni zla ba phyed pa ming med 'og tu bskum pa rang gi lag mthil
148b7(rgyud): son gyur pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje can gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya ba'o// rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams te lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du mthe bong la sogs mtha' dag
149a1(rgyud): rnams// lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings pa rdo rjer 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur dag gis dril bur bcas// khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mnga' dang mtshungs pa
149a2(rgyud): ngag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur// mdzub mo la sogs rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yi no rje gsum la// dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur bcings shing dpal ldan mthen/
149a3(rgyud): chung zla ba phyed pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyur// rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings shing mthe bong gung mo'i steng du 'gyur te mnga' yi mchog la'o// khu tshur bcings shing mdzub mo shin tu 'khyog
149a4(rgyud): por 'gyur ro mi bdag de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o// rtsa bar mdzub mo ming med du 'gyur mda' dang mtshungs pa'i steng du gung mo yang ni mdung la ste// thad kar khu tshur dbyug pa la'o lag mthil
149a5(rgyud): shin tu mnyam la mthe bong brkyang ba dgra sta la// steng du khu tshur gnyis dang mdzub mor 'gyur te lha mini bdag po glang chen lpags pa dag la'o// mche ba la ni lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du khru
149a6(rgyud): tshur bcings shing mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa'o// khe Ta ka la dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du son par 'gyur// kha T+wAM ga la khu tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyid du
149a7(rgyud): phrag par mthe'u chung brkyang ba'o// sor mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad 'dab lta bu steng du byas pa dpal ldan thod pa la// gzhul lag pa gan kyil khu tshur du 'gyur nges par dpung pa g.yon
149b1(rgyud): pa rab tu brkyang ba'o// gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po kun tu brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje zhags pa la// rin cher la ni sbyar ba'i sor mor 'gyur te mi bdag de dag rnam par
149b2(rgyud): ba pad+ma la// rgyu na rgyu ba la ni mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i 'og tu khu tshur ro// me long la ni shin tu mnyam pa'i la ga mthil sor mo bug med dang bcas mngor du phyogs par
149b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ mthe bong la ni mdzub mo la sogs stong du 'khyog po rim par yongs su bkod pa lcags sgrog la'o// mgo bo la ni mthe bong la sogs bzhi po gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og tu mthe'u
149b4(rgyud): chung bskum pa'o// cod pan la ni lag pa dag gis dung gi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar ba nyid du 'gyur// lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni gcig tu sbyar ba dag kyang rna rgyan la/
149b5(rgyud): lag po'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mgul pa'i rgyan la ste// lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo gsum ni phar tshun sbyar cing thog mtha' bskum pa dag ni skra
149b6(rgyud): rags la'o// khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang gung mo gnyis po zlum skor lta bur byas pa rkang gdub la// de bzhin du ni dpung rgyan zung dang gdu bu la yang mdzub mo phan tshun sbyar ba dag tu
149b7(rgyud): 'gyur// mthe bong mkha' 'gro ma rnams ngag gi mchog gi rigs su 'gyur te mdzub mo gsang ba pa rnams kyi// dri za rnams dang gdengs can rnams kyi gung mo ming med dag ni rim par yongs
150a1(rgyud): su bkod pa'o// 'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i mthil na srin po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur// grub pa rnams kyi khu tshur bcings pa
150a2(rgyud): mchog gi rigs kyi mtshams ni lha rnams ngag gi'o// lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgya sder mo can rnams kyi// khu tshur bcings las mdzub mo gnyis
150a3(rgyud): po phyed 'khyog nges par mgo bor son pa rwa can rnams kyi'o// mi mnyam lag pa'i mthil la mthe'u chung phan tshun bcings shing gshog pa sbyar ba sgong skyes rnams kyi ste// sor mo lnga po
150a4(rgyud): rtse mo 'khyog pa gdengs can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags par 'gyur// nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma la ni mdzub mo'i mtha' rnams rab brkyang gzhan pa 'og tu sbyar
150a5(rgyud): byas pa/ 'bar dag la mthe bong sbyar te mchog gi lag mthil dag gi mdzub mo brkyang ba gzhan pa'o// mdzub mo bstan na legs par 'ongs sam dag kyang nges par brjod par 'gyur
150a6(rgyud): te rnal 'byor pa la yang // gnyis kyis shin tu legs par 'ongs dang skal bzang dge ba mthe bong bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur// sor mo'i sa gos rdeb pa khyod
150a7(rgyud): 'di ru sngags pa mchog ces nges par brjod par 'gyur ba ste// mthe bong dang ni ming med ngag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod ni tshim par byed pa'o// sor mo thams cad rtse mo
150b1(rgyud): brkyang bas skal bzang legs par 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la yang // g.yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed/
150b2(rgyud): skyes gnas dag la reg pas gtso bo mchu dang nu ma zung dang nges par ser mo 'debs pas kyang // sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung mo dang ni mthe bong brkyang bas dam tshig rjod par
150b3(rgyud): byed pa yin// mchu dang smin ma mig dag yo nang mgo la 'phrug par byed na shin tu rmongs parjod par byed// mche ba'i dbus su mthe'u chung dang ni snying kha kha ru mdzub mo 'jigs pa
150b4(rgyud): rab tu gsal bar byed// mthe bong khu tshur bcings pa dang ni lag pa rkang pa sa la rdib na nga yis bza' bar bya// lce la reg na zos pa dang ni lto dang so la bsnun pa dag gis ma zos
150b5(rgyud): pa nyid do// lag pa'i rgyab kyis song zhig nges par rab tu rjod de mngon du phyogs pas 'dug cig 'dug cig go// byin pa brlal nyed na skal bzang khyod ni de ring kho na ngal so nges
150b6(rgyud): par rjod par byed// rkang pa rab tu rkyong bas gnyid dang pus mo zung dag rkyong bas bdag la shin tu dga' ba gyis// yan lag kun la reg par byed cing kha ru lag pa gnas pa
150b7(rgyud): bdag la 'dus pa med pa'o// phan tshun lag pa bcings pas bdag gi khyim du de ring 'khor lo 'dus pa dag ni rjod par byed// mthe bong ming med rtse mo dag gis rnam mang dam
151a1(rgyud): tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya// rkang pa la ni 'phrug par byed na de bzhin du ni phyi rol 'dus pa dag la 'gro ba yang // mdzub mo phan tshun bcings
