151a2(rgyud): na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni de ring 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o// skra ni rang gi so yis gcod na mi yi phyags khyod 'dir ni lhung bar bya ba rjod par byed// so ni phan tshun 'dar bar byed
151a3(rgyud): na khyod kyi sha ni 'di dag bdag gis de ring bza' bar bya// lce mchu g.yo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya'o nges par rjod par byed// mchu la so ni 'debs par byen na khyod
151a4(rgyud): kyi rgyu ma lto bar gnas 'di bdag gis bza' bar bya// sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis ni sgeg par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bzhad pa'i sbyor bas bzhad pa'o// gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gar du 'gyur
151a5(rgyud): te rnam pa mang po'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo'o// glu yi sbyor ba yis ni glu ste mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dri yi sbyor ba dag gis dri// 'phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ni 'phreng bar 'gyur te
151a6(rgyud): yon tan dbang gis spos kyi sbyor ba dag gis spos// mar mo'i rnam pas mar me nges par mun pa bcom pa dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'gyur// zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar
151a7(rgyud): yang de nas lnga yi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste// gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du
151b1(rgyud): 'gyur sa yi steng du de mi rang bzhin ngag kyang phyag rgya rnams// pho nya mo ni 'phreng la blta bas khyod ni gang zhig nas 'ongs skal ba bzang la rjod par byed// mgo bor lag bzhag de mi
151b2(rgyud): phyogs su nges par bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yis lan ni smras par 'gyur// steng du blta bas khyod ni dge 'am sa yi steng du gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ngal so zhig/ yon por lta
151b3(rgyud): bas khyod song chags pa'i lta bas pho nya mo ni shin tu dga' brjod par byed// zhi ba'i lta bas bdag gi grogs po khro gnyer khro bo'i lta bas 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed// skra la lta
151b4(rgyud): bas bdag ni ma rungs par brjod skal bzang la ni rang gi rang bzhin zur gyis so// mdzod spur lta bas bdag mchog rnal 'byor ma ni sna la lta bas yon tan rab tu gsal bar byed// maN+Dal
151b5(rgyud): lta bas skal ba bzang ste nu mazung la lta na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mor brjod// snying khar lta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid lag pa zung la lta na bdag ni rab tu gtum mor brjod// phrag
151b6(rgyud): par lta bas bdag ni nus ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la lta na srin mo'o// rgyab tu lhan lag 'gro ma ste lte bar lta bas mi yi dbang po bdag ni dam tshig can// gsang bar lta
151b7(rgyud): bas bdag ni dag pa brlal lta bas bdag ni shin tu dga' la gdul bar dka'// pus mor lta bas bdag ni grub pa nges par rjod byed rkang par lta bas rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa mo//
152a1(rgyud): rkang pa'i mthe bong nges par ldan bdag ni srid par rdo rje'i sku ste dpal mo gcig pu dang // sor mo kun gyi rtse mor skabs srid pa gsum myi gnas su kun tu 'gros
152a2(rgyud): sna tshogs yum// pho nya mo rnams lta stangs nyid ni sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// drug cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus ngag gi ni yan lag mchog kyang
152a3(rgyud): sbyin pa ste// las kyi dbang po rnams kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dang bcas yid dag kyang // khams kyi cha shas khams kyi nang na rkang gnyis pa dang phyugs kyi rdo rje tshogs
152a4(rgyud): kyi de nyid cha yis gzhan// mchog gi phyag rgya rjes su rig pa slob dpon la ni rab tu phul na bde ba'i gnas su 'gro// sems can gang dag rnam gsum srid par gnas rnams 'jig rten
152a5(rgyud): khams las ye shes rdo rje lcags kyu yis// bkug ste de dag mtha' dag mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje yi// bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur nas
152a6(rgyud): ni dri med ri bong can lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa// dri ma rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas rnams rang gi gnas su gtang bar bya// rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang
152a7(rgyud): bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya// de bzhin du ba la sogs lam dang mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa ste/ bstan pa'i don
152b1(rgyud): du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang son skyon rnams kun las rnam par grol// gzhan rnams la ni rgyal ba mchog gi snying po sum gyi mchod pa rnams dmaran sbyir pa nyid 'bya// dbang na
152b2(rgyud): mthar ni dpal lngar bum pa rnams kyi 'jam zhing lus la bde ster stod kor gos zung dag/ dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la sbyin bya gzhan yang de bzhin stod kor dang ni gos zung
152b3(rgyud): dag sgo na gnas pa rnams la rab sbyin mtha' dag yon tan rigs la bdag nyid nus pas de bzhin gzhan// mthar ni sbyin sreg byas nas rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar ye shes sems dpa'
152b4(rgyud): rab tu gzhug bya ste// 'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnas su mtha' dag rdul tshon dag kyang dag pa'i klung la spyan drang bya// traM bu la dang dri spos me tog 'bras bur bcas dang ras yug dag ri
152b5(rgyud): gzhon nu ma rnams la// byin ras slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni ji ltar 'dod par mchod byas te// slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin rab mchog tshogs
152b6(rgyud): kyi rigs ni rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol// dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang lto 'phye'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas 'ching ba dang // chu gter 'khrugs pa dang ni sha
152b7(rgyud): za 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed rang dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang // dbul dang bud med bral dang mi bdag 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni rdo rje ltung dang don nyams pa// gang zhig
153a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni nyin zhag so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur// dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las byung ba'i dpal chen po dus
153a2(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo las/ mngon par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / rgyal ba skyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdud po rnams dang bum pa dang nigs
153a3(rgyud): ba'i dbang dag dang // shes rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'jobs pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya bzhi pa thob// slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso
153a4(rgyud): bo'i sgrub thabs yang dag par ni bdag zhu'o// zla ba bzang po'i tshig gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo rje can ngag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs// zla ba'i sku dang zung gi zhabs te me yi
153a5(rgyud): mgrin pa chu gter dpal ldan zhal ni sna tshogs mdog/ phrag pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung pa rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma stong pa drug dang ma yi tshogs// zhabs ngag gis ni zla ba nyi ma sreg za'i
153a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag la bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin pa// rol pas mnan pa'i srid med srid pa mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor lo gcig pu de ni bsgrub par bya// skyed mos tshal lam ri
153a7(rgyud): bo dang ni rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas ni stong pa dang // grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang ni mtsho dang bzang po'i gnas dang de bzhin nyid du sbas pa'i sa// gang du sam
153b1(rgyud): nirab tshim par 'gyur ba der ni bsgrub par bya na ma yi bdag byo'o// nges par 'jam pa'i mas ldan dag dang gdan lanye bar 'dug nas thar brjod bskyang bzlas nas ni// da
153b2(rgyud): bor snying khar zla ba'i dbus su de nyid 'od zer sna tshogs rnams ni phyogs bcur bsgom par bya// kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar yang nam mkha' dag la spros pa'i rgyal ba rnams la mi/
153b3(rgyud): mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po bsags pa dag ni bshags byas te// sgrub pa po yis lus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis ni gsum la skyabs
153b4(rgyud): su 'gro bar bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa// de dag mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam bral byang
153b5(rgyud): chub spyod la rjes su gnas pas rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rdzogs sangs rgyas su
153b6(rgyud): bdag gyur cig ces 'dir ni smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid do// stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman//
153b7(rgyud): de las sangs rgyas byang chub med cing gzhan phan snying rje dag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste// mtha' dag de ltar shes nas de lta na yang mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
154a1(rgyud): ni dpag med yon tan dkyil 'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya// chu yis me ni rnam par nyams pa dang por
154a2(rgyud): 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su sdom brtson dag gis bya// phyi nas 'dzin ma dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshwa bzhin du chu yi dbus su rab tu zhugs// rlung ni chu bo de dag bskams nas nam mkha'
154a3(rgyud): la ni snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// sems ni me dang mun pa'i mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyi sa la gzhag par bya// stong pa rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla/
154a4(rgyud): ba nyi ma ma rnams ni// khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba 'am ni rdo rje las skyes gur dag go// de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sa la nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par
154a5(rgyud): 'phro ba ste// oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag gi gdan// phyi rol du ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor ror gyi pad+ma 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman/
154a6(rgyud): 6phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi char ni nyin mor byed pa'i pad+ma sgo yi dbus su shing rta rnams// nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nor bu gser gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod dang // snying
154a7(rgyud): por brgyad gnyis ka ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin shin tu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal ba yi// zla ba nyi ma la yang a sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis/
154b1(rgyud): 'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri ma med pa'i ther 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i rgyang dang ldan pa'i lus dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma nyi ma'i dpung pa dus sbyin la/
154b2(rgyud): mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan te rnam par rgyas pa'i zhal yang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa'o// dpal ldan oM yig las skyes rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+mar zla ba nyi ma ma yi steng du mi
154b3(rgyud): drag po lus med gnyis kyi snying khar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin tu rol pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang stabs// g.yas pa dmar po'i mchog gi zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud ste dkar po g.yon
154b4(rgyud): bar yang ni drag po'o// dbus dang g.yas dang g.yas min mgrin pa dag kyang bung ba nyi ma dang mtshungs zla ba dag gi mdog/ zag pa sngon po dang ni dmar dang ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar
154b5(rgyud): g.yas pa dang ni g.yon du yang // g.yas dang g.yas min dpung pa gnyis gnyis dag ni gnag dang nyi ma'i lus dang zla ba'i mdog rnams te// de bzhin nges par mtshon cha dang ni
154b6(rgyud): bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyi ni rim pas so// phyag gi pad+ma ri bong can la tshigs gsum sor mo lnga po rnams ni kha dog lnga rnams 'phro// gnag dang dmar
154b7(rgyud): dang dkar ba'i rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshon cha'i tshogs ni yang ngag gnas pa yang // rdo rje ral gri dag dang rtse gsum pa dang srid pa 'jigs byed gri gug dang ni me yi mdal
155a1(rgyud): nas rdo rje lcags kyus nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang tho ba 'khor lo nyid// mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta rnams ni rdo rje can gyi nyi ma'i phyag gi pad+ma g.yas la'o// /
155a2(rgyud): dril bu phub dang kha T+wAM ga ni rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang // gzhu dang zhags pa rin cher pad+ma chu na rgyu ba dag dang me long dang ni lcags sgrog dang // tshangs pa'i//
155a3(rgyud): mgo bo pad+mas brgyan pa rig byed gdong ldan gang yin rgyal ba'i g.yon gyi phyag na'o// bdud dang drag po'i lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed/
155a4(rgyud): gser mdog rig byed zhal ldan nor gyi phyag gi pad+mas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogs yum yin te// g.yas na gri gug lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang bgrang 'phreng
155a5(rgyud): rim pas so// g.yon na thod pa zhags pa dang ni 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma'i mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid// g.yon brkyang nyi ma'i spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams
155a6(rgyud): kyis rgya yis btab pa'o// 'dab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma rig byed zhal dang nyi ma'i sbyar// de dag rnams las bani ni sbrul gyi rnga layab 'dzin te zung du rgyal
155a7(rgyud): pa'i zhal gyi dbye bas so// dbang ldan bden bral dang ni rtse mo can dang rlung gi zur du chos kyi dung dang gaN+DI dang // de bzhin yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur te nges par de bzhin du ni dpag bas
155b1(rgyud): shing du rim pas 'gyur// nag mo yi ni dang po'i phyag gi mthil na smos kyi snod dang gnyis pa dag ra bsil ba'i snod// dmar po sbyar ba gsum pa na ste myos byed dang bcas
155b2(rgyud): khong 'dzir pa g.yas kyi phyag bzhin// g.yon na dril bu pad+ma lha yi shing gi me tog dang ni me tog 'phreng ba rim pas so// dmar mo'i g.yas na mar me do shal dag dang cod pan dang
155b3(rgyud): bcas gdu bu rnams te phyag g.yon na// gos dang ska rags dang ni dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub bo// sor mo'i g.yas kyi phyag na dung dang gling bu nor bu dang bcas
155b4(rgyud): Da ma ru ni rom pas te// g.yon na rgyud mangs dang ni rnga dang sil sil rab tu sgrogs pa'i khar ba dag dang zangs dung ngo // 'o ma chu dang sman dang chang dang bdud rtsi ro dang 'bras bu zan
155b5(rgyud): gyi snod ni dkar mo yi// phyogs kyi pad+mar chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par spyan dgu me yi zhal dang dus kyi phyag/ zur du sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang slar yang de dag mtsham/
155b6(rgyud): brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad// lha dang lha mo gnag dang dmar dang ser ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba ste// nag po dkar po zla ba'i steng du yang na phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser/
155b7(rgyud): po nyi ma'i steng // mkha' snying la sogs rtsig pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas reg bya rdo rje ma la sogs// shar dang phyogs gzhan gyi ni g.yas dang g.yas min pad+ma dag la
156a1(rgyud): kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje nges par sgra yi rdo rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings ni rim pas so// rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed dag
156a2(rgyud): shin tu stobs shes gang yin sgro skyong de ni shar du'o// shes rab phang bar thabs ni ri bong 'dzin pa'i pad+ma la ste lha rnams kyi yang lha mo'o// gnyis po dag ni rang gi phyag gi chu skyes
156a3(rgyud): rang rang mtshan mas mtshan ma dag gis phan tshun 'khyud// mtshan ma gang zhig gang gis g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag mthil na ste de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman// shes rab thabs kyis 'khor
156a4(rgyud): lo mchog gi bde bar gnas pa pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs// nag po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri gri gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtse gsum ste// g.yon pa'i phyag/
156a5(rgyud): gi mthil du phub dang thod pa dag dang kha T+wAM gA ni dkar po nyid du 'gyur// mnga' dang rdo rje lcags kyu sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru ni g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa yis// gzhu dang zhags pa dag
156a6(rgyud): dang dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu dmar po rnams kyi g.yon na de bzhin nyid// ser po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na 'khor lo dbyug pa dang ni 'jigs byed rdo rje rim pas te// g.yon du dpal
156a7(rgyud): ldan dung dang lcags sgrog dang ni nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bur 'gyur// ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba rnams kyi g.yas na dpal ldan thob mdung dang rtse gsum ste/
156b1(rgyud): gson ra pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgya dang ldan pa dag dang me long dang ni bgrang 'phreng ngo // ljang khru rnams kyi g.yas su rdo rje gri gug dang ni dgra skar rim pas rab tu 'gyur ba ste// g.yo//
156b2(rgyud): du dril bu dang ni thod pa mtha' dag yon tan gter dang tshangs pa'i gdong pa de nyid do// lha mo sngon mo rnams dag gi ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de bzhin du ni rig par bya// gdag
156b3(rgyud): dang dmar dang dkar dang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa shar gyi sa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dor ras rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma dag la res 'ga'
156b4(rgyud): ni/ dpal ldan 'khor lo snying po'i dbus su mi yi bdag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur// rang gi sems kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'di yang rnal 'byor pa rnams dag
156b5(rgyud): gis bsgom par bya// dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi dkyil 'khor rab tu dman par 'gyur// phyi rol du ni brgyad pa brgyad kyis par 'dab brgyad
156b6(rgyud): po rnams la phyogs brgyad lha mo rnams dang ni// tsartsi ka sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum ma// shar gyi pad+mar tsartsi ka ste mer ni mkha'
156b7(rgyud): 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro ma phag mo gdong drug ma// ga shin rje bden bral zur dag tu ste chur bcas rlung du rdo rje lag dang chu gter gdong ma'o// drag mo dpal mo byang dang dbang ldan du ste
157a1(rgyud): mtshon cha dang bcus thabs kyi sku la 'khyung ba'o// brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas gtso mo'i kha dog zhal rnams so// shar la/
157a2(rgyud): sogs par dang po'i phyag gi mthil na gri gug dang ni rtse gsum 'khor lo be con dang // dbyug pa ral gri dang ni mdung thung lcags kyu dag ni g.yas kyi phyag gi pad+ma zung la'o// rdo rje mda'
157a3(rgyud): dang pad+ma dang ni dri med glog mtshungs tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtse gsum dang // sna tshogs rin chen gyis bcings sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang pad+ma nyid dang bgrang 'phreng ste/
157a4(rgyud): g.yon na thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang pad+ma ma dung dang lcags sgrog dag dang phub dang ni// nges par rin po che dang zhags pa sgra ni rab tu sgrog pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dag dang // spyi blugs
157a5(rgyud): snod dang kha T+wAM ga dang sbrul dang de nas chu las skyes dang rin po che nyid de// pad+ma nor 'dab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma yi phyag gi mtshon cha de bzhin no// 'jigs ma drag mo dus
157a6(rgyud): kyi mche ba me'i bar gdong ma rlung gi shugs ma dang ni rab gtum ma// drag spyan ma dang sna chen ma rnams tsartsi ka ya~M pad+ma nor 'dab la ni phyogs rnams su// g.yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal
157a7(rgyud): rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal byed ma// brgyad pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor 'dab pad+ma la ni khyab 'jug ma yi phyogs kyi char// keng rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan
157b1(rgyud): mo rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dus kyi skye dang gtsigs ma dang // nug mo 'jigs rung gzugs ngan ma rnams nor 'ad ba pad+ma la ste phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo la'o// pang+ga lus myed
157b2(rgyud): gzhon nu ma dang ringags bdag pos 'gro ma rin chen 'phreng ba mig bzang ma// rul ma bzang mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu skyes 'angab la rgyal po ste/ rdo rje 'od
157b3(rgyud): dang rdo rje lus dang mchog gi gser ldan ur ba sI dang bkra ba'i ri mo dang // raM b+hA zug med shin tu sgrol ma pad+ma nor 'dra ba rdo rje lag ma lhag po'i lha can la'o// sA bi tr-i dang pad+ma'i mig
157b4(rgyud): dang nges par chu skyes can pa blo dang ngag gi dbang phyug ma// gA ya tri dang glog nyid dran pa dag kyang pad+ma rig byed gdong ni lhag pa'i lha can la// gau rI gang+gA dang ni rtag ma shin tu mchog tu
157b5(rgyud): myur ma to ta la dang mtshon byed ma// dmar ser nag mo brgyad ni de bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o// dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i ri mo ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong
157b6(rgyud): mngang pa'i mdog dang 'dzin ma dang // pad+ma'i dbang po skar mig dri med ri bong 'dzin ma dbang ldan pad+ma dag la mtshan mar bcas// de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i pad+ma la ni lha mi g.yo dang gshin
157b7(rgyud): rje me dang gdong drug dang // gnod sbyin brgya byin chu gter gdong dang phyugs bdag rgya mtsho dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang po khyab 'jug go// ral gri gri gug ljon shing dbang po lha yi shing gi
158a1(rgyud): me tog dbyug pa ral gri shag ti dang // dbyug pa shag ti dag dang bdud dang nor bu dang ni btson rdo rje nyid dang me yi mda'// khab dang bgrang 'phreng dag ni phyag gi
158a2(rgyud): mthil du 'gyur te rtse gsum pa dang mda' dang zhags pa dang // rin chen dgra sta rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dbyug pa 'phrog byed dag gi g.yas kyi phyag tu 'gyur// g.yon du phub dang thod pa
158a3(rgyud): dkar po min pa'i nor bu dang ni ut+pa la dang lcags sgrog dang // zhags pa chu skyes spyi blugs dag ni nges par g.yon gyi phyag tu rim pas 'gyur ro mi yi bdag/ rin chen me long dang ni de
158a4(rgyud): bzhin ne'u le dang bcas chu skyes rdo rje dril bu gzhu dang ni// pad+ma dang ni spyi blugs sgrol dang gzhu dang de bzhin klu yi zhags pa dag dang rin chen dang // zhags pa rin po che dang pad+ma skye ba lnga pa'i
158a5(rgyud): dung ni lha min dgra bo dag gir 'gyur// pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag la nag po sogs kyi nor lag chos rnams lte ba la ni rdzogs pa gnyis// mchog gi zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad stong dus 'jig
158a6(rgyud): rten dag tu mo mo sbyor bas rig par bya// sgor ni lha mo shing rta la gnas ral gri rdo rje 'dzin dang lcags kyu dang bcas mda' yi phyag/ dpal ldan 'khor lo dbyug pa'i phyag dang rang bzhin
158a7(rgyud): yon tan dbang gis tho ba dang ni mdung gi phyag/ dpal ldan gri gug rdo rje'i phyag dang nges par phyag na dgra sta phyag na rtse gsum g.yas na ste// g.yon gyi phyag na phu ba dang sprul te rang bzhin
158b1(rgyud): yon ta dbang gis zhags pa dang ni gA nu yi phyag/ dpal ldan dung dang rin chen phyag dang pad+ma bong 'dzin pa me long phyug kyang de bzhin no// dpal ldan dril bu thod pa'i phyag dang nges
158b2(rgyud): par phyag na lag 'gro nyid dang kha T+wAM ga yi phyag/ 'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams ni rim pas rig par bya// ka ba'i 'og tu klu brgyang rnabs kyang bum pa rdo
158b3(rgyud): rje'i phyag dang pad+ma nor bu dag gi phyeg/ rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni pad+ma karko Ta sogs dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams// khyi gdong phag gdong ma dang ce spyang gdong ma nges par
158b4(rgyud): g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs rnams su// stag gdong ma ni byang du gnas te dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas gri gug dang ni thod pa'i phyag/ bya rog gdong dang bya rgod gdong dang mkha'
158b5(rgyud): 'gro bdag po'i gdong dang 'ug gdong ma ni zur du'o// rdo rje mig dang shin tu sngon mo sa 'og nam mkha' la gnas 'byung po'i skye gnas g.yo ba'i mtha'// yi dgas dmar dang mkha' 'gro'i
158b6(rgyud): dbang po ma he rma bya glang po ngang pa grang dang gdong lnga pa// rim pas tsA muN+DA la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan du rab 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su'o// lha min lha sogs rnams kyi ngo
158b7(rgyud): ba zhin nor bdag rtse mo cam dang chu gter rlub dang tshogs kyi ni// glang po'i dbang po dang ni lug dang chu srin zhes dang ridags dang ni byi ba rim pas so// b+he ru tra dang khrung khrung mig sngon bshang
159a1(rgyud): lam gdong ni bya rog gdong la sogs pa'i zur du ste// bse dang dom dang seng ge g.yag ni khyi gdong ma la sogs pa mi ste phyogs su rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje mig
159a2(rgyud): gi rkang pa brgyad pa sa 'og shing rta la gnas mkha' la sngon mo'i shing rta yi// mkha' bgrong khro ba dang bcas kha dog lnga pa lus rgyas mig gsum ldan pa a ni la zhes pa// 'od zer can dang
159a3(rgyud): tsun+d+ra lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can gyi shing rta rnams la phag dang ni// rta dang glang po seng ge bdun gyi grangs su 'gyur te lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang du'o// shar du dri dang 'phreng ba ma ste gshin/
159a4(rgyud): rje chu la gnas pa spos ma mar me sgeg mo dang // gzhad ma'o gar ma rol mo ma ni nor sbyin sa gzhi la ste mkha' la glu ma 'dod ma'o// snying por brgyad ni kha khyer la ste mkha' dang 'og na gnas pa/
159a5(rgyud): rta babs 'og tu nges par sbyar// gzungs ma rnams ni snam bu la ste gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams kha khyer la// dbye ba dang ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te mi yi
159a6(rgyud): bdag po de bzhin rgyas dang rangs 'dod ma// lha mo sgrol ma la sogs dag pa yis te srid gsum skyed ma gsod pa dang ni skyed 'dod ma// rol mo 'dod ma dang ni tur 'dod mar 'gyur mi mi
159a7(rgyud): bdag po zas 'dod ma dang de bzhin nyid// dri 'dod ma dang gos ni 'dod mar 'gyur te nges par 'khrig pa 'dod ma dag ni drug pa'o// lus la 'khrug 'dod ma dang kha na gnas pa'i mchil
159b1(rgyud): pa 'dor dang lus kyi sgri ba 'dod pa dang // gar 'dong ba dang snar 'dod ma dang rgya nga mal stan dag la rgyal dang bsnyes par 'dod ma dang // tsa mu N+ya sogs brgyad kyi bya ba rnams te de bzhin
159b2(rgyud): sa la khro skyes rnams kyi 'dod ma yang // kun tu gdung dang 'ching 'dod ma dang nges par 'jam por smra ba dang ni skems dang snod 'dod ma// reg dang dgug pa dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag
159b3(rgyud): bo phur bu 'debs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar 'gyur// yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci zag par 'dod ma dang // sems can rnams la slu 'dod/
159b4(rgyud): ma dang nges par rtsod pa mang po lnga pa lhag ma za ba dang // g.yul 'dod ma dang sbrul 'ching ma dang byis pa khro bar 'dod ma rnams ni lha min rigs la 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdud phyir
159b5(rgyud): 'dod ma rnams slar yang de ni phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag gi kha khyer la// nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad sems can bya ba rnal 'byor pa yi bya ba 'dir// zhes pa de ltar
159b6(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs// phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ni spro dang sdud pa dag la dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas//
159b7(rgyud): de la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje rnam gsum srid pa la gnas mi rtag nyid du 'gyur ma yin// 'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te mi yi dag po mig 'phrul ji bzhin nyid du'o//
160a1(rgyud): rtag dang mi rtag mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems ni dag pa'i don slad du// sgrub thabs dag ni brjod par bya ste snying por gyur pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni bsgrub
160a2(rgyud): par bya ba med// gang zhig bsgrub bya sgrub pa po de 'khrul pa zhes pa rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang // de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag ni dkyil 'khor dbang
160a3(rgyud): po rab tu bya// dpal ldan rdo rje can ni thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor sku yi rdo rje'o// lha rnams 'khor lo A li kA li'i rigs skyes gsung gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng du'o//
160a4(rgyud): rtsa ba sdong bu dag ni a yig 'dab ma dag ni de bzhin ge sar rnams kyang u yig go// dbus su dpal ldan lte ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rnam gnyis rkang pa'i gnas dag ma yig go// ho yig
160a5(rgyud): thog ma tha ma'i snying po bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de ni shes rab chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltas na// lha mo rnams
160a6(rgyud): kyis glu dag mdzad de bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po// bdag cag srungs shig lha mo'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod// rdo rje can
160a7(rgyud): des glu dag gsan nas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni// gzigs nas bskyed pa mdzad de dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rang gi mtshan ma spros byas nas/
160b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan rlung rtul ba'i bdag po'i cod pan shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa yang // shes rab thabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa de rab tu sto ba dag
160b2(rgyud): kyang ngo // 'od zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku ste rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal dang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa dang // sgra drag sgrog byed nyi ma'i spyan dang gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste rig byed
160b3(rgyud): nal dang zhabs gnyis pa// shes rab thabs las rab byung mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta dag la gnas// rgyal ba'i dgra ni 'joms par byed pa rdo rje shugs te/
160b4(rgyud): ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du bskul bar bya// dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag ni lte bar lcags kyus bsnur byas shing // phyag rnams rang gi rdo rje gdengs
160b5(rgyud): can dag gis de bzhin rab bcings mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te// mtha' dag bsgrub byar byas shing 'khor lo bzang po bskyod par byas nas 'dir ni slar yang 'gro ba ste// gzhug dang bcing
160b6(rgyud): dang mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag ni rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyis byed// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag la sems ni nam mkha' dang bcas snying po'i pad+mar me yi steng du 'gyur// shar
160b7(rgyud): dungadapal ldan nag mo 'bar ma mchog gi pang 'dab la ni lho ru dmar mo 'bar ma ste// byang du dpal ldan dkar mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o//
161a1(rgyud): mer ni du ba da nu'i bu yi phyogs su smig rgyu ma dang dbang ldan phyogs su mkha' snang ma// rlung du dpal ldan mar me ma ste nor bu dang ni shing dang chos kyi gaN+DI dag dang
161a2(rgyud): dung me dang rlung dang lha min dang ni 'phrog byed phyogs su de bzhin bar gyi zur gyi cha la 'o// sha ra du 'du byed dang ni sa bdag nges par pad+ma la gnas lho ru tshor ba chu dag go// byang du 'du
161a3(rgyud): shes dang ni me ru 'gyur te nub tu yang ni rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid do// me yi phyogs su rlung dang gzugs su 'gyur te lha min bdag por me dang 'du shes gnyis po'o// dbang
161a4(rgyud): ldan du ni chu dang tsher ba dag ste rlung du 'dzin ma 'du byed phung por ldan pa'o// lha mo sangs rgyas par rnams su ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro yi bum pa rnams// slar yang 'phar ma
161a5(rgyud): phyi ma la ni shar du sA dang dri ste lho ru mig dang gzugs dag go// byang du lce dang ro ru 'gyur te chu ra ni de bzhin nyid du lus dang reg bya dag tu 'gyur// sa 'og tu ni rna ba sgra ru 'gyur te rigs kyi
161a6(rgyud): dbang gis lho yi sgo yi g.yon du'o// nam mkha' la ni nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te shar gyi sgo yi g.yon du'o// dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gis dkyil
161a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur// phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ni rab tu gsal bar bdag po rang rang pad+ma'i gdan la'o// shar gyi sgor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te/
161b1(rgyud): da mi drug rgyu rengs byed ma'o// g.yas su thugs byed dang ning rgyal mar 'gyur nor sbyin du yang khengs byed dang ni rmugs byed ma// chu ru rengs byed dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar
161b2(rgyud): 'gyur sgo yi dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma la'o// dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes drong khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma// 'dod btsun+da shing rta la gnas lha dang /
161b3(rgyud): nor sbyin gzhan dang lho yi sgo yi dbus su ste// gnod mdzes drag spyan ma ni 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkha' la gtsug tor dang ni shin tu sngon mo nyid// shar gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhan du yang ni nges par
161b4(rgyud): 'gyur te gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang // gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogs su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur// shar du tsA mur+N+Na dang dbang por 'gyur te/
161b5(rgyud): rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong // gshin rjer phag mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por gdong drug ma dang gogs kyi mgon po'o// nub tu dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung
161b6(rgyud): du nges par dus kyi gdong ma dag ni khyab 'jug nyid// gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyid dang gdong drug pa// phyi rol gyi ni dbang
161b7(rgyud): po'i sgo yi g.yas su lha min ngag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur// mer ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste mi dang chu lha mo yang lho yi sgo yi g.yas su'o// lha min bdag por dpal ldan gdong
162a1(rgyud): drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha mo// rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor sbyin du yang rgya mtsho dang ni phag mo'o// dbang ldan du
162a2(rgyud): ni tshogs kyi dbang po gzhon nu ma ste nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgo yi g.yon gyi char// drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g.yon du'o// de dag rnams kyi
162a3(rgyud): phyag rgyar rab grags ri sras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur// phyi rol du ni lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste// pad+ma dang ni stobs
162a4(rgyud): kyi rgyu dag g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni// me la gnas pa dag ste chu yi steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur// de bzhin sa yi
162a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis 'jog po dang ni pad+ma chen por 'gyur// de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste// de
162a6(rgyud): rnams thabs na pad+mam sogs gan rgyags kyang dbang gis bying byungs pa'i dodan du 'gyur// shA la ma rnam pa 'thogs pa dran khyod du dag so pa'i dkyil 'khom la gas
162a7(rgyud): khyi gdong ma// gshin rje dag tu nges par ro ni sreg par phag gi gdong ma byang du rus pa dang bcas par// stag gdong ma ste chu ru rag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid du ce spyang dag gi gdong mar
162b1(rgyud): 'gyur// me dang lnga min bdag por lhag ma dang ni mi bzang g.yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas// rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis
162b2(rgyud): pab shi bar ni// 'khor lo la gnas 'ug gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya// g.yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni 'dab ma
162b3(rgyud): dag gi lha mo'i tshigs kyi'o// bcu dang nor gyi tshogs dag gi ni g.yon brkyang sa ga lnga min mo rnams kyi yang zlum po'o// g.yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g.yas
162b4(rgyud): brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste// sa ga la ni sa gnyid ces bya bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o// dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges
162b5(rgyud): par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste// rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang rang pad+ma zla ba'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan gyis gnas// gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang phyogs
162b6(rgyud): kyi bzhon par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdan gyis gnas// lha rnams 'dab mar lha mo rnams ni rol pa'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid// g.yas pa bskum
162b7(rgyud): pa dag kyang sa gzhi la ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba dag/ phyed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa ste mi yi bdag po de ni g.yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur//
163a1(rgyud): g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis ni g.yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa dag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs// yon tan dbang gis pus mo zung ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las/
163a2(rgyud): sa ga dang ni zlum por 'gyur// cung zad pus mo phyed ni 'khyog pa rol par 'gyur te lhag ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid// slar yang rnal 'byor pa yi sa b+ha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar/
163a3(rgyud): gyi slad du'o// cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rje yi ni rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams re 'ga' na// gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal bar pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad
163a4(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur// rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchog nor bu'i phyag/ drug gi cod pan ral pa zhes byar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor
163a5(rgyud): lo lo yang gzhan// sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las pad+ma dang ni me las nor bu'o// rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur te 'gyur med las ni gri gug go// gos
163a6(rgyud): dang bdud rtsi'i snod du 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas 'phreng ba dang ni rgyud mangs dang // drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang sreg zla rlung dang nam mkha' zhib dag las so// phub
163a7(rgyud): dang mdung dang mda' dang dgra sta dang ni Da ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du// dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges par de bzhin tho ba dang ni rtse gsum dag tu 'gyur// gzhu dang
163b1(rgyud): ut+pa la dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang dril bu dang // de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs rgyu na rgyu bzod pa stag sngags dang ni glang po'i pags pa ste// 'dir ni lhag mnye ba'i
163b2(rgyud): mtshan ma sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa// de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis shes par bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// gang zhig l-i la sogs pa sum
163b3(rgyud): cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa// zung ngu ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyis rim pas yongs bkod nges par pad+ma la gnas zla ba dang // nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa
163b4(rgyud): de dag mtha' dag 'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags// gang zhig kho nar mtshan mar drug par gyur pa der ni yon tan dbang gis gzhom du med par 'gyur// nA da dpal
163b5(rgyud): ldan rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje a yig go// i yig zung ngu ral gri ldan par 'gyur te slar yang raM yig dag ni phyag na rin chen no// u yig thung ngu snang ba mtha'
163b6(rgyud): yas su 'gyur slar yang 'dir ni l-i yig rnam par snang mdzad do// bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so// dpal ldan yum ni
163b7(rgyud): gzhom du med pa zhes par 'gyur te de bzhin a yig las skyes nam mkha'i khams// rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams la ni I r-i U l-I thams cad rim pas gnas par 'gyur// mchog gi
164a1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs yum ni bde ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang bsam pa ste// mi bskyod stong pa'i khams dang phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni spyan ma lus dang bsam
164a2(rgyud): pa'o// rin chen dbang po mA ma kI dang gsal bar pad 'dzin gos dkar mo ni lus dang bsam pa ste// de bzhin 'khor lo can dang sgrol ma rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis thung dang ring ba'i
164a3(rgyud): dbyangs kyis so// aM yig kun tu bzang por 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis a yig dag kyang phyag na rdo rje'o// e yig thung ngu nam mkha'i snying po ar yig dag kyang de bzhin yang dag sa yi snying
164a4(rgyud): por 'gyur// o yig 'jig rten mgon po a la yang de bzhin 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus la'o// A yig chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te nges par de bzhin AHyig las skyes
164a5(rgyud): sgra yi rdo rje ma// aM yig reg bya rdo rje ma ste lus kyi dbye bas Ar yig las skyes ro yi rdo rje ma// oM yig gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur nges par de bzhin al yig las skyes dri yi rdo rje ma/
164a6(rgyud): dpal ldan bzang po chos kyi dbyings dang phyag la rdo rje dang ni sgra yi rdo rje ma dgazung // nam mkha'i snying po dri yi rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten mgon po ro yi rdo rje ma dag zung // sa yi snying po gzugs kyi
164a7(rgyud): rdo rje ma dang reg bya rnam par sel ba dag ni zung du 'gyur// de ltar rigs ni drug po rnams dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rig par bya// haM yig gtsug tor 'khor lo
164b1(rgyud): can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni haHyig shin tu sngon mo'o// ha yig thung ngu gnod mdzes su 'gyur nges par de bzhin ring po las skyes drag po'i mig ma'o// oM lAHrim
164b2(rgyud): pas rab tu gsal bar shin tu stobs dang rengs byed mi ste gnyis po dag kyang zung // raM wAHrmugs byed nga rgyal ma ste waM dang rAHzhes pa ni khengs byed rmugs byed mar 'gyur ro//
164b3(rgyud): yAHrengs byed shin tu brtson 'grus mar 'gyur ya wa ra la dbyug pa sngon po mi g.yo ba// 'dod pa dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus su 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi ring po ste/
164b4(rgyud): yA wA rA lA de bzhin glang po rta dang seng ge dang ni phag gi shing rta dag la 'gyur// dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma//
164b5(rgyud): 'dod pa tsun+ta zung du 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don du'o// a yig dug dang aM dang rnam par bcad pa haM dang haHdang ha hA las skyes nus ma brgyad//
164b6(rgyud): bum pa rnams la de bzhin ha yig rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar 'gyur// oM hu~M ho AHdung dang dri med yon tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos kyi gaN+DI'o// ha yig/
164b7(rgyud): tsAmra N+DA lwa ste dang san zhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma dang phag mo'o// sA ngang k+Sha k+Sha k+Shi kaN+Da dbang mo mkha' 'gro'i ba ga pos 'gro mtshangs ma dpal mo gzhon du ma/ hrI hA hA hU~M
165a1(rgyud): rgyab tu pad+ma mchog gi 'dab ma la ste thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun du'o// k+Shi k+Sha~M k+ShA k+Sh+mI de bzhin nyid de rab tu gsal zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams
165a2(rgyud): de bzhin no// shar dang g.yas dang g.yos min chu dang me dang lha min dbang ldan dang ni rlung gi pad+ma la// dpe me drug la ya sogs dbyangs drug gis phye thung ngu ring po rnams ni
165a3(rgyud): rim par yongs bkod pa// hi k+Shi la sogs la mtha' thams cad nor ni gdengs can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams kyi 'dab ma la// rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs tsA mur+N+Na la sogs
165a4(rgyud): pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas so// taM naHbrgya byin chu gter gdong ste baM maHzhes pa rgya mtsho dang ni dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang // TaM naHme dang gzhon nu dag ste ci dang
165a5(rgyud): nyaHzhes bya ba srin po'i dbang po dag dang rlung // kaM daHkhyab 'jug dus te 'phrog byed ces dang nor sbyin dag kyang saM dang 'dir ni rnAHnyid do// rtsa sogs sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa
165a6(rgyud): rnams ni lha yi pad+ma'i 'dab mar lha mo rnams kyis 'gyur// nag pa'i zla ba sogs kyi tshes rnams dus kyis nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi grangs// de nyid la zhon ha
165a7(rgyud): yig rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyi// sde bdud brtsegs pa la gnas kA ya ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du ni lha min mo rnams kyi// shes rab thabs kyi lus
165b1(rgyud): dang bsam pas rigs kyi dbang las 'dir ni gang zhig dbus su mngon phyogs 'gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje can dang kun bzang rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur/
165b2(rgyud): don yod grub dang nam mkha'i snying po dri med nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi snying po yang dag go// phyag na 'khor lo rnam par sel bar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag med dang 'jig rten
165b3(rgyud): mgon// dpal ldan yum dang chos kyi dbyings te sgra yi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// dpal ldan sgrol ma reg bya rdo rje ma ste rigs kyi dbye bas dgos dkar ro yi rje
165b4(rgyud): ma mA ma kI dang gzugs zhes grags par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis spyan ma ji yo rdo rje ma// khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzang po
165b5(rgyud): do gtsug tor mi bskyod pa nyid 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs dang don yod grub par rab tu grags// rmugs byed dang ni phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed dang
165b6(rgyud): ni 'od dpag med// rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur stobs ldan phyag na rdo rje dag dang gnod mdzes so// mkha' snying dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin yon tan dbang
165b7(rgyud): gis sa yi snying po 'dod pa'o// rnam par sel dang shin tu brtson 'grus su 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig rten mgon po mi g.yo ba// yum dang khro bo'i dbang po'i phyag rgyar
166a1(rgyud): 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid// stong par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung me chu dang sa la sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang /
166a2(rgyud): rmugs byed ma dang khengs ma rengs byed mar ni rim pas rab tu gsal zhing nges par rab tu grags// drag spyan sgra yi rdo rje ma 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis lcags sgrog ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma/
166a3(rgyud): 'od zer can da 'dri yi rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang tsun+d+har rab grags pa// rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro yi rdo rje ma dang gzugs kyi rdo rjer rim pas shes par bya// 'dir na
166a4(rgyud): rengs byed dus mthar byed pa nyid de slar yang shin tu stobs dang bgegs dgrar rab tu grags// rmugs byed shes rab mthar byed dag tu rab tu 'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni
166a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i dgra// rlung me chu sa tsA mud+d+ha dang phag mo dbang phyug ma dang de bzhin dbang mo bzhi pa ste// dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya zhes pa g.yo ba 'phrogs byed lha min mer ni
166a6(rgyud): gnas pa yang // tshangs pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis rgya mtsho dag dang 'od dpag med// me dang dpal ldan phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don yod
166a7(rgyud): grub pa dag ni de bzhin nyid// mi bskyod pa dang lha min dgra bor 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni bde byed rab tu grags// rnam par sel ba gang de brgya byin du 'gyur 'jig rten mgon/
166b1(rgyud): po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid// sa yi snying po gdong drug par 'gyur dpal ldan mkha' snying nga chu'i bdag por rab tu grags pa yin// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dus gsum
166b2(rgyud): 'gyur te drug pa kun tu bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o// rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drug ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de rnams rang rang phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya rig ma la sogs nyi ma lnga yi mchog
166b3(rgyud): gI bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o// de dag rnams kyi bad 'dab la ni nor lag tshes te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de rnams// zla ba drug ni snga ma drug tu 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang
166b4(rgyud): gis lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang // klu brgyad gang de bum pa rnams te khyab bdag pad+ma'i 'dab la nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma// dpal ldar du ba bya rog gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang
166b5(rgyud): gis bya rgod gdong ma smig rgyu ma// mkha' snang ma ni 'ug pa'i gdong ma dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong mar rab tu grags// nag mo 'bar ma khyi gdong ma ste dmar mo
166b6(rgyud): 'bar ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan phag gdong ma// dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma ce spyang ma// de bzhin sgeg mo la sogs thams
166b7(rgyud): cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs yum ni lhag ma'o// lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i sku// khro bo'i dbang po byang chub sem
167a1(rgyud): dpa' nges par ro yi rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rta la gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa// klu ni brgyad po
167a2(rgyud): rnams dang rab gtum ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'i sku// de bzhin slar yang rgyal ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur te phyi rol dag dang nang na yang // mngal
167a3(rgyud): nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu 'gyur// ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su'o// sangs
167a4(rgyud): rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag gnas/
167a5(rgyud): phyi rol du ni tsA mut+pa la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i sku// lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste mtha' dag gdengs can rigs kyang 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs
167a6(rgyud): pa'i sku// gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o// sku yi rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs
167a7(rgyud): pa'i slad du'o// gsung gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi sku yang zung du 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o// thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur te sems can kun gyi don ni
167b1(rgyud): byed pa po// ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku dag zung du 'gyur te srog chags rnams la thar pa ster ba nyid// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni nyi zla la sogs
167b2(rgyud): ka sogs dang // rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// rdo rje swA hA'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lte ba gsang
167b3(rgyud): ba spyi bor te// 'di dag gis ni byin brlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya// stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi dus dang ye shes mchod
167b4(rgyud): brjes su chags pa la// skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nas sgrub pa po yis twad sA b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM brjod par bya// bum pa rnams dang du ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis snying khar
167b5(rgyud): chos kyis 'khor lor rab tu 'gyur// rig ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid kyis mgo bor rtsi ba sa bcu drug pa lhan cig skyes par rab tu grags// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis
167b6(rgyud): 'gyur mi bdag rnams kyis mgron par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// 'jigs ma la sogs nor ni gdengs can dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyis lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor
167b7(rgyud): lor 'gyur// lag pa rkang pa'i tshogs la lha rnams kyi ni las kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis bsnun pa ste// klu dang gtum mi yi bdag bo rnams kyis sor mo'i tshogs kyi mtshams
168a1(rgyud): la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur// dus kyi dag pas dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs dbye bas so// thugs kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin zhag so so'i
168a2(rgyud): dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag/ rlung gi dag pas du ba la sogs rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar rtsa yi 'khor lo la gnas rnams// nyon mongs rnams kyis drag po chung mar bcas pa khyab
168a3(rgyud): bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud// dung dang gaN+DI ma Ni ljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis// bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis te rgyal dang
168a4(rgyud): rnam rgyal bum pa byang chub sems sogs kyis// 'du byed don yod grub pa tshor ba dri med nor bu'i phyag dang 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// gzugs ni 'khor lo can no ri bong can dang stobs/
168a5(rgyud): khrag bshang ba gci ba rnam par dag pa'o// lha mo drug ni khams rnams kyis te yul dang yul can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas// khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams kyis te nges
168a6(rgyud): par slar yang gzhan pa lnga ni dbang po gzhan rnams kyis// tsA muN+Da sogs thun brgyad kyis te pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams nyi ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod kyis// lha min la sogs nyi ma'i zla bas
168a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs kyis so// gsang bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams kyis klu rnams dang ni gtum mo rnams kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin 'dod ma la sogs
168b1(rgyud): de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya bas rnam par dag/ sgra rnams kyis ni sgrub pa mtha' dag pa spu rnams kyis dur khrong sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs// de nyid rnams/
168b2(rgyud): kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyis phyi yi phyag rgya'o// rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o// dpal ldar
168b3(rgyud): rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni rnam gsum srid gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbye ba las// dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang
168b4(rgyud): po'o// longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po// bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi
168b5(rgyud): dbye bas sad pa ste// de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas// sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang
168b6(rgyud): ngag gi dbang pos so// longs spyod rdzogs la ma mthong sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la ga nyid kyang ngo // dag pa la ni bde bar rab 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan
168b7(rgyud): dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar// de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ste 'gyur med don du'o// g.yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni
169a1(rgyud): g.yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa// de ni g.yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g.yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las// sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang /
169a2(rgyud): mchog gi rol pa'i stabs dang pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan// nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga// gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis
169a3(rgyud): bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsartsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan// ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa// lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs/
169a4(rgyud): sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams// thams cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni 'dzag pa gang de rdo rje can// shes rab chos 'byung
169a5(rgyud): dag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis// sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba// 'dod pa dang ni
169a6(rgyud): gzugs dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te// phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya// zla ba nyi ma
169a7(rgyud): a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa// so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang pad+ma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te/
169b1(rgyud): dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas sgom pa rdo rje gsum// shes rab pad+mar sems kyi thig le dag la lhar skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom
169b2(rgyud): med 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste// so sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje pad+ma las skyes bdud rtsi yis
169b3(rgyud): ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur// dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa bsgom pa bsgrub par 'gyur// shes rab sbyar la gang che 'pho med phra mo'i
169b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur// dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin// de nas gzugs dag bskyed cing
169b5(rgyud): rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams dag gis yi ge dgod pa nyid yin te// 'di ni spyi yi bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring po yang // 'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir
169b6(rgyud): 'gyur te dman dang brtan pa sgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin nyid// so sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid do// srog rtsol dag
169b7(rgyud): kyang ral gri can no slar yang rnam pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phyag na rin chen no// gdol pa mo la rjes su dran pa pad+ma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can// re re dbye ba lnga
170a1(rgyud): rnams kyis te slar yang gang las a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o// so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med
170a2(rgyud): pa'o/ bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g.yo med bde ba rtse gcig sems pa'o// srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bsgyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs
170a3(rgyud): pa dag tu 'gyur// thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o// gtum mo'i snang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam
170a4(rgyud): mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin// 'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye
170a5(rgyud): ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so//
170a6(rgyud): so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o// srog gi
170a7(rgyud): rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod// bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i
170b1(rgyud): stobs kyis so// rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so// de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin nag 'ga' zhig dag gis so/
170b2(rgyud): shas lus ni 'grub par 'gyur// so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na// nA da goms pas btsan thabs rgya skyes su gnas rdo rje
170b3(rgyud): nor bur thig le bkag nas bsgrub par bya// bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyi khro bo'i skabs so// bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam
170b4(rgyud): du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug/ shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la// bde ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan
170b5(rgyud): skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'byor 'di ni sgrub pa chen po la// srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste// de las steng du 'dod pa ma yin
170b6(rgyud): 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jig pa'i rgyu// gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la nges par sbyar bar bya// phung po med kyang rnal 'byor
170b7(rgyud): kha ri bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min// dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste// pad+mar zhugs
171a1(rgyud): pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs pa'o// bde ba sa bon ma lhung ba la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal
171a2(rgyud): 'byor 'di// phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang ba'o// gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis
171a3(rgyud): 'gyur gyi// rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dag ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan// de yi yang ni nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs /
171a4(rgyud): dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro// de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i pad+ma'i khongs su gnas pa'o// rnal 'byor pa yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod pa
171a5(rgyud): dag bya ba de ni srog nyams par gsungs te// sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid// gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin
171a6(rgyud): padag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis rku bar gsungs// thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o// srog gi rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong
171a7(rgyud): can ni zhu ba dag kyang btung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o// mthe bo'i tshogs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems 'gro ste chos kyi dbang gis so// gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams
171b1(rgyud): su slar yang 'di nyid 'gro ste rig po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o// rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba'o// bsam dang 'dod//
171b2(rgyud): dang lus la rims dang kha mchog pad+ma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang // 'dar dang smyo dang rab tu rmongs par 'gyur dang ying ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag/ rdo rje can gyi
171b3(rgyud): du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du// rab tu gsol zhing nges pa de rnams yid srubs gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su// nyin dang /
171b4(rgyud): mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig mA ma kI ste chang ma yin// go gu la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang mid//
171b5(rgyud): rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste// stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs par ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la
171b6(rgyud): ma yin/ nor ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te// bzod pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyis ka'i bgrod pa 'jig
171b7(rgyud): pa brtson 'grus nyid// bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad// de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar
172a1(rgyud): byed mi skye 'thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so// gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa// bsgoms na phyag rgya
172a2(rgyud): la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis yang dag 'gyur// rengs pa dang ri zhi dang dbang dang srid pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed// 'byung ba rnams
172a3(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgoms pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// dkar po yis ni ni dang rgyas pa byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug dang dbang //
172a4(rgyud): ser pos rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o// sgom dang bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang rdo
172a5(rgyud): ni 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya// phyogs ni lhag pa las byung bung ba dang ni gse dang mtshungs pa g.yas
172a6(rgyud): dang cig shos dag gis ni// phung po'i bdud la glang chen lpags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin// lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thod pa rab mchog phyag
172a7(rgyud): mthil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag/ nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bsgyel ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyis don du bsgom par bya// de la yum ni zhal gcig zung
172b1(rgyud): gi phyag gi pad+ma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste// nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gis so// de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag/
172b2(rgyud): por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin nyid// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so// gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas rnal te
172b3(rgyud): phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtse ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las// sa la sogs pa rnams ni kur nas
172b4(rgyud): 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong pa gcig pu ste// thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang med la yul med yul ni bsgrubs pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o// khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs
172b5(rgyud): ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang reg byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa// dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste// sbrul gyi rgyan dang rab
172b6(rgyud): mchog stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du mtshon cha'i phyag/ spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams ngag gis 'phreng ba nges par bcings// dri med
172b7(rgyud): 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni// zhabs gnyis ngag gis 'byung po'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g.yas brkyang stabs kyis/
173a1(rgyud): yang dag gnas// 'byung po rnams dang lha min gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig gyur pa// bsgoms na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas
173a2(rgyud): dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya// klu rnams chu skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas// zha bas dag gis ni gdengs
173a3(rgyud): can bdag po zung dang pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyi mjug ma yi// rtse mo thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun tu spro byed pa// de ltar khro bo'i dbang po
173a4(rgyud): bsgoms pas nyin zhag dag gi sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya// zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rang gi rgyal
173a5(rgyud): ba'i dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur// rengs dang zhi ba dag dang dbang dang gzhan nor 'phrog dang gsad pa dang ni bskrad pa dag la yang // sum cu rtsa drug rnal
173a6(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon gyis// zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs// drag po la yang bsam
173a7(rgyud): gtan drag po dang ni sprin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs// dbang du bya la bsam gtan chags pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste lha ni chags pa'i gzugs// rengs
173b1(rgyud): pa la ni bsam gtan rmongs pa dang bcas mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams rengs pa'i gzugs// zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams
173b2(rgyud): kyis 'grub par 'gyur// dbye dang bskrad pa dag kyang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khro bo las skyes rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur// dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal
173b3(rgyud): lha min rigs la phur bus gdab pa'ang lha min mo rnams kyis// yum dag gis ni las rnams thams cad gnyis ka'i rdo rje'i rigs la gsad pa dang ni gso ba yang // dang por dpal ldan
173b4(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lo dang ni srid gsum skyes ma 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// de nas sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gang zhig zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag kyang bsgrub par bya// pha dang ma
173b5(rgyud): yis rnam par dman pa'i bu ni yod pa min par dus kun tu ni 'jig rten grags// de phyir bde mnyam 'bras ster gnyis po bsgrub par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las ni 'grub pa min// gtso
173b6(rgyud): bo'i thugs kar pad+ma'i dbus su ri bong can dang nyi ma me yi steng du rdo rje ni// hU~M yig ye shes las skyes 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs partse lnga 'od zer dang bcas dgod par bya// de yi dbus
173b7(rgyud): su dzaHyig lcags kyu'i 'od zer rnams kyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag bkang byas nas// rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas rdo rje'i lam du rab tu gzhug
174a1(rgyud): bya ste thams cad zla ba zhu ba dang mtshungs rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi pad+mar spro bar bya// de ni nyi mar rab tu zhugs pa ro mnyam dag tu 'gyur te a sogs ka
174a2(rgyud): sogs rab ldan pa// de yi dbus su zhi ba la sogs las kyi ye shes sa bon du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis so// de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo 'am ni lha yang rnal 'byor pa la 'bras bu ster
174a3(rgyud): pa nyid du 'gyur// dzaHhUM baM hoHrim pas lcags kyu zhes dang rdo rje dang ni rdo rje zhags pa dril bu ste// oM aHhUM hoHde bzhin du gsungs zla ba nyi ma rdo rje de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med do// I ra~M U li/
174a4(rgyud): de bzhin nyid du rab gsal ya ra wa la rlung me chu dang sa rnams so// haHhUM he phro nyi ma dang ni rdo rje zla ba dag dang gri gug tu yang de bzhin gsungs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su A li kA li dang bcas
174a5(rgyud): chu yi sa bon bdag nyid chu skyes te// de las rdzogs pa'i lha mo zla ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma ste zung gi phyag gi pad+ma can// glang chen dkar po la zhon phyag na chu skyes dkar dang mi 'jigs pa dang gos
174a6(rgyud): ni dkar po dang // dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal ni bsgoms nas bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// de nas bsgrub bya bzung nas slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du
174a7(rgyud): ni yang dag rab tu gzhug par bya'o// gtso bo'i bka' di rab tu thob nas spyan ma la sogs rab dgyes rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa yis// bsgrub bya de ni bkru bar byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu
174b1(rgyud): yi nus ma rnams kyis mchod par byed// gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis gso bar byed cing rab gsal sgeg mo la sogs bcu yis tshim par byed// 'byung por grags pa rnams kyis
174b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa med byed rab mchog rnam bcu khro skyes rnams kyis skyong bar byed// klu mo rnams kyis 'o dag byed cing 'chi med na chung bcu gnyis rnams kyis 'khyud pa dag tu byed// gtum mo rnams
174b3(rgyud): kyis srung bar byed de mtha' dag sa gzhi ngag la zhi rgyas don gyi slad du'o// de ltar bsgrub bya yi ni mchog gi bde ba byed pa thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su hri ste/
174b4(rgyud): ut+pal kha ma bye ba'i mda' nyid dang ni i k+Shu'i gzhu// de las rdzogs pa nyi ma ltar gsal phyag ni gnyis kas gzhu dang mda' ni rna ba'i bar du bkang // pad+ma dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa g.yon
174b5(rgyud): brkyang rta la zhon pa bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya yi ni snying kha lte ba gsang ba dag dang mgo dang kha la mda' yis bsnur byas shing // mgrin par gzhu yis bcings nas de
174b6(rgyud): yis bskyod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor du ni khrid par byed pa ste// gtum mo rnams kyis gos dang bral ba byas shing klu mo rnams kyis kyang ni nges par dkri bar byas// lha mo rnams kyis
174b7(rgyud): spyo bar byed cing khro skyes rnams kyis gtun shing dbyug par bcas pa dag gis bsnun// 'byung po rnams kyis 'jigs par byed cing sgeg mo la sogs rnams kyis kyang ni sen mo
175a1(rgyud): rnon po 'debs// rdo rje ma rnams kyis ni blo gros nyams byas sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung rnams ngag gis bcings/ nus ma rnams kyis gos bral tugs pa bza'
175a2(rgyud): dgra bcom zhing gtso bo yin zhabs la ltung bar byas// de ltar dbang du byas nas slar yang khyab bdag dag gis tshim par byas te der ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin zhags pa lcags kyu dag
175a3(rgyud): gis khams gsum po nas dgug pa'i las n-i rnam pa mang por 'gyur// nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su sprin nag dang mtshungs hUM yig ring po las skyes ral gri bsgom byas nas// de las byung
175a4(rgyud): ba bung ba'i mdog can phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni sdigs mdzub zhags pa'i phyag/ rnga mo'i steng du g.yon pa brkyang zhing rab tu khros pa'i zhal ni bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya/
175a5(rgyud): bsgrub bya 'gas pas bcing ba byas nas khros pa'i zhal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo ru khrid byas te// yaHyig las skyes rnga mo mgyogs pa rlung ltar bgrod pa de la gtso bo'i gsung gis
175a6(rgyud): bsgrub bya ni// zhon pa rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid nyid du rang bzhin gyis ni bskul bar bya// de ltar lho yi bdag po dag kyang nges par bskrad par 'gyur na mi rnams dag ni
175a7(rgyud): smos ci dgos// dbye ba la yang rnga mos dman dong rtsod mang byas pa dag ni g.yas dang g.yon du bkri bar bya// nyi zla'i dbus su laHzhes bya ba yongs gyur 'khor lo bzang po kha dog ser po
175b1(rgyud): bsgoms byas nas// de las byung ba'i sal gcis pa se mchog gi gas radang ma rgyangs pa phyag na lcags stos 'khor ston/ rdzusas lams min ga dang rtsis gnas klung gi
175b2(rgyud): 'gro bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub 'khor los 'jigs par byas nas sa la rab tu bskul te lcags sdog gis ni rkang pa bcings// dkyil 'khor du ni kun tu ldad rtsing
175b3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yos 'dzin bral mo bsgyel byas nas// de yi steng du bsgrub bya'i lus la lhun po mchog gi gser gyi rang bzhin dgod bya rengs la skye// phur bus gang ba
175b4(rgyud): pa'i don du tshig drug la ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin phur bu rnams kyis gdab par bya// rmongs pa la yang sbrul rnams kyis ni kun tu za bar byed cing sa la 'gyel bar bsgom par bya// nyi ma zla
175b5(rgyud): ba'i dbus su dri bang glog dang mtshungs pa'i gri gug bro gyi rang bzhin bsgobs byas nas// de las byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo 'jig dus sprin dang mtshung pa phyag dgu gug zod pa car
175b6(rgyud): rta yi dgra yi steng du g.yon pas brkyang zhing gos dang bral bar bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya'i skra rnams ngag las myur du bzung zhing de yis dkyil 'khor du ni gos kyis
175b7(rgyud): dman pa yang // kun tu khrid de dpal ldan dur khrod dag tu rgyal po'i bdag po'i bka' yis bya rgod bya rog dang // ce spyang rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun las khrag 'thungs
176a1(rgyud): sha dang de bzhin du ni khams kun zos// de ltar ma lus pa ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la bsgom par bya ste gsud pa dag la'o// bsam gtan 'di yis brgya byin/
176a2(rgyud): dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dgos// ni dang rgyas pa la yang rigs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur// dbang dang dgug
176a3(rgyud): pa la yang dmar po lus ni sreg par byed pa me yi sa bon bdag nyid do// dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa la yang 'jigs dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid do// rangs pa dang ni phur
176a4(rgyud): bus gdab pa sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang bzhin no// stong pa'i sa bon las ni sngon po'i mdog dang ljang khur 'gyur te gsad dang gso ba dag la'o// sa yi zad par
176a5(rgyud): kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni// nyams pa'i don te me yi zad par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don te me dag kyang // nyams pa'i don du chu yi
176a6(rgyud): zad par du 'gyur stong pa'i zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min pa// glang po'i bdag po gzhom pa la ni me yi'i khon nyid las gdong lnga pa yi bsam gtan 'gyur// klu yi dbang po gzhom pa
176a7(rgyud): la ni mkha' lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur// bas dang seng ge dag la rkang brgyad 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can// rta yi dgra la bas zhes
176b1(rgyud): grags pas mi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min gnom ma khro ba skyes// khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldar sngags dang sangs rgyas gzugs kyang ral 'byor ba yis dang bor bsgrub par bya/ 'byo /
176b2(rgyud): nyi ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan pag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// sngags dang gzugs pa na ma grub par ni srid gsum gnas su ci meng 'grub pa gyur
176b3(rgyud): ba nyid ma yin// de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnarngam par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya// dpa' bo g.yul gyi dus su lhung bar gyur pa zhes pa'am ni de bzhin tshim
176b4(rgyud): rkutun dpyangs pa dag/ brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan mo ma yi bdag po ro sreg sar ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya// dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams
176b5(rgyud): kyis rab mchod nas// mgo dang snying kha dang ni spyi bo lte ba la sogs su yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas te// thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i pad+ma gang zhig mtshan mar bcas
176b6(rgyud): ba dang // 'dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogs su'o phyogs bral du ni de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma// phyi rol re khA gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro bo'i
176b7(rgyud): mtshan ma rnams byas nas// de yi g.yas min du ni yi dgas lag pas ral gri dkyil 'khor las ni g.yas su rkang pa'o// sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag
177a1(rgyud): nyid bsrung ba rab byas nas// sngags pas zab kyi g.yas su khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid ni rab byed pa// de yi sngags ni oM hri pro hU~M phaT kyi
177a2(rgyud): mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar ni sbyin sreg bya// rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas 'chi med ri bo bzhin du g.yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo phyed// sbyin sreg rdzogs na ro 'dzin ral gri lta bur
177a3(rgyud): 'khyug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum pa// gang zhig sgra sgrogs sa yang rkang pas rnam par 'gems shing sgrub pa po ni 'jigs par byed pa de// thab kyi mtha' ru gnas nas ka
177a4(rgyud): ha ka ha rgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed de// de mthong nas ni 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro bar 'gyur// ro sreg/
177a5(rgyud): gnas su sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni lha mo na dbang po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste// g.yo ba med pa'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrub pa'i 'byung po'i mgon po 'di skad smra
177a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// dpa' bo bzang po khyod kyis bdag ni grub po mtha' dag smros shig da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi// de skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du
177a7(rgyud): gnyer bar bya// ral gri reg pa bcud kyi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ril bu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang // rkang pa byug dang shing lham dag dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyod
177b1(rgyud): kyis bdag la sro la/ dbye dang bskrad pa dang ni srid pa gzhom pa nyid dang rengs pa dang ning thug pa dag dang dbang // bdag gi dngos sgrub thams cad mdzod cig de yis sngar snang 'ja/

177b3(rgyud): rol gang yin nger 'gro ste// de la zhon pa phyag na ral gri thogs pas sa yi steng gi gnas su 'jig rten bya ba byed// de phyir sems can don gyi sdad du mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po
177b4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// gsung gi rdo rje ming gi yi ge thams cad de las lhag pa dag kyang sku yi rdo rje ste/
177b5(rgyud): las yan lag so so'i sngags ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te bklags pas grub pa brgya lam na// bsgom bya mchod bya bzlas bya rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung su yi dbye
177b6(rgyud): khas so// so sor sngags kyi rigs ni nges par bye ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o// sbyin sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin yon na dbang gis grub par 'gyur ba ji
177b7(rgyud): srid nyid// phyi nas zhi ba la sogs rnabs la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyur// bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs ngas ldan sa/
178a1(rgyud): kyis sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya'o// grub pa skyugs gsum gyis bcings mkha' la 'gro ba'i sha mi rom bus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ser// b+hi da
178a2(rgyud): sogs pa'i sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkres skom la sogs nang rnams 'phrog par byed// de dag rnams kyi mig dang mkhris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnams kyi mig sman sa ni rab
178a3(rgyud): 'byed dang // mi snang ba dang dbang du bya ba na chung yid 'phrog dpal ldan dur khrod du ni bsgrubs pa'o// nag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dag gam yang na ma nu'i nyin zhag la ni dkyil 'khor
178a4(rgyud): bzhengs byas nas// bsrung ba dag kyang kur nas byas te de yi dbus su sha yi ril bu dag gam mig sma na ni// byas nas shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod de sngags kyi
178a5(rgyud): bzlas pa rab tu bya// ji srid mkha' la nyi ma bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar te de nas blangs la gzung bar bya// 'tshe bar pho nya de ni 'tsho la nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas na sos zin
178a6(rgyud): 'chi ba thob par 'gyur// pho nya'i dri ba mi mnyam pa gang nges par bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod// pho nya sbrul la sogs pa'i ming dag rab tu brjod na de las sos zin
178a7(rgyud): 'chi bathob par 'gyur// gal te srog ni rab tu 'jug la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung ba la ni dge mir 'gyur// pho nya'i rkang pa g.yon pa mdun nan chung mar brjod g.yas pa
178b1(rgyud): mdun du byas pa'o// lagapas ra gi mnas gangs sa grang du ma pan gyugs 'ang mar sa // klung ga tug smra dang sa
178b2(rgyud): bo yang ni 'chi bar brjod// gal te snying kha'i pad+ma dkar por sgra ni cung zad gyur dang ni rab tu bsdu bar bya// dang por srung ba'i chog so yis zin pa dang ni bdag nyid la yang bde ba myed
178b3(rgyud): par 'gyur// sa chu me rlung de bzhin nam mkha' dag kyang mthe bong la sogs la ni nges par sbyar bar bya// la la sogs pa ha yi mtha' rnams rim pas brla dang lto ba snying kha kha nang
178b4(rgyud): dpral ba la// hu~Mk+Sh+mAM h+ya hUM la sogs klu bcu mi mnyam mnyam pa thung ngu ring po'i rab tu dbye ba yis// g.yon gyi lus la sa bon thung ngu rab mgrin pa la gnas mtshan khung dkru dang
178b5(rgyud): brla phyogs la// g.yas kyi lus la gdengs can rnams kyi ring po nyid du rab 'gyur spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye bas so// rgyal ba zhes grags sor mo shin tu mnyam pa'i 'dam bu sbrul gyi sa bon
178b6(rgyud): ldan pas bsrung byas nas// hUMk+Sh+mI ldan pas snying khar shin tu bsgyur na myur du so yis zin pa spyod par byed par 'gyur// sa yi sa bon dpral ba la ste mkha' skyes rkang par gnas
178b7(rgyud): bas myur du rengs par byed par 'gyur// spyi bor chu dang rtse mo can ni lto bar rab tu bcug mjug ni med pa nyid du 'gyur// dpral bar rlung gi sa bon dang ni snying kha rtse mo can gyis nges
179a1(rgyud): par dug ni 'pho ba ste// spyi bor stod pa rab tu zhugs shing sa ni rkang par gnas pas nges par dug ni gcod par byed// nga bral bar thig le dkar po yis ni rnab
179a2(rgyud): pa gsum gyi dug kyang nges par dug ni med par byed// dmar pos bskyod cing nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas 'jug pa dang ni kha dog ser po sa rengs par byed// tsha ba gsum po sbyar ba'i
179a3(rgyud): sdong bu srog ni rab tu 'bab par dug med byed la sbyar byas te// yang na kha ni rnam par phye ba'i lce'u chung la sor mo yis ni Ta ga Na sbyar bya// dzA tI badz+rI gzhor nu tsha ba gsum dang lan tsha lang
179a4(rgyud): ga lI dang de ba dA li dang // brih+ma k+Sha ro a shA gan+d+ha nyin mor byed pa dang bcas ban+d+ha karko Ta ki dang // bshang ba sha dang khu ba khrag ni mnyam pa dag kyang mi bskyod pas btags ril bu byas pa ni/
179a5(rgyud): sna ru bkod pas 'byung po 'am ni 'byung po'i rims dang brtan dang ltos 'gro'i dug ni nges par 'joms// nyi ma la sogs gza' bdun dag ni nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus te bdun gyi cha yi mtha'
179a6(rgyud): ru ni spen pa nyi ma'i dbus su stong pa rigs ldan ma dag 'chi gzugs chu tshod byed ni rab tu rgyu// de la klu dang rtse bar mi bya rnam pa gsum po dag gi dug kyang bza' bar mi bya ste// de nyid la
179a7(rgyud): nonasbrul gyi sos zin 'byung pos btab dang mtshon gyis phug pa gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro// nyi ma gung dang mtshan mo phyed la nyim mtshan dus su rtag tu rgyu ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang // tho rangs
179b1(rgyud): dag nyim rngub pa ma mang bzhin du 'tsho ba'i dus kyi ma dang / thung mtshams dungs bu myong pa chug ter dgal rigs ldan dus kyis sas zin tu spyong na/ 'di
179b2(rgyud): gcan gdong pa rnams su nyi ma nag so so'i dus su yang dag par mi rigs par bya// nyi ma la ni mtha' yas longs spyod nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyid po'i dang po'i tshal lo// phying
179b3(rgyud): lhag ma can te 'dir ni lto 'phye rnams dag gza' bdun rab tu dbye bas 'char bar 'gyur// mkha' dus mkha' dang bug pa mkha' mnga' mkha' dus mkha' nor mkha' ri mkha' ma dag gi chu
179b4(rgyud): tshetsho rnams// nyi ma la sogs las kyang gdengs can nor rnams dag gi longs spyod longs spyod dbye bas dug tu 'gyur// mtha' yas rigs ldan zhes pa bram ze kha ba'i mdog ste rmo
179b5(rgyud): rgyas bu dang dung skyong rgyal rigs dmar// pad+ma chen po dang ni de bzhin nyid du 'jog po rje'u rigs mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dmangs rigs spri rag dang
179b6(rgyud): mtshungs mthar skyes dag ni kha dog sna tshogs so// de dag rnams kyi skye gnas dag kyang chu dang rtse mo can dang 'dzin ma rlung dang nam mkha'i khams// mkha' lding zhes pa rkang pa nas ni dbyi
179b7(rgyud): mthar ser po de bzhin lte ba'i mtshams su kha ba'i mdog/ mgrin pa'i bar du kha dog dmar po sprin nag dang mtshungs smin ma'i 'khri shing ji srid nyid du ste// de phyir nges par kha
