180a1(rgyud): dog sna tshogs gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa de nyid lnga yis rgyas btab pa// bsgoms na de yi phyag rgyas gdengs can dug dang 'byung po'i nad la sogs pa dag kyang
180a2(rgyud): nges par 'phrog/ rang gi snying kha'i pad+ma dag la nyi ma'i steng du k+ShiHgi yi ge 'dab chags mgon po ni// klu yi rgyan dang ldan zhing mtha' dgra rigs kyi dbang gis kha dog lnga rnams 'phro ba
180a3(rgyud): bsgoms par bya// de nas 'dab chags mgon po'i sngags ni dang por oM yig dag dang bak+Shi swA hA'i mtha' can te// de ni bye ba phrag gcig bzlas nas gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i
180a4(rgyud): 'dab chags mgon po bsgrub par bya// mkha' lding grub na gdengs can dbang po rnams dang gdengs can bdag po'i bu rnams mngag gzhug nyid du 'gyur// rab mchog sa yi steng
180a5(rgyud): du 'byung po gnod sbyin gdon rnams dag dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo rnams// sngags kyis dgug par rab tu 'gyur te gdon gyi tshogs pa mtha' dag dus kyi sos zin rjod par byed//
180a6(rgyud): de phyir sems can don gyi slad du dang por mi rnams kyis ni mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par bya// rig byed dang ni 'dab brgyad nyid dang mi yi bdag po so dang chu gter drug dang gnyis skyes
180a7(rgyud): la snying por bsgrub bya rang gi phyogs su dang por aM a zung ste i la sogs pa 'dab brgyad la// e ya la sogs bcu drug la ste ka sogs gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu dang ha kA/
180b1(rgyud): gnyis skyes la// thun mtshams 'dab ma rnams la bsgrub bya chos kyis bsgyur ba'i dus la la mtha' dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams// A sogs dbyangs ni re re dag gis chu srin
180b2(rgyud): bum pa'i dbang las ring po thung ngu dag kyang lnga// phyi rol 'dab ma sum cu gnyis la bdag gi snying po badz+ra tik+Sh+Na la sogs yi ge rnams// de dag rnams kyi phyi rol du yang ni sogs las la wa
180b3(rgyud): ya ral dkyil 'khor rnams nyid do// snying por yi ge yan lag mchog dang rtse mo can dang g.yo bar rkang pa dbang dang dgug pa la// zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang pa dang ni me dang rlung du
180b4(rgyud): mgo bo sngags pas bri bar bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa srid pa gzhom pa dag dang bskrang dang dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang // rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi gnas su
180b5(rgyud): 'khor lo 'di ni byed de 'dir// sngar brjod bzlas pa sbyin sreg rnams kyis dang por badz+ra tik+Sh+Na la sogs sngags chen bsgrub par bya// rtsibs brgyad la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas
180b6(rgyud): bcu gnyis rtsibs dang bcu drug rtsibs la bar du yang // bsgrub bya zur rnams su ste dbus su rab 'gyur ya ma rA dzA sa daM me ru Na las yo// de nas snying po'i rtsibs kyi dbus nas da ni
180b7(rgyud): ra ya ke tshwa de nas mthar ni ni ru 'gyur// de yi phyi rol oM dr-Idz+dzi dang bi kr-i tA na na las rnam gnyis hUM dang phaT du 'gyur// re mig nas ni re mig bar la 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsgrub
181a1(rgyud): bya'i ming dang sngags 'di'o// dbye dang gsad dang dbang la ya ma rA ni rab tu 'gyur te k+She da me ngos tsa sogs// rengs dang dgug dang rmongs pa dang ni stobs ni byed
181a2(rgyud): pa dag dang zhi ba dang ni bskrad pa la// der ni snying po dag na sa ya yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin// yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog la sa mdun du dbya
181a3(rgyud): kyis 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur// yi ge rnams kyis sde mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis lnga pa haM dang saM du gsungs// thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di
181a4(rgyud): yang bdag gis shes ra ba yi ge u ru 'gyur// maM muHhaM huHsaM suHmany+dzaHnyid ni pad+ma nor 'dab la ste nyi ma'i 'dab ma la// phyi rol du shrI badz+ra g+ho Sha \u0f7fsa dang ldan pa'i man+ta b+hA dra hUM
181a5(rgyud): dang phaT du 'gyur// bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste che ge mo yang mdzod cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul// de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnam dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni
181a6(rgyud): bri bar bya bar 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// sgra ni gang zhig snying kha'i phyogs na yod pa mi
181a7(rgyud): mchog rnams kyi rna ba'i bu gas thos gyur pa// de la mi yi sems ni gcig tu gyur par sbyar ba dag kyang ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ste// 'jig rten kun tu sgra ni gang zhig srid par skyes
181b1(rgyud): pas brjod pa de dang de ni de bzhin thos// khyab bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// skyil krung bcing ba byas nas pan tshur so
181b2(rgyud): dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis// phyi rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa yis// kun tu gdung ba dang ni bkres dang sgom pa
181b3(rgyud): 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag 'gog/ dpral bar thig le dkar por dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang ngo // kha yang bkang
181b4(rgyud): ste sna yi bug pa gnyis ka dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa// srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur se la rlung dang sbyar byas pa// dus kyi goms
181b5(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbus su ro ni mnyam par 'gyur// lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster// nyi ma las ni
181b6(rgyud): gzhan du phyogs te nyi 'od la gnas rang gi grib ma brtan pa'i mig gis blta// phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par brtags na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur//
181b7(rgyud): zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong // yang na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i 'phreng ba bsgoms pas so// nus
182a1(rgyud): ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba// de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug
182a2(rgyud): pa'i gzugs can la nges pa yang // 'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsa la bskyod// ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi
182a3(rgyud): rol gyi ni pags pa dag la khab bzhin reg/ de yi dus su thur du sel ba mchog gi btsan thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya// zung gi rlung dag 'gags pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas
182a4(rgyud): mchog gi grong khyer dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// de ltar yid la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur// mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin du 'gyur slar yang
182a5(rgyud): 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sna tshogs yum// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te// 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri
182a6(rgyud): med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed// phyi dang lus dang dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi// sems dang sems byung ba ni bdag
182a7(rgyud): gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i gzugs kyis de ni gcig pu'o// snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya gtang bya ste// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang
182b1(rgyud): chub slad du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med// rnam par 'gyur ba med cing mkha' mnyam sun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs par gnas/
182b2(rgyud): ma shes gzi ba rjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa bsgom par bya// srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'drir ni rnam par shes pa'o de bzhin rnam par shes pa
182b3(rgyud): nyid med do// sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur// gang gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de
182b4(rgyud): gzung nas stong par lta byed pa// de na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhar skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan// ba lang bas rta glang po'i mgon song mchod sbyin dus su
182b5(rgyud): lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni// bde bar gzung bgyi gang de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'gog pa ste// bslab ldan rnams kyi ba glang lpags par so ma
182b6(rgyud): bal+la'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang // de ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi b+ha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs// tshangs pa srog chags rnams kyi
182b7(rgyud): lus dang 'phrog byed dag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid de dag rig byed gsum// oM yig de dag yi ge gsum ste zla nyi sreg za de dag rnams dang yon tan rtsa gsum mo// rigs
183a1(rgyud): can lus kyi rigs la gzhan pa yul dang yon tan la gnas srid srung nA nga'i gzugs can te// de yi dbus su gzhom med gang de yul dang rnam par bral zhing
183a2(rgyud): yon tan med pa'i 'gyur med do// rig byed mtha' yas gsang ba 'di dag tshangs pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la sngon brjod de// dus kyis shes pa rab nyams thub pa rnams kyis
183a3(rgyud): 'dir ni srog chags rnams la gsod pa dag kyang bstan// mi rnams mtho ris don du de la rab tu 'jug ste dmyal ba ngan pa'i 'bras bu sbyar bar 'gyur// sol ba 'o ma'i rgyun gyis
183a4(rgyud): mngon par bkrus pa 'dir ni zla ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin// sbyor ba med pa'i rig byed tshig ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba dag gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang // de rnams
183a5(rgyud): gzhan gyi bu ni mi bskyod don du nyin mtshan dus su rang gi bud med bsrung byas nas// bu yis byin pa dag kyang yi dgas kyi ni 'jig rten du song pha yis sbyin par 'gyur ro lo// des na
183a6(rgyud): bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni gdug pa'i bram ze rnams kyis sbas// gal te rigs kyi rta yis rgod ma bzang mo la ni rta mchog skyes bu gzhan du gyur pa na//
183a7(rgyud): dpal yang 'di yi mthu las slar yang 'gyur te bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag kyang cis ma yin// gang gis chags pa can rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang rang bud med dag ni srung bar
183b1(rgyud): byed/ shi bar gyur ra khyod su khyod kyi rang gi bud med su skyes kye ma mi dge'i las kyis bcings// ba lang sbyin dang sa gzhi sbyin par de bzhin gzhan yang mi yi 'jig rten du ni longs spyod/
183b2(rgyud): ster/ sman dang kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dang ni skom pa dag kyang 'phrog/ 'dod pa'i sbyin pa thams cad du ni bde mnyam 'bras ster 'khor lo'i dus su smos
183b3(rgyud): kyang ci zhig dgos// yid 'ong chung ma sring mo skal bzang bu mo rnams kyang gsang ba sbyin pa la ni rab sbyin bya// smad 'tshong dam pa las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur zhing gsang ba'i mi mo gzhan
183b4(rgyud): gyi bud med dam tshig ste// rang dbang chos kyi phyag rgya yul ni mang po la dga' rang gi chung ma ye shes phyag rgya'o// smad 'tshong dam pa bcu gnyis lo lon mchog gi bde ba la dga'
183b5(rgyud): gzhan gyis bud med bcu drug lo// rang rang lo ni nyi shu lon pa bu mo dang bcas rang gi chung ma sum cu'i lo ru 'gyur// sngon tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dzin ma dang ni glang chen rta dang shing
183b6(rgyud): rta du ma gser gyi khur// sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du byin zhing slar yang mgo dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin// 'di rnams kyis ni bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du ma gyur de nas
183b7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rab tu sbyin// gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis skyes bu rnams ni rgyal ba skyed byed rigs la sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs// zangs ma yis ni gser dang mtshungs shing mching
184a1(rgyud): bu dum bus lha yi cod pan nor bu dag dang mtshungs// smad 'tshong dam pa'i 'dod pa'i sbyin pas 'chi med rigs kyi bu mo lpags pa dum bu ga rtsi ste/ khong bu yis ni rig
184a2(rgyud): kyi rta dang ra yis rab mchog glang chen bdag po gal te rnyed pa na// chung ma'i sbyin pas rgyal bskyed mdzad rigs la lha mo nga la 'di ni rnyed pacis ma yin// byams pa'i gnas la spyon pa dag ni
184a3(rgyud): bde mnyam 'bras ster ma yin sems can mtshungs pa'i mthu las te// ltos pa dang bcas gnas la de bzhin rab mchog rgyal ba'i rigs la sems can bdud kyi rang bzhin phyir//
184a4(rgyud): snying rje dga' dang bcas pa'i gnas ni zung la gzhan gyi don du bde bar gshegs pa pa rnams kyis// rab tu byin na dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid phyir na tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs mi zad
184a5(rgyud): bde 'bras ster// gang la rigs ni tshad mar gyur pa de la mi yi bdag po rig byed dag ni tshad mar 'gyur// gang la rig byed tshad mar gyur pa de la nges par sa gzhi'i gnas su mchod sbyin tshad
184a6(rgyud): ma ste gang la mchod sbyin tshad ma de la rnam mang phyugs dang mi rnams dag la 'tshe ba tshad mar 'gyur// gang la 'tshe ba tshad mar gyur pa de la dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i sdig
184a7(rgyud): patshad ma'o// gnas ni 'dzir pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan gtsug lag khang gi ra ba gnas panod par gsungs// de la spar dang kha zas sbyin pa rang mi zhi bar byed pa
184b1(rgyud): sbyin tha tha mas sbyin mo zer// sbyin pa med na gtsugs sa yang 'dus ma phreng gi gnas mdung 'apornams kyi gnasas so// gang dradage 'dun gcig ni 'dzin par gyur ba ga
184b2(rgyud): ba chos dang sangs rgyas kyang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la ni mi rnams thar pa'i slad du skabs su nye bar 'gro ba 'o// 'di de sangs rgyas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa 'di dang mi ga d+d+ha
184b3(rgyud): pa'i glegs pam chos nyid dang // dge 'dun ngur smrig 'dzin pa mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba sgrib 'bum phrag rnams kyis ster ba min// slob dpon dag ni sangs rgyas nyid de rab mchog
184b4(rgyud): sa yi gzhi la chos ni de yis bstan pa'o// dge 'dun gang zhig der gnas rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang sems can kun la rjes su brtse ba ste// de 'dir rnam bzhi rnam pa gnyis gsungs 'dir
184b5(rgyud): nisngar yang nyan thos pa dang bla na med pa'o// dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma dang slar yang 'dir ni dge bsnyen chen po dag dang dge bsnyen ma// rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa rnams ldan/
184b6(rgyud): skyes bde ba la dga' dge bsnyen ma dang dge bsnyen yang // bsod nams ye shes don gyi slad du rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // nyan thos rnams la mchod
184b7(rgyud): ston la sogs rnal 'byor pa la mchog gi bde byed 'dod pa'i sbyin pa yang // sbyin pa po gang rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang dus kun tu ni chags pa'i sems kyis sbyin byed pa// de dag
185a1(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes rdzogs te mchog gi bde ba'i gnas su skye ba 'di la 'gro bar 'gyur// slob dpon dang ji rgyal ba la yang mkhas pa min pa'i nyan thos gang dag
185a2(rgyud): gsal bar spod byed pa// de dag bgegs kyi mgon pos bsad de mchog tu 'jigs pa byed pa'i mnar med du ni myur du 'gro// gang la rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag pos sngags kyi mthu
185a3(rgyud): rnams kyis ni rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa mdzad// mi rnams dag las dge slong su zhig brtul zhugs nges pa'i gnas la de dang tshangs par spyod pa mtshungs// mchog gi bde ba la dga'
185a4(rgyud): dge slong dag gam kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu mgo zlum ral pa can// thos dang klog pa la dga' mkhas pa lam nyams thams cad byed po dang ni bdag tu zhen pa dang // 'dir ni rtag tu rang
185a5(rgyud): gzhan bu dang chung mar zhen dang bza' dang bza' ba min par zhen pa dang // rigs dang rigs ni min pa la dga' snod dang snod min dag tu zhen pas dka' ba byed pa'o// sangs rgyas
185a6(rgyud): zhing ni sangs rgyas dang bcas bde mnyam 'bras ster lus dang ngag dang yid dang chags pa ste// 'di dag kun tu bor nas sdig pa'i blo yis khyab bdag gzhan pa dag kyang yang dag tshol byed de//
185a7(rgyud): zhing dang 'jug ngogs yul gzhan dag tu brtul zhugs nges pa brgya dang smyung gnas ri las mchod ba dang // g.yul dang nyi ma gza' yis zin la yul gyi bde 'dod du ma'i mtshon dang me la mchod
185b1(rgyud): pas so// bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni babyung ba'i slang du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi cha yang bkod paste// 'jug chogs sbyang gnas drag gis shi ba byur dang gsus du phru nga /
185b2(rgyud): dang ba lang nyi ma ni// grol ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyi yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shrI ba mtho ris so// de yi phyir na rang dang gzhon gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya
185b3(rgyud): ba yin// gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa zos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang // slar yang phrag dog byed na de ni dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur/
185b4(rgyud): te/ gang ma khabartse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun tu rgyu bar byed// de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du dbang ni blang bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro//
185b5(rgyud): rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang // bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang stobs dang mi
185b6(rgyud): shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi// sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste// gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching ba byas nas dmyal
185b7(rgyud): bar nye bar 'gro// sa dang dpal 'byor slang du shin tu g.yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rno po dag/ bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis dkrigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g.yul
186a1(rgyud): du rab tu rmugs pam// glang chen tshogs pa ma myo nas 'jigs pa de mi lag pa'i mthil mas ram byu ga rlung byung ba// de lar la gro'o sngon du rgyu byas sbyin
186a2(rgyud): ltar de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o// sngags dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya// rang byin rlabs pas lha mo dam tshig
186a3(rgyud): rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang // dag pa'i rim pas dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis so// ye shes
186a4(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o// me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid yin te me dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba med// ma bcings na
186a5(rgyud): ni gser byed med de gser dang bral na smra bo rnams la longs spyod med pa nyid// de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur// bcings
186a6(rgyud): pa meng ma grus 'bigs me nga 'thun thos kyis 'di ji la skyem ba ba ster ba mis// skyeng mos tshal la ma za dag spyi bo ri dgas bram par ni ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// rdzag
186a7(rgyud): bo rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang // dbang dang dgug pasngags pas mchog gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la// gnas gzhan dang
186b1(rgyud): ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub myi 'gyur// khyim dang grong du bgrang 'breng dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni// madz+dza /
186b2(rgyud): rmongs te chags pa dang bral sbyar yang 'don sngags kyi dngos grub med parjod par byed// gnas dang stong pa dus drang mchog gi mtshan mo la gargyas yang dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid// nang ba'i
186b3(rgyud): sor mo rnams kyi nang la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin// bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang gdan rnams dang //
186b4(rgyud): sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drang bskul ba med par yang // bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos
186b5(rgyud): grub ster bar byed// de phyir de ni nyan zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yi thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya// rang gi sems ni brgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mo yi bdag po rang bzhin med
186b6(rgyud): par 'gyur// sang la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin// dngos dang dngos myed kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dgal
186b7(rgyud): bde mnyam ster ba min// gang nig mkha' yi shes rab la 'khyud ldar skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang bzhin de ni thar pa ser// oM AHhUM hoH/ rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni cag tu
187a1(rgyud): chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya// rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgom par byas nas ni// snod de nas ni thog le dag gis lag pa da ri/
187a2(rgyud): bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa dag la// phyi rol du ni zur gsum byas nas de yi dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o// de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas
187a3(rgyud): pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgoms byas nas// mthe bong dang ni maung med dag gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya// yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir
187a4(rgyud): ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming gis te// 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang slar yang sngags pas khro bo'i rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o// pho nya mo rnams dag la zas kyi phud ni sa steng
187a5(rgyud): rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin// 'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshogs bcad 'di bklag go// mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lte gsang
187a6(rgyud): gtsug tor du ni rang gi rdo rje rnams kyis yan lag dgod// gnyis ka'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrig pa la// lha yi dmigs
187a7(rgyud): pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste// mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// mngon
187b1(rgyud): sum minan rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang // de ni ri mo sogs la blta bya yongs su ma spyin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi sgom pa'i don// gzugs/
187b2(rgyud): sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya// nam mkha' la ni nga nyid sbyor ba dag gis rang sems mching med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur pa/
187b3(rgyud): lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyid du brtan par gyur kyi bar// de nas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba so nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur/
187b4(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag la gsungs// byis pa rnams ni smin par byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gis sna tshogs gtso bas
187b5(rgyud): skyes de byor nga ri dbye ba byas nas nyid nags so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// b+hag d+hA'i dngos grub do slong rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gnom du med pa dus kyi 'khor
187b6(rgyud): dang bam dang ba'i sangs rgyas chen po las byung ba pa la dus kyi 'khor lo las sgrub thabs kyi le bzhi pa'o// san pa'i sgrub thebs rgyal pa mchog
187b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa gang nig khyod kyis gsungs pa dag na cung bang shes/ slar yang bdagi ni nyan par 'tshal ma su ma'o bla ma khams kyi dbye rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang// sangs rgyas
188a1(rgyud): rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs drug A li kA li dag la gnas pa nyid// zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye bas/
188a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs// ka ba rnams dang rdo rje 'phreng ba sa yi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod// sha khrag chu dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje
188a3(rgyud): nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa ste// mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyi chu skyes rnams// ra bA lnga yi re khA sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nAm
188a4(rgyud): mkha' las skyes rnams kyis so// dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g.yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs pags pa la sogs kyis// nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i
188a5(rgyud): rang bzhin bkod pa so yi 'phreng bas de bzhin nyid// dur khrod brgyad du 'khor lo g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis// ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce dkyil 'khor
188a6(rgyud): gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la gnas// de ltar nges par sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs// gsung gi rdo rje a sogs ka sogs lha yi
188a7(rgyud): rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis// stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid// de bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa
188b1(rgyud): 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no// sde ba ka la sogs pa drug po rim par yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis// rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin
188b2(rgyud): gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste// slar yang sde ba re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams ngag gis dbye// so sor yi ge'i dbye bas dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang rnam
188b3(rgyud): mkha' dngos po dag las so// dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang nga nyaN ma na dang zhwa dang dang po'i dbyangs// rlung gi dbye ba i yig g+ha dz+dza D+ha b+ha d+ha sha rnams te me yi dbyi bor la sogs/
188b4(rgyud): rgyu yi dbye ba u yin+da kha tsha' pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye ba l-i la sogs// de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i rigs ni rnam pa lnga yis ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams rnam par phye// gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste
188b5(rgyud): rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o// a sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams// 'jig rten snang
188b6(rgyud): byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o// rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mtha' dag tu 'gyur ka sogs sde pa brtsegs pa la gnas brgyad
188b7(rgyud): rnams so// ka sogs yi ge sum cu ha ya ra wa lar ldan k+Sha dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa drug nyid// dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni 'khor lo'i mgon po
189a1(rgyud): rnams su 'gyur// sku ni gcig pa nges par gcig gis 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te
189a2(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu bdag nyid// dbyangs kyi grangs kyis bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa drug bdag nyid de// ya la sogs/
189a3(rgyud): ba rnams kyi sgo skyong mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so// khro bo drug tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis//
189a4(rgyud): so sor yi ge'i dpe ba rnams kyis ro yos bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud// de bzhin yi ge so sor ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste// phung po
189a5(rgyud): 'byung ba dbang po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyang bar bya// stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams rgya yis gdab pa ste//
189a6(rgyud): gtsug tor nas ni chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o// rdo rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye
189a7(rgyud): ba yis// de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis// sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can//
189b1(rgyud): yi ge so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams ngag gi'o// sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// phung po
189b2(rgyud): rnams kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgu pa yang // bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'di ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag
189b3(rgyud): nyid kyang // de bzhin so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams drag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can// dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar pad+ma'i mtshan ma
189b4(rgyud): 'od dpag med// nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma mA ma kI dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma// drag mo chu gter tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdengs can dang ni stag gdong
189b5(rgyud): ma dang 'ug par bcas// 'di dag dpal ldan g.yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje car gyis spros pa'o// chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi pad+ma ral gri ngor yod grub pa
189b6(rgyud): sgrol ma dang // mkha' yi snying po reg bya rdo rje ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsartsi ka dang lcags sgrog ma// bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi gdong ma dang bya
189b7(rgyud): rog bcas// de dag nges par byams pa'i thugs kyis srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs rin
190a1(rgyud): chen 'dzin dang gos dkar mo// sa mi snying po rmugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug pa yilha// gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab
190a2(rgyud): gsal khro gnyer can dang phag gdong sa dang bya rgod bcas// 'di dag dpal ldan g.yas kyi nal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis na sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o// lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa
190a3(rgyud): las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i thub pa phyag na 'khor lo dang // spyan ma dang ni rnam par sel ma rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs byed dri yi rdo rje ma// 'od zer can dang dbang po brgya
190a4(rgyud): byin dus kyi gdong pa dang bcas rje'u rigs klu la sogs pa kun// gtso bo yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa'o// gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa
190a5(rgyud): las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te nam mkha'i yon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzhan// gsang ba dag pa las
190a6(rgyud): ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang // steng dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru spros pa'o// phyogs kyi 'dab
190a7(rgyud): mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste// nyi ma'i steng du g.yon brkyang u ma dang bcas dbang phyug mnan zhing 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin dang
190b1(rgyud): mtshungs// zod pa rnams kyis 'phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ruH// phyag rgya sbrul dang skrag gi pags pa mi bzang glang po'i bdag po'i pags pa bshus
190b2(rgyud): brlon pa 'dzin// gnag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyis phyi rol du ni 'khor lo gsum// rdo rje drug ni khro bo las skyes phyag gnyis zla zhal rnams dang de bzhin 'byung
190b3(rgyud): bo skyes rnams kyis// skor ni gtum mo ro la gnas shing phyag na gri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro// dpa' bo rnams kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje Da ma ru dang dril bu rdo rjel
190b4(rgyud): T+wAM ga dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te// zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod sa ni me dang rlung gi dbus su
190b5(rgyud): yang / de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba dang // shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nas
190b6(rgyud): spros pa'o// snying por 'khor lo cha dgu pa ste dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha shas zla nyi pad+ma la// rdo rje ka pa'i 'phreng ba dag gis smras pa yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po/
190b7(rgyud): rol du ni ra ba'i rdzogs pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la gnas// sgra skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag la kun nas so// 'di la sogs
191a1(rgyud): pa la ni de bzhin nal byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa ste// zur du khro bo rnabs dang logs su yul dang yul can dza b+ha la ri phyag na sob bsnams// dag
191a2(rgyud): dang rkang lag bshang lam b+ha ga'o nyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyi rtsa yi rang bzhin te// shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o//
191a3(rgyud): snying por 'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor las ni sum gyi cha// phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'bar ma gzhar la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs
191a4(rgyud): brgyad// phyi rol du gnas dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te// der ni raba'i rtsig pa dgra la dus la chu gter gyis bstan byang chub sems
191a5(rgyud): dpa' mtha' dag rnams// sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro yi phyag ri lha yi sku yi dbye ba las// rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi dpa'agos g.yon gyi/
191a6(rgyud): nal ras spros pa'o// rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir ni nyos 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug mi bdag dur khrod sa rnams
191a7(rgyud): kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros pa'o// thig ni drug dang thug pa'i cha shas g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thog btab nas// snying po las ni drug drug cha rnams
191b1(rgyud): kyis te pad+ma'i 'dab pa byed kyi lte bar ldan pa yang // gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i 'phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis// nyi ma rnams kyis sgo dang blo byung /
191b2(rgyud): dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni do sha las// gsum gyis kyang nair ba snga yi re kha rtse mo can gyis do shAl rdza bar snam bu'o// nyis rnams kyis logs dang 'gram skye sum 'gyur nyin
191b3(rgyud): byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rta babs so// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu sgo ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o// dbus su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la
191b4(rgyud): ni nyi ma ri bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan// 'khor lo dang ni 'phreng ba sngon po sa ni ljang khu dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo ser// sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po 'breng bar
191b5(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang // sa ni ser po sngon po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang khu'i mdog tu 'gyur// cha drug gis ni mtshon gyi sa ste skye byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo
191b6(rgyud): yi 'khor lo de bzhin no// phyi rol du ri brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad// 'dab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad de 'drab mar
191b7(rgyud): brgyad la lha mo rnams// phyi de sgeg mo la sogs su mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin klu yi rgyal po brgyad// de yi phyi rol du ris chu me dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rdo na
192a1(rgyud): 'phreng ba'o// ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta paT tsaka sa sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams// rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis
192a2(rgyud): ring po sa sogs khams kyi rang bzhin rnams// steng sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis thung ngu rang rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi steng du'o// sgo dang sgo yi bar du ha k+ShaHdang ldan nam
192a3(rgyud): mkha'i mthil na gnas pa'i sde par bcas pa rnams// mkha' 'gro ma rnams thung ba'i dngos po ro bong 'dzin pa'i zhal dang phyag na gri gug thod pa can// g.yas pa brkyang zhing rang rang
192a4(rgyud): snod rnams kyis ni lha min khrag 'thung skra grol gos dang bral ba ste// rkang pa rked pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g.yer ka sogs dang rus pa'i rgyan// mgo dang rked pa'i ngos la
192a5(rgyud): zothod pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog lnga yis 'phreng ba'o// mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje mchog dang ra ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dril bu// mgrin par dpal ldan mgo 'phreng
192a6(rgyud): mgo bor cod pan la yang rdo rje dar dpyangs dang ni nor bu'o// dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdub phyag la phyag gdub dang ni ska rags ngag dang rna rgyan te// rdzogs pa'i thod pa
192a7(rgyud): rnams kyis 'phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang thal ba'i rgya// gtso bo'i dbu la thod pa rnams kyis 'phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi 'phreng ba'o//
192b1(rgyud): zla phyed rdo rje'i cod pan la ste rang gi rkeng dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i pags pa'o// zla nyi sreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal ba ste//
192b2(rgyud): phyag rgya klu yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma la 'o dag byed// phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga nyid de// bshang
192b3(rgyud): gci khrag dang mi sha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang phyag na'o// de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyis ka ba de la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o// /
192b4(rgyud): ser dang dkar po dmar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang khu'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang phyogs su// rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams ni
192b5(rgyud): sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs// phan tshun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so// sbyin pa sogs dang phung po 'byung ba yul/
192b6(rgyud): dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga la sogs pa dang // phyogs sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya// lhun po'i phyogs
192b7(rgyud): su dbye ba brgyad kyis phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang // zhing dang chen do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtshams su ste/
193a1(rgyud): 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lnga dang lha min dang // nus dang gtso bo'i nyon gcig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab
193a2(rgyud): tu rgyu ba las// rgyab tu lha mo dbang byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te// rlung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod
193a3(rgyud): sbyin nub tu yang // gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'og dang steng du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nas
193a4(rgyud): ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis par// gtso bo'i chu skyes rdo rje kun dang 'gyur med thig le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la gnas pa// kun nas dga' ba thams cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas
193a5(rgyud): te dus ni thams cad do// zla ba zhu ba bla ma'i zhal de ru ni gang zhig zhugs pa dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid de// bdud rnams kyi ni dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma yi
193a6(rgyud): 'khor lo 'di dag go/ shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i ming // rdo rje gsum po rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog
193a7(rgyud): ma dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba bzlas bya ste// srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyis ka'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi rjes mthun pa'o// ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas
193b1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i dus su dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mdar gyur pa// de brgyad rnams/
193b2(rgyud): kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams// rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri gug dang ni thod pa can/
193b3(rgyud): bdud rtsi bde ba'i tsha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g.yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o// lha gsum me lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las/
193b4(rgyud): gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gang na ni gzhan pa rnams// nag po dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan rnams te// 'di nyid
193b5(rgyud): la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnams so// zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma sgo bzhi zur gyi ro rnams te// slar yang rkang pa nyis
193b6(rgyud): 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan rnams nyid// rdzogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdan rnams te// nyi ma 'am ni//
193b7(rgyud): gang ba'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la// rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni yon tan gzhan gyi dbang gis rgyas gdab zhal ni gnyis pa'o// rtse mo can la
194a1(rgyud): gzugs dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gang ba zhal ni gsum pa'o// tshu la zhal yang reg bya dang ni gzugs dang ro yin la te rgyus gang ba zhal ni bzhi pa'o/
194a2(rgyud): sa la dri la sogs pa reg bya'i mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gang ba zhal ni lnga pa'o// nam mkha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnam pa lnga ste rgya yis bdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o// de bzhin
194a3(rgyud): du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gi zhal rnams so// gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsres pa lnga/
194a4(rgyud): shes rab thabs ni zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bzhi// thun mtshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ste rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha
194a5(rgyud): dog gsum// dus sbyor phyed pa phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni// thun mtshams cha shas snga phyi las te zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni 'khyud pa dbu ma'i//
194a6(rgyud): cha shas la// shes rab sbyor dang snyoms par zhugs pa dag kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtshams la'o// shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po mni nges par
194a7(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje can gyi g.yon mdun yan lag dkar dang sprin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o// mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye ba
194b1(rgyud): g.yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur// drag po g.yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid// shes rab kyis bye rgyal ba dag gi rab/
194b2(rgyud): mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur// shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid de// g.yas dang galas min nyi ma dang ni
194b3(rgyud): ri bong can gyi sku dang zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang // nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang khu dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas// dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar mo dmar po
194b4(rgyud): rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid// ser po rnams kyi kha dog dag mo dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o// sngon po rnams kyi kha dog sna tshogs slar yang
194b5(rgyud): ljang khu rnams kyi sngon mo rnams su de bzhin gsungs// de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rig phyogs su gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya// shes rab rgyud ni shar nas slar yang rnal 'byor
194b6(rgyud): rjes su rig pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so// g.yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g.yon gyi zhal nas bya ba la sogs so// shar nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid de slar yang nub kyi
194b7(rgyud): zhal nas nges par dbu ma mtha' dag go// mdo sde pa ni g.yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'i zhal ras dag pa'i bye brag smra ba'o// nub kyi zhal nas nges brjod rig byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang pos
195a1(rgyud): g.yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyin gsungs// g.yas kyi zhal nas snyan tshig rig byed mchog gi bsreg bya'i rigs la srid srung shar gyi zhal nas so// shar gyi zhal nas rigs/
195a2(rgyud): can rgyud de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyud// g.yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs g.yas pa nas ni khyab 'jug chos// rgyab nas
195a3(rgyud): 'phral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas g.yon gyi lha dang rab tu gnas pa ste// g.yas nas rig pa drag po'i min dang slar yang rlung gi zhal nas rlung skyes tshangs pa zhi pa dag/ stong pa'i zhal
195a4(rgyud): nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros// rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan pa rtsod dus rgyab kyi zhal la sogs pa'i dbye ba las// de bzhin dpa' bo'i//
195a5(rgyud): rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis thung mtshams bzhi po nyid dag dang // kha zas ngag ni g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyi zhal nas spros pa ste// mdun gyi zhal nas
195a6(rgyud): 'khrid pa nyid ngo mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po rmi lam dag dang gnyid// rgyab nas rje'u rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur// rgyal ba'i bdag/
195a7(rgyud): pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g.yas nas mang pos bkur ba'o// rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge 'dun phal chen pa ni g.yon gyi zhal nas so// mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams
195b1(rgyud): dang ni slar yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dung 'gro rnams ni nges par spros// g.yas kyi nal nas 'byung po lnga rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i nal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rdzabs// mdun gyi nam/
195b2(rgyud): nas spros pa dag kyang snying kha'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgyab zhal sde ba'i 'khor lo nas// g.yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun tu g.yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa ras/
195b3(rgyud): 'khor lo rnams kyi zham gyi dbus nas lus la dngos po sngo ba dang ri sdud pa nyid du 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang rgyal bskyed byed zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang dgas
195b4(rgyud): dpal ldan zla ba zla ba chu shel rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba// de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la brten thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'dzag ste// chu ni sa bon
195b5(rgyud): khams la kun tu brten nas ro mnyam 'gyur ba ji bzhin nyid du chos dag ni// sems can rnams kyi dga' ba'i sems kyis rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu las so// srid gsum gnas na
195b6(rgyud): sems can don gyi byed po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa med// sems la gnas de mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems cad rnams kyis mi mthong ste// yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon min mi dge/
195b7(rgyud): ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu sems cadan thams cad rab tu spyod// sems de dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya// gang gis myu gu 'di skyed skyed par byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas rnam/
196a1(rgyud): par nyams par 'gyur// nyams pa de yis skyes par rab tu 'gyur te slar yang sa bon brgyad po dag gi skyed byed do// snga ma gang de gzhan gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i tshig ste
196a2(rgyud): rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min// gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcur 'gro bar 'gyur// bde nas bde la rjes chags skad cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po
196a3(rgyud): gzhan la rjes su chags pa min// phung po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis skyed par byed pa ste// dag pa las chos de las gzhan te slar yang de las
196a4(rgyud): gzhan dang de las rnam par dag pa'o// dag pa'i sa la sa bor btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste phra rab
196a5(rgyud): dag ni rnam pa drug/ dri la sogs pa re res dman zhing yul dang rnam par bral ba mtha' ma ye shes palta bya rnams// 'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang ri bong/
196a6(rgyud): can te mtha' ma chos kyi dbyings// rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tu 'pho med bde ba lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o// slar yang sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la
196a7(rgyud): chung ba'i dngos rnams gnas// phan tshun phung po 'byung ba dang ni yul dang yul can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa// phan tshun rjes chags lnga ni ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas sdug bsngal
196b1(rgyud): dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gis// rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kun nas gzhan gyi yon tan mi ga' mi phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas// de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tugasal
196b2(rgyud): byed chen po du ma sprul pa'i sku// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa lha man dang ni mi rnams dang // longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha'as rgyas/
196b3(rgyud): ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis// stong pa'i cha yis srid gsum mtha' dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad par te// me yi cha shas rnams kyis me yi zangad
196b4(rgyud): par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams kyis// 'dzin ma'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kun// kun nas nam mkha' dag dang //
196b5(rgyud): mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par byed// de ltar sangs rgyas skur 'gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir ra 'chi bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro// de gcig pu las rnam
196b6(rgyud): pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di// rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i rang gi ngo bo'o// de yi skad cig gcig ni bde
196b7(rgyud): mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min// 'dir thabs 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes chos kyi dbyings su rab tu zhugs pa la'o//
197a1(rgyud): mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang nam mkha' la sogs khams rnams dang // gnas dang skye dang nyams pa rnam gsum zhes
197a2(rgyud): pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu sems can kun// sangs rgyas khro bo lnga sogs rnams dang snying rje'i thugs ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te// 'di dag rnams ni srid
197a3(rgyud): pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin ro// spu dang pags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin rus pa dang ni rkang dang rtsa// de dag rnams la
197a4(rgyud): srog sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o// zla ba'i dbus su dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste// de ni dngos dang dngos
197a5(rgyud): med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzhom med do// spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang zhig sa bcur gsungs pa rnams// /
197a6(rgyud): sde pa drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster// de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni thar pa'i slad du
197a7(rgyud): btsal bar bya// lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po
197b1(rgyud): gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin// de rnams mnyes par byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod par byed de rnam par mi rtog pa las so// rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed dang myal
197b2(rgyud): bangu 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur// de phyir sems ni dag pa na yang mkhas dang mi mkhas spyi bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o// sems can dag dang 'grogs pa thob
197b3(rgyud): nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs sems su 'gyur// mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi zhe sdang chags sogs sems su 'gyur// dus kun tu ni byang
197b4(rgyud): chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// thar par 'jug pas dman zhing smon pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams cad dus su bdud kyi sems// srid pa gsum gyi
197b5(rgyud): gnas su bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi bar byed// bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog tu 'jigs byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan// bdud rnams kyi ni bdud
197b6(rgyud): kyi blo dang skyob pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug/ de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum po mtha' dag mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur// rgyal ba
197b7(rgyud): rnams kyis 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin// sangs rgyas rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang gi khru ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med de//
198a1(rgyud): las kyi sar ni srog chags rnams la sems can rjes mthun tshad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar byed// gal te tshad 'di bdag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyis
198a2(rgyud): 'di med pa pa zhes brjod par 'gyur// gang gis rgyal ba'i dbang po bskyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung // skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam
198a3(rgyud): par bral ba grub cing g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur pa// sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bden mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa// de yi bskal pa bye ba du ma rnams kyis sangs
198a4(rgyud): rgyas nyid dang lhar skyes bde ba dag kyang ring // nim pa'i shing las rgun 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shing las 'dam skyes dang // stong pa las ni myang 'das
198a5(rgyud): bde ba mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams// mchod sbyin dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang dbang po rnams ni 'gog las min//
198a6(rgyud): rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g.yo med 'gyur ba ma dag sems las min// sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis
198a7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'o// gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang
198b1(rgyud): gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa// de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma mo so'i dus su de dag rnams la du ma yis ni bgegs rnams byed// rgyal ba'i ltar skyes/
198b2(rgyud): bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don srang dang por las kyi phyag rgya bsten par bya// de nas nyi ma'i gzugs ni lus dang gdong dang rkang pa gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste// glog gi dbyug
198b3(rgyud): pa'i rjes mthur 'pho med bde bskyed par byed ma mtshan nyid yan lag rab tu rdzogs// rdo rje rnams kyis rab tu snang bar byed ma srid gsum gnas lus chos kyi dbyings ni de nas 'gyur/
198b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras sar byug rgyam po'ang rnams rkyong dang 'brig blon du brjong dang / mi gzung ba ding gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyi ma dang skra'i khang pa thams cad du nadus sas
198b5(rgyud): shin tu dga' ba'i dga' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing // lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba la sogs longs spyod dang ldan
198b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya// rlung ni yang dag phrad pa rnams kyi glog gi me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bar byed// thig le gang gang zhu ba 'di las mgrin pa snying kha la so ni lte ba gsang ba
198b7(rgyud): dag la 'gog/ thig le las ni g.yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor bu la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la 'god pa gang // de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gal te thig le'i 'phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde na'o// de phyir g.yo
199a1(rgyud): meng bde ba'i skad cig lhan cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis skyer byed de// srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnam
199a2(rgyud): bcom byas nas// rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang srid gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba 'di las te// gal te lam du rab zhugs 'chi bar 'gyur na de tshe dri yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhan
199a3(rgyud): la'o// gang zhig yon tan med cing dngos chung yul dang rnam bral de ni sku yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis// de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa
199a4(rgyud): gnyis// gnag dang dkar la rjes chags yul gyi yon tan la dag 'thugs kyi phyag d+ha rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te// brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' dus dang ni spyong pa rig byed
199a5(rgyud): dag gi lo// rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog bskyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya// rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag yon tan gter gyi dkyil 'khor
199a6(rgyud): bzhengs byas nas// sangs rgyas byin rlabs sngags rnams kyis ni gsang ba'i pad+mar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa spro bya ste// gsang bar bsrung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas
199a7(rgyud): byang chub sems ni myang bar bya// de la gang zhig bu ru gyur pa rgyal bskyed byed sras po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid// shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig tshen bu mor 'gyur te nges par sangs rgyas
199b1(rgyud): yum du 'gyur// de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyis pad+ma dkar 'dzin dzaM pA la dang phyag na rdo rje ste// me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul che ldan
199b2(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po rnams// zla ba de la rdul gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu bskyed pa ste// lo ni nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang chub sems dpa' snying stobs chen po ste/
199b3(rgyud): de nas stong pa dang ni rig byed par du cung zad snying stobs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur// slar yang mo ni nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba'o// de nas skye gnas
199b4(rgyud): la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'o nga nyams pa las dbang ma yin// 'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gsung gis sbyin par bya// de dag rnams kyis chum
199b5(rgyud): rlung na ma mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal bar bya// byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por 'gyur// gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lnga/
199b6(rgyud): mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste// skyugs pa snying kha gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes nang du rab zhugs min// bshang ba gci ga khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro ma'am smras
199b7(rgyud): pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste// 'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan// shes rab chos 'byung la ni gang zhig ltung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu
200a1(rgyud): 'bad pas bsrung bar bya// de yis sems can gang dag su zhig 'byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la byang chub sems dpa' nyid// de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su
200a2(rgyud): bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug/ shes rab me tog dang ldan zos pa zhi ba bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar ngon du 'jug par byed// mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khums nyid kyi bar du/
200a3(rgyud): chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya// gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying khar ye shes 'khor lo rab
200a4(rgyud): bcug ste// 'di yi 'od zer rnams kyis gnyis ka'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed// gal te 'di ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya// shes
200a5(rgyud): rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya// shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas gcig pu la ste slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku// gang /
200a6(rgyud): su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dga' byed g.yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod par byed// srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang // de/
200a7(rgyud): dag thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyed byed srog chags rnams la nam yang ma yin no// gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi byed po g.yul gyi yul la dga' zhing gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa//
200b1(rgyud): de rnabs la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i don du de dag sbyar bar bya// mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon rnams phyugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas pa yi gsol ba gang ba mi bya// sems
200b2(rgyud): can rnams ni srung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas 'jig rten khams su smos pa ste// de phyir de rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su srung bar byed cing sgrub pa po la sdang bar byed// bsgrub bya dag ni las/
200b3(rgyud): kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin no// skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis phran tshegs rig pa la rjes chags// rig pa 'od yis srid pa
200b4(rgyud): gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o// zhes pa'i bsam pa brkam chags sems kyis ye shes sbyin pa rnam par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug/ rgyab tu rdzas dang
200b5(rgyud): rang gi khyim thab gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin
200b6(rgyud): nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba las// 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i don ni byed pa po// sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du slar yang
200b7(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa he ru kar ni byung bar gyur// gdug pa rnams ni smin pa'i don te de yang
201a1(rgyud): dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don// rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de yang bar 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad// bgegs rnams
201a2(rgyud): dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grub par byung bar gyur// zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur// gti mug dag las spyan
201a3(rgyud): ma zhes bya mchog gi snying rje mA ma kI ni nga rgyal rgyu las so// chags las de ni gos dkar zhes bya mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni phrag dog las// sna tshogs gzugs can gnyis po 'di
201a4(rgyud): dag yul dang yul can gzhan rnams thams cad du yang byung bar gyur// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis// nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs
201a5(rgyud): bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni smin pa'i don du ste// gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad du'o// gang zhig
201a6(rgyud): e waM yi ge la gnas mchog gi nges pa can rnams mchog la dgod pa'i don du'o// sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du skra dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun tu// nges par rdo rje
201a7(rgyud): can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur// phyi rol sna tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la srog gi rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba'o// khyab bdag gi ni sa
201b1(rgyud): sogs dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la// sgra la sogs la gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med pa yang gzhan ni de bzhin kho na'o// gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas mchog/
201b2(rgyud): tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o// gcig pu rdo rje can ni dbye ba gsum ste yul dang yul can khams rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o// dus gsum gnas gsum du bzhugs srid pa
201b3(rgyud): gsum du'ang gnas pa sems cad du ma'i don gyi spang du'o// rgyud rnams ngag las 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste// rdo rje can mi zla ba zhu las rdo
201b4(rgyud): gang zhig spyi mgrir snying kha'i chu skyes lte gsang dang // bud med rnams kyi b+ha gar de ni thig le grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi pad+ma la gnas pa// de 'dir sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan
201b5(rgyud): 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya// skye ba snga mar rang gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni// bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig
201b6(rgyud): ni du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang gis so// don gcig du ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug/ gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du 'khor lo la
201b7(rgyud): gnas bsod snyoms la ni rnam par rgyu ru gshegs// dud 'gro yi dgas lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la// byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar
202a1(rgyud): byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden pa'i chos ni gsung byed cing // rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po mtshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa// 'di
202a2(rgyud): ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtog bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni/
202a3(rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o// sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab zhugs pa// 'di
202a4(rgyud): nim skyes chos te chu la nam mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o// rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyis bgrod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa// gsung gi rdo rje sems
202a5(rgyud): can thams cad rang snying skad rnams ngag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o// rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dgas la gnas// dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po
202a6(rgyud): rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o// sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs// de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag pa
202a7(rgyud): mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams// bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams// phyag rgya drug rnams stong
202b1(rgyud): pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o// 'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang bzhes pa'o bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni// pad+ma'i nyon mongs zad pa ral gyi/
202b2(rgyud): rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o// mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa// phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs
202b3(rgyud): mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya// gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs// gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
202b4(rgyud): nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste// gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o// gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du
202b5(rgyud): gyur pa dag ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o// gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs// gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams
202b6(rgyud): pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid// 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams// gzhan ni khams drug dbye ba rnams tes
202b7(rgyud): dang chu dang ma dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams// gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o// gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa
203a1(rgyud): mA ma kI ste de ni chu nyid do// gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa gos dkar mo ste de ni me yin no// gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur
203a2(rgyud): pa sgrol ma yin te de ri rlung yang ngo // gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'// gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum/
203a3(rgyud): ste de ni 'gyur med do// mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig/ ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i na
203a4(rgyud): ba chen po'o// mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po// rang gi zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lce/
203a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste// thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos// dbye
203a6(rgyud): ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams// sna tshogs gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas/
203a7(rgyud): ni/ dngas zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste// khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis
203b1(rgyud): rtogs bya min// ye shes dgug pa byed pa 'dir ri slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rdugs byed kyis// rengs byed de ribacing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed
203b2(rgyud): kyis ni mnyes pa yang // ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo ro ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste// de bzhinakhro ba'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud
203b3(rgyud): kyi sku la'o// srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste// bcing ba khro bo mi g.yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus
203b4(rgyud): kyis ni phur bus gdab// 'dod pas de yi brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so// gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal
203b5(rgyud): zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams// yi dgas rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsartsi ka la sogs pa spros par gyur pa ste// skye bo rnams ni srung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams
203b6(rgyud): de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du// klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros// lha min rnams ni smir bar bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma
203b7(rgyud): chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spos// gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar// sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan dam/
204a1(rgyud): mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya// de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste// 'dir ni dbang bskur/
204a2(rgyud): rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o// gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang // shes rab dang 'gregs/
204a3(rgyud): byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang // de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan// 'jig rten 'das
204a4(rgyud): pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya phyogs la rjes su sbyor ba'o// sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid// gang zhig
204a5(rgyud): mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bstan bya ste// ye shes me lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg
204a6(rgyud): 1byed cing // lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed// shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur//
204a7(rgyud): dbang ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa// de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste// sangs rgyas zhal
204b1(rgyud): 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o// nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzun rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis// stong pa las ni du bsdig
204b2(rgyud): rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang // 'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur// de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang
204b3(rgyud): rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste// re khA nag po drag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba
204b4(rgyud): dus kyi rtsa la mthong bar gyur kyi bar du'o// de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni tshu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te// rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par bral ba dag gi sems ni
204b5(rgyud): gzhan pa min pa nyid// gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin nag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog pa rab bya ste// 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong /
204b6(rgyud): gi bar du'o// zla ba drug gis sdom brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur// chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi
204b7(rgyud): ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo// on+d+ra 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes rnam shes dag gi dbus// gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma dag gi gnyis
205a1(rgyud): sa / / [ऽ]
205a2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o// sa yi rnam pa sra ba min ning zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir// me yi rnam pa me min g.yo ba
205a3(rgyud): rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g.yo ba min pa rlung ma yin// stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ldang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min// rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min
205a4(rgyud): te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so// nA da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su son pa lu gu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa// srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang
205a5(rgyud): bcas pad+ma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid// rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste// du ba la sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag
205a6(rgyud): kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya// dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g.yas dang g.yon la bcing // phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems
205a7(rgyud): dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang // pad+mar rdo rje'i sgra 'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad du ste// sa bor gtong ba min po'i bde ba de ni 'chi
205b1(rgyud): ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal// sa ni chul rab tu 'jug cing rgyu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o// rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan brlab
205b2(rgyud): pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni// rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zang mchog gi bde ba gnom du med pa ye shes sku// ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes
205b3(rgyud): bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o// 'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do// 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed
205b4(rgyud): pa'i ye shes dag ni on+d+ra nyid// dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni// gsung dang thugs su lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid
205b5(rgyud): kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur// 'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur// gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid
205b6(rgyud): pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o// yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le nA da rim pa yis// bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam
205b7(rgyud): gsum srid par gnas pa'o// sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni// lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par dpyod cing g.yo
206a1(rgyud): med sems la zhen pa ste// ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur// sprul pa la sogs dag gi sems kyi
206a2(rgyud): rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur// de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste// rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bde mnyam
206a3(rgyud): 'bras ster khyab byed ngag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya// thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skyes pa'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang // de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig
206a4(rgyud): 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya// gang phyir a sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdan min zhing // hUM yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang
206a5(rgyud): ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de// 'gyur meng dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni// rnam pa kun ldan thig le
206a6(rgyud): mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o// lo sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams// phan tshun dbye bas
206a7(rgyud): phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste// dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams// slar yang thun mtshams
206b1(rgyud): gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab// de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bong ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs// ka la son+da/
206b2(rgyud): pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal ba dgu brgya nyid// dbyangs drug gi ni 'bye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// de bzhin ring
206b3(rgyud): pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i nyon mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// de bzhin
206b4(rgyud): ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod pa dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab//
206b5(rgyud): snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya// phyi rol du ri gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du
206b6(rgyud): gnas// de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste// snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas sring pa gsum po mtha' dag spyong pa dag tu
206b7(rgyud): thim pa'o// de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug/ zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thur mtshams/
207a1(rgyud): bzhi la ste// thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis// sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams/
207a2(rgyud): tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la// gza' rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o// rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par
207a3(rgyud): mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs// zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur// gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgya dang bye
207a4(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mar thun chod longs spyod mtha'// lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o// spen par bug pa
207a5(rgyud): mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yi bla ma'i phyed bcas migo dang mig gi grangs// phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes// sa skyes
207a6(rgyud): stong pa sbrul zla nyi ma gza' lhag pa sangs mjug rings la yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig/ mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las
207a7(rgyud): byung / gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung // mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sbrul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshod
207b1(rgyud): de bzhin nyid// mkha' 'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma// de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag pa/
207b2(rgyud): byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya// ji srid gza' rnams ngag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las// de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang
207b3(rgyud): khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci// pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la// sgrib bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis
207b4(rgyud): shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyis ma yin no// nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyis ka'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams// yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag
207b5(rgyud): pa'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug rings za// thun mtshams kun dang thur brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams// dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs
207b6(rgyud): rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab pa yan lag gsungs// yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par// de phyir dus
207b7(rgyud): la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnams so// de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag las 'gyur// gang du zla
208a1(rgyud): pa'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o// zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel pa yan lag bcu gnyis
208a2(rgyud): kyis/ drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs// reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gi rkang pa de 'dzin no// nyin dang mtshan
208a3(rgyud): mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster// sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyid skyes spen// sngags pa
208a4(rgyud): lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu// zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa 'i skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang dgug
208a5(rgyud): pa 'bral dang gsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o// zhi la dkar po'i zhal te dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang gser mtshungs thun chod lag pa la// rengs la ser po me
208a6(rgyud): yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la// dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o// gsad la nag po'i zhal te ri
