208a7(rgyud): bo la'o bskrad la gnag dang dkar 'dir sbrul la mtshan mo'i mthar// sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min// 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang
208b1(rgyud): mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed// sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed// gang
208b2(rgyud): gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no// dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur// de yang yul gyi
208b3(rgyud): yoyon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum 'gyur ni// 'byung ba chu gter grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams// chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs
208b4(rgyud): rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so// gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste// de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams
208b5(rgyud): kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum// kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las// ji srid rig byed sbrul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri/
208b6(rgyud): gug thod pa can du rab tu 'gyur// 'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis// gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ste rab du ba la
208b7(rgyud): sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so// de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs// lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan
209a1(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma phyag 'os pa'o// gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang // de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro
209a2(rgyud): bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so// gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon
209a3(rgyud): tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so// gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni// snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu/
209a4(rgyud): gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra gcan gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste// de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di// brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la
209a5(rgyud): yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul// dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa// mkha' 'gro ma rnams
209a6(rgyud): ngag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyam ste 'gro ba drug tu gnas// de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku// gang zhig dbug
209a7(rgyud): ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus kyi 'khor lo'o// dbugs ni bcad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam drug kyang yod pa ma yin te// thig le bkag par gyur
209b1(rgyud): na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur// 'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rdul 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// spyod pa sgeg pa'i
209b2(rgyud): gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no// gtso ba'i dbugs la gza' mi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te// dbugs
209b3(rgyud): mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed// lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol du ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la// rang rang tshad/
209b4(rgyud): kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya// stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te// stong pa nam
209b5(rgyud): mkha' mkha' mtsho chu ga ter zla ba'i nyin nag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam klu'o// rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyim nag mkha' mkha' mam mkha' mkha' ma tho mig ga der nga skrag cad 'jug
209b6(rgyud): rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyim nag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dus dus kyi lha yi blon po 'jug/ nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig gi nyi zhag rnams kyis bkra
209b7(rgyud): shis 'jug pa ste// mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jam// mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda'
210a1(rgyud): yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der 'jug ste// de yi dus su rgyal po 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur// de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa
210a2(rgyud): yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur// gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mnga' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa// bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra
210a3(rgyud): mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o// de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i rna rnams ngag tu 'gyur// gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can
210a4(rgyud): gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang // lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsa ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams// zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha'
210a5(rgyud): ngag nyi rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dang // brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshogs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams// gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i
210a6(rgyud): rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams// brgyad cu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te// de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs
210a7(rgyud): la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing // gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi bskyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do// dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la
210b1(rgyud): gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur// khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste// sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde//
210b2(rgyud): mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa// rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya// gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag gi mchog
210b3(rgyud): gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur// de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes par 'gyur// shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba
210b4(rgyud): rjes su dran par 'gyur// shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams
210b5(rgyud): cad dus su gzhom du med par 'gyur// lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur// lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang
210b6(rgyud): kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur// de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur// rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshad
210b7(rgyud): bakhu ba 'bab pa rnams// srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal// rna ba sna dang mig la rnab gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung mi lce dang bcas
211a1(rgyud): pa dang // thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang // srog dang thur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa
211a2(rgyud): nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje pad+mas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed// rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig/
211a3(rgyud): tu 'gyur// de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin// zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang mir ba nyid//
211a4(rgyud): thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o// phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta
211a5(rgyud): bar srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go// zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyis ka yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po 'gags/
211a6(rgyud): chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs// dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid pa la gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa/
211a7(rgyud): deyi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro// khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dpas yi snying po sogs// rab tu dga'
211b1(rgyud): ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur// de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur/
211b2(rgyud): rin po che 'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur// lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab
211b3(rgyud): rdzogs 'gyur// sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang // skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la
211b4(rgyud): 'jug pa ste// sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhing mi g.yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o// sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug
211b5(rgyud): par byed// chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can la rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste// rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la// rnam gsum srid pa'i
211b6(rgyud): dbang gis gang zhig las kyi rlung gis bsnun pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus las can min par srid gsum skyed par mdzad pas rnam par gzigs nas mi
211b7(rgyud): gnyis ka ro mnyam dag pa'i rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste// so so re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams
212a1(rgyud): kyis bskor// sa la sogs pa'i rdul la ma lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mig yo sogs la rab zhugs rnams// de dag rnams dang thabs cig rdo rje sems
212a2(rgyud): dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs// yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin// srub par byed pas tha dad
212a3(rgyud): rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur kyi bar du srub par byed pa ste// slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnams so// dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen
212a4(rgyud): bo thams cad dag gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed// 'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so// de yi dbus su las /
212a5(rgyud): kyis ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur// lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba rnams// mtha' dag ri yi bdag/
212a6(rgyud): po'i shar ni dag pa'i in+d+ra nI la lho ni pad+ma rA ga ste// nub ni ka ra ke ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla ba chu shel lo// dbus ni ljang khu de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni
212a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po ste// dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbu ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no// de nas gzhan ni nyos 'gyur dag ste mnga' la bcu yis bsgyur
212b1(rgyud): bar gyur pa'i dpag tshad stong phrag go// de mi phyi rol dus rnams ngag gis 'khor ma 'ang ba de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no// 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rig byed 'bum rgyas
212b2(rgyud): rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro// brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skyes nas gzugs// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni
212b3(rgyud): mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur// de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying kha dang ni de nas lte gsang chu skyes de bzhin no// zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngarabarla dang dbyi
212b4(rgyud): yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te// brang phyed phyed bcas nyi mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so// nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang
212b5(rgyud): zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad// rig byed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rig byed ri khyed kyis// gtsug tor mgo bo'i 'og tu 'gyur te
212b6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni// shangs kyi 'og tu ko sko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus// de nas snying kha lte ba gsang/
212b7(rgyud): bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur// gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yi ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid// mdzod spu gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus
213a1(rgyud): su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang // dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o// byed/
213a2(rgyud): bcas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste// thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying kha la gnas lhan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o// gsum
213a3(rgyud): po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o// 'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo nyis 'gyur dag tu
213a4(rgyud): 'gyur// lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur// de bzhin lnga yi ri ba dag ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yin no//
213a5(rgyud): deyi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur// de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me dang rlung dang me lce dang bcas rdo rje 'breng ba'o// phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i
213a6(rgyud): bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus// gsung gi 'khor lo skra yi 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu phyed kyi mtshams// sgo khyud mthar ni
213a7(rgyud): dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams// phyed bcos nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje'i 'phreng ba'o// steng
213b1(rgyud): dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te spu dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// kun nas rlung gis bgrod pa'i dbang gis zad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhir drun
213b2(rgyud): rnams kyis// rtsibs brgyang mtshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur// sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis
213b3(rgyud): dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya// steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// pad+ma phyed la snying po'i dbus nas gsum
213b4(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang de nas 'phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug/ sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis nges par rab tu 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod
213b5(rgyud): rten gzugs 'di kun nas shes rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no// lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad po yang dag gnas pa ste// shar du ral grir 'gyur te ro/
213b6(rgyud): yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ril bu mig sman ro can// lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du'o// dbus su mchod phyir thogs pa dag
213b7(rgyud): ste lha dang mi yi bla ma'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do// nor bu gtsug tor da pral ba mgrin pa snying kha'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni// gcig gnyis chu gter mda'
214a1(rgyud): dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams ngag gis rim pas so// dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste thum pa dang ni rnam par skyes pani dang drag po la'o//
214a2(rgyud): dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs pa lang kha dang pad+ma'i gzugs// khyor ni de yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las// rwa ni khyon dang
214a3(rgyud): mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du steng rwa yi zlum po dag ni bzhi cha'o// phyi rol rA yi sum cha 'og ste steng du ba da rI yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o// dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma
214a4(rgyud): rdo rje yang ngo ba lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid// gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad// de yi byed kyis gdan gyi
214a5(rgyud): rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams// phyed dang gnyis mkhar phyir byung chu skyes snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o// pad+ma'i mtha' las chas/
214a6(rgyud): dman gzhi dang mnyam pa bral te de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o// gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams// gsang ba'i chu skyes dag
214a7(rgyud): las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te// gdan nas pad+ma'i sngon mtshams snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o// de nas
214b1(rgyud): gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang phyed bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum// gang na las rig byed dag gis pad+ma snying khar sor pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin
214b2(rgyud): te/ phyeng bcas brgyad kyis gdong pa'i tshang dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi 'phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang // mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral ba dag dang mgo bos de nas 'dir nigatsug tor dag gi mthar
214b3(rgyud): thug 'di// de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no// gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams
214b4(rgyud): yin no// lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dag dang 'dres pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no// rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te// nag
214b5(rgyud): po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang khu de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las byung ba'o// lan tshwa sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang khab rlung yin te// skyur dang bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar
214b6(rgyud): yang zhing gi rdo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang // sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams// sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni
214b7(rgyud): 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go/ sa yis gzugs gzer 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de me yis ni// 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i
215a1(rgyud): lta ba rab tu ltung ba 'phrog par byed// ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang // chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags/
215a2(rgyud): dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab// bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing // slar yang thams cad
215a3(rgyud): tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// rang gi nyid bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir/
215a4(rgyud): mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying po dkyil 'khor ro// phyi rol du ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa las gzhi la gnas mi rnams so// longs spyod/
215a5(rgyud): sa la gling drug bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams// rA la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung // gnod sbyir dang ni
215a6(rgyud): drag po 'og dang steng dang 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong // 'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung // nya dang lug dang glang
215a7(rgyud): dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni// gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa kaN Ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so// 'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs
215b1(rgyud): ka tsaT pa ta sa ring po thung ngu lhag pa'i lha// lug dang 'khrig pa karka Tar ni zla ba dkar po nyi ma seng ge bu mo srang rnams su// sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can
215b2(rgyud): sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro// de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni su nas phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye// 'gro ba 'di ni sems cad rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen
215b3(rgyud): kun gyis rab tu gang // gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan// mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems
215b4(rgyud): can rnams kyis mi mthong ste// gang zhig phal pa'i rtswa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur// yi dgas rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams
215b5(rgyud): dag gis kun ras gcod 'bigs so// 'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te// mngal ni rab tu bzung ba mdzad cing mchog
215b6(rgyud): gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni// nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te// sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad
215b7(rgyud): nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o// de phyir rgyal ba'i dag pa'i sku ni skyes shing ma nyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste// bcom ldan de
216a1(rgyud): yi thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no// de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las kyi sar gnas
216a2(rgyud): nyi ma kye// sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phrog lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no// gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med
216a3(rgyud): dag la rjes su chags// shi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te// mchod sbyir la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g.yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris
216a4(rgyud): 'jig rten dag tu 'jug/ 'jug ngogs lus po lhung las mchog gi go 'bang 'gro ba de rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma yin// de nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi
216a5(rgyud): ma gang pha ni gang // mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla chung ma sring mo rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang // bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis
216a6(rgyud): thar par 'gro 'gyur ba// de yis nyi ma khyod kyis thub pa rnams ni bdag gi chog las rigs gcig dag la 'jug pa mdzod// gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas sdug bsngal 'gyur
216a7(rgyud): nade la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can// dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi// 'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul te sems
216b1(rgyud): kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro bo'i me yis so// de phyir khro bo'o me 'di 'gro ba'i dgra bo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsad par gyur// chags las sdang sogs
216b2(rgyud): skyon te rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang 'grogs las so// de ni rtsa nas dbyung slad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin// de phyir sbyin
216b3(rgyud): la rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba bsod nams dag gi tshogs 'di ni// 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing thams cad dus su skye bo rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog
216b4(rgyud): chags pa gang gis sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste// sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig srung byed de ni skyob rnams ster
216b5(rgyud): bar byed// sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad// des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha min rnams kyis bya/
216b6(rgyud): ba dka' bar 'gyur// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin srog dang ni// gzugs la sogs dang mig la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las
216b7(rgyud): kyi dbang po lnga rnams te// phyugs dang bcas pa mi yi lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang // mi bdag dang bcas mi yi bla ma rigs dregs nga rgyal can khyod gang gis
217a1(rgyud): rigs ni thu bo yin// bsregs byas dang dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tut+ma ka ni me nyid do// rlung dang nam mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g.yo ba dang bcas ri bong
217a2(rgyud): can dang mtshal ni bdun pa yang // kA k+Shi kA shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang mkha' rlung me dang chu ni ldong ros pa bla ste// btsag ni sa 'o lan tshwa gang zhig ze tshwa rgya mtsho skyes dang rgya ma tshwa nag po thabs
217a3(rgyud): kyi tshwa 'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni nA ba sA ra ya bak+Sha ra sad dzi dang // tshul kA tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung mchu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no// rdo yi chu nis
217a4(rgyud): ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu dang me yi chu ni me// rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dag gi drug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin no// g+ha sgang ser po sa yi khams te shag tu ka dang ra can/
217a5(rgyud): nag po chu dang me dang rlung // nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes bya gzhan pa nye ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya// rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dung la sogs
217a6(rgyud): pa'i gzugs// de dag rnams kyi lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha dang khab len rnam pa bzhi// ro ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bug byed dang
217a7(rgyud): ni 'bugs byed min// grub pa lcags ni 'bugs par byed de slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed pa'o// gang zhig 'bugs byed min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur bar
217b1(rgyud): gyur pa dag gis kyang // lcags ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nang 'phrog rul ba'i lcags ni rnam par spangs nas so// dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste me la
217b2(rgyud): gnas shing bskol ba de ni rim pa yis// sgra dang rab tu 'phar ba yis te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur// sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang 'dab ma
217b3(rgyud): 'bugs byed 'dar dang bcas pa ste// 'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'bugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sbyar byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o// mchog gi sman gyi stobs dang ldan par rab tu
217b4(rgyud): 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhu ba'o// su zhig de rnams med na sa yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing ba dag ni gang zhig byed// bcings na mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing de bzhin zos na
217b5(rgyud): 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur// ye shes med nas bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// de dag rnams kyis rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon par sbyor
217b6(rgyud): bal yang 'god par 'gyur// gang zhig chung zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul la ma bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin// gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag
217b7(rgyud): gis bcings// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad// gang zhig byugs pas 'phral la zangs kyi 'dab ma'i dri ma 'phrog par byed pa dag
218a1(rgyud): ni sman yin te// mtha' dag nad 'phrog lcags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyis sa la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan dag rnams kyis 'di yi bcing
218a2(rgyud): bar rab tu 'gyur pa gang de nges par lo dus bar dang ni// bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig 'bugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro// sman rnams thams
218a3(rgyud): cad shin tu tsha ba'i ro rnams dag dang 'gyur byed sde dang sgyur ba'i sde rnams dang // bslang bar gyur pa'i rtsa ba mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste// dngul chu rnams
218a4(rgyud): ni dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o// gnyis sbyor tshal mching bu byi ba rta sen dug rnams kyis so snum gyis bran pas 'jam pa nyid// glang po mi yi chu ni lan
218a5(rgyud): bdun blugs pa dag gis chu shing tsi tra la sogs thal ba dang // 'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro ni sbyangs pa de rnams slu bar bya// yang nas yang du me yi tsha ba dag gis/
218a6(rgyud): slar yang lan brgyar slu bar bya zhing bskam par bya// de bzhin du nga gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang // lcags rnams zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi Da 'di ni
218a7(rgyud): dngul chu dag gi brgyad kyi cha shas 'gyur// khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad de ro yi snying khar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid// drag por bskol bas dri ma med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhus
218b1(rgyud): pas stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur// lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad kha sbyar byed// khyab byed sbyar ba de yang chen po dang bcas
218b2(rgyud): zha nye bsha' tshe spra tshil bcas pas 'jug pa ste// de ltar gang zhig dbus chu'i las ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag so sor byed pa na// dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci
218b3(rgyud): zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu grol// de yis mchog gi lus la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed// khru phyed gser gyi pad+ma nor gyi 'dab
218b4(rgyud): ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste// lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag tu dag pa'i in+d+ra nI la pad+ma rA ga chu shel lo// nub tu rin chen kar ke ta sde me dang lha min 'phrog byed du ni rnom
218b5(rgyud): po zangs dang dngul// rlung gi 'dab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag la skyes pa'i gdan ni lte ba la// snying por de steng gser las skyes pa'i dzaM b+ha la ni phyag gnyis ne'u le dang bcas
218b6(rgyud): mchog sbyin pa// 'dab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa'am dngul las skyes pa'i lha mo brgyad de chu skyes mchog sbyin phyag/ cod par sangs rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ste
218b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid// ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams rim pas so// dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su thun gsum
219a1(rgyud): zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas// oM ng+ku swA hA'i mtha' ste dbus su b+ha la dang bcas dza len+d+ra ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis// rgyal po rab dga' yid kyis gser 'gyur
219a2(rgyud): mkhan rnams dag gi srung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya// de ltar srung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro// so phag 'gyur byed sgyur ba'i sde
219a3(rgyud): rnams ngag gis nyi ma bcu ru ro ni mnye zhing bdug par bya// de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phyed nas bsre bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o// slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni
219a4(rgyud): ma phyed ro ni 'chi ste de yang de la bzhu bar bya// dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za na de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu za// zha nye rnon po ragan zangs dang lgang tsher skyes sam
219a5(rgyud): gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa// mnyam pa gcig tu bsregs pa'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni lhang tsher dkar po las skyes bsha' tshe mnyam// dang por drug cu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar
219a6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing de nas cha re bskyed pas 'phel bar bya// rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid nyid du rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag pa rab tu sbyin mi bya// phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang
219a7(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag/ de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang zhu ba 'di na pa'i mchog rnams kyis// mazhun ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du
219b1(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur// reg pa mchog gi sman rnams dag gis me la gnas pa ljang tsher lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur// lgang tsher dag las ljags ni brgyad 'gyur stobs/
219b2(rgyud): su 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na yang brgyad 'gyur ro// de yi sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro// de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro dang ro//
219b3(rgyud): rnams ji srid khol bar gyur kyi bar// ma yi nang du bskol bar bya ste de nas do ni 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs par rab tu 'gyur// reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi Di mnye ba dag dang dug
219b4(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur// 'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed gser ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur// slar yang gzhan ni gnyis dang sum 'gyur gser zhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul
219b5(rgyud): chu dag la blugs pas so// rdzas kyis don du zha nye brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bad nas blugs par bya// gser dngul bya ba dag la gser rnod sprul zangs zha nye mtshal dang ldong
219b6(rgyud): ros mu zi dag gis dang // bsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin ljang tsher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni bsreg bya dag gis bsad byas nas// mnyam pa'i 'gyur byang dug dang lan tshwa nye ba'i ro rnams ngag dang lcags dang
219b7(rgyud): mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni// mkhris pa skyur po dag gis nyin zhog bcu ru mnyes nas de ni rdo ba'i dbus su blugs byas te// sa yi nang du zatha ba drug tu steng du me dang bcas pas thams cad dus su bdug
220a1(rgyud): gyur pa// dngul chu de ni bcu drug cha yis dbyangs kyis drangs pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar// zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gser 'di gser/
220a2(rgyud): 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste// dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// 'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus
220a3(rgyud): dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i gzugs// de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya// de nas slar yang btags pa dang ni tshal
220a4(rgyud): 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni// lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas nyis 'gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya// nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur/
220a5(rgyud): te 'bras bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni// sman gyis bsad pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa dngul chu dang bcas dang // ba yi 'o ma gsar pa rnying pa sA li zan ni lo ma sbyar
220a6(rgyud): pos dman zhing lan tshwa dang // rnam bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o// stong phrag 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang bye ba 'bugs
220a7(rgyud): ba ji srid par yang shes byas nas// nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste nyungs kar cha las mtha' ma ske cha cha shas so// khang bzang dang ni sa yi khang ba grang ba rlung dang tshad pa dag dang
220b1(rgyud): bral bar rab tu 'gyur// 'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug gis lha yi lus po sna dkar gnyer ma ngag dang bral bar byed// kano Ti dang de bdA la tshagasum bri ha ti dang nim pA kA rA \u0f7fti k+Shi/ bskol ba/
220b2(rgyud): 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du sbyang bar gnas pa rab tu bya// de bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang b+halpA tA yi chu// ngan pa'i dri deng sa dang rdo ba dug gi sha
220b3(rgyud): dang brtag pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags pas so// gang zhig zos na drag tu brgyal ba ster byed drug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te// phye mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang /
220b4(rgyud): rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid// gsal ba mi phyugs sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma yin// de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang
220b5(rgyud): yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur// ngarjod pa la sA li paN+Di chu skyes sA ri dag gi rang lus 'dab ma'i khu ba yis// ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len snod du lcags kyi nyin zhag gsum dag tu
220b6(rgyud): yang mnyes byas nas// gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin zhag so so'i dus su Ti ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni za byed pa// de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nang las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis ma
220b7(rgyud): lon dbyibs// bok+ka Na dang bar snang shak+Sha ki ri'i mchu yis rab g.yo dngul chu dag kyang gsad par bya// sman gzhan dag gis bsad pa la ni dmar reng lteng tsher skyes dang gser dang khab len mnyam
221a1(rgyud): pa dag/ gcig tu byas nas srog bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste// sngar brjod khab len snod du chur khu dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra
221a2(rgyud): dkar 'phrog/ zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang // zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu dag la sa ni lus la dngos grub tu
221a3(rgyud): yang rab tu 'gyur// thun mong ba dang 'bring po 'jig pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste// mchog dman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skyes pa gcig gi rjes
221a4(rgyud): 'bugs dag las min// gang na 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyi zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod// ral gri dag la pad+ma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter
221a5(rgyud): ni gsal bar byed// der ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung po'i bdag po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya// ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur kyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la rdzas kyi
221a6(rgyud): dngos grub bo// dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa skye gnas drug gi sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni
221a7(rgyud): zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya// klu mo rnams ni bsgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya// mkha' 'gro ma rnams bsgrub pa byas nas mchog
221b1(rgyud): tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya// klu la sogs rngams bsgrub pa byas nas rab mchog sgra dang mi rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya// du ba la sogs bsgrub pa/
221b2(rgyud): byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dog ni bsgrub par bya// srog la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par bya// dam pa'i bde ba
221b3(rgyud): bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya// sems can rnams la 'tsho ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste// 'dod
221b4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod bya min pa de yang srid gsum gnas su bsam gtan bgrod bya'o// ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje pad+ma bde bas byin rlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid// de lta
221b5(rgyud): de ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam ster gyur cig/ sgra gcan me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod des chu sreg za rlung dang stong pa gang // lnga po dag go gza' yi
221b6(rgyud): tshogs pa cig shos dag ni drug po lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams su// gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga por phyi rol dag tu gsungs// snying stobs la sogs
221b7(rgyud): yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid// pad+ma rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go de las ni// gang zhig rus pa la
222a1(rgyud): sogs mtha' dag rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste// lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga pa'o//
222a2(rgyud): de rnams tshogs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya// sa 'dzin de nyid rnam dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang // dbye ba
222a3(rgyud): drug cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bug la drug dang zla ba'i grangs// de dag thams cad bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang // gza' rnams
222a4(rgyud): dag gi rgyu ba gang de slar yang cig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma yi rgyu bar brjod// ye shes nam mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang // nyon mongs/
222a5(rgyud): bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni slar yang nges par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams ngag dang // mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par// bsdu/
222a6(rgyud): pab bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang /
222a7(rgyud): de bzhin phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni// bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so so'i legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams
222b1(rgyud): dang bug pa zhes bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten
222b2(rgyud): 'brel dag/ skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag gong bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa yis sangs rgyas chos// rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang
222b3(rgyud): brgyad cu ste// khyab bdag mchog gi go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yis ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin// zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig pa phyogs dang bgrod
222b4(rgyud): pa dag ni gnyis// 'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod// mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug/
222b5(rgyud): gza' dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yin no// rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig go// nyi ma lus med
222b6(rgyud): ma nu srid pa gang dang chos dang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel// nyes pa 'di dag bco brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog mim lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// de nyid ces grangs nyi shu rtsa lngayin
222b7(rgyud): te gnyis skyes zhes pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste// dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du/
223a1(rgyud): ma lus par yang mngon sum gsungs// de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyud ni bla ma ste// dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i
223a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par brjod pa'o zla ba bzang // gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang // reg bya gzugs dang
223a3(rgyud): sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching dang grol dang byed po med// sa bon dang ni bsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med//
223a4(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing byed pa rnams bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu da pe zla med cing thams cad du 'gro spros pa med//
223a5(rgyud): brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs// 'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag
223a6(rgyud): gi rgyur gyur pa// rigs pa la sogs rnal 'byor ngag gi bgrod bya mchog pa de'i go 'phang dus kyi 'khor la phyag 'tshalo// spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis
223a7(rgyud): dag go gzi brjid can// ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phang bgrod byed rnam par bcad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong 'dzin pa las
223b1(rgyud): 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas// bdud rtsis 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lnga
223b2(rgyud): yis yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te// dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzang rnams las mi bzad pa// gang gis las gang
223b3(rgyud): rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de bskyed pa// 'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can snying gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo//
223b4(rgyud): gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon dang mdun dang rgyab// steng 'og kun nas dI kar ljang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te zung
223b5(rgyud): du ring po dang // shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min// gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+hag khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud//
223b6(rgyud): gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag ste// de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med//
223b7(rgyud): de ma nyes pa yis bdag ni mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes pa chen po'o// de nyid sems can rnams la thar pa bde mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams ngag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so//
224a1(rgyud): sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs par bzang po dag la dus gsum phyag mi byed// mi shes gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus
224a2(rgyud): gsum du ni maN+Dal mi byed pa'o// myur du mnar med 'gro ba gang zhing bde mnyam ster byed bla ma skyo ba skyed pa po// shes rab ye shes 'thob pa gang yin ma nyams gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i
224a3(rgyud): zhabs ni mi spong ba'o// nyams pa gang yin gang zhig rtsa gsum dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni mtha' yas dus su gsod pa'o// dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lam la srog dang thur sel
224a4(rgyud): rlung ni gsod byed pa'o// sprin bdag gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs thams cad ster// ma rabs gang yin gang zhig sla byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i
224a5(rgyud): sems dang g.yo sgyu can// dpal ldan dpal ni chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btud pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa// de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhugs pas zla ba'i zhu ba rtogs pa
224a6(rgyud): na sems camangoran gyi sbrang du mi lo bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa gang // de yang di lta bdag gis de rnams A li kA li nyu ngu'i rgyud du bkod do nyim kye// sangs rgyas kyis ni
224a7(rgyud): gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis 'phreng 'dzin sdeb sbyor bcings pas brjod// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid du mdzod// ji ltar
224b1(rgyud): nyim dang bcas thub pa rigs ni shes rab me shes thob pa 'dis sa zung gyur pa// rnas gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams na ngas kyi 'khor mo 'dzin las bsto 'gyur ba yon//
224b2(rgyud): nyig khyong ngam mi dbang byim gyur pa'i grong byar dus kyi 'khor mo'i rnal 'byor gcig las n-i// tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes pa yi bdag po grags pa bdag la yang sa
224b3(rgyud): bdag gi dga' ma ni// dpal ldan sgrol ma'o pang dkar can ni yon tan kun gter 'jig rten mgon po chu skyes mtshan ma can// ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad
224b4(rgyud): ngor ni ji lta bzhin du ltos// ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang bzhin la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji ltar bzhin mthong nas// thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang
224b5(rgyud): lag pa dag gis ni// rigs ldan zhabs kyi pad+mar phyag dag 'tshal nas spras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs rjes yis// thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas/
224b6(rgyud): mi shes lam la gnag par mdzod// khyod ni rgan yang gnon du mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sgras po yin yang thog mar drang po'i sangs rgyas khyod// bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyong sden mchog gi thugs rje dag
224b7(rgyud): gis 'jig rten gnyen teg shin rje'i dgra khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'brog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud / khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du
225a1(rgyud): grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug/ tshangs pa'i rigs las khyim bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btung bar gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar spyad// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i sla /
225a2(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas// rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi mas bdag gis btung dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka lA par// khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma dag la 'jigs
225a3(rgyud): rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi// sa ga'i zla ba'i nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la// thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs
225a4(rgyud): gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin// dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems
225a5(rgyud): can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur cig/ sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rjes dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas// sras po pad+ma dkar po
225a6(rgyud): rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la gnang ba stsal ba nges par ni// dang por khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag ma tshang med pa glegs bam dag la gnas pa dang // de nas rang gi 'dod pas
225a7(rgyud): 'grel bshad byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen// gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mi
225b1(rgyud): mi 'dig rten dag byogs dang phyogs bral du gnam mthara' rgyam po budur mor bcas pa rnams/ gang dgas 'ogang pa na ga dengs can bang ba ga don chogs ming gebasas cad dus su tsho byed/
225b2(rgyud): pa 'de dag thams cad nyin nags so'i dus smra mo shes 'jig rten kun nas skyong bar byed gyur cig/ rgyud ni pal lhung dus kyi 'khor lo shin tu bsdus pa ma lus rdo rjes pas dpa' sag pa
225b3(rgyud): ljang thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje dag gi de nyid rnam pa bcu drug pa// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba'i bdage pos gsungs shing bdag gis kyang dri
225b4(rgyud): bstan pa gang // bsod nams de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud gyur cig/ dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba dpal dus kyi
225b5(rgyud): 'khor lo las/ ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
225b6(rgyud): kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas
225b7(rgyud): spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du/ mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang / dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul
226a1(rgyud): khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims ngar gyis don gyi chal legs par dpyad cing bskul te/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprong ba'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong //
226a2(rgyud): shong ston gyis/ dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya pe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// gang gis thugs dgongs rnam par dag
226a3(rgyud): pa yis// 'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang // bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gang thob des// kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog/
226a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ka la tsakra ut+ta ra tan+t+ra rA dza tan+t+ra hrid ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes
226a5(rgyud): bya ba/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ltar chos dbyings dkyil 'khor dri med sku la 'jam dpal gyis ni dge dang mi dge bas// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag lha
226a6(rgyud): rnams dang ni dmyal ba nyid ces gang thob pa// rgyal mchog pho brang sham bA lar grags ka lA pa ru ngag gi dbang phyug seng ge yi// gdan la bzhugs nas rgyal pos rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang
226a7(rgyud): thub pa rnams la gsal bar bsdam// byung gyur ces sogs bden de lha mchog bla ma khyab 'jug lha yi dbang phyug lha yi dbang po dang // zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan me lha sa steng lha yul nam mkhar
226b1(rgyud): bsod nams sdig las 'byung // mi rnams pa rol srid par mi dgas dmyal ba gang zhig bkag pa sha yi dam tshig cam/ rig byed pa dang thod pa can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de ri brdzu /
226b2(rgyud): gang du ga can chen bdun la sogs pa dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang der// sgreng la sngar gyi lus po spangs nas lus gnan bsam pas nges par 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni
226b3(rgyud): thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsong byed za ba'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur// sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang lha las sa steng 'dir ltung de ri bden pa ste// bzang
226b4(rgyud): po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rigs byed zhi chos khyab 'jug ches bla ma// sha yi kha zas bkag la sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud// rdzogs sangs
226b5(rgyud): rgyas kyis bco lnga sogs par bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas byang chub ni// sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sha mi bza' zhing bdag gi ba yis rtag tu bsrung mi bya// srog chags
226b6(rgyud): rnams la srog chags 'du shes gsod pa'i yid kyis nye bar brtsams pas 'dir nyams pa// yan lag lnga yos srog gcod 'gyur gyi nam mkha' tsam ni srog chags rnams kyi byed
226b7(rgyud): bo min// srog gcod lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyu rnams gsum gyis 'grub la de la longs spyod cing // skyed byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po srog chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas/
227a1(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur// seng ge sprul dang ri le stag dang bya rog skye gnas yan lag lnga yi srog gcod 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni skye dgu rnams ni byed nga ba byed du 'jug dang
227a2(rgyud): yi rang gsum gyis 'gyur// dge slong snying rje med pas lce la sha yi ro myong ro la rjes su tshol byed cing // bdag nyid gsod pa la sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang ni dmyal
227a3(rgyud): par 'gro// dge slong nad pa la ni sman pas sha bstan na yang bya khwa rnams kyis bsang ba dang // pha yi ched du bsad dang mchod sbyin thogs dang me dang chu dang mazhu'i skyon gyis shi ba rnams// sbyor ba 'di
227a4(rgyud): rnams med par gyur na gang du de tshe bza' bar bya bar gsungs pa rnams// dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni stobs bcu ldan pas nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi bslur min// sha la sogs pa zos na nges
227a5(rgyud): par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnams su sdug bsngal 'gyur// srog chags yi dgas la sogs skye gnas dka' thub khyim pa rgyal po nges par rang khyim du// gzhan gyi khyim dang chung ma longs
227a6(rgyud): spyod dang ni bu mo gnyer 'dun tshogs dang rang khyim rnams// shi ba rnams kyi lus ni gang yi ni chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs ni gang // 'dir ni rdol gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang
227a7(rgyud): rig bya nyid ni rnam par blta// mtho sor shes pa yod la rang gzhan rnam par bral ba nyid las rdo ba'i mtho yor phung por 'gyur// sa steng gnas su srog chags rnams kyi rigs pa nyams
227b1(rgyud): ba'i lus la'ang yong pa nyid// srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni rang gzhan rnam par bral bar legs par sang las shes/ shas b+hA la yi nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs phung po khams dang /
227b2(rgyud): dbang po 'gro ba rnams// 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa phung po thams cad rdul phran rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te// longs spyod byed pa rnam par rig pa tsam te rang gnan bral bachog
227b3(rgyud): med de rnams kyis// longs spyod byed min srog chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sang 'gyur ba// zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus kyi me dang mun pa gcig pu snang bar byed pa yang /
227b4(rgyud): sa sogs dri sogs mig la sogs dang gzhu dang char pa glog dang rlung sogs drug pa gnyis// de ni lus la phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba drug pa gnyis// de rnams longs
227b5(rgyud): spyod byang po sog chags byung po gnyid log gyur 'dir sdang byed kyis brlang ba// b+h+yo yi bdag dang nang gi bdag dang gsum pa mchog gi bdag rnams tho non pa las rab byung // sbrul sku longs
227b6(rgyud): sku dang de ba ni na chos kyi sku rnams pazhi po las ni rab tu byung // khong stong mi ma ring gcig pu mchog gyur 'byung ba las gyur tsam gyis gsum sogs thim par 'gyur// de bzhin gsum la
227b7(rgyud): sogs pa gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyings su ngas par thim par 'gyur// phung po khams dang dbang po'i ya lag skye mched mun ba stug po sdang ba 'od kyi mingag/ rnam par shes pa
228a1(rgyud): srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar gtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos// dri rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod min mkha' tsam rdul phran chos kyi dbyings/
228a2(rgyud): la gnas// gang phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sogs pa sangs rgyas skyabs gsum la sogs pa// yan lag nang nas nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar yang len pa dang
228a3(rgyud): ni sred pa yang // las ni 'du byed srid par 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung bcas rgyu chos sdug bsngal ni// rnam shes la sogs rnam pa lngar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis
228a4(rgyud): pa yang yin// gsum las zung la zung las dpag tu med pa'i srid par chos bdun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams// shing las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i
228a5(rgyud): nyon mongs pa las las// de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgyu las byung // chos rnams 'gag pa med pa nam mkha' tsam las 'byung ba'ang
228a6(rgyud): med pa nyid pas de yi phyir// srog chags srog gi rdul phran phung por bcas shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min// sbyin pa la sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa gtong zhing byang chub
228a7(rgyud): phyogs kyi stong pa nyid// gang zhig de dag byed pa por 'gyur rgyal mchog sras bcas srog chags rnam gyi bdud kyi ris// de las phung po rnams las de las slar yang srid gzhan 'pho min phung
228b1(rgyud): po'i mtshams sbyor na/ mar me kha tor tu dang dri mang chu dang ska dang nyis rgyu shes sa bon gyur// gang du rgyal ba rnams kyi chos su dkar ba chos kyi tshogs sas byung ngo zhes pab sa
228b2(rgyud): chos las longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams te// phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu 'gyur med bde ba chos sku min zhing de mi phyir// gang zhig sku mi
228b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid 'dir ni sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpon klu yis gang gsungs pa// gang zhig gcig min du ma min la rang dang bdag gzhan la phan tshun tshogs chen po'i rten gyur pa// dngos med dngos
228b4(rgyud): po med min nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rnam par dpyad dka'i rang bzhin nyid// gos med rnam par 'gyur med zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab la spros pa med// dpe med so sor
228b5(rgyud): rang gis rig bya rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam mi khyab pa legs spyad 'bras bu bdag nyid phun sum tshogs// blo ldan chen por
228b6(rgyud): gyur pa mnyes pa'i rgyur gyur 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs gsungs mdzad cing // 'jig rten kun la khyab pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// longs spyod/
228b7(rgyud): rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal po chen por gnas pa de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig sems can rnams kyi smin pa'i rgyur gyur la lar me bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang // slar yang la lar
229a1(rgyud): mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi ba gang mthong ba/ rnam pa du mar 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi thabs kyis 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms/
229a2(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i rjes su 'jug pa don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid//
229a3(rgyud): dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog tu 'i la rang bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis rtogs bya ba// rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la zhib mi mnyam mnyam par khyab cing mtshan ma med pa nyid// mi mnyam
229a4(rgyud): bde ba rnam par mi rtog sku gcig rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas rdul phran yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams su// zla ba nyi ma
229a5(rgyud): la sogs skye gnas lha yul sa steng nam mkha' rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar// bud med skye gnas chos kyi dbyings su bde 'gro ngan 'gro dus kun tu ni rnam par bzhugs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
229a6(rgyud): srog chags phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan pa bsod nams sdig pa'i mthus// khu ba khrag dag rig ma'i b+ha ga'i pad+mar chud cing srog gi rlung dang rtsol ba'i rlung // de ni ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin
229a7(rgyud): can du 'gyur ba'i skyes bu rig ma yang dag ldan// yul gyi yon tan las byung de longs spyod pa'i gzugs sku ma yi khams la rab brten pa// skyes pa bud med ma ning lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal
229b1(rgyud): ba thub pa rang las mthu las byung // gang gi de nyid de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum go 'bang yang ni gcig tu gsang ba yi// zhal brgya rigs 'dzin dbang po zla ba sa sogs yul dang yul can bdag
229b2(rgyud): po chos kyi dbyings// zhal brgya pa de rgyu las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i tshogs rnams la// de la tshor ba gsum la sogs pa nub par 'gyur ba sku bzhin myur du 'gro
229b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// gang zhig lnga dang gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis khams rnams rgyas btab
229b4(rgyud): des/ gcig gi du ba'i khams las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa sor mo'i tshogs rnams gang zhig tu// thams cad zla ba'i rgyu las mchog gi rigs brgya rgyas btab skyes pa dang ni bud
229b5(rgyud): med dag/ rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang ni 'jig rten rdul gyi phung po ste// srog gi rgyu ni dbyangs yig la sogs rang bzhin kyang ni 'jig pa med pa srog gi khams// khru
229b6(rgyud): ba'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni las yin rdul ni srog chags phung po yi// de yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu las 'bras bus bzhan du// rang gi las kyi phung po/
229b7(rgyud): lngar longs spyod cing slar yang gzhan du'ang slar yang sogs par byed// de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges par brgya yis las kyi phung po zad pa min// gcer bu la ni las kyi phung po rnam par
230a1(rgyud): 'jig 'gyur sreg byed me ni 'ba' zhig gis// dkar po'i bsam gtan dgra bcom sngags dang bstod pa nges pa brgya phrag sems can lus ngag las// pad+ma khyab byed/
230a2(rgyud): snying po'i ze'u 'bru'i dbang phyug dgra bcom thig le bzang po sgom par byed// de dbus lus po sbas pa rtse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas gsal bar byed pa can// lha rnams gsang ba'i
230a3(rgyud): mdzod gyur mchog gi go 'phang 'di ni brgya byin rgyal po mchod 'os pa// bsam gtan 'di ni sreg blugs zabs ma lus lus kyi phung po sreg par 'gyur ba mthong // gang zhig gnod
230a4(rgyud): pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig 'phel 'gyur// gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig nyams 'gyur//
230a5(rgyud): gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams//
230a6(rgyud): gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel//
230a7(rgyud): gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshar du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du yi sdig pa 'phel/
230b1(rgyud): gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'phel/ re/
230b2(rgyud): bzhin sha dang chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams dang nges par khro bo nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur// gang
230b3(rgyud): zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin tshul
230b4(rgyud): khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du 'gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du// shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye shes rdo rje rnams// dngos dang dngos med byed
230b5(rgyud): po bsgribs dang ram mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bdag/ nam mkha' med na byed po gnas min 'dir ni gang zhig stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig/ sems can rnams kyi byed por ma
230b6(rgyud): byas bsod nams sdig pa dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha rnams longs ma spyod par 'jig pa min// so sor sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs
230b7(rgyud): bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas stong nyid bsgom par gsungs// mtshan mo du ba la sogs sbyor bas slar yang nyin mo nam mkha' 'bar ba la sogs pas// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor
231a1(rgyud): pa yis dus gsum dngos po nam mkha'i dkyil du son par mthong // bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin tu sems brtan byas pas phyi rol dngos po rnam par spog/
231a2(rgyud): srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi ma zla ba bral nas mun par rgyu bar byed// dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig le 'dzin par byed// rjes su dran
231a3(rgyud): pas rang gis gzugs las zla ba bzhin du nam mkhar 'od mang 'phrog par byed// ting nge 'dzin gyis khu ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo bor dri med bde bas rang gang 'gyur// nam mkhar
231a4(rgyud): bltas pas gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te sna tshogs stong pa nyid mthong bas// nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags 'jig par 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkag pas so//
231a5(rgyud): yan lag med par bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te khu ba dri med bde ba yis// sna rtser bltas pas nga rgyal 'jig par 'gyur te gzhom du med pa tshangs pa'i gsung las so// srog dang
231a6(rgyud): rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma bral ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// gsang ba lte ba snying kha mgrin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams su rim bzhin sa zung re// khu ba gyen du song zhing khrag/
231a7(rgyud): kyang 'og tu 'gro la tshangs dbyangs gzhom du med pa las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dri ma gsum dang bral ba gang gis ston pa sangs rgyas nyid// khyi la sogs pa'i sha li mig dang rang bzhin yon/
231b1(rgyud): tan dbang gis lha la sogs pa'i lha yi spyan// rang rgyal nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas spyan te gsum pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drim bral
231b2(rgyud): brnam dag bzhin pa shes rab spyan du 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan// rgyu mthun dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin pas
231b3(rgyud): na nges par rdo rje 'dzin// lus kyi sa bon khu ba phab ste 'khor lo 'dzin pa lte ba'i 'khor lo'i bde ba gang // mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pa yi snying kha sgra bcas bde ba mgon po 'khor ba 'jig
231b4(rgyud): gang gis mgrin par de rig g.yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin// gang gis mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral bde ba shes rab 'dzin// gtsug tor tshangs pa'i bu
231b5(rgyud): gar 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang ba// gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'// de ni dpag med gang gis rig pa
231b6(rgyud): mgo bor rdo rje dang bcas drug pa rdo rje sems// snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la// dri bra la sa yi thig le mgo bo'i skyes bu de ni chu dang nyi ma mgrin
231b7(rgyud): par yang // sgra gcan me dang rnam smin snying kha sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang lte ba mjug rings te// gsang ba'i 'khor lor mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stong pa can ni stong pa mun pa'i khams// gang zhig
232a1(rgyud): mig la sogs pa yul can drug po lha mo rnams las sa snying la sogs gang // gzugs ni phung po la sogs gang zhig yul drug rnams kyang lha ru brtags pa de rnams kyi/
232a2(rgyud): dag pa'i dbang po la sogs yul can drug po gang zhig gnod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa// de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yul drug rnams kyang sngon mo la sogs de rnams so// gang zhig
232a3(rgyud): khro bo gshin rje gshed ni zla ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa// nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom 'gyur gang zhig khro bo pad+ma mthur byed do// sgra gcan dang bcas srog rlung rab
232a4(rgyud): bcom pas gang zhig khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ste// mjug rings dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa gang zhig khro bo shes rab mthar byed do// srog rlung 'gags pas phyag gnyis dgyes
232a5(rgyud): rdor zhi ba 'dir ni nga rgyal 'joms pa rdo rje sems// srog rlung bkag pas phyag bzhi pa yi dgyes rdor byin za zhe sdang 'joms la byang chub sems// dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i 'dod chags 'joms
232a6(rgyud): pabazhal gsum phyag drug dbang phyug sems dpa' chen por 'gyur// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi gti mug 'joms pas tshangs pa bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems// lte bar srog rlung
232a7(rgyud): bkag pas dri ma gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas nyid// snying khar bkag pas dri ma gsum bral byang chub sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid// mgrin par nyim de ni
232b1(rgyud): drim gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur// dpral ba rlung gi dbang po 'gags pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' stor pa'i sras// lte ba'i 'khor lor
232b2(rgyud): mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtsa bzhi dang // sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan ro la ro yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum// lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu
232b3(rgyud): brgyad dang lag mthil sor tshig dum bu rnams// 'khor lo drug gi rtswa rnams 'dir ni nyis 'gyur bde mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la// gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnabs su 'pho ba rnam par bral
232b4(rgyud): dang de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lor brgyad// mgrin par sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i 'khor lo ru// gang zhig zla ba'i cha yis gang ba mgo bor dkar po de 'dir
232b5(rgyud): gsang bar dkar po'i cha// 'khor lo'i rtsi rnams kyang ni mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba dus kyi 'khor lo lhag pa'i lhas// dus ni drug cus lhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gsum ste tshigs mtshams
232b6(rgyud): rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku// rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyug gu nam mkha' lag pa rgyal po de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs// zla ba'i cha shas sum cu nam mkha' nam mkha' gdengs car zla ba'i rtsa ni
232b7(rgyud): zla bzang po// rtsa dang ba spu gang zhig ma lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'i ming can te// rdo rje chu dang bshang ba khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yis bldag par 'gyur// byams pa'i
233a1(rgyud): tshems kyis gtong dang lag pa rkang pa'i sha rnams zos pas des na drag po la// mngon shes lnga yi zhal chen yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams zos pas des na seng ge ste/
233a2(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum bral dus kyi 'khor lo spyan gsum pa// dpal ldan 'dus par sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu lus byung //
233a3(rgyud): der ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lha ru rtag tu bdud kyi res la gsal bar mdzad// rtsa dang sha dang rus pa khu ba khrag rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas// srog chags
233a4(rgyud): so so'i sangs rgyas lha yul bar snang sa steng rang rang gnas su gtso bo'i gnas// mdor byas brdzun gyi rim pas 'gyur la yul dang yul can sgrub byed rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin// rang
233a5(rgyud): byin rlabs pas srog rlung ri bong can du bzhin pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod// 'dir ni lnga bzung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus par yang // bdud
233a6(rgyud): rnams yang dag bzung phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas lha yis bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu yi lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs las
233a7(rgyud): skyes skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur gyi yid tsam min la btags pa dang ni bdag kyang ngo // bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis// bsam
233b1(rgyud): gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod mir lha yul sa steng bsod nams tshul khrims rnam par dman// stobs bcu mchog dang ldan pas rdzogs pa'i lha dag chos kyi dbyings la yang dag gnas pa de/
233b2(rgyud): bsten par bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mnga' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhags pas bsgrub pa min// bkug cing 'dir ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdung zhing lag pa bcing ba yi// bsam
233b3(rgyud): gtan 'dis ni dge ba rnam par bral nas bdud rnams shi nas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma gsum dang bral zhing sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa// de ni/
233b4(rgyud): shin tu dri zhim me tog dri dang spos dang mar me dang ri lnga bshos dang // gsang sngags bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis bster bya sgrub pa po la rab dgyes nas// sa 'og 'jig rten lha yul
233b5(rgyud): sa steng bar snang rnams su grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su srog gi gsang sngags gang zhig ni// zla ba gcig la nam mkha' nam mkha'
233b6(rgyud): stong pa brang 'gro dus ro mur par dbyer med bzlas// steng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lam gsum bral nas srog rlung gang bas rlung dag khyer bzhin pas// grub par 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur nam
233b7(rgyud): mkhar 'gro bas rig pa 'dzin pa de// bsod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal srid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong // ye shes don du dus gsum dngos po stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mi
234a1(rgyud): g.yo brel blo byed cing // tshul khrims don du khu ba rdo rje mgo bor khyer la mgo nas tshangs pa'i bu ga ru// bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims yang dag drim rnam par bral
234a2(rgyud): nas rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// shin tu skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal srid sems kyis ster ba len pas longs mi spyod// yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin yang gang zhig len pas long
234a3(rgyud): spyod min// sha dag sems kyis byin yang gang zhig sha yi dam tshig can gyis len pas longs spyod min// de yis byang chub sems dpa' gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tshe dman rigs cis mi 'gyur// /
234a4(rgyud): byams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs dus su chang gi don du chang 'tshong khyim du 'gro// nyin phyed dus su mchog gi thugs rjes nya yi don du nye ba rnams kyi tshong dus su// dgongs kyi dus su bud med
234a5(rgyud): la 'jug phyir du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro// chang nya bud med rnams kyi dri ma gsum bral a ba d+hU tI dman rigs cis ma yin// gang dag dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya ba ni gcig pu
234a6(rgyud): nyid du dam 'cha' la// gang gis bsgrub bya med pa nyid la brtan g.yo'i 'gro ba yod pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba// gang tshe gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min// gal
234a7(rgyud): te spu bya gzhan la gtan tshigs kyang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bca' nyams// sgra rnams rtag par dam bca' nam mkha' lta bur byas pa'i lus meng par grub de bzhin du// sgra rnams mi rtag dam
234b1(rgyud): bca' bum pa lta bur byas te shin tu rtsol bas byung ba'i phyir// nam mkha' las ni rtag par grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams mi rtag nges par grub// gzugs dang reg bya ni dang ro la yul rnams/
234b2(rgyud): bzhin du lnga pa sgra yang cis ma yin// de ni gang gi thog mar rtogs pas sa steng bar snang khams su sgra des slar yang ni// rna bas don rnams rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de ri sgra rnams rtag pa nyid yin
234b3(rgyud): lo/ gang gis thog mar don rtogs gyur pas sa steng bar snang khams su slar yang de tshul gyis// rna bas don rnams nges par rtogs par gyur pas de ci gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam// rtag pa
234b4(rgyud): gsal bya gcig pu yon tan ma lus rang bzhin sgra zhig rna ba'i bug par gnas// mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs nas slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la// gang zhig brjod pa gcig gis
234b5(rgyud): nyan byed rna ba'i bu gar sgra yi ku cor 'gyur mir ram// rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min// dngos po'i byed po'i rgyur ni slar yang mur pa gsal bar
234b6(rgyud): byed pa gzhan na gnas pas ni// rtag pa mngon par gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'dir ni byas pa ste// byas pa dang ni gzhan pa gang dag chos mi mthur pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin//
234b7(rgyud): chos mi mthun par de phyir byas pa rnams ni yod par 'gyur la cig shos de med do// gang zhig mngon par gsal bya'i rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed de ni ci yis rgyu ma yin// mun par thim par gyur pa gang dag de
235a1(rgyud): yis mngon par gsal byas de yi 'bras bu ces ma yin// sgra dang don dag gal te gcig par gyur na de tshedodan nyams pan sgra nyams 'gyur// spyi dang gsal ba'ang de bzhin/
235a2(rgyud): 'gyur te nam mkha' tsam dang gzhan pa nyid dang gcig pa nyid// stong pa sgra dang ldan par gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum por rtag tu sgra med 'gyur// gang gis nam mkha' yod pa nyid na brtan dang
235a3(rgyud): g.yo ba'i 'gro ba des na med pa nyid// gal te nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dag chos mi mthun las grub gyur na// de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra min dman par nges par sgrub pa po
235a4(rgyud): la nges par 'gyur// nam mkha' sa steng dag tu gza' dang rgyu skar dag dang byol song dang ni mi rnams dang // lha dang srin po dang ni rang gi rigs kyi da ma tshig can gyi yi dgas lha min klu// sngags kyi yi ge
235a5(rgyud): rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi// don gcig du ma'i sgra yis kha cig tu yung don rnams mang po de ni sgra gcig gis// dngos med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang
235a6(rgyud): g.yo ba'i dngos po rgyu rnams las ni grub pas na// dpe ni nam mkha'i me tog dang ni sa dang shing dang me tog de der rang rang grub// mo ga sham bu mo nam mkha' tsam las skyes pa nam mkhar 'gyur la bu ldan las
235a7(rgyud): skyes pa// bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran phung po'i sa bon las// sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid khyad par rnams ni phyi dang tha dad min// gal te lha gcig rab tu 'jig par gyur
235b1(rgyud): na de che tha dang gzugs dang lhan cig tu// sa dang chu dang ma rnams lha mo de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jig pa min// srog chags ma ma'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi lda ma/
235b2(rgyud): te/ sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig rnam lnga'i bdag nyid lus// lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnams rnam lnga der ni mthong min yod ces grags// srog chags
235b3(rgyud): rnams ni sngon gyi lus po spangs nas slar yang lus gzhan bsam pas 'dzin par 'gyur// gang zhig sa la sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi sngon gyi lus po zhig pas rab 'dzin 'gyur// srog chags
235b4(rgyud): gzugs gzhan glog gi 'phreng ba chen po bzhin du rab tu rgya chen gzugs can te// sprin bor nas ni bar snang dag la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis 'gro//
235b5(rgyud): srog chags srog dang lhan cig bem po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba la sogs rab ldan pa// srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig rnams su dag dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig pu kho nar 'gro// gcig min rnam
235b6(rgyud): balnga po yul dang bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid ni// nam mkha' las 'das mi gsal min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min nus pa dman pa min// sems las 'dod pas rang
235b7(rgyud): bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min cing srog rlung med na sems med la// srog chags sems dang lhan cig bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel pas 'jug/ phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni bems po
236a1(rgyud): ngag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag dang // phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gyur par rab tu 'byung bas na// ther zug pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas
236a2(rgyud): de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams 'gyur bar nges pa yin// thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur yang ra gang zhig rtag pa nyid ri 'gyur ba med// zer zug pa dang ther zug dman pa'i
236a3(rgyud): skyes bu khyab bdag gis ri srid sgrub la bshad de// phan tshun ltos phyir rigs pa dang ni rigs bdag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa dag
236a4(rgyud): kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa dag kyang bya ba yang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam ste sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i
236a5(rgyud): khams// gzugs dang reg bya sgra dang dri dang bcas pa'i bde ba rdul phran phung por gyur pa min// rnam par shes las 'bras bu'i dngos po rab byung ba las min zhing me dang 'dren mas min//
236a6(rgyud): sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin la sogs par 'gyur gyi rang las min zhing rgyu med min// rkang dang rus pa chu ba sha dang khu khrag tshil bu pags pa rdul phran phung po min// rnam par rig pa tsam zhig spangs
236a7(rgyud): nas slar yang srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro// der ni lus len slar yang srid pa gzhan du de yang rnam rig tsam pa de nyid de// 'dod chags gnyid log gyur na rang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam
236b1(rgyud): po rnam par nyams// gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam du gyur na 'dir ni dor gzhan rnam par rig tsam du// de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir// gang zhig
