236b2(rgyud): 'di yi ma rig glo bur ba ste lhan skyes gyur pa de ni rnam rig med// sngor du rngam rig rnam par dag pa lhar skyes bems po yang ni rig pa rnam dag 'gyur// bems po ma lus rnam par rig pa tsam du 'gro bas
236b3(rgyud): sad pa'i tshe na rab tu rtogs pas grub// de yi rnam rig mi snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug la sogs 'gyur// bye brag par gyur yang na ser skya'i 'dod par 'gyur te sa bon
236b4(rgyud): nang na myu gu sogs// gcig phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyur te brgya la rtag pa cung zad yod ma yin// thog mar phra rab rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i cha med gang gi rdul phran nam mkha' la// phra
236b5(rgyud): rab rdul rnams 'dus pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba'i srong ba rdul phran phung po min// rdul phran bral te nam mkhar gnas pa las gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa min// gal te lus po rdul
236b6(rgyud): phran phung por gyur na de tshe su yi lus po 'jig par 'gyur// 'byung ba brtags pa med las gzhan du rdul phrar bral min gang gi rdul phran de rdul kyang // sdud dang skyed pa bral bas nam mkha'i
236b7(rgyud): dkyil la gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas// phra rab rdul rnams cha shas drug la slar yang cha shas drug ste slar yang gang gi cha shas drug/ de yi cha shas phra rab cha yis nam mkha'i khams 'di
237a1(rgyud): bar cis mi 'grub/ dngul chu nor bu'i rdul phran cha bcas cha med tshad ma dag gis bsgrub byar gyur pa min// cha dang bcas na zangs ma 'bigs min rdo yang min la rdul phran
237a2(rgyud): phung po che med min// dngul chu zangs ma reg cing gnyis skyes nor bus rdo ba lha yi rin po cher 'gyur la// rnam par shes pa rnam rtog drug gi nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur min//
237a3(rgyud): phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la gang zhig rdul phran phung por de yi tshad mas grub pa min// rnam par shes pa'i bag chags dag las nam mkha'i dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes grags/
237a4(rgyud): gang phyir dmus long mig med yid kyis de ni mig dang ldan zhing ma yin de phyir min// mig gi rnam shes khams las mig dang bcas pas phyi rol gzugs las yin gyi bag chags min// gang zhig sgra//
237a5(rgyud): rnams ma lus rna bas thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams kyis thos pa min// sna nang bcas pa gang zhig dri yi rdul phran 'dus pa min zhing nad med pas de 'dzin// lce yi nad can ro mo myong la de nyid la
237a6(rgyud): yang nad med lce yis myong bar byed// rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub par bya ba min// rdul phran 'dus pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis/
237a7(rgyud): tshad ma yis// drag po dang ni tshangs pa'ang seng ges kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas// rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gags par
237b1(rgyud): 'gyur// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med la mang po 'dus sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung // 'di ni thub pas nam mkha'i tshad ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi yang // rang rgyal rnams dang /
237b2(rgyud): nyan thos lha dang lha mi klu dang bdag lta bu yi rgyal sras rnams// gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dang nam mkha' sa steng dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnams// khro bo rnams dang srin po sha ying mchog
237b3(rgyud): can gyi stag gzig byol song dmyal ba rnams// gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang ldan rang gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus gsum ngo bo nyid// rnam pa thams cad rdul phran gyis stong nam mkha'i dkyil
237b4(rgyud): ltar sor pa'am rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin// gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog de ma yin// gang gis de rtogs sems la dri med dri mar ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid
237b5(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas te// gang zhig sbyin pa la sogs lam dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub chos sogs chos rnams dang // byams pa la sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral ba stong pa la sogs rnam par
237b6(rgyud): thar pa dang // tshul khrims la sogs phung po gang zhig yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa// de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs ldan nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'
237b7(rgyud): min gang zhig gzugs sogs khams drug dang ni yul drug kyang ste rdul phran phung po'i rdzam 'gyur ro// phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa dang dril sogs pa drugag/ stong pa
238a1(rgyud): snang dang mud pas gsum gnas su rnam pa kun nas rnam par mi rtog pa// snang bas rab tu sad pa rab rib rnam par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags min// 'phags
238a2(rgyud): pa'i yul gyi rgyal po bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas lam ston mdzad pa po// klu grub rdo rje can kyang srid pa gsum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbyings su lung bstan cing // nyams pa rnams kyi
238a3(rgyud): gos sngon can la sha yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub rdo rje ste// ye shes mtha' can nag po'i ming can gzhan yang ma d+hu ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung // ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag gdug
238a4(rgyud): dag kyang de bzhin thod par chang 'thung zhing // kha T+wAM ga dang rus pa'i rgyan cha chang snod cang te'u ster ba nag po'i ming can no// slob ma rnams la gos sngon dang ni kun tu rgyug pa ster ba na bza' sngon
238a5(rgyud): po can// shA yi dam tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba byang chub rdo rje'o// gos sngon can ni rta mchog bdag po dpal ldan ha la sogs pa'i ming can gyis bsdun 'gyur// ye shes
238a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur// rab tu khros pa'i kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhon nus nag po'i khrag 'thung byed// sha yi dam tshig
238a7(rgyud): can gyi spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams spong mi 'gyur// mchog gi thugs rje can gyi 'jigs byed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po la 'doms pa// gang gi ming gis rnam
238b1(rgyud): rtog yid kyis thugs rje min zhing sems can phung po byams pa mim// de rnams bzang po'i thabs ni sna tshogs sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs 'dod pa ni// log par g.yem pa dge ba rnam
238b2(rgyud): par bral bas skye ba 'di nyid la ni 'grub par 'gyur// skyes bus mtho ris gnyis skyes 'jigs byed la sogs phyugs kyi sha yis mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis// de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng ge
238b3(rgyud): 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs// khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// gang yang rung ba blo gros dbar pa
238b4(rgyud): dge ba rnam bral de ni bdud kyis bslus par 'gyur// khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i dbang po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod phyir gnyis skyes phyugs
238b5(rgyud): kyi sha dang khrag gis bgos pa'i mgo bo yis// nges par mnar med dmyal bar rtag tu'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba pa la ster bar 'gro bar 'gyur// gang las bskal pa'i rgyal po stong phrag sum
238b6(rgyud): cu rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur// bdud kyi sha yi dam tshig can gyi yi dgas mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyu ma byed 'gyur zhing // sems can bslu phyir kha cig tu ni 'jigs pa min par
238b7(rgyud): bdag nyid gzugs ni ston par byed// lha rnams sha yis dam tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sgyu ma byed// sems can rnams ni bskyang phyir kha gcig tu yang bdag nyid gzugs ni 'jig byed ston par byes/
239a1(rgyud): long ba glag phyir 'jigs par dus kyi me lha'i 'jig byed dus ni me lha rab tu byung // bde byed kyis bsad lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis 'thungs par 'gyur//
239a2(rgyud): nya dang rus sbal phag rgod mi yi seng ge lha ma yin rnams brlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes// nya dang de bzhin ri dag sa la sogs 'o ma nags tshal dgon par khyab 'jug gis mi bza'// sa gsum
239a3(rgyud): bla mas yi dgas mkha' 'gro rnams ni smin phyir he ru ka yi gzugs su byas// mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos ra ma na yi chung ma dbrog phyir gnas 'jog gzugs su byas// 'jigs sde med
239a4(rgyud): pas skyabs seng bu rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyis bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings// kir mi ri yi sha yi ched du sum cu'i stobs can srin po'i rigs kyi chos byed cing // lha dang klu yi
239a5(rgyud): dbang po rnams kyis dam tshig 'dir ni rgyal po chen po rig par byos// lha bshos 'bras chan 'khur ba zho dang 'o ma mar dang bcas pa'o thug sha khar rnams// khro bo rnams dang sring po rnams la phyugs
239a6(rgyud): kyi sha yi gtor ma 'bras chan khrag dang chang // sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lnga dang bu ram zhor bcas 'brus chan lhung bzed dka' thub la// khrus bcas sbrang rtsi mar gsar za zhing tsan dan ma
239a7(rgyud): tog dag gis mgon por bcas pa mchod// gang gis chang sogs mchod pa de dag lha dang 'jigs byed dam ni he ru ka la min// srin po'i dbang po mtshan mo rgyu ba'i dam tshig dpal ldan rgyal po zla ba seng
239b1(rgyud): gis spyad// mdung can ma dang dr-i pa ti dang 'di dag rigs skyes bud med min te khyo mo lnga// gzhar yang thod pa can gyi chang snod rang gi chu yi gtsang sbra an+d+ra la sogs yul// sin d+hA'i yul nab
239b2(rgyud): glang sha za kha ba chen skyes rgyal po'i mo rnams chang 'thung zhing // gla re sogs na ma he dU sha mkha bar bar mi se re na rta glang sha/ de dzid stag dang mi sha za la po kar yul nabong bu rnga mo khyi yo sha/ bram
239b3(rgyud): ze la sogs rnams kyis sha mi bza' ba yul 'khor chen po kar+N+NaN+Da ra yi yul// nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su dmangs rigs la sogs khyim du chang 'thung bkag la rigs skyes 'thung // bud med rnam
239b4(rgyud): kyi dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jig par byed cing gnyis skyes kyis bshad pa'i// khrus dang gtsang sbra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa'i pi ra'i yul la sogs pa rnams// pha dag shi na ma
239b5(rgyud): dag bu yi chung mar bag ma len pa nges par gau kha'i yul// rug mar spur zla'i tsha mo len la ma khar yang ni spur zla'i bu mo rang gi bus// sor me dang tsam pa ka la sogs par tsha mo'i bu mo dang ni
239b6(rgyud): mo'ang yin// spur zla'i bu mo chung mar len pa'i yul 'khor chen po kaN+Da ta la sogs par ro// ma yi tsha mo chung mar len lam la yang ste khol mo len pa ra ra'i yul// bod na khrus dang gtsang sbra med la
239b7(rgyud): pa ru ku lan ta re go stan rigs ngan yul// skyes pa'i bka' yis gdengs can dbang po nyidan dang mtshan gyi dus su chu yi char 'bebs byed// gal te yul chos spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rigs byed ngag dag
240a1(rgyud): bden pa min// sha yi dam tshig can gyi sha za'i yul can drug gu sha dag spong bar 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig rig byed byed pa drang srog ma chog gi// 'thub can gyi rig byed ngag de gnyis//
240a2(rgyud): mtho ris don du mi dang ba glang gsod cing b+ha gar dkrugs pa'i zhi ba'i btung // zhi ba'i rig byed ngag de dag gis sems can sun 'byin pa la rab tu mkhas pa rnams// ba glang lpags pa'i zhi ba'i
240a3(rgyud): btung ba b+ha ga mchog dkrugs rta yi pho rtags bcad pa la// khu ba khrag gis rnam par bgos pa sbrang dang mar du bcas pa lce yis ldag par byed// de lta'i sha za'i spyod pas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed
240a4(rgyud): ngag gis gnyis skyes rnams kyi grub// nges pa dang ldan zhi ba'i sems dang snying rje ldan pa'i daN+Di mtho ris rnam par nyams// pha la sogs pa'i don du 'tshe ba byed cing khyim pa mchod sbyin dus su phyugs
240a5(rgyud): ngag gsod// dka' thub rnabs ni 'tshe ba spong zhing dka' thub nges par gdung zhing gong ma goms sogs yod// dat+ti dka' thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin 'gegs par 'gyur te de yang gang
240a6(rgyud): gi phyir// shes pas grol bas de phyir sna tshogs phyugs dag gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams ni ngu 'bod 'gro// lha la sogs pa mchod pa nyid bas gral te sha zos pa las nyes pa mi skrod na// bcu
240a7(rgyud): gnyis pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi klu yi chos dang nyi ma 'pho ba'i dus dag tu// khyab 'jug la sogs mchod phyir 'di rnams nyi ma bram ze rnams kyis ci phyir sha mi bza'// pa la gnas su sha dang rnam
240b1(rgyud): par bral ba'i chang bu ci phyir ster byed mkhas pa rnams// 'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig shi bar gyur na sngon gyi rigs brgyud rnam par spangs// bsod rabs sdig pa'i mthu yis mtho ris
240b2(rgyud): ngar song dag tu rab tu skyed la lus bsregs nas// gnas dang gnas su rus pa'i dum bu 'jog cing chang bu dag kyang ster byang su zhig ni// ma yin su zhig pa yin de ni lus dang bral ngas gang
240b3(rgyud): zhig skye gnas gzhan zhugs pa// bram ze la sogs mchod pas gal te de yi pha ma mchod par rig byed las grub na// bram ze la sogs ma zhu ba yis de tshe shi ba la yang ma zhus gnod par 'gyur//
240b4(rgyud): gang gi pha dag dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis yi dgas skyes nas dad pa'i kha zas slong // nges pa'i bu yis rab tu byin pa'i chang bu len par 'gyur la chu yang len par byed// tshangs pa la sogs
240b5(rgyud): gtso bo nyi ma lha mchog bdag po nyi ma de ni ci yis bza'// sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ster ba 'chi ba'i 'dzegs skyed lha rnams ci yis zhi bar 'gyur// zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bos sems
240b6(rgyud): can dang bcas gtso bo ci zhig zla ba bza' de ni// sems can rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog tu 'jigs 'joms ci yis lha ma yin rnams skrag/ gang zhig mtho ris lha rnams mi dang
240b7(rgyud): phyugs kyi sha yis bram ze rnams kyi mchod bya ba// gang zhig yi dgas sa yi khor yug gtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spod yul min// sa la sogs pa lha yi de nyid nye bar zhig par//
241a1(rgyud): #/ gyur pa dbang po'i spyod yul min// tshangs gzugs sna tshogs nam mkha' tsam yang seng ge dbang phyug gtso bo tshangs pa de nyid de// yi dgas la sogs rlung gi lus po rang
241a2(rgyud): bzhin yon tan dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dmar// sa dang chu dang me yi lus can sa dang bar snang dag tu kha dog rags sogs ldan// rlung gi reg bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang me rnams mig/
241a3(rgyud): gis gzung bya'i kha dog gzugs// dri ni sna yis gzung bya 'dir ni lce yis ro myang dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so// rig byed tshig las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog ge'i tshad ma yis//
241a4(rgyud): gzugs med de yis sa dang bar snang dag tu de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams bskyod pa min// mo bsham bu dang mtshungs pa nam mkha' tsam la nam mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang // gzhan dag
241a5(rgyud): gzugs can bzhi ste sa dang chu dang byin za rlung rnams ro yi dbang po gnyis// bram ze sogs kyis mthong 'gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mtshan mo mar me med na yang // byi ba la sogs phyogs dang mtsham
241a6(rgyud): su son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus snang bar 'gyur// srin po dang ni yi dgas la sogs tshogs pa mtshan mo'i dus su lha rnams ma lus kyang // bram ze la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing
241a7(rgyud): nyi ma shar na skar ma ma lus kyang // bya rog srin bya ce spyad khyi rnams ma lus 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur byung ba ma lus stor// de bzhin lhag ma'i chang bus sgrub pa'i theb brang dag gis skyes bu rnams la yang //
241b1(rgyud): byol song rnams ri gang du rang gi sems la bab pa'i sa phyogs der ni gnas 'cha' la// de dag shes pa byam ze rnams la sring pa gang las mig gis gzung ba'i rgyug nam mim/ lha mo gnon dung /
241b2(rgyud): la zhugs na byung dang 'byung 'gyur 'byung ba ma lus ston par byed// bram ze shi ras yi dgas gyur pas rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas rig byed 'don par byed// spyir bdag srir por gyur na
241b3(rgyud): khyim du bong bas phag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen par byed// blo dang ldan pa'i spyod pa can rnams nye bar nyams par 'gyur ba'i yi dgas spyod pa ltos// mur pa bsal ba mir par gyur la mur las khA ta
241b4(rgyud): de yi bshang ba las byung ba// mya ngan med skyes khyab 'jug 'phrog byed skyed byed des na mes po khA ta mchod par 'os// ba glang rgyu ba dang ra yi kha dang gnyis skyes bong bu'i rkang pa bud med bya gar
241b5(rgyud): phyag byed cing // khams rnams gtong la gnyis pa mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa bldag pa gang zhig bram ze rnams// sgra med yi ge med las nam mkhar 'gyur te nam mkha' rlung gi rten du gyur
241b6(rgyud): pa las// rlung las me la me las chu yin chu las sa ste sa las 'bras bu'i kha zas rnams// zas dang chu dag zos dang 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'di dag
241b7(rgyud): bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog chags phung po rab tu 'byung // mo ga sham bu yi thu bo mchog las mchog gyur mchog gang rdul phran 'bum gyi cha ltar pra// nam mkha' las ni
242a1(rgyud): mchog gi bdag nyid yul dang bral zhing yon tan med pa nam mkha'i rtags// rtags kyi gnas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos por rnams so// gang yang 'dzi/
242a2(rgyud): ngag kun nas thim zhing nam mkha' sa steng dag tu zhi ba'i grub mthar ldan/ gang zhig de yi nus pa b+ha ga zhes bya rnam gsum lam ldan sgur mo 'jigs byed ma// de ni nam mkha' las
242a3(rgyud): 'das nam mkha'i dbang phyug mchog gi mchog gyur rtsa bcings 'khyil ba can// nam mkha'i mtha' can thig le'i 'phreng ba mgo nas bshang lam bar du ba thag dang mtshungs ma// mchu 'phyang skar
242a4(rgyud): ma'i mig can gnas dang 'jigs pa skyed byed za byed rnams kyi za byed ma// gsal dang migs la gcig ma rigs las rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo ma// rig ma'i 'khor lo'i/
242a5(rgyud): dbang phyug rigs dang rigs min gyur pa'i thar pa ster ba'i dbang gis 'bigs// migs la bya rog rA yi gzhung la 'dir ni rang gi yon tan rus sbal spu yis byas// nam mkha'i me tog lcags
242a6(rgyud): mnga'i mda' gzhus gang dga' bogs pa de ni rgyal po dbang bskur 'gyur// gal te skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu ru sgyu ma chen po byed dam heR+Wa kar myur na// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag khyab 'ja/
242a7(rgyud): gas ni rtag pa'i sgyu ba ji ltar min// 'dor drug pa'i tshig las srog chags srog ni dus phrar pyod dam byed du 'jug pa med// sems can rnams kyi bso nams sdig las pa de dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'dus
242b1(rgyud): du 'byin par 'gyur/ gang nig srin po yi dgas mkha' 'gro bdud kyi ris kyi g.yeng mtshig can gyis bsgrubs/ sgrub pa'i tshig gis skye bog zha rnams kyis ni rnams nges par 'bengs pa byed ste/
242b2(rgyud): stug la sogs pa 'gyes la tshul me 'bar glang chen rengs byed mtshon cha sogs kyis min// sngags kyis thob brang la sogs rnams kyisas so khor mugartog par je po'i byang byed// byang chub sems dpa' 'dzi
242b3(rgyud): dbang phyug lha min lha klu rnams ni sangs rgyas pas bsgrubs nas// gang gis grub pa'i ngag gis de rnams sa yi steng du 'dod pa'i dngos grub skye bo rnams la ster// skal ba ngan dang nad kyis sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i
242b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa byed pa thams cad 'joms par byed// seng ge la sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhi ba la sogs byed par 'gyur// byang chub don du gcig tu sbyin pa la sogs lam ni dge bcu ldan las gnan/
242b5(rgyud): ma gsungs// dbu ma'i dga' ba gcig pu b+ha gar dkrugs pa dang ldan 'grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdo rje'i sa gzhi byang chub shing las gzhan du rin/
242b6(rgyud): sha yi dam tshig can gyi grub pa yi dgas sa gzhir shing gcig las ni gzhan du min// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyis byang chub lnga las gshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la 'jug/ sha yi dam tshig can
242b7(rgyud): gyi grub pa'i yo dgas 'jug pas phran tshegs las la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas lhas 'jug pa na bde gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston// grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pa sha yi dam
243a1(rgyud): tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo la sngon byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyed par mdzad pa bya no pung po las garan ri ma mam grub pa rnabs kyis ri dgas rigs bskyed smod pa/
243a2(rgyud): 'jigs byed rilas rig zhan lam yin// dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu'i stobs bda' sangs rgyas pa mi rgyung rlabs bstan// gang zhig drug po dur khrod dag tu phyugs kyi skye
243a3(rgyud): bopo stobs can thong ba can rgyud ston// rgyal po'i rgyal srid lha khangs steng sa las 'byung ba de rjes lha yi rgyal srid do// gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor lo legs par bzhag par gyur pas thar pa rab tu 'byung
243a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rgyal po srog gcod pa las dmyal bar 'jug par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin// rgyal po bram ze la sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan du grub pa'i tshig ma yin// sha yi kha zas longs spyod
243a5(rgyud): byed pas slar yang srid pa gzhan du lha min rigs su skyes// sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang sdig gzhan lha yi rigs su 'di skye'o// mgo zlu ma dang ni yugs mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro
243a6(rgyud): mgo zlum dang ni yug za mngon spyod byed pas slar yang sring gzhan 'jigs byed nyid du 'gro// sems can phan pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la gnod pas sdig par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// sems can gnod pa byas
243a7(rgyud): pas bsod nams nyid la phan pas sdig par nam mkha' tsam pos snyom// sangs rgyas rnams dpa 'jig byed skyes pa bud med gdengs can rnams kyis bstan pa lnga rten gang// g.yul du zhugs pa'i lhag gzigs rnams
243b1(rgyud): na mchogs kyis de rnams sa lus 'dzis par byed// de dbas rigs gnag gnan gyi na ma lan cing bded par spang dang gcang sna ba tu 'jug gco dus nan kyi chung mtho rnying ga 'thungs pa dang dru/
243b2(rgyud): rang gi chung ma bster// khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i sgragacan mtshan mos mo'i dus su nyin gung phyed yol dang // srod dang thu gsum dag dang nyi ma ril shar bar gyur nas lan sngar phyag byed cing // sa steng sa yul dag
243b3(rgyud): stag gzig mu stegs ngag la mun can dbang pos gcig tu skyob// drag po'i g.yul ngor ba ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang brang bzhin 'gyur la rgyal po ni// rgyal po 'thab mo yin pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis 'jigs
243b4(rgyud): bye la sogs mchod nas su// sna tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa yis gdung brgyud 'chad par 'gyur// grub pa bya'i dbang po sbyin pa mi phyugs zhabs dang dum bu zhes bye thod pa can// dge slong klu
243b5(rgyud): grub ces bya yon tan ma lus 'byung khungs sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa// slob dpon 'od brtan zhes bya gcod byed chu yis grub pa stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa rnams// gnan yang de ltar rab tu grags kyang kyis
243b6(rgyud): de lta dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod// dge bcu la ma gyis grub par gyur pas 'phags pa'i zhwa dang la ba'i da bza' rtang dbyangs dang // phyogs kyi byung po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa btsun pa pad+ma'i myu gu zhes// khang gos
243b7(rgyud): la rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus nag po rgyal po yon+da n+do d+ho dang // de bzhin gzhan dang de rnams mthong yang mi bdag 'jigs byed 'phrog byed sogs kyis byid kyis brlabs/ sa dang chu dang byin pa rlung dang rnam mdza' tsham gdod lnga pas
244a1(rgyud): yang yan lag drug/ de yi dbyangs yig ring dang thung bas 'gyur gyi gzhan la dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min// nyi ma gang du tshangs pa'i sa bon nye bar 'jig par 'gyur ba des na dus
244a2(rgyud): phyi mar// sa gzhi sbyong ba mchod na 'dir ni g.yul ngor kla klo dang ni mu stegs 'jig par 'gyur// thung dang ring ba lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan mtshungs pa dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min// a sogs ma ning
244a3(rgyud): dbyangs yig stobs bcu mnga' bas gsungs te nyi ma 'thab mo zang phyir ro// ring dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du a ko ka ni ring po phyugs dag tig las 'gyur// de phyir ma ning yod la i ko yan tsa mi byed po'i
244a4(rgyud): phyogs nas nges par bskyod// thog ma'i lo nas nam mkha' mkha' dang gzhan yang zla ba tsin tsi ni yi dbang phyug 'byung // de yi bka' yis yi dgas dbang sgyur dus la ka sogs grogs ldan sguskur mor byin brlab pa/
244a5(rgyud): phyi nas sa steng son pa'i gnas dang zhing gi lha gang drug cu rtsa brgyad kla klo yi// mgon po ma d+hu ma ti bu dang bu mo spun zla skyes pa rnams kyis 'jig par byed// der ni bco brgyad lo la brgya yis brgya la bsgyur bas mkhal
244a6(rgyud): sogs 'phags pa'i yul// kla klo rlabs kyi lha khang mud can nyi mar rtogs pa gang de nga yis brlag par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs gsum tshogs skye dgu rnams ni der bzhag nas// bde la
244a7(rgyud): bkod de ka lA pa nas lha gnas dga' ldan mchog tu nyim 'gro bar bya// nam mkha' mkha' dang dus dang dbang po mig gis dus kyi dus su son pa'i lo yo tshad// slar yang skye bo rnams ni kla klor 'jug ste ji srid bco
244b1(rgyud): brgyad lo la bsgyur ba'i bar// yang ras yang dung yis rtsod pa'i dus der byung nas de rnams gnig par bya ba nyid// ji srings dang chu dang me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan ngam mkha' 'i zlas ma rnams// phyogs skyong phyog/
244b2(rgyud): kyi gdon dang phyogs lha nam mkha' sa gzhir yi dgas bram ze ba glang sogs// sa 'og klu dang lha min rnams ni sa yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod// don kun grub phyir rtag tu rgyal po mi dang bcas
244b3(rgyud): pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong pa nyi mar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchod// slob dpon mchog la gzhol bas srung ba lnga po rab tu dri zhim me tog rnams kyis mchod//
244b4(rgyud): sngon du khrus byas gos sngon snga dro gso sbyong blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du nges par gdon// klog mkhan bzhi dang lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas nyin dang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur// slar yang de la bsrung
244b5(rgyud): ba bya zhing nyi ma bcu ru zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang bya// zho dang 'bras chan nyi mar rta dang glang po'i gtor ma 'bras chan 'o ma zla ba la// 'bras chan la sogs mig dmar gza' la me tog bcud dang bcas po'i
244b6(rgyud): 'bras chan gza' lag la// 'bras chan ser po bu ram sogs kyi gtor ma lha yi bla ma 'o thug sha khar gyis// pa wa sangs la zan dron mar nag bcas pas spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de bskyon la// nyi mar slar yang phyog/
244b7(rgyud): su glang po rnams kyi gtor ma bya zhing 'khur ba 'bras chan gyis// glang po rta mchog rnams kyis zhi dang rgyas pa'i don du sbyin sreg nyi ma la sogs gzar// 'bru dang mar gsar 'o ma dUr ba mda' yi yam shing brgya dang 'o ma'i mchod yod btung //
245a1(rgyud): sbyin sreg rjes la dung por gang ba'i zhi ba'i chu yis rta ngang glang po khrus bya'o// yi dgas la sogs gtor ma sran chan sha dang chang rnams nyin mtshan dus su sbyin par 'gyur// srin po la sogs sung
245a2(rgyud): kar dang ni rdo rje phur bus phyogs mtshams rtogs par phur bus gdab// slob dpon gyis ni srung ba lnga yi cho gas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrung bar bya// gang dang gang gis yul mtha'i bar gyi skye dgu nyin dang mtshan du ni dang rgyas
245a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba// thog mar dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang las pad+ma lnga yis bskor// gang zhig rang bzhin yon tan dbang las sa dag kha sbyar zur brgyad de bzhin phyi rol du// gang zhig zur rnams dang
245a4(rgyud): bcings pa phyogs dang phyogs mtshams de las rdo rje'i 'phreng bar 'gyur// rgyal chen phyogs kyi zur la ma lus yon tan rang bzhin ri yi rgyal po phyogs mtshams rnams// de nang zlum po'i snam bu phyogs dang phyogs mtshamra rnams
245a5(rgyud): su de la snod dang rtse mo'i 'phreng du 'gyur// pad+ma'i ge sar cha la 'dir ni dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa dang ni dung nyid do// chu skyes 'dab mar srung 'khor gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhir gnyis pa gsum par de// de ltar
245a6(rgyud): pad+ma gnyis la gyur te nye ba'i snying po chu skyes 'dab ma rnam gnyis der// klu rnams zung gi bar du phyogs dang mtshams kyi 'dab mar de bzhin lha dang lha min dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' dang ma lus 'jigs pa 'jom
245a7(rgyud): pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams// srung 'khor 'dis ni thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur te khrag dang gi'u wang la sogs rnams kyis bris// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang ma lus rgyal sras rnams kyis srung ba lnga sogs ma lus/
245b1(rgyud): srung 'khor gsungs// bud med bu 'dod pa las bu dang rgyal po dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur// nang pa dang las grol bar 'gyur te sa yi steng du dbul po rnams kyis nor rnyedang 'gyur// skyes/
245b2(rgyud): pa bud med rnams kyis 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ba sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis so// bsod nams sems can rnams la phan btags dge bcu'i lam gyi mchod las nam mkha' sogs la min// bram ze gang zhig
245b3(rgyud): chang 'thung gyur dang gcer bu pa 'am ral pa can nam dbyug gu can// dge tshul dang ni tshogs dpon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral bas grub mtha'i spyod pa nyams// sum cu'i dam tshig can gyi mi yi dbang pos de rnams
245b4(rgyud): yul nas bskrad par bya// gang phyir de dag rnams kyis dge dang mi dge'i las byas drug cu'i cha shas rgyal po yin// yug sa mo rnams gang zhig 'khrig pa spyad nas ngan pa dmyal ba'i 'bras ster mngal rtsod byed// gang du/
245b5(rgyud): yul na bdud ris de yod mi bdag dpung bcas der ni nam yang grub ma yin// rgyal po sa yi steng du rgyal srid dang ni dgra dag 'joms dang nor rnyed bsod nams kyis// skal ba bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dbam/
245b6(rgyud): ldan lha yul sa steng grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin// sa steng ma lus mi yi rgyal po sbyin las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas lnga rgyal po// bzod pa tshul khrims skyong la nyin dang mtshan du rtsod pa las ni sbyin pa
245b7(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur// skyes bu bsam gtan la gnas mchog tu rang bzhin rnam par bral ba shes rab kyis thabs 'phel// shes rab thabs kyi mthu las smon lam dang yang stobs dang stobs nyid ye shes
246a1(rgyud): rdo rje'o// chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gal te 'khor bar byon pa ma yin na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yul dang yul can lhan cig
246a2(rgyud): nam mkha'i khams rnams su// de ni brdzun gyi tshig las de bzhin bcom ldan rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha gar bzhugs zhes pa// 'dod chags la sogs skyon spangs dri ma gsum dang rnam bral rdo rje sems las
246a3(rgyud): gzhan du min// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams sa steng dmyal ba'i dmyal ba sa 'dir zhi ba la sogs kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lus tshe yi tshad rnams rang rang grub mtha' chos su gsal bar byas// tshangs pa
246a4(rgyud): la sogs bsod nams longs spyod mthar ni lha yul sa steng ngag nas ltung bar 'gyur// srin pos byin brlabs rnams kyis de las thar pa 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i shing 'bras bzhin// byis pa rnams la rang rang ma
246a5(rgyud): yin brdzun tshig 'jam pos bdag nyid drung du khrid par byed// chang pa stong pa ston cing bdag gi lag la ril bu yod pa long zhig bu zhes brjod// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdud kyi lag nas shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis bdag/
246a6(rgyud): nyid drung du 'khrid// nam mkha' tsam zhig ston zhing bdag gi rigs kyi mya ngan 'das pa long zhig pu zhes gsungs// sems can rnams kyis bsams pa'i dbang las rgyal bas srin po rnams la gso sbyong gsal
246a7(rgyud): bar mdzad// de rnams de yis sangs rgyas nyid ni thub pa'i bka' yi gsang sngags theg pa bden pa yin// gang zhig bskal pa dpag med byams dang dge bcu'i lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pas//
246b1(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan pas sangs rgyas byang chub lung bstan to// mog sham bu ni lus med ma lus yon tan rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'dus pa rnams// smon/
246b2(rgyud): ninam mkha'i me tog min te gong du rags pa'i lus la zhugs nas glog cing dgod// srog chags bya rog rwa min bsod nams sdig pa'i dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnams su 'khor// srog chags gang zhig
246b3(rgyud): rdul phra phung po'i lus ni sa steng 'chi ba'i chen mi lhung med// rgyud kyi rgyal po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas sangs rgyas pa yi gang zhig lam bstan pas// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan dang ston pa'i sras dang
246b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa dang lha klu dri za lha min dang // khro bo srin po sha yi ngo mchog can dang stag gzig rnams dang mu stegs spyod pa rnams// de kun sham b+ha la zhes bya bar rgyal mchog bzhugs gnas der mi nyi ma bdag gis
246b5(rgyud): bstan// dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu mnga' bas gang zhig bdud rnams btul mdzad pa// de kun sham pA la yi dpal ldan ka lA pa yi skyed mos tshal gyi dus 'khor gyi// don chen gser gyi dkyil
246b6(rgyud): 'khor khang pa'i sgo yi phyi rol thub pa nyi ma'i shing rtas dris// dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rin chen seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa stobs bcu mnga' ba'i mdzad spyod gsungs// dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las
246b7(rgyud): phyung ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong gnyan chung dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
247a1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba buSh+Tas ma sog rdza ka~M nI dza la sa ba ra nA ma ut+ta ra tAn+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro snum bde ba'i mchog ces/
247a2(rgyud): bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid
247a3(rgyud): rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ chags med chags dang bral ba min//
247a4(rgyud): dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis// /
247a5(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur//
247a6(rgyud): rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur na// bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub// ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di// mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to// DA ni nam mkhar 'gro ba zhes// khams las mngon du brtags pa ste/
247a7(rgyud): nam mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub pa// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma zhes/
247b1(rgyud): rab tu grags// de ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes// sangs rgyas khams las rnam par btags// kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni// sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o// shi zhes bya ba bde bar bshad/
247b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kur gyi bde cher yin// snu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba// mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kur nas thams cad no// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan
247b3(rgyud): g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhir bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// rdo
247b4(rgyud): rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // de bzhin pad+mo pad+mo 'chang // nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang // de dag gi yang rigs yin no// de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin// dus gsum srid gsum
247b5(rgyud): mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang // rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i// gnas pa thams cad de nyid do// 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun// thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mtha' las mchog
247b6(rgyud): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dngos po thams cad de yin te// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs dadapal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas
247b7(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog go// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba// de ni
248a1(rgyud): bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid kyin tu bsgrubs pa las// sangs rgyas kung bdag pa de 'chog s+ho/ rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems
248a2(rgyud): lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye// yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rang gi dam
248a3(rgyud): tshig bdag sbyor ba// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa la// rnal 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson na// de las rnal 'byor
248a4(rgyud): lhar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad
248a5(rgyud): dang / dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no// de bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa
248a6(rgyud): thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i
248a7(rgyud): mchog las/ de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya brtag pa ste dang po'o// / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
248b1(rgyud): gshegs/ sangs rgyas thams cad panam stor pa mapa' 'gro stsal ba ba mchog rdornasams dpa' ba ga sbyor bas/ dbab pamasas cad ba tu 'jug / sangs rgyas pasasmras
248b2(rgyud): sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde bache// ribs bde banyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas pa bkur 'thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug pang cher po// 'di la khrum
248b3(rgyud): dang sdom mi dgos// dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos// dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang // bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub// de bas ci ltar 'dod spyod cing // kun zing bzhin thams cad sbyor// spyad
248b4(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod par byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed// langs pa dag ni 'dug pa 'am// 'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung // dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung // gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung // dkyil 'khor
248b5(rgyud): du yang ma zhugs pa'am// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung // rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na// bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad sgrub par byed pa na// ngan zos ngan
248b6(rgyud): spyod thams cad kyis// nyes pa dag tu yong mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar mi 'thob pa// sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de// phyag rgya'i cho ga ngag gis ni// bsgrubs na kun tu 'thob 'gyur ba// bdag nyid grub par byed pa'i mchog
248b7(rgyud): 'a'adi ni bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor ba// cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis// thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag/
249a1(rgyud): bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// rgya 'di bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad byon gyis rlobs// shin tu byin gyis brlabs na mi// sangs rgyas thams cad 'du
249a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong /
249a3(rgyud): zhing / rnam pa kun tu mchod byed na// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs
249a4(rgyud): pa'ang // bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam rol zhing // sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub// 'di dang sangs rgyas thams
249a5(rgyud): cad la// rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams
249a6(rgyud): cad dngos grub par// de yis bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas pas// mchod pa'i sprid chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs dag gis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa mdzad/
249a7(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun la nyer sbyor bas// dpal ni bzhir 'gyur grub par
249b1(rgyud): 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khams gsum ma lus thams cad do// rnal 'byor kur gyi longs spyod kyis// ji sngar
249b2(rgyud): bde bar ster byed cing // rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag/ bdag nyid kun tu myang byed na// shin tu sbyor bas
249b3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ras yan bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang // lang tsho nang med pade mchog 'grub// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cadas
249b4(rgyud): sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog
249b5(rgyud): las dpal rdo rje sems dpar kun tu sbyor ba brtag pa ste gnyis pa'o// / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor/
249b6(rgyud): ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa// dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bde// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpar
249b7(rgyud): sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun// so so rjes su rang grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor bde ba mos pa kun// rdo rje
250a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kun// so so rjes su rang grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni
250a2(rgyud): thams cad du// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa'i// bud med mchog rngams skye bar 'gyur// de yi dam tshig de byung ba// sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang // shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po/
250a3(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa// lhan cig spyod pas rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bar// thams
250a4(rgyud): cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i// phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che// rtag pa dam pa lha mo yis// rgyal mos mchod pa thams cad mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba dang // thams cad lha mo 'dus
250a5(rgyud): pas ni// ma lus skal ba bzang po kun// bde ba so so rjes su 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha// mam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o//
250a6(rgyud): lha mo bde ba chen mo kun// thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos// sdig med stobs kyis ngo mthon du// phan tshun du ri rab dga' bas// skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed// dbang po kun
250a7(rgyud): nas byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs rnams kyis// thams cad bdag nyid mchod par byed// rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi// dbang
250b1(rgyud): bskur bde chen las byung ba// rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur// lha mo kur gyi longs spyod la// ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba// bdag ni
250b2(rgyud): che ba'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod// rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yis// rjes su sbyor ba mchod byed cing // rtag tu myang bar byed pa na// shin tu sbyor bas rab 'grub
250b3(rgyud): 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba nges// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang // lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas kur gyi sku chen dang // sangs rgyas
250b4(rgyud): kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kur gyi rgyal chen po// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rter dbang phyug kun
250b5(rgyud): gyi gtso// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de dag dang ni dga' spyod na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo thams cad grub chen po// 'khor lo sgyur ba rab tu 'grub// chos dbyings
250b6(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// dngos grub kun gyi bde mos pas// de las rgyal chen mchog gzhan med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal
250b7(rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa'i// dngos grub kur gyis bde mos pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas
251a1(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi bde mos pa// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid
251a2(rgyud): kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub med// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/
251a3(rgyud): lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba mchog bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtag pa ste gsum pa'o// / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'
251a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// skal ba bzang mchog 'dod pa ste// yang dag sbyor ba'i bde
251a5(rgyud): myong ba// 'dod chags ther zug brtan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bde mchog/ rang gi spyod par de spyod do// sangs
251a6(rgyud): rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa// gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin du// dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i// skal bzang bud med ci zhig smos// lha la dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub
251a7(rgyud): bde chen po// skal ba bzang po bde myong bas// so sor rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal// skal ba bzang po longs spyod kun/
251b1(rgyud): rang gis spyad par de spyod do// rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang // 'jig rten dang po mchog gi dpal// sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed// khams gsum dag na ma/
251b2(rgyud): lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun// rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas
251b3(rgyud): phrogs nas de spyod da// longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan// phrogs las grub dang dran las dga'// ngo 'thor stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dang la sbyin par
251b4(rgyud): byed ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid// 'jig rten dbang phyug kur dang bcas// ngo 'thor stobs kyis phrogs ras kyang // de ni dang la sbyin par byed// tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi/
251b5(rgyud): mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs te myur sbyin na// longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de yis mi sbyir ci yang med// sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun// mi bya ba ni gang yang med// sbyin pa dang
251b6(rgyud): ni byed pa'ang yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // phrogs nas kyang ni sbyin byed na// las mchog dag ni rab 'byams dang // dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// dngos grub mchog ri gdon
251b7(rgyud): mi za sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis grub chen po// 'khor lo sgyur ba rab grub pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/
252a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che// rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug/ la lar byang chub sems chen po// la lar spyod pa mthun par 'gro// la lar dga' ldar lha dag las// dam pa
252a2(rgyud): shin tu 'pho ba'o// la lar skye ba rnam par dag/ la lar nges par 'byung bar gsal// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar bdud las rab tu rgyal// la lar byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// la lar
252a3(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar pha rol mu stegs rnams// chos dang mthun par tshar gcod do// la lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba// grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// la lar rtogs pa thams
252a4(rgyud): cad mchod// grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// 'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar// rnam par sprul pa
252a5(rgyud): dgyes shing rol// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ brtan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag/ gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// 'gro ba dag
252a6(rgyud): gis bsnyen bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog/ rdo rje sems dpar rab tu 'grub// sems cad khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni phyag rgyas
252a7(rgyud): 'debs// lha dang byang chub dka' ba rnams// brten par sems can dag la smin// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// sems cad kun gyi don byed cing // ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal
252b1(rgyud): bkun tu sring bar gnas// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro snum bde ba'i mchog las// sna tshogs thams
252b2(rgyud): cad kyi skas pa bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste pal dam tshig gi brtag pa ste bzhi pa'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
252b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// rtogs pa'i cho ga thams cad la// grub pa
252b4(rgyud): dam pa mchog gi mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang // bde ba thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// bcom ldan rnam
252b5(rgyud): 'byor de nyid ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pas// sems can kun don rnam sprul na// myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyur// nyin re'am yang na zla re 'am// yang na de bzhin lo
252b6(rgyud): ro ni ci bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o// khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang // de bzhin srog dang rtsa las 'byung // rang gi lha yi cha lugs su/
252b7(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor gang dag gang bsten pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der// mchod pa byas nas de bsgrub bo// de las
253a1(rgyud): gzhan yang rtog kun gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i// gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi
253a2(rgyud): dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste/
253a3(rgyud): rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba bzhin// ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// 'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa
253a4(rgyud): yin/ sangs rgyas la sogs brtar g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/
253a5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams// sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub// dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o// // 'das pa'i
253a6(rgyud): dus su sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu ston pa nyid la brtson// 'gog pa'i
253a7(rgyud): chos nyid la sbyor bas// 'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// grol ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas sprul
253b1(rgyud): pa kun tu bskyed// stong pa ma yin mi stong min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs kyi snying rje bdag nyid rnams// de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pa
253b2(rgyud): rol phyin par gsal// rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams la// sems can don du yongs brtags pa// rnam par mi rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtogs pas brtag par bya// brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra ba// chos kyi
253b3(rgyud): tshig tu 'gyur te// de las theg pa chen po yis// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa'i glus// dus gsum pa yis das tshig gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad stod// mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam
253b4(rgyud): med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can//
253b5(rgyud): yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod pa'ang min// dngos grub mtha' yas mtha' med dpa dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog
253b6(rgyud): rnams nges par stso la// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen
253b7(rgyud): po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshang dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yis// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang // khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog
254a1(rgyud): stsol mdzad// thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shing tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog
254a2(rgyud): brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stso la// 'di
254a3(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgya chen te// lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad grub par 'grub// sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas// bstod pa'i rgyal po
254a4(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis// dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun// dam tshig gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// sku ni blta bas mi ngoms pa// thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang // legs so zhes nas dngos grub
254a5(rgyud): ni/ mchog rnams kun ni rab smin mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang // bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang // rnal 'byor dam
254a6(rgyud): pa'ang sbyin par mdzad// de nas de yis sgrub pa dang // shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub dag/ gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub shin tu rtag thob bshad// rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis//
254a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// thal mo legs par sbyar ba yi// thal mo lan gsum rnam par brdab// dbang po gang dag gang la ma gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor
254b1(rgyud): ba yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing // ji ltar mos pa'i chags pa dang // Sha Da ba la sogs pa yis// ci ras yongs su ma skyo bar// rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya// kun tu kun
254b2(rgyud): nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas kun tu dngos grub pa// rab tu mthong zhing mchog grub pa'o// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad
254b3(rgyud): dang rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba// bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan cig glur blangs pas// kun tu 'gro ba'i/
254b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor dam pa rtag pa'i mchog/ dngos grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid thob par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba
254b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun grub ste// de bas dam tshig gsum la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par bkrol/
254b6(rgyud): dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i
254b7(rgyud): tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur// shin tu gdug par khro ba yis// 'dod 'bod par lhung bar 'gyur// de nas 'phos nas sems
255a1(rgyud): can de// bag chags kyis ni mtshams sbyor bas// shin tu gdug pa chen por 'gyur// blo ni bdud kyis byir brlabs nas// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug da// phra med ma dang
255a2(rgyud): gnod byed gdon// bdud dang rnam par log 'dren nyid// shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur// gnas gsum po ni 'jigs byed cing // sgrub pa po rnams la yang za// lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho
255a3(rgyud): bar byed// bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed// de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha// tshangs pa'i drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas// 'jug sel la yang skyabs su
255a4(rgyud): dong tshangs dang 'jug sel lha rnams kyang // lha chen drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa 'jugasel dab chen yang // rdo rje can la skyabs su song // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje ca// rdo rje sams
255a5(rgyud): dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje se gol phyag rgyas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings// rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis// sangs
255a6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad na// de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcings pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur na// gnad lta spros kyang ci zhig dgos// rdo rjes
255a7(rgyud): gol gtogs pa yis// 'jig rte khams ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas// shin tu gdug par gtum po la// zhibs phan par mi
255b1(rgyud): 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ba yi// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kur mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa
255b2(rgyud): yis khams gsum ma lus spros ci dgos// de nas sna yi rtse mo la// yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung // sna yi dbugs ring dro ba las// rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung // bcom ldan
255b3(rgyud): de nyid rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje khro bor gyur nas byung // dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ 'bar bas thal bas rab tu 'jig/ sems dpa' sngon por 'bar ba'i dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar
255b4(rgyud): bor 'bar// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra// 'bar ba chen po sgra 'bar ba// thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyad can// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod
255b5(rgyud): bzhin du rab tu 'jigs// khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa// zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang // smin ma khro gnyer bcas par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas// gu lang
255b6(rgyud): dbang chen nye dbang bcas// nyi zlag shin rje tshangs par bcas// gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas// thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig/ rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba
255b7(rgyud): yis thams cad phab nas slar yang ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de yi 'bar ba nyi ma las// byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa// bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs// gdug pa
256a1(rgyud): rnams kyi khrag za nus// rgyal po de ni de dag dang // lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol// thams cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis// shin tu
256a2(rgyud): gdug cing khro drag pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas// dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod// rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams
256a3(rgyud): cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs// dpal he ru kas dbugs phyung ba'o// / 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen
256a4(rgyud): po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngor byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// log par lta la gnas par 'gyur// shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis// 'dod 'bod pa
256a5(rgyud): chen por lhung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir// pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yis// rdo rje chos su gnas par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas
256a6(rgyud): mi gos pas// de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi// nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag/ 'di ni kun tu gzigs pas na// rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan spyan ras
256a7(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na// mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis//
256b1(rgyud): tshogs pa ni 'dul bar sngo// kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal// pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// pad+mo'i rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sbyar ma bde mchog des// pad+mo gar dbang la sogs
256b2(rgyud): kyi/ rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnab par sbyangs// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o//
256b3(rgyud): 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngor byung ba/ de tshe sems can thams cad mi
256b4(rgyud): shin tu gdug cing bskam par gyur// shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa yis// yi dgas rnams dang dmyal bar ltung // de nas 'phos nas slar yang ni// shin tu dbul por skyes
256b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// bkres dang slob pa'i sbyor rnams kyis// de dag phan tshun gsod par byed// shin tu gdug pa sbyangs pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das// dam pa'i
256b6(rgyud): don gyi nor chen po// rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur// nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad phyogs// kun gyi reb yongs rdzogs mdzad// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las
256b7(rgyud): rin chen thams cad 'bebs// shin tu gdug cing khro ba la// zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// rab tu gdung ba kun bsgrubs pas// bya ba dang ni bzlog
257a1(rgyud): ba dang // brog pas kyang dbyung bar sa// rtul bar byas nas gangs gsus gyi// nor gyi tshogs kun srung bar byed/ 'jig rte gsum rgyal la sogs kyi/
257a2(rgyud): rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ri rab tu bkrol// dpal rdo rje nyams dbugs phyung ba'o// / 'das pa'i
257a3(rgyud): dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngor byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar
257a4(rgyud): 'gyur// shin tu brtsod 'grus chung ba yis// mnar med pa yi dmyal bar ltung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor ba'i
257a5(rgyud): tshul dag tu// rta mchog dpal ni byung bar gyur// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// shin tu gdug
257a6(rgyud): cing khro gtum pa'i// sems cad rnam pa mang po'i khams// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ byi brkun po chom po yis// thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed// bring ba dang mi sgyu
257a7(rgyud): dag dang // ngo 'thon stobs kyis de bzhin du// dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// skye 'gro gnas pa 'gro ba rnams// mtha' dag brtul nas 'grub
257b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// 'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis// rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu sbyong // g.yem pa rnams la g.yeb par gyur// khro bo rnams la khro ba'i mchog/ zhi brdabs la'i ba'i mchog
257b2(rgyud): drag shul can la drag pos gnon// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dam phyug dam pa rab mnan nas// lha mo b+hi mo phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs
257b3(rgyud): kyis ngo 'thon du// mthu bo che yang rab mnar nas// rug mi ni yang phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thor du// skye dgu'i bdag po rab
257b4(rgyud): mnan nas// lha mo rab tu zhi ba phrogs// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo mthon du// 'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas// dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma//
257b5(rgyud): phrogs nas de tshe nye bar spyod// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rdo rje las mchog rnams gnod
257b6(rgyud): ba nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// thabs dang rtsal gyis grub pa yis// drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs na ni// khams gsum rgyal srid pa
257b7(rgyud): lus par// rdo rje 'dzin pa nges thob nas// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mchog/ drag shul sbyor bas grub par byed// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis
258a1(rgyud): ngo 'thon du// rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel// lnga yi dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/
258a2(rgyud): 'phang mchog gi rtag pa dag/ rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing // 'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag/ sems can
258a3(rgyud): rnams la brtan par sbyin// rtag mchog rnam par sprul pa yis// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas// sems can kur gyi dor yang byed// de ltar rta mchog dpal
258a4(rgyud): la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs// dpal rta mchog gis dbugs phyung ba'o//
258a5(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags// dem mkha' kur gyi skabs
258a6(rgyud): na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyan par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyum pade/
258a7(rgyud): ba'i mchog las// gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa rtog pa ste sde pa'o// / de nas gnad yang thams cad de// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas thams
258b1(rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes par// thams cad bdag
258b2(rgyud): nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpas// rdo rje sems dpa' sdang ba bde// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyu la sogs pas spras// dril bu rnam
258b3(rgyud): mtshan mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa bres pa na// rdo rje glu dang mchod la sogs// glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me dri dang sogs
258b4(rgyud): ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog sgrub// yang ra bdag gi gnas dag gam// skyed mos tshal la sogs par sgrub// der ni dang por
258b5(rgyud): gdan bshams te// 'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur ba// sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs// de ri thams cad dag pa'i gdan// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//
258b6(rgyud): sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de ni rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// star de dag ni thams cad la// ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du
258b7(rgyud): dgod// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sogs// sgo srungs dang ni ldan par byas// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// bud med
259a1(rgyud): ngag ni legs bsgrubs pa// bskal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// mi yi mtshal ni grub pa la// dmar chen po zhes bya
259a2(rgyud): bar ba shad// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// rdo rje'i chu dang rdo rjer bcas// mtshal chen po dag sgrub pa ni// mthu yis rab tu grub pa ste// pad+ma
259a3(rgyud): snod kyi nang du gzhag/ chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de yi mtshal
259a4(rgyud): dang khu ba dang // mtshal chen po ni bsgrubs pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// dmar chen dang nig pur bcas// tsan dan dmar por sbyar
259a5(rgyud): ba dag/ tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni// ra sa la na kun slong ba// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtses// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa yi no
259a6(rgyud): dngos grub thob// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhan// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad
259a7(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// 'dus pa der ri zhugs pa dag/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // kun tu kun ras thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa
259b1(rgyud): kun sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro// 'dis ni bsrung ba byas pas dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkha' gro/
259b2(rgyud): pade mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub// de nas khrus byas dri ni ba lus// ci 'byor pa yi gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs gos bzang bgos dang mi// me tog 'phreng
259b3(rgyud): ldan kha dri zhim// sna tshogs kur gyi skal bzang pos// slong bas dal gyi dal gyis su// gos dgab pa yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi 'byung ba bskul bar bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
259b4(rgyud): nyi zla rnams// shar ba dag ni mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// nges pa'i lam dang kur ldan pa// rnam par
259b5(rgyud): 'das pas rnam par brgyan// brtar zhing grub pa slong byed pa// kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni// stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas//
259b6(rgyud): bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pas bzhengs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ 'di dag nyid kyi glur blangs na// shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das pa'i// shi
259b7(rgyud): ba'ang slar ni slongs 'gyur na// yang srid pa lta ci zhig smos// lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa// rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas// sna tshogs 'brang ba rab tu 'grub// 'jig rten
260a1(rgyud): gsum ni rab sgrub pa// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa// 'jig rten gsub gyi ston pa'o// 'jig rten gsum la sgyid sbyin pa// 'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrubs/
260a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// a ra li ni kun 'grub 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo kun
260a3(rgyud): dang bde mos pa// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs// nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'byung // lan cig dmigs pa tsam
260a4(rgyud): gyis kyang // bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba// brten zhing grub pa slong byed pa// sna tshogs 'brang bas de bzhin du// gan+d+har ba dang sha dbil// glu dbyangs sna tshogs glus sgrub bo// de nas de nyid dam
260a5(rgyud): pa yis// thar pa thams cad rmongs pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid la// glu 'di yos ni bskul bar bya// rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad+mo rnam dag pa'o// mchod pas gsal
260a6(rgyud): bar rjes su mchod byas nas// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod// kye ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang
260a7(rgyud): mchog dgyes pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon med dag la rol cig rol cig ho// kye ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir// rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so//
260b1(rgyud): 'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar gsal bar mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur// rgyal ba kur gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha' 'gro snum go/
260b2(rgyud): kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu bsgrub la stor// dzaHhUM baM hoHe ma'o bde mchog bde bar drongs// rnam par sprul hUM snang bar mdzod// a la la hoHde bzhin gshegs pa thams
260b3(rgyud): cad kyi// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis// slob ma dag ni gzhug tu gsol// glu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas// kun gyi sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog
260b4(rgyud): ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// glu 'di dag ni len pa na// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa// me lus lus pa med par
260b5(rgyud): snang rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam
260b6(rgyud): par sprul// te na te te hUM/ rnam mang rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu mas pade mchog sgyums thams
260b7(rgyud): cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// hUM hUM hU~M/ rnam pa mang po khro ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams
261a1(rgyud): cang rab sprul rnam par sprul// ru lu ru lun+na ts+tshadz+dza/ rnam pa mang ma srog gi rgyud kyis sems can pa lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin ga shegs pa
261a2(rgyud): kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog snrums thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// hU~M shi Sh+ya b+hi Sha hUM/ de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
261a3(rgyud): mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi glu yirgya// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par/
261a4(rgyud): 'gyur// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa dang // lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// dbang po kun las byung ba yi// mchod
261a5(rgyud): pa'i sprin chen rnam bkod pa// rab 'byams tshegs rnams thams cad kyis// kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// 'kha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/
261a6(rgyud): dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis// bud med dag kyang bsgrubs nas ni// rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin// rnal 'byor mar ni
261a7(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur// de dag rang gi lha rnams dang // 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs nas// sngon med rol mo'i sil snya gar// rnam par 'phrul pas 'grub par 'gyur// lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg pa'i
261b1(rgyud): bde mos pas// bdag nyid rang gi lhar mthong zhing // mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur// lha yi mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba// bskal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// rnam pa kun tu skal bzang po'i//
261b2(rgyud): bde ba yang dag sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas sgyu mas byin brlabs pas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyor ba'i// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba rnams// dkyil 'khor bathong dka' myong bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'
261b3(rgyud): ma'am sbyor ba'o// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// rang gi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro bde bas// rdorje
261b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i bdag nyid du// de yis rab mthong mchod par byed// mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// dngos grub ma lus lus
261b5(rgyud): med 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar// rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang // de nas yang dag rab gsang bas// bud med
261b6(rgyud): dag ni bzhi rnams dang // gar gyi phyag rgya mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhir gshegs pa'i dam par grub par mdzod// oM hUM/ dam tshig
261b7(rgyud): dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/
262a1(rgyud): mchod pa ma lus lus med pa'i// rab 'jams las la'ang sbyar du rung // gang dag grub par ma gyur dang // mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor pa// phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas na/
262a2(rgyud): mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub// mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang // lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni// me tog la sogs mchod byas nas// slob ma thams cad gzung bar bya// dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod
262a3(rgyud): par snyim pa'i gar ni kun bskod nas// de dag gdong ni mdzes pa yi// ras kyis g.yogs te gzung bar bya// dngos grub ji ltar 'thob 'dong par// slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug/ lha mo gang
262a4(rgyud): la srung ba ni// sA de de la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang // yon gyi mchog ni blang bar bya// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas// ji lta bar ni dbang bskur ro// dmar chen
262a5(rgyud): po dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar por sbyar ba'i rnams// tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa la// g.yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rje bcas// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ldan// srin lag dang ni mthe bong rtses//
262a6(rgyud): zhibabatung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis kyang // rgyas mi thebs shing mi rmongs te/
262a7(rgyud): de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas mna' ni bsgag byas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'thun pa yis// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas
262b1(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lhang dag dang ni mi rnams dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor grub/
262b2(rgyud): pa po/ de dag la ni snying rings nas// snying las khrag chen 'thungs pa bzhin// sems can khams ni ma lus don// srid pa shin tu ga bya'i phyir// mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du bsgru
262b3(rgyud): bar bya// bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// de ni byi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// cis kyang mi 'jigs
262b4(rgyud): dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// grub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod// lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin// yang dag nyid kyis rtag
262b5(rgyud): turten// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de skad bka' stsal dpal ldan gyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i// bdag gi
262b6(rgyud): ye shes rgya bsgrubs nas// ji ltar tshul bzhin gar byed par// slob ma rnams la bde bar sbyin// slob ma dam pas de phyin cad// phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung nas// rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du/
262b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid grub// de nas ro dang zas dang gnas// glu dang sil snyan la sogs pa// de dag mgon po rnams la dbul// rdo rje bla ma chen po dang // bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgus
263a1(rgyud): mchod// 'dod don 'bras bu phun tshogs 'grub// de nas bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// ji lta'i tshul bzhin 'jug pa yis// bden pa'i chos ni
263a2(rgyud): brjod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul// rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrubs shing // rtog pa kun rab sbyor ba yi// ngo bo nyid phyir chen po'i mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba dang // 'dul ba'i bdag
263a3(rgyud): nyid sna tshogs pas// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// de las gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam sbyang phyir
263a4(rgyud): grol ba'i mkha' 'gro byung bar gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin rlabs sgrub pa'i rgyas// phyag rgyang bzhin rjes mthun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom
263a5(rgyud): ldan 'das// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang shin tu rnal 'byor pa// ma lus pad+mo rnam spyad phyir// skal bzang
263a6(rgyud): dam pa mi 'gyur ba// pad+mo sgyu ma 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// nor gyi mchog gis rnam sbyang phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi bdag po che// rdo rje nyi ma dpal 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid
263a7(rgyud): su ma na su mi
263b1(rgyud): ngo bor sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gar bya'o// dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de ltar rnam par spyod na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgrub bde mchog 'grub/ kur tu kun nas/
263b2(rgyud): thams cad ni// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kur// sangs rgyas la sogs brtad g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro// kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
263b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rnam par 'phrul pa ston// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas sprul pa grub par byed// sangs rgyas sprul pa
263b4(rgyud): sgyu ma yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa stor// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma gar byed pas// khams gsum dag ni ma lus par// dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro//
263b5(rgyud): pad+mo sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// sna tshogs gzugs byed rim pa yis// 'gro ba thams cad mgu bar byed// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// 'jal dum g.yul 'gyed
263b6(rgyud): grub pa dag/ rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas// bya ba thams cad ston par byed// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// bdag rtul phod pas mnar nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab 'joms par// rta yi gar
263b7(rgyud): gyis ston par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog gis// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na//
264a1(rgyud): dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// nga pal dgyes rol pa rnam 'phrul pa/ sna tshogs kyis ni rngab par rol// rnam pa sna tshogs rgal bzang po// rnam pa sna tshogs pa de mchog/
264a2(rgyud): gis 'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can khams ni rab tu sgrub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/
264a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i mchog/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par byed// bcom ldan
264a4(rgyud): 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil
264a5(rgyud): 'khor brtag pa ste drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// rngam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ 'khor lo thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// gseng ba mchog
264a6(rgyud): go dgyes pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rjes su sgrub// dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam// rang gi skyed mos tshal sogs par// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun tu sna tshogs/
264a7(rgyud): dgos pa'i rnams// ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya// rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang // ri mi rtse rnams thams cad du// rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dgos pa bsgrub par bya// dur khrod dang ni
