264b1(rgyud): lha rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dag/ rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur// pad+mo'i skyed mos tshal dga' dang // chu bo dag gi mdo dag tu// pad+mo 'dzin pa'i dgos pa
264b2(rgyud): rnams// yang dag par ni 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang // rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs du ba yis// rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub par bya// mkhar ni rnam pa snga
264b3(rgyud): tshogs dang // de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam// rgyal khams gzhan las grub par ru// rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya// cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i
264b4(rgyud): dgos pa la// dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu sgrub// sangs rgyas rnams kyi pad+mo dmar// phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs la// 'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar// rdo rje nyim dpal gyi ser// kha dog kun dang ci 'byor pa
264b5(rgyud): bla re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi rnams// thams cad rab tu sgrub pa dpal// rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o// gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang // bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang // 'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra bar// de 'dra'i
264b6(rgyud): 'khor lo mchog gis mdzad// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lha rnams kyi// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las// bsod nams brtag pa ci 'dra ba// phyis bris pa yang de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor thig btab shes rabacas/
264b7(rgyud): phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid sgrub cing // shar nub byang gi phyogs dag tu// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// dkyil 'khor yang dag ci 'dra bar// rab tu brtag par su zhig nus// rang gi lha yi rang bzhin gyis//
265a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rtag pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// chog lpagags 'chang na'ang // nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur/
265a2(rgyud): kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs 'khor lo can// kun tu sna tshogs 'grub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor kun tu snga tshogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje can gyi bla gam bzhin
265a3(rgyud): pad+mo'i dbang gi pad+mo'i dbyibs// rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs// ji ltar 'dod pa ci'i 'byor pa// ji lta'i dus dang ci bde bar// dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas par dpal// rta mchog phyag rgya rdo rje'i 'o//
265a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs shing // dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dag/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo// srog chags gsang bar mi bya zhing // dkon mchog gsum
265a5(rgyud): niyong mi spang // byang chub sems ni mi gtang ste// slob dpon skal bzang yong mi gtang // kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang por// bdag rang bsgrubs pas skal ba bzang // bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa
265a6(rgyud): dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan// srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na// skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// skal ngan nyan thos 'jig rten na// shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das// rtog pa thams cad
265a7(rgyud): bsgrubs pa'i phyir// skal bzang phyag na rdo rje dpal// stong pa nyid la rab sbyor bas// rang rgyal rnams mi skal ba ngan// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag pas// skal bzang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // log par lta dang ldan
265b1(rgyud): bas na// skal ngan 'jig rten mu stegs na// dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir// skal bzang rdo rje nyi ma dpal// bdag gi bu yang ma chags pas// skal ngan dka' thub spyong ba kum// rgyal sring mchog rnams
265b2(rgyud): kun bsdus pas// rta mchog dpal ni skal ba bzang // bdag med yongs su 'dzin med pas// thug pa thams cad skal ba ma// bde ba thams cad bdag sgrub phyir// kun gyi slob dpon skal ba bzang // lha ngan dam tshig la
265b3(rgyud): sdang ba'i// slob ma thams cad skal ba nga// gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid// 'di ni gsal bar shes pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// kun gyi slob dpon
265b4(rgyud): la gnas pas// 'khor lor 'jug par byed pa na// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la// gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog/ thog ma nyid du gsang brjod pas// kye khyod ci la dga' zhes dris// skal ba
265b5(rgyud): bzang la bdag dga' zhes// 'jug pa pos kyang smra bar bya// gsang ba'i yan lag 'di shes na// ji ltar 'dod par rab tu gzhug/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes te// g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya// de ltar dkyil
265b6(rgyud): 'khor du zhugs nas// de bzhin shin tu yon 'bul te// gsang ba'i cho ga nyid shes pas// mi 'gyur ba yi mchog 'grub bo// kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la// yon mchog dag ni dbul bar nges// gang la yongs su
265b7(rgyud): gtang dka' gang // de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin// gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog/ yang na shin tu khyad par can// de dang de ni bla ma la// de nyid mi zad 'dod pas dbul// yang na de ni 'dod 'gyur ba 'am// 'on te sems pa/
266a1(rgyud): dgos pa dag/ de sbyin mang na dgos pa bya// de ni chung yang mchog yin no// de lags te mchog 'dog la// de yang ngan pa'i yon 'bul na// kun gyi slob dpon panas bsam// de ni rtag/
266a2(rgyud): tusdug bsngal 'thob// bu mo shin tu brgyan pa 'ab// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ phul nas rin gyis slu ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yom// mtshan dag ni phul nas su// slar yang rin gyis slub ni/
266a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yin// 'od te mchog gi yon yin no// mu tig bzang dang nor bu dang // shin tu dkar po'i ras zung dang // de bzhin rta ni dkar po dag/ pad+mo can gyi yon mchog yin// rgyal srid longs
266a4(rgyud): spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no// shin tu brgyan pa'i rta dag dang // glang po shin tu brgyan pa dang // shing rta rin chen gang
266a5(rgyud): bdag karta mi rgyal po'i yon yin no// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba// mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs brtag/ spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang /
266a6(rgyud): ldan pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru// sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi// dbu rgyar mi 'gyur dam pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dem// srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te// thod pa rin chen dbu rgyun nam// sangs
266a7(rgyud): rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ kun tu sna tshogs bla mar ni// kun gyi slob dpon kun la bya// rgyal srid thams cad rnam dag la// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las byas// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan
266b1(rgyud): gyis sbas// sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dbang bskur bas// slob ma thams cad dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje byed// rdo rje rigs la rdo rje yin// spyan ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku// nor bu 'dzin gyi nor/
266b2(rgyud): bu yin// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du// thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la// rang gi dbang bskur bsdus pa'o// blugs pa dang ni byas pa 'am// bsrungs pa'am yang na bris pa'ang rung//
266b3(rgyud): sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag/ kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog/ gzhu
266b4(rgyud): dang mda' dang de bzhin du// skal ldan de bzhin skal ba bzang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// pad+mo rgya gram dpag med che'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa// lha mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyi//
266b5(rgyud): mtshan ma phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin// mda' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje tri shU la phyag rgya'i mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang lcug ma dang // pad+mo rta mgrin 'phang
266b6(rgyud): mthong ba// rta mgrin ljang khu de bzhin no// phag gi mche ba grub pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no// rin chen sna tshogs snang chen du// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi ra sa ye// thams cad bdag nyid myong skal
266b7(rgyud): bzang // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// gling bu dang ni pi wang kun// ku mu da dang mu ra dza// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // sna tshogs dri rnams de bzhin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos
267a1(rgyud): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs// nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la
267a2(rgyud): gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin du ni 'khar gsil dang // dam pa'i chos ni gleg pa ma dag/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i
267a3(rgyud): tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang // cha lang dang ni rnga dag dang // rdo rje dang ni rin chen snod// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tsho gas gzhan no// de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang // me long dang ni rlung yab dang /
267a4(rgyud): rdo rje ser ba'i sprin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang // rdo rje 'bar ba khats+tsha ga/ thod pa kham por de bzhin no// dmar chen dang ni snying rje dang // sha chen dang ni de bzhin te// rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren// chang
267a5(rgyud): nga chu dang de bzhin te// lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang // ras dang de bzhin mo dang ni// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal// gdug pa thams cad za ba yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs// rnal 'byor dngos grub rab
267a6(rgyud): sgrub pa'o// pad+mo sna tshogs dmar po dang // ljang khu de bzhin dkar po dang // mthing la ser po le brgan dag/ pad+mo mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun// pad+mo sbrang po bud med rgya// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // gsal
267a7(rgyud): shing dpal bskyed rdo rje dag/ pad+mo mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhan no// gzhu dang mnga' dang ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me// dbang bskur gter dang rgyal mtshan dag/ mchod pa'i mtshan ma bsdus
267b1(rgyud): pa'o// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+mo dang // rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin te// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa// dngos po gtan g.yo ma
267b2(rgyud): lus kun// rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o// de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam
267b3(rgyud): bar sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchog las/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan dag bshang ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa'ang bal gyi/
267b4(rgyud): lha'i rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs//
267b5(rgyud): g.yas bab ngan gsum du bya// sri zhur bcas pa'i steg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje
267b6(rgyud): pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas// skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na// khengs pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// btud de rab tu phyag
267b7(rgyud): 'tshal nas// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur// bsam pa g.yos pas phyag byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa legs byas nas// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/
268a1(rgyud): smin ma g.yon du 'deg tshul gyis// ru lu ru lur bcas bgang na// tshangs pa nye dbang drag por bcas// khams gsum pa rlabs phyag byed 'gyur// thal mo pad+mo kha 'bus bzhin//
268a2(rgyud): rang gi sbyor ldan snying khar bcing // mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhin// rgyas pa btung ba'i phyag kyang bya// lus pa'i yan lag thams cad ni// sa la bsnyal te phyag bya ba// snying kha kha dang spyi gtsug
268a3(rgyud): tu thal mo sbyar te phyag bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs// 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag byas nas// khams gsum pa yang phyag byed na// mthu bsnyems gzhan lta ci zhig smos/
268a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// gar gyi rgyun rnams ji snyed dang // de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun// de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya// rang gi don rnams grub par byed pa'o// 'gying dang bcas pa'i
268a5(rgyud): tshul byas nas// ji ltar tshul bzhin gar byed cing // bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzum mo mthen
268a6(rgyud): chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur bcang // g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang // dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyi//
268a7(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa// dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yis// sbyor ba de nyid bteganas su// 'gras
268b1(rgyud): ba'i phyogs su yongs bsgyur nas// spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya// thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// gar byas de nas phab nas su// skal bzang hUM zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad
268b2(rgyud): dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba las skal ba bzang po bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ mdzum mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ba'i// rdo/
268b3(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas su// de bzhin g.yon du bsgyur bar bya// de ni sbyor bas bteg nas su// spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya// skal bzang oM zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje thal mo
268b4(rgyud): sbyar ba// sangs rgyas kyi ni mchod pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ngag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol// mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul// dur khrod cha lugs
268b5(rgyud): gar byed pas// phyag rgya 'di yis gar byed cing // skal bzang rdo rje drag por dgod// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i thong pa'i thal mo ste mchod pa'i gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'o// lag
268b6(rgyud): pagayas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzum mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi zil mo'o// lag pa g.yas g.yo/
268b7(rgyud): gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje rin chen thal sbyar nas// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
269a1(rgyud): gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs// bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dang // me tog bdug pa mar me mchog/ dri yi mchod pa 'byung ba'o// gang ba'ang 'on te stong pa'ang rung // yang naH
269a2(rgyud): 'byor pa yis kyang // dam tshig mnyam par sgrub pa yis// mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur// dngos grub dbang phyug grub
269a3(rgyud): pas kyang // kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// gang dag de yis ma byas shing /
269a4(rgyud): spel bar yang mi ma gyur pa'i// rlabs chen dam pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen dang // dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med//
269a5(rgyud): mchod pa rab 'byams grub pa rnams// ma lus lus med 'grub chen dpal// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las//
269a6(rgyud): mchod pa thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba dpal skal ba bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// kun tu sna
269a7(rgyud): tshogs mchog rnams kyi// phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid cag
269b1(rgyud): tu bzhugs// bde ba kun la zhen pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku// 'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir// chags pa chen po bcod/
269b2(rgyud): ldan 'das// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di// dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// khams gsum dag na rin chen gzhan// sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rim chemache// dab rgyan
269b3(rgyud): can ni bde ba'i mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa// lha yi chu 'dis dag pa ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub bo// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi/
269b4(rgyud): nor bu can// kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang // mi mjed la sogs de 'grub bo// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// mkha' 'gro ma
269b5(rgyud): ni thams cad 'grub// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs pas bslangs nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni//
269b6(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo kun mchog dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa
269b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba mchog gi phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dpung rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo //
270a1(rgyud): zla ba'i kha dog 'dzub pa'i zhal// dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang // pad+mo'i 'dod chags rnam dag phyir// brla yi dbus ni dmar la dkar// phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra// de bzhin bde ba'i dbang
270a2(rgyud): phyuphyag dang // bde bar reg pa'i dbang phyug pas// dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan// lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+mo sna tshogs la gnas pa// thams cad dag par rab tu
270a3(rgyud): gnas// sangs rgyas pad+mo la sogs mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin// mi mjed la sogs brgyan pa bzhin// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // 'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par
270a4(rgyud): mdzad// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// yan lag thams cad 'phrog par 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btabar ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan 'dod pa kun la dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' rab
270a5(rgyud): tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mda' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags// bde ba'i 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// bdag la 'khyur/
270a6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi snga mchog chen po yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong ldong // bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' la rang
270a7(rgyud): sbyor ba// skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dam tshig bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// rdo rje la T+wAM ga bzung ste// bdag la 'khyung ba'i phyag rgya ni// bang bcas rdo rje rgya gram mchog/
270b1(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rnal 'byor kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor pade/
270b2(rgyud): ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham por 'grub// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa//
270b3(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan tshe dang gzhon 'grub pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje tshe bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
270b4(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa'
270b5(rgyud): la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'bab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// gtsug
270b6(rgyud): lag ji lta'i rjes mthun pa'i// dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis// mnga' bzhi yongs su 'phangs na ni// bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// tshangs pa chen po mgo dpal rdo rje mnga' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
270b7(rgyud): rkang pa 'deg cing phab pa dang // gshibs te mchongs pa'i stabs ngag gis// 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bstod nas ni// khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
271a1(rgyud): bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // phrogs pa dag gi khyad bar du// sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing // khams gsub dag ni bsdu bar bya// dpal rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag
271a2(rgyud): rgya'o// lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// bud med thams cad rtsed nas ni// dpag bsam shing ltar rtag tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje 'dod pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
271a3(rgyud): myang ba btungs pa ltar byas pas// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten gsum dag skams par byed// dpal rdo rje rta gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sgra yi myang ba'i rngub pa
271a4(rgyud): yis 'drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// khams gsum yang ni sdud par byed// dpal rdo rje phrag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mig tshugs zhen par lta ba yis// drag po dbang
271a5(rgyud): po nye dbang bcas// nyi zlag shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed// dpal rdo rje can nyi zla zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thams cad bdag nyid myangs pa yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/
271a6(rgyud): nyi zlag shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tsha ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// glang bu len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed/
271a7(rgyud): pas/ tshangs dang nye dbang drag por bcas// 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dpal rdo rje gling bu'i dbang byed ces bya'i phyag rgya'o// pi wang len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas// las rnams grub
271b1(rgyud): par rab 'byams dang // dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje pi wang bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas// rims dang /
271b2(rgyud): gdon dang dug zhen pa'i// sdug bsngal thams cad myur du sel// dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs pa'i
271b3(rgyud): gar byed pa// gnas gsum ngag ni ma lus pa// skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par byed// dpal rdo rje rdza rngas myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad byas
271b4(rgyud): mni rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byad// 'phra men gdon gyi gnod pa rnams// bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// skad cig tsam gyis
271b5(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// rgyas btang rmongs byas zos pa dag/ skad cig tsam gyis 'tshe bar byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos
271b6(rgyud): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// rang byung lha mo phyag rgya rnams// nam mkha'i kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// dngos grub dbang
271b7(rgyud): phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid babs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// rab tu thub pa'i glu rnams kyis// bla med pa yi dngos grub 'thog/ de nas
272a1(rgyud): byas rgyas shes 'di// dpal ldan rdo/ mchogs su// mas rnams thams cad zu cing // ming ba shi sgru pa m+sa// d+himams dpa' ba chen skal babang dpal stod pa
272a2(rgyud): bdag la bsgrubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyum sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub pa bdag
272a3(rgyud): lagrub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dzaHhUM baM hod kye bde mchog bde bas zung la rnam par sprul// hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol//
272a4(rgyud): a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma gzung du gsol/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas thams cad du// 'di nyid
272a5(rgyud): kyis ni myur du 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar
272a6(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam dag phyir// sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// 'dod dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// gcom gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la sogs chags chen phyir// dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs
272a7(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrubs pas// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de bas theg cher byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rim chen can// g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi
272b1(rgyud): sor mo gun la reg pa ni/ zla ba'i phyag tu yin par grags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyi gsal yin// byang chub sems chen skye ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ phyag nA 'ja/
272b2(rgyud): yis btab na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rab tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/
272b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid du rig par bya// mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing // rnam pa kun tu mchod byed pa// de yi sangs rgyas rtag po'i mchog/ mthong zhing mchod pa byed
272b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor// dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las
272b5(rgyud): rgyal sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas na// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo // rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab pa ni/
272b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun blo dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dgab// dpa' bo blong pa'i dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par
272b7(rgyud): 'grub/ pad+mo'i bud med khu tshur ni// de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang // byang chub spyod rab 'grub pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas
273a1(rgyud): bkab na ni// sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas khru chur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas kun/
273a2(rgyud): gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/
273a3(rgyud): rtagadong dpal gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// thams cad 'gug par rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal grub can gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas ba ka ba na ni/
273a4(rgyud): snang ba thams cad rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dang po sangs rgyas kun blod pa// gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin// gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i'o// bzhi pa mi zad snod yin no// sangs
273a5(rgyud): rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal// de bzhin zhal bzang gzugs ma yin// sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan yin no// gzungs ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya shes pa
273a6(rgyud): 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// slong bar byed pa bstan sgrub pa// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag/ sha
273a7(rgyud): rdza'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// de ba ta yi glu blang ngo // 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs snyed khyab par 'phros pa yis// rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ga// sprul pa'i sku rnams phra ba'i rdul
273b1(rgyud): gyi grangs snyed ni// srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam 'phrul sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul mdzod to// dpal rnam par sngang mdzad sbyor bayal la la tsho//
273b2(rgyud): de ring nyid du grub par mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro snum bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang / 2
273b3(rgyud): gi yang dag gsang ba yis// cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gsheg/
273b4(rgyud): dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsal// shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur//
273b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas khros byung khro bo ni// thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po snang // gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs pa// lha rdzas chu yis dgang bste//
273b6(rgyud): 'di ni rang bzhin nyid dag dang // mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// gos chen po dang glugs pa chen// sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin tu khro gdug
273b7(rgyud): gtum po yi// sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir// 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog/ thong pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ rgyal srid thams cad ra sgrub
274a1(rgyud): pa ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rdo rje la T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu dkrol ba'i slar bcas pa// dpal ldan te ru ka babs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul pas// sangs
274a2(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs bces de bzos nas// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje he ruka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug
274a3(rgyud): ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten byas// lag pa g.yon na thod pa thogs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par byas// nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa// nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar
274a4(rgyud): 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin// phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas// bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas// nam mkha' las ni kun lhags te// bdag gi
274a5(rgyud): spyod par de spyod do// drag po dbang po nyi dbang bcas// nyi rna mkha' 'gro mi mdzad tshogs// mkha' las sgyu ma kun blags nas// lus pa med par za'o// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal ba bzang /
274a6(rgyud): dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// bde bar 'bar ba'i gar byed pas// skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas la// rkang pa rang gi brla bsdams na// drag po
274a7(rgyud): dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas su// gar dag byed cing de za'o// de nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis// de nas bde bar brla bsdams pas// legs par bsdams te
274b1(rgyud): phyir btags nas// rab tu bkram ste btung bar byas// sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni// de nas brla phrag bskyod pa yis// skal bzang lha dang mi rnams kyis// bud med kun la de spyod do// bde ba reg pa thams cad
274b2(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal ldan ho ru ka babs pa'i/
274b3(rgyud): phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o// zhi nga drag po rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas// shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas// zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang // rkyen
274b4(rgyud): du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang // ras dang me gdong grub pa yis/
274b5(rgyud): khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba byin// mngon par gtor zhing se gol jog// ngal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas// g.yon du lta zhing lag pas
274b6(rgyud): drangs// 'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin te// gar byed rab tu rmongs pa dang // za dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang // tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las 'gal// de bzhin gzhan las 'dren
274b7(rgyud): pa dang // rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul ston dang // dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // rab tu 'jigs par sreg pa'i me// las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang po rgyas 'debs ma yi rgya/
275a1(rgyud): snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa shin tu rmongs byed ma'o// de bzhin bzhi pa 'degs byed ma'o// lnga pa gar byed pa yi rgya// drug pa gsod ma'i yin par bshad// bdun pa zab mo
275a2(rgyud): yi rgya brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi// phyag rgya'i lan rnams bla na med// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'joms pa// khyad par du ni bshang bar bya// dpal ldan rdo rje pad+mo slong /
275a3(rgyud): gar dag byed cing byas na ni// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad
275a4(rgyud): par du ni bshad par bya// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyal thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol ba// rnam pa sna chos/
275a5(rgyud): bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs byas mnabs su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde ba zhugs// hUM a la la ho snang bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyums sprul// dam tshig dag la
275a6(rgyud): 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus bdag bsnams su gsol// nyon mongs thams cad gsal bar mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rdo rje thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'
275a7(rgyud): 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags
275b1(rgyud): thams cad rnam ngag phyir// pad+mo'i phyag rgya dpal du gnas// mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir// shel sgong shin tu dag pa 'dra// 'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrid pa ni/
275b2(rgyud): 'od sangs rgyas tshe ni rin chen spras// gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur// gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs
275b3(rgyud): su bsgyur zhing gar byas pas// pad+mo'i mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas// phyag ni rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// pad+mo sgyu mas rnam sbyangs nas// sangs
275b4(rgyud): rgyas byang chub sgrub par mdzad// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa'o// skal pa bzang po dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// skyil mo krung ni phyed mar gnas
275b5(rgyud): rgyal po'i skyil mo krung bcas na// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// dpal pad+mo rgyal po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo dmar po tso bdir bzung // rang gi snying
275b6(rgyud): khar 'dren pa'i tshul// pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo sngon po ci bder bzung // rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// bud med phyag rgya bcing bar bya// bsnyems pa'i lag pa
275b7(rgyud): g.yon pa yis// pad+mo dkar po ci bder bzung // 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo mthing kha ci bder bzung // g.yas pas rab tu gar byed pa//
276a1(rgyud): dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo ser po ci bi der bzung // g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pas// chu srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya// bsnyems par/
276a2(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo le brgan mchog bzung ste// rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i bcing bar bya// rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// sgrol ma'i byang chub mchog yin no//
276a3(rgyud): rgya chen ma yis 'khor lo bskor// khro gnyer ma ni phyag rgya'i lam/ pad+mo gnas pa'i dpal chen yin// 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i 'gro ba gsum// dpal pad+mo'i rgyal ba'i rig pa'i lha rnams so// de nas
276a4(rgyud): phyag rgya shes pa 'di// pad+mo rgyal po dpal gyi gru// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ri bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin
276a5(rgyud): sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// kye sems dpa' pad+mo dga' mchog sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol// a la la la ho// kye gar dbang thar dga' dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig/
276a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bdag tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla ba dag lags a la la la ho// pad+mo sgyu ma sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad pa// pad+mo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas
276a7(rgyud): gar rnams mdzad du gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad da dung rnam par sbyong // pad+mo 'dzin pa de yi spyar sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig/ glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// sna tshogs pad+mo mnyam sbyor ba/
276b1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rdo /
276b2(rgyud): mchog rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// dpal ldan nyi ma phyag rgyar gnas// nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs// re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ rin chen thams cad mkha'
276b3(rgyud): las 'bebs// shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thab kyi nyi ma ni// dam pa'i don du drag por 'gyur// drag pos 'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams// drag po nyid kyis sgrub par
276b4(rgyud): byed nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang // tshul dang gzi brjid chen pos ston// rdo rje gzhu dang mda' mchog dag/ shin tu legs par 'gengs pa ste// mdang sa gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan/
276b5(rgyud): g.yon pa 'byed cing gyen du 'dogs// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa// drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad// dpal khams gsum
276b6(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings te// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas// bdag ni stan la 'dug nas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// dpal rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo // dbang bskur
276b7(rgyud): ba dang gter dag dang // rgyal mtshan mchog ldan mchod pa che// ji lta'i tshul dag ston pa dag/ rang gi don rnams 'grub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// rgyal po'i sgyu ma mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa//
277a1(rgyud): khyad par du ni bshad par bya// khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs mchog gi ror ldan pa// 'jal dus g.yul 'gyed rnam mang khyad par sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba/ jam pa sna tshogs mja'/
277a2(rgyud): dum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan can// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chub mchog sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa// bdag gi re ba kun sgrub myur du ston// a la la la
277a3(rgyud): te/ mi zing gter gyi dbang bskur khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol// khyad par rin chen 'di dag thams cad bud med rin chen rnams kyi phyir// rin chen tshogs kun mang na bud med rin chen gcig pu mchog/ bud med rin/
277a4(rgyud): chen dag pa dam pa'i don du thams cad 'gro// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag/
277a5(rgyud): rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor bas rnal 'byor dpal// rta yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// thams cad dag pa mos pa yis// sdig
277a6(rgyud): med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rab tu gdon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags can la g.yon par ston// gdug pa rnams la gdug par ston// zhi ba rnams la
277a7(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur// drag shul can la drag shul sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste// dbang phyug dam pa grub par 'gyur// g.yon pa'i
277b1(rgyud): mdzub mo khu tshur gyis// dpal ldan pad+mo sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje bcas shing spong ba sgrub// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// shin tu lhung bar gyur pa yang // de ma thag
277b2(rgyud): tu kun bslang nas// ldang ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje spong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor ba yis// brkyang bskum pa yi
277b3(rgyud): tshul byas nas// khro bo'i skyil mo krung bcas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu bshig/ dpal rdo rje khro bo gnas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di'i// rta mchog dpal dang ldan pa'i glu// las rnams thams
277b4(rgyud): cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// myos byed stong pas lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa
277b5(rgyud): stong pas shin tu lhag par ston// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod// thams cad rnam par dag pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis gnon pas gnon// hi he he he he/ dbang phyug
277b6(rgyud): thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'o stobs kyis ngo 'thon dbang phyug non// sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo mthon mthu
277b7(rgyud): chen non// mnyam sbyor ru Ta maT snying las dpal mo drongs shig rab drongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnod pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'tho tshangs pa nom// sbyor chen tshangs las grol ma drongs shig slar \u0f7f/ rab kyi tshul gyis gnon/
278a1(rgyud): pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dga' dbang non// mnyam sbyor kun gyi bdag la dga' drongs a la la la ho// gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir// sgrub zhugs a la/
278a2(rgyud): la la ho// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT phaT/ mdza' bo mi la bya 'am mi bya yongs rtog de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' bshes su zhig zer// rgol ba la yang bya 'am mi bya yongs su
278a3(rgyud): rtog pa med kyang bla// de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// rta mchog mnyam par sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub
278a4(rgyud): par 'gyur// thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// mdzub mos mthe bong mnan nas ni// rang gi mthe bos mdzub mo mnan// dpal grub spyan gi phyag rgya ste// mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur byas// rdo
278a5(rgyud): rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// rdo rje spyan ni gnyis dag tu// khong stong du ni sbyar bar bya// dpal grub rdo rje'i spyan yin no// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin
278a6(rgyud): pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dpal grub spyan ni grub pa ste// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// las kyi dngos grub rab 'jams rnams// ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grub/
278a7(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bo'i rtse mo mnyam par gzhag/ khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa'o// spyi bo'i mtshams su rab bzhag nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na
278b1(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas dngos grub ma lus pa// lus pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bong gnyis
278b2(rgyud): kyi mche ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma// 'grub pa bdud la sogs pa za// de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// de bzhir rnam par shes pa sgrub// gter rnams
278b3(rgyud): 'byin par byed pa dang // de bzhin nor kun 'phrog par byed// ngal bso bo ni dpal mnan te// dpal mo dag kyang phrogs nas ni// mngag gzhug mar ni byed pa dang // gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba spyod// gnod
278b4(rgyud): sbyor ngag gi sde dpon du// 'dis ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar ras// gung mo mnyam par rab tu sgrub// mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bani//
278b5(rgyud): pad+mo dri med rab tu rgyas// 'dis ni ldog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa byang nas rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan dpal mo'i phyag
278b6(rgyud): rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// mdzub mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste// mthe bong rdo rje g.yog pa ni// rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// nam mkha'i thams cad rab 'grub ste/
278b7(rgyud): bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang // mdzu mo rtse mnyam bkug pa ni// dpal mchog
279a1(rgyud): rta zhes grags pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'brel na// thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal// lha yis skal bzang smos ci dgos// dam tshig gi
279a2(rgyud): phyag rgya shes pa'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal// de bzhin//
279a3(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos grub ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa 'i//
279a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'dis// mi 'grub 'byor par mi 'gyur ba'i// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'//
279a5(rgyud): dpal sbyor ba'i// ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ldan// bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag/ kur gyi bdag la zhugs par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rgyal po'i
279a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba bskal ba bzang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// chags pa med cing ma cha grames/
279a7(rgyud): dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// bud med kun gyi sgyu sbyor 'di// gnyis su med pa'i theg pa'i mchog// phyag rgya 'di yis bta bar ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan sgyu ma kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje sems
279b1(rgyud): dpa' rab tu 'grub/ sgru ba thams cad kyi lha mo'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min// dbu mar yang ri dmigs su med// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub
279b2(rgyud): ba'o/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsum ngag ri ma lus pa// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong ba dang ni
279b3(rgyud): reg par 'gyur// dmigs su yod pa'ang ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // bud med la sogs ring chen mchog/ mkha' las
279b4(rgyud): dngos rnams thams cad spyod// dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas// nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ shin tu rtag par 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma dmar
279b5(rgyud): po 'di// chags pa'i nyes pas mi gos pa// rnal 'byor ldan pa'ang de bzhin du// gnas kyi nyes pas yong mi gos// shin tu gdug cing drag po la// zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs
279b6(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba ni// rnam par rgyal sring rab tu drag/ thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thor du// drag shul sbyor bas pa nyam sbyor ba// 'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya// sbyor
279b7(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sbyor ba ji snyed yod kun dang // byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// 'an/
280a1(rgyud): ba bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // chags pa chen po dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grug// ku tu ma tshogs skal ba bzang po ba la ma tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// byab/
280a2(rgyud): dang ni bzlog pa dang // khyad par du ni 'phrog pa dang // yan lag kun tu byed pa yis// de ni nor rnams kun kyang phrogs// 'o byed 'khyung la sogs pa yis// khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'debs so// thar par
280a3(rgyud): byed cing gsod par byed// shi ba'ang mos la sos par byed// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// gnas gsum po ni ma lus zer// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas su// gar byas nas ni za bar byed//
280a4(rgyud): sbyor ba kun gyi bde myong bas// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba
280a5(rgyud): mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing // bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang
280a6(rgyud): thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma che// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam sbyar ba// rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog/ mdzes par lta bas gar byas pa// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin/
280a7(rgyud): rdorje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas blangs nas ni// zos nas slar yang 'tsho bar byed// sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum// shin tu srid pa yang dag sgrub// gsang
280b1(rgyud): bar lta la gnas ma mi// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// srid pa kun tu kun bsgrubs nas// gnas gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan//
280b2(rgyud): mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur zhing // rim gror bcas shing sdig pa'i mchog/ steg pa'i lta bsdu kar byed cing // mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla
280b3(rgyud): gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum dag sgrub par byed// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i kha// khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin// khro la 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzum// gsal bar lta zhing
280b4(rgyud): legs par gnas// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyal po sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// 'dod chags myos pas g.yem spyog
280b5(rgyud): mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par bsgyur// 'di ni bzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// drag po mche ba rnon po gtsigs// gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs lha// g.yas pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis//
280b6(rgyud): khams gsum ngag kyang za bar byed// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum// g.yon pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang thar par byed// spyi bor rta mgrin gas mtho/
280b7(rgyud): ba rta gdong ljang ser kha dog gsal// so gtsigs pas ni mchu mnan na// 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed// bzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes po'i ma mchu sos mnan te//
281a1(rgyud): #'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// 'dod chags bde bas g.yem spyo ba// steg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di
281a2(rgyud): ni khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu g.yo bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sha chen gyis
281a3(rgyud): ni ro myong zhing // ma mchu so yis mnan pa yis// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// bde ba kun gyi ro myong zhing // ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pa// 'dzum pa'i phyag
281a4(rgyud): rgya mchog 'di ni// thal bar 'gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shes pa'o// bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// zang zing lta ba rnam bsgyur ba sa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa yi//
281a5(rgyud): khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog/ mdzes par lta ba'i gar byas pas// rgyas btab rmongs byas bsdang nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed// sangs/
281a6(rgyud): rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba// lta ba rab zhi bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bar bcas// lta ba rab 'bar rnam par
281a7(rgyud): bsgyur// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed// khro zhing 'gyur bar bcas par 'dzum// lta ba gsal la bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khros pa thams
281b1(rgyud): cad rab tu sgrug/ steg la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan// steg bcas lta ba'i gar byed pa// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug/ lta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// nam su
281b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba bud+d+he b+h+yoHzhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na// las dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med par thams cad 'grub// rang byung rnams kyi mchod ba kun/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/
281b3(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// lan cig brjod pas 'grub pa'i phyir// dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis// gang dag byas par ma gyur cing // spel ba dag tu ma gyur pa'i// dam pa rgya chen
281b4(rgyud): de dag med// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sa d+ha ni swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// stobs kyis myur du bkug nas ni// bran bzhin du ni byed du 'jug/
281b5(rgyud): su b+ha gA staM ma hA na de bi he ra/ mi ri/ r-i ti/ ni ri shri ye swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba kun sbyin pa'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab
281b6(rgyud): bsgrubs na// bud med gzhan lta ci zhig smos// tAM b+hA ba Ta TA/ re ba/ traT tAT/ re ba thams cad kun rdzogs pa// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// ri ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// shrI badz+ra padrA ba Da ba mu kha yo gA shA
281b7(rgyud): ra hau hi hi hi hi/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// skad kyi gsang ni mthong man dang // gle sbyar bcos shing bzlas pa dang // dus su rab zhi mchog rnams kyi/
282a1(rgyud): hUM la sogs pa'i glu blang zhing // tshig rnams kur gyis ci 'dod par// ji ltar spro bar glu kun gyis// hUM gi glu yi phyag rgya dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pa'o// lha mo kur gyi
282a2(rgyud): lha mo mchog/ cha lugs bzhin du gar bya zhing // ka ka la shang ba la sogs// glu rnams thams cad rjes su blang // oM gyi glu yi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci dgar blangs// ma lus lus pa
282a3(rgyud): med pa yi// sems can thams cad thar par byed// rdo rje drag po gad mo che// mkhur ba'i dbugs kyis rlung 'byor cing // 'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa yi// ru lu ru lu'i sgra byung na// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor//
282a4(rgyud): pa khams gsum dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing // thar par byed cing gsod par byed// shi ba mod la 'tsho bar byed// rdo rje drag tu bzhad pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// Te zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya// thams cad
282a5(rgyud): dag par rab bsgrubs pa'o// hi zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byedado// ka ka la lce dang co rang dbyangs// de bzhin rab tu gdangs snyan dang // ka ha sha yi klu yi rgya// 'joms pa
282a6(rgyud): thams cad grub po'o// glu yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// gling bu dag ni rlung gcig dang // de bzhin rgyud mangs rgyud sdug dang // sil snyan phyag rgya bshang ba rnams// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// cha lugs
282a7(rgyud): bzhin du gar byed pas so// ma brdungs par yang rab tu 'grub// las rnams kun la mchog tu ni// brdungs na dpal ni bzhi 'gyur 'grub// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig dang // bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam par sel
282b1(rgyud): la sogs pa'i thabs// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// rba d+hU ba sto/ dra T+Ta man+t+ra/ sA rA rAT/ su su phu lu/ pra sid+d+ha/ tsak+ki dz+dzaHkIni d+hu tsU r+tha/ tsaskr-i s+phu pra lu h+ya lu/ a la la la po/ shud+d+ha sid+d+ha/ dArA/
282b2(rgyud): Sha ya sarba maT k+She g+he k+ShaM/ nunu g+he g+he g+ha~M/ Ta m+le Ta ke ge ga ga~M/ Ta ta kaM/ Ta ga~M/ ha~M To Na/ Takr-i hUM dzaHge ta ge d+ho na/ TarbI n+na d+hu/ a la la la ho/ ru n+ya maT+Ta/ thal mo brdab pa brtag pa'o// Ta g+he g+he/ Ta g+ha~M g+ha~M/ Ta ken
282b3(rgyud): Ta ts+tshe g+hI ts+tsha/ Ta gI m+le Ta g+h+raM/ rgyan gyi rnga'o// AM A A/ hA hA hAM/ dAnA n+te/ drA d+ha d+h+waM/ dam tshig gsum gyi ri'o// de g+h+r-i kr-I g+ha k+to/ d+he badz+ra badz+ra trung / ka~M ka~M ki kau/ d+hur+dz+dza r+thA dz+dza nAn+d+ha d+hu b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hU~M/
282b4(rgyud): d+ho k+Shok+Shau k+tok+Shau/ ts+tshe/ kr-I k+Sho k+Shau/ D+ho kau kau kau/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i rdo rje rnga'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma pad+ma hr-iH/ pad+ma pad+ma tri/ pad+ma pad+ma shi/ pad+ma pad+ma hAM/ dpal pad+ma rdo rje brdabs pa'i rnga'o// trAM NAH/
282b5(rgyud): thAg+h+na / sa// rgyam po'i 'o// sa pa sems pa'i 'a so// Sh+Tha Ad+d+ha
282b6(rgyud): byur zhing rab tu myur ba'o// ti Da b+ha ta/ ba hU~M/ ta thA ga tA/ ba hUM ta Ta b+ha ta ta b+ha ta he na/ dpal rta mchog rnam par rol pa'o// ta tA b+ha naT b+ha tAt+t+wa/ shin tu myur ba'i rnga'i phyag rgya ste/ so la snyam gyi phyag rgya
282b7(rgyud): shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas/ lag gnyis rdo rjer bcings pa yi// rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor gyi dkyil
283a1(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'du 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig smos// g.yon pa'i se gol brdabs pa dang // thal mo dal bus brdabs pas 'grug
283a2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i thal mo yin par gsungs// gnyis ka kun tu sdud pa yin// thal mo'i sbyor ba rab sbyor bas// las kyi tshul bzhin 'brang ba dang // thal mo dal bus bsdu ba dang // glu dang sil snyan gar
283a3(rgyud): byed pas// steg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang // rgod dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang // mi sdug ngo mtshar zhi ba yi// nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don sgrub// steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// sna tshogs phyag
283a4(rgyud): rgya'i gar byas pas// thams cad bdag nyid rgyar sbyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' steg pa la// dpal la dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje la// rgod
283a5(rgyud): ba 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje nyi ma khro ba la// rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa la// shAkya thub pa mi sdug la// ngo mtshar la ni a ra li// rab tu zhi la sangs rgyas rtag/ sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'i
283a6(rgyud): phyir/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi// nye bar gnas shing byin gyis rlobs// lta bas mi ngoms pa yi gzugs// thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad// legs so zhes bya 'grub pa yi// mchog tu
283a7(rgyud): gyur pa'ang rab tu stsol// thams cad bdag nyid grub pa'i mchog/ re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas kun tu 'gyur ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor dam pa ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya sbyor ba 'di dag gis//
283b1(rgyud): rang gi mchod pa rab tu sbyar// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// sbyor ba thams cad rnam 'phrul dang // phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan rnams dang // sna tshogs phyag rgya rnam sprul pas// yid la bsam pa kum rdzog/
283b2(rgyud): byaphyir mchod pa dam par sbyar bar bya// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur// kun 'byung la sogs sbyor ba yis// rgol bdag dang gar byas te// de nas rgol bar ci rigs
283b3(rgyud): pa sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas slar ni rgol ba yeng // rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bsgyur// nol pa'ang de nas tshul bzhin du// pad+mo gar 'byung mchog tu bsgyur// de nas slar du rgol ba yang /
283b4(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu bsgyur// de nas phyir yang rgol ba ni// rta mchog 'byung bar bsgyur bar bya// de nas slar ni rgol ba yang // bdag nyid 'byung bar rab tu 'grub// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// sdom pa thams cad rab ston/
283b5(rgyud): pardo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu/ khyad par du ni bshad par bya// la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang // la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyi ma bye ba phrag dgu'i 'od zer
283b6(rgyud): mchog pas 'jigs// la lar mdangs bzang gzi che ba de dang zhi bar ldan par rgyal ba'i gzugs su snang // la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston// rdo rje sems
283b7(rgyud): dpa' 'dul la mkhas pa ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams la// a ra li thams cad mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod// ru ta ma te a la la la ho/ rnam pa mang po 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshul la gar mkhan mchog gis gar mdzadas/
284a1(rgyud): dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mdzod a la la la ho// rnam mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa yis thar pa'i bde ba'ang thob par mdzod// 'di dag glur ni blangs pa yis// sangs
284a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de ltar rab tu gar byas te// de las gang zhig lam gyur pa// tshogs la de yis tshogs kyi zas// yon dang
284a3(rgyud): bcas par dbul bar bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin rtag par bsrungs par 'gyur// rims dang dug dang
284a4(rgyud): dbyig dug dang // mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams dang // bdud dang sems can dmyal ba'i rnams// 'di yis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dngos grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs// dga' dang de bzhin bdag
284a5(rgyud): po dang // sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad dang // phyag rgya'i mchog rnams grub par 'gyur// gar gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rab tu dga' ba rjes su rab chags dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pas/
284a6(rgyud): rab tu dga' bar sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod// rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang // rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug
284a7(rgyud): tshe mchog grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs ho rta mchog ho// rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog la rol cig ho// bde bas slong la rnam par rol cig hUM snang mdzod// a la la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs
284b1(rgyud): pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis// slob ma rab tu gzung du gsol// kye ma'o bde ba grub par mdzod// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba stsol// dam par rab tu zhugs par mdzod// bdag la rab tu dgyes par
284b2(rgyud): gyur a la la la ho/ e ma'o shi shi zhugs shig zhugs shig mkha' 'gro bde mchog yongs bskor kun tu zhugs// 'di dag glur ni blangs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde
284b3(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa dang // rdo rje rin chen pa med pa// rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang // rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// hUM rdo rje las kyi mnga' gzhul phyag 'tshal lo//
284b4(rgyud): dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// la lar rab tu drag cing skye bor drag la drag
284b5(rgyud): ba'i bud med sku ltar rab tu snang // 'gro ba mtha' yas 'drul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku// la lar rab tu nges shing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzad//
284b6(rgyud): la lar rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa pad+ma rgyal po'i dam tshig dag la grub par mdzod// thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter mchog bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// kun mchog rgyal
284b7(rgyud): mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la grub par mdzod// la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin// la lar dus mtha'i dus ltar drag/ la lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du zhi/
285a1(rgyud): la lar rta mchog sbyor bas 'dod bsdug dzo rje klu'i mchod pa'i byas tu shes pa'o// me tog dkar dang ngam rab dang // mthing la ser po kun bsdus pa/ me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di mi
285a2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro// rgya skyegs mthing kha ljang khu'i mdog/ tshon sna bzhi yis bcos pa dang // dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/ snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub// khams las byung ba thams cad dang /
285a3(rgyud): srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa// snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub// tsan dan gnyis dang gla rtsi dang // ga bur nag shal ki/ bdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba// las rnams thams
285a4(rgyud): cad rab sgrub pa'o// gan dar dri dang gu gul dang // sardza ga pur gla rtsi dang // rdzas 'di dag las bcos pa'i mar// me mar byas na snang ba skye// tsan dan gur kum smri ka dang // ga pur dang ni gla rtsi dang /
285a5(rgyud): bcas pa bdug pa grub pa ste// spos kyi phyag rgya spos mchog 'gyur// ka ko la dang sug smel dang // gla sgang ga pur gla rtsi dang // 'di rnams zhib tu btags pa ni// seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyar/
285a6(rgyud): shing tsha pa tA lo drA dang // na le sham dang ga pur sbyar// sa ha ka re shing mar gyis// sbrus pa kha yi spos yin no// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba'o// me tog dmar po sangs rgyas
285a7(rgyud): la/ rdo rje can la sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang la me tog dkar// ser po mkha' las byung ba la// tsan dan bdug pa sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la du ru ka/ spyan ras gzigs dbang
285b1(rgyud): ka pi ta// rtse bog rdo rje nyi ma la// mar me 'phreng ba sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la mar me bdun// spyan ras gzigs la mar me brgya// stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la// sangs rgyas rnams la can dang spros
285b2(rgyud): rdo rje can la gur kum yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan dan dmar// ga pur rdo rje nyi ma la/ me tog kun dang bdug pa kun// de bzhin mar me thams cad dang // spos rnams thams cad ji snyed
285b3(rgyud): pa/ rdo rje rtal 'bul du rung // mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// sgeg mo dang ni na chung dang // myos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang // gcig tu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra// g.yon can
285b4(rgyud): bran mo de bzhin te// lan tshwa la sogs ro kun dang // kha ra la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin// bdag nyid kun gyi ro sgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sha dang chang du ldan pa yi// bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa
285b5(rgyud): ni dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste// tshe yi dam pa rab tu 'grub// a 'bra sprin dang rgun 'brum dang // banas dang nA le ker// a ru ga la sogs 'bras bu'i// phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'di rnams
285b6(rgyud): te/ dngos grub 'bras bu thams cad 'thob// khar sbrang rtsi byugs pa yis// a 'bra la sogs tshig gus byug/ sa ha ra yi mar la sogs// mnyam pa'i dri yis bslu bar bya// yungs dang rgya skyegs
285b7(rgyud): la sogs pa'i// tshon gyis 'thun par kha bsgyur nas// shun pa gro ba la sogs byas/ mchod pa'i tshe na 'bul bar bya// 'bras bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sangs rgyas
286a1(rgyud): rnams la bshos dbul bar// sha dang chang ni rnam par spangs// glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bdan dang // sha dang chang du bcas pa ni// gtor
286a2(rgyud): ma'i mchog ste sna tshogs pa'o// bdag gi phyug chen skal bzang po// rdo rje'i las ni dpal grub pa'o// bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang // pad+ma'i me tog ldan pa ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang
286a3(rgyud): gtso bo la// phul na dgos pa thams cad 'grub// rgyal po'i kha zas sna tshogs pa// sha dang chang du ldan pa dang // glu dang sil snyan skal bzang dag/ rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dbul// kha zas kun gyi
286a4(rgyud): ro rnams dang // sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang / ka sha yi sbyor dang sha skam dang // bshos dag rdo rje rnal dbul// mchod pa dang gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong sems dpa'i phyil
286a5(rgyud): mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyor// lhag mardo rje thal mo sbar// sangs rgyas rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba// rgyal srid thams
286a6(rgyud): cad ma lus pa// lus pa med par myur du 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang lhag par ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen mchog/ dbu rgyan kun tu brgyan par bya// dbu rgyan bcing
286a7(rgyud): bas bcings nas ni// 'gying zhing mtha' nas dgrol bar bya// dar gyi mtha' ma spangs pa ltar// byas nas thal mo brdab par bya// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// de yis dgra
286b1(rgyud): ming sdig med pa// bdag gi longs spyod nyid du spyod// 'di yis bsrung ba byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub che// 'khor lo sgyur ba rab tu 'grub// de bzhin
286b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyun mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal gyi 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o// sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol// sor mo rtse mo kun sprad nas// mthe bong rdo rje
286b3(rgyud): mnan pa ni// snang dang mig phugs lta bu ste// pad+mo rin chen phyag rgya 'di// bdag nyid chen por dbang bskur ba// rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa// lus pa med par myur du 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral
286b4(rgyud): ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang lhag par sbyar// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan te// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu 'bar// dbu rgyan bcing bas bcings nas ni// 'gying ba'i mtha' nas dgrol bar bya//
286b5(rgyud): dar gyi mtha' ma sbyangs pa ltar// byas nas thal mo brdab par bya// 'di yis bsrung ba byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// khams gsum dag ni rgyal srid che// 'khor los sgyur
286b6(rgyud): b.rab tu 'grub/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka pad+mo ror bu rin po che'i dbu rgyun mnyam par sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// lag gnyis nor chu
286b7(rgyud): ririn chen du// ji ltar rigs par mnyam sbyar nas// mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtse mo bzhi// yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su// dpral bar legs par bzhag nas ni// khams gsum bdag po rgyal bar bdag
287a1(rgyud): ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yi// mdzub mo gnyis pa'i mdud par bcig// gung mo mtho po'i dri mo can// rdodzA/
287a2(rgyud): phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas kyang // khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag na// rgyal srid thams cad legs 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// rdo rje las kyi
287a3(rgyud): dpal dang 'dra// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// ma mo dang ni byad ma dang // mkha' 'gro ma yang lhag par 'grub// dur khrod dngos grub thams cad dang /
287a4(rgyud): las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dpa' bo'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag ma rdo rje thal
287a5(rgyud): mo'i 'od// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o// 'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang /
287a6(rgyud): 'drar sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// mdzub mo snyam ste phyi rol
287a7(rgyud): dgug/ mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya// dpral bar myur du bzhag pa ni// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // rgyal srid thams cad rab bsgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med par
287b1(rgyud): 'grub// dpal nor bu rin po che dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog/ rta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/
287b2(rgyud): phyag rgyas rab tu dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mo yin par bshad// sor mo thams cad bsdams pa ni// rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa
287b3(rgyud): byas nas ni// mdzub mo mthe bo'i nang dag tu// g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i mtshan ma 'di// rtse mo bcu la bsdam par bya// dga' chen dpal gyi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya thams cad rang byung ba// rab 'byams las
287b4(rgyud): rnams dngos grub ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/ mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur// 'di
287b5(rgyud): yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dpal bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de las gung me lcags kyu ni//
287b6(rgyud): bdag gi snying khar sbyar bar bya// 'di ni thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya// de ma thag tu phyag rgya 'dis// sangs rgyas pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// bkug ste dbang du byas nas ni// las
287b7(rgyud): rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyog rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// phung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug mthe'u chung mthe bo rtse mo tsam/ rdo rje'i
288a1(rgyud): phyag rgyar yongs bsgyur na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar yang // sbyor ba 'di yis mi dka' na// dngos grub gzhan dang las kyi mchog/ rab 'byams gzhan lta ci
288a2(rgyud): zhig smos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing ba las// sbyor ldan thal mo khong stong sbyar// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// de ma thag tu 'bebs
288a3(rgyud): par byed// dpal rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las// gung mo de bzhin bkug nas ni// rdo rje rdo rje zhes brjod de// gung mo nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni//
288a4(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la gnas te// mthe bo'i rtse mo de bzhin mnyam//
288a5(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// dag pa kun la rab tu gnas// byang chub sems ni mtha' yas mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab tu
288a6(rgyud): 'grub// dpal rdo rje'i rab tu gnas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i pad+mor byas pa las// gung mo bcings pa'i dbus na gnas// mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i rtse mo mde'u// rdo rje mda' ni yongs su 'phang // phyag rgya 'di
288a7(rgyud): yis btab na ni// tshangs pa nye dbang dga' byed bcas// mthu yis myur du brgyal byas nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// dpal rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings nas// gung mo bcings
288b1(rgyud): pa'i phyi rol pa zhag/ rdo rje sna tshogs dpal gyi rgya// ldang ba thams cad rab grub pa'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya thams cad shes pa'o// A li kA li mnyam byas nas// mkha' yi thad kar bsdu bar bya// de yi 'og tu ri/
288b2(rgyud): mo rnams// yi ge thams cad dgod par bya// gug skyed dag gi lcug mar bya// yi ge ra ni myu gur bya// klang kor zla ba khams pa dang // tshe ga gnyis zla ba gnyis su bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
288b3(rgyud): phyag rgya mi 'gyur dam pa ste// sangs rgyas dpal gyi ri mo bshad// yi ge dag kyang mi 'gyur mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris ma// sdig pa kun las thar
288b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor zhes// rab tu chags pa'i mtshan bris na// sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grug
288b5(rgyud): chags chen grol ba pal zhes pa'i// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// 'gro ba kun la rab tu gnas// snying rje dri med khro dpal zhes// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris ma
288b6(rgyud): sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// dngos grub kun gyi mchog kyang 'grug/ pad+mo chags pa dpal dag ces// chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// dag pa thams cad rnam
288b7(rgyud): par dag/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dpal mdangs zhes// bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// longs spyod kun la rab tu gnas// rta mchog pha rol gnon dpal zhes// chags pa'i
289a1(rgyud): mtshan dag bris na ni// sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur// dbang phyug thams cad rab tu 'grub// brjod pa dag kyang de bzhin te// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams dag/ ma lus par ni myur//
289a2(rgyud): du 'grub// lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gi/ slob dpon gang dang gang yin pas// de dang de yi mtshan dag ni// dpal gyi tshig dang ldan par brjod// slob ma dkyil 'khor btsud nas kyang // yon gyi mchog dang blangs
289a3(rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs par de lung bstan// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// rdo rje'i ming du rab tu gnas// de nas sangs rgyas su yang
289a4(rgyud): 'gyur// bstod pa dang bcas pa'i ming gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// spyi bor nyug pa gang yin pa// phyag 'tshal bar ni ston pa yin// dpral bar reg par byed pa ni// phyag lan yin par shes par bya// smin ma bskul
289a5(rgyud): pa gang yin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda// g.yas pas nam mkhar 'gro ba 'grub// g.yon pa rnam par rgyal ba yi// rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya// mig gnyis g.yo bar 'grub pa ste// g.yon pa bud
289a6(rgyud): med bzang mo yi// g.yas pa skyes pa bzang po'o// rna ba dag la reg pa'i brda// g.yas g.yon gnyis ka de bzhin te// g.yon pa legs par blangs pa'i glu// g.yas pa legs par smras pa'o// sna yi bu
289a7(rgyud): ga gnyis kyi brda// sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa ste// g.yas pa bdag la bdug pa slong // g.yon pa bdag la dri slong ba'o// lce ni ldag pa ltar byed pa// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa sha yi
289b1(rgyud): brag rgya yin// g.yon pa chang gi phyag rgya yin// mche ba g.yas dang g.yon pa yi// bar du ma mchu mnan pa ni// g.yon pa bud med reg na bde// g.yas pa de bzhin skyes pa'o// lkog mar reg pa'ang de
289b2(rgyud): bzhin te// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// rtog pa thams cad smra ba'i mchog/ snying khar gyen du 'dren pa ni// rang byung phyag rgya'i brda grub pa// rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa ste/
289b3(rgyud): 'khor ba shin tu sdud pa'o// lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// dbu ma'i nan tan bsgrubs pa yis// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil// rang gi dbang po sgreng ba ni// rang byung
289b4(rgyud): rnams kyi brda yi rgya// de las de bzhin bde ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// phrag pa gnyis ni kun bstod pa// brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste// g.yas pa 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya yin//
289b5(rgyud): g.yon pa slad du gtong ba'o// dpung pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yi// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa thams cad 'grub pa yin// g.yon pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub// khu tshur g.yas
289b6(rgyud): g.yon gnyis ka yis// khu tshur bcings dang dgrol ba dag/ g.yas pa rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa mi rnams thong zhig pa'o// brla gnyis rab tu bsdams pa ni// g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te//
289b7(rgyud): g.yon pa 'dod la rab tu brtson// g.yas pa chos la brtson pa'o// pus mo lha nga'i brda dag kyang // g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa 'dud pa'i phyag rgya ste// g.yas pa rab tu phyag 'tshal ba'o// pus
290a1(rgyud): mo g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// brda yi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas// g.yas pa bcing ba'i phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa thams cad rnam par dgrol// rkang pa gnyis kyis sa gnon pa/
290a2(rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te// g.yon pa thams cad gnod par byed// g.yas pa thams cad rab tu 'joms// dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// rang don las rnams/
290a3(rgyud): rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// oM a ti b+hu zhes bya ba'i brda// 'di ni phyag 'tshal ba zhes pa'o// pra ti oM d+hi b+hu zhes pa// phyag lam yin par shes par bya'o//
290a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// e ma'o bde ba yin par bshad// e ma'o bde ba dpal gyi mtshan// rdo rje sems dpa'
290a5(rgyud): gang brjod pa// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// bde mchog e ma'o bde ba dang // sgron ma de bzhin shi shi dag/ rgyus 'debs ma dang rmongs byed dang // zab mo dang /
290a6(rgyud): tshe 'phel ma// sangs rgyas byang chub chos 'khor lo// de bzhin khams gsum rnam par rgyal// 'dod pa'i lcug ma thams cad kyang // phyag rgya brda yi phyag rgya'o// rta dang rdo rje'i zhal dag dang // de bzhin rdo rje/
290a7(rgyud): snang ba dang // thal bar rlog pa'i ro langs ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// gling bu dang ni rgyung rnams dang // de bzhin du ni rgyud gcig dang // stug po dang ni rdza rnga dag/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o//
290b1(rgyud): me tog mchod dang bdug pa'i mchod// de bzhin mar me'i mchod pa dang // spos kyi mchod pa gla rtsi dag/ longs spyod phyag rgya'i brda yin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi
290b2(rgyud): mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo kun gyi brda yin no// smin ma bskyod pa mnga' bzhi yin// b+ha ga ling ga e ma'o// thod pa pad+mo yin par bshad// kha T+wAM ga yang rgyal mtshan che// sangs
290b3(rgyud): rgyas phyag rgya pad+mor gnas// bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// shi shi sangs rgyas kun tu bshad// dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad// de nyid dam tshig yin par
