389a5(rgyud): so/ slar yang mi ldog go/ 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin pa la nyungs kar bskyed pa la sngags mang du bzlas nas gtor na 'byer ro// byis pa gsar du btsas pasrung ba ni kham por dza
389a6(rgyud): rgyus kyis bris pa bcang ngo // spra tshol gyis gzugs sor bzhi pa'i tshang du byas pa'i sgo khar bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bcug la kha la tsher ma btsugs na bsgrub bya'i kha la tshe la bcug
389a7(rgyud): pabar 'gyur ro// rkang pa la btsugs na rengs so// snying la btsugs na dran pa stor bar byed do// mi'i rje ngar gyi rus pa'i phur bu 'am/ lcags bur yan lag gang dang gang la btab pa de zha ba'am rengs
389b1(rgyud): par byed do// ngur khrod kyi thal ba la lan mang du bsngags nas dgra zo'i sgo 'og tu btab na 'byer ro// g.yul du zhugs nas ral gri la bsngags te bzung nga rgyal lo// gang la'ang gtor ma'i bye brag gis/
389b2(rgyud): 'grub nges so// dur khrod du phyin te sdong thod pa la pad sngal dkar po'i sdong bu dang tshil chen gyi mar me byas la/ tshes brgyad dam bcu pa ni la sbar ba'i du ba mig la byugs na gzhan gyis
389b3(rgyud): mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyi ma 'am zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe/ mi g.yo mgon po'i sku kham pa la byas nas me tog shel pa l-i ka 'am/ tan rjod pa las byas mchod cing sngags mtshan
389b4(rgyud): thog thag bzlas pas tshe lo stong thub bo// yang zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe dum bu drug pa'i thod par khrag sna tshogs blugs te/ maN+Dal nag po'i thog tu bzhag nas kha me long gis bcad de/ de'i steng du kham
389b5(rgyud): pa las byas pa'i mi g.yo ba bzhag ste/ rang nyid gcer bu'i lus ma he'i rnam lngas byugs te/ mtshan thog thag bzlas na srid pa gsum mthong bar 'gyur ro// yang nyi ma zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe maN+Dal
389b6(rgyud): gru bzhi pa byas nas grwa bzhir ral gri btsugs la/ rang nyid gcer bu lus thams cad thal bas byugs te mtshan thog thag bzlas na srid pa gsum gsal bar 'gyur ro// gal te gter kha dbye bar 'dod pas mi g.yo mgon
389b7(rgyud): po'i sku kham pa las byas la/ sman drug la sogs pa dri zhim po thams cad dang lhan cig pa'i rin po che'i snod kha sbyar du bcug nas/ maN+Dal dkar po'i dbus su khri'u la bzhag nas/ dus gsum du mchod cing
390a1(rgyud): bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad byas te gsol ba gdab cing / a ka ru la sogs pa'i spos sreg cing bstod pa byas na zla ba gsum gyi rjes su gter rnyed nges so// gal te char 'bebs
390a2(rgyud): par 'dod na klu yod pa'i gnas su klu'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ spra tshil lam bag zan la dga' bo la sogs pa'i gzugs byas te/ kha dog tha dad par byas nas maN+Dal der bzhugs te dam tshig pa
390a3(rgyud): bskyed nas/ dbus su mi g.yo mgon po dang bcas pa la ye shes kyi lha bcug nas/ ka ra dang / bu ram dang / sbrang dang / 'o ma la sogs pas mchod cing rtsa ba'i sngags 'brug ltar bsgrags pas klu rnams/
390a4(rgyud): skrag nas char pa'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do// gal te mi 'bab mthod pa dum bu gcig par klu'i gzugs rnams bcug la/ gdug pa can gyi mes bsros na char shing rta'i phang lo tsam zhag bdun du 'bebs
390a5(rgyud): pa la the tshom med do// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyor ka phra mo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bsam gtan brtan las byung
390a6(rgyud): ba ning ra 'khrul med nyid do gnod rnams sel// khams gsum rgyal po cher nyon cig/ spro bsdu'i rom pa gobs gyur las// ji sring 'dod kyi dus par du// rang sems gnas nas brtad par 'gyur/
390a7(rgyud): dngos med dngos sogs ma lus pa'i// rnab rtog rab rib kun bas lams// nyon mongs da rnams ma lus pa// bag chags dang bcas gtan bcom nas// 'phral du yang ni brod ka s+ye// spro yang mi dmigs
390b1(rgyud): bsdu ba dmigs// skye med 'gag med ting nge 'dzin// 'byung med 'gro med bsam gtan la// gnas na ye shes myur du thog / 'bra med ye shes yon tan dang // mthu rnams che bar 'gyur ba mi/ bra ma mnyes
390b2(rgyud): las rnyed 'gyur ba'i// de nyid bdud rtsi bcud kyis len// gus pas rtag par nyin mtshan du// rgya mchad med par gom sa byas na// myur du phyag rgya cher po lo// nga ngos grub sdod du 'gyur ba lamaka' bang rtsol byang
390b3(rgyud): chub yan lag ste// le loganyid dang g.yeng ba spang // sngags la dmigs pa brtan gyur cing // bsam gtam thod nas 'khrul 'khor brtsam// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par la// groga'am yang na shing shun la/
390b4(rgyud): gur kum gi'u wang tsan dan gyis// rdo rje rgya gras su khyud bcas// dbus su ming dang sngags spel bri// mu khyud la ni rtse sngags bri// ra kun la ni sU dang ming // spel te g.yas nas bskor la bri// dkyil
390b5(rgyud): 'khor dkar po'i dbus su ni// me tog dkar po snying bzhag nas// lha'i skur ni bskyed byas te// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas nas// gang zhig 'dod pa'i dpung pa 'am// lus la bcangs na srung bar byed/
390b6(rgyud): kham por gsar pa la rdo rdzas kyis bris te/ skor bcangs na gsar du bcas pa'i byis pa srung ngo // dur khrod kyi ras la sngags ming dang bcas pa bris te/ spra tshal gyis gtums nas dur khrod kyi bum par sug
390b7(rgyud): nas kha rdo rje rgya gram gyis bcad de sbas na mngal skem par byed do// phyung nas 'o mas bkrus na sos so// gal te gsad par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag por byas pa'i steng du kham pa las
391a1(rgyud): byas pa'i mi g.yo mgon po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang rdo rje/ sdigs mdzub dang thod khrag g.yon na 'chang ba byas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
391a2(rgyud): pa bzhugs so// de nas dri ma drug pa bag zar las bsgrub bya'i gzugs sor brgyad byas nas rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo bsad pa'i sham bu dang bcas pa snying khar bcug ste de'i sku'i zhabs su bzhag nas/
391a3(rgyud): rang nyid lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas zur bzhir mi nus sam/ seng ldeng ngam/ lcags las byas pa'i phur bsor bzhi pa bzhag pa la/ zung mtshams thams cad du btab pas shes pa brgyal bar
391a4(rgyud): bsam mo// de'i 'od kyis mdun gyi phur pa mi g.yo bar bsgoms pa'i thugs bskul nas/ de las khro bo lcags kyu dang zhags pa thogs pa grangs med pa spros pas/ bsgrub bya rlung gi 'khor lo la bzhag
391a5(rgyud): nas 'ongs pas skad cig tsam gyis phung po gtor nas shes pa ling ga la bstim par bya'o// de ltar zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byas pas hom khung du bsreg pa 'am/ mnan pa byas na dbang phyug chen po'ang gsod/
391a6(rgyud): par nges na gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos/ yang na dur dang / khyi khrag dang / nya'i khrag gis 'khor lo ral gri'i rtse mo ltar rdo bar byas nas// lte ba'i dbus su gru gsum me'i nang du bsgrub bya'i ming dang chung du
391a7(rgyud): bcas pa bris la/ de zhags pas bskor bar bya'o// rtsibs rnams su sngags kyi rkang pa brgyad pa bri'o// mu khyud la ming dang bcas pa'i snying po bri'o// de'i rgyab kyi mu khyud la las thams cad pa bri'o// mu
391b1(rgyud): khyud gsum pa la rdo rje dang ral gri spel nas bri bar bya'o// de nas zong ba kha sbyar gyi nang du bcuganas zhing skas bcings te/ bsgrub bya dag pa pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas khro bo shin tu khros pas
391b2(rgyud): khrag 'dren pa'i lta bas bltas na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gang la byas pa de khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi'o// dur khrod du zas ma mtshon gyi bskal pa babs nas 'chi'o// shing gcig gi rtsar sbas na
391b3(rgyud): rengs so// chu mdor sbas na 'byer ro// lam rgya gram du sbas na spro'o// lha rten zhabs su sbas man por 'gyur// klu yod pa'i sar sbas na mdzes zin pa la the tshom med do// rang nyid kyi nyal
391b4(rgyud): ba'i zhabs su sbas na 'dod pa'i bu mo khugs so// ci ste rgyal mtshon gyi rtse mo la btags na dmag kyang rengs so// de dag thams cad la khro bo 'bar bdud pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa phyag bzhi zhabs
391b5(rgyud): bzhi spyan gsus dang ldan par blta'o// dur khrod kyi ras la dmag pon gyi mong dang spel ba'i sngags rdo rje rgya mam gyi skye bar bris la mtha' yi ge mo brgyad kyis mnan te/ de'i phyi rol
391b6(rgyud): dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rgya gram bris la/ de spra tshol las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying khar btsugs nas gang zab pa'i mtshams su bzhag na dmag rengs so// gzhan yang
391b7(rgyud): gza' skar la bltas te 'phyar ro// bskrad par 'dod na gro ga 'am ras la bya rog dang 'ug pa'i khrag gis gong du gsungs pa'i 'khor lo bris te/ uts+tsha Ta la spel bar bya'o// char che ba 'am ser ba gcad
392a1(rgyud): par 'dod ma gro ga la gur kum mam gi'u wang gis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa byas la mu khyud gsum pa byas te/ rtsibs bzhi la snying po'i sngags yi ge hUM la bskor ba bris la/
392a2(rgyud): dbus kyi lte bar yi ge k+ShiM bris te/ de la rtsa ba'i sngags g.yon bskor du bris nas/ mu khyud dang po la las thams cad pa'i sngags bri'o// gnyis pa la ral gri'i 'phreng ba / gsum pa la kun tu ma ri'o//
392a3(rgyud): de ltar dmigs te mchod nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na char ches pa dang ser ba 'chad par 'gyur ro// yang gsang par 'dod pas kham pa'i bar bu la mi g.yo ba'i snying po mtshal gyis g.yon
392a4(rgyud): bskor du bris nas/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum gyi nang du gong du bstan pa'i ling ga'i snying khar ming dang bcas pa bcug nas gan kyal du steng du kha gzar te/ las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas shing
392a5(rgyud): zhag bcu drug tu las bya'o// de nas dur khrod kyi sa la byas pa'i mchod rten khru gang ba nag po'i bum pa'i nang du rang gis srung ba nyid bcug nas/ mchod rten bang rim gsum man chad stong pa'i nang du tsha
392a6(rgyud): tsha lnga bzhag pas/ gru gsum kha bkab cing lho phyogs su gzhag go/ des zla ba gnyis na 'chi nges so// gal te gzhan gyi rig sngags gcad par 'dod na dbang chen gyi dbus su tshogs kyi bdag po bras
392a7(rgyud): thu gams sang po thams kyis bca ba sa/ mas ca sa rgyas pan rab sa/ ma pas bathu kyi ma 'a mangs dag bdun gyi ga ldanas
392b1(rgyud): yang sgrubanas na spang ba'i 'khrul 'khor ro// na su kun d+ha ra bkrus pa la 'khrul 'khor rengs pa 'gyur ba nga bcas pa'am grub rdzong tha byas shing tshal la mar ma byas mas/ du ba de dngam/
392b2(rgyud): nas mig la bskus da dgras mi mthong ngo // yang dpral bar thig le bya ste/ lag pa la bslus nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur nges so// gang ba la bslus na dpag chad brgyad 'gro nus so// sA lu'i phye
392b3(rgyud): ma la gzugs byas te bye ma nges bskus na dgra rengs par byed // dur khrod kyi thal ba dang bcas pas dgra po'i sgo'am dpung la gtor na nad kyis thebs so// tsu tsun d+ha ra'i pags pa la 'khrul 'khor
392b4(rgyud): bris nas dbugs kyis brgyangs te sngags stong bzlas nang gra de spos nas 'chi'o// de la sngags ni/ tad+ya thA na ma mastu te/ ma hA ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ oM ga ga na a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ oM ga na pa ti pra dz+nyA pa ta ye
392b5(rgyud): sAtra na mastu ti ma hA ga Na pa te ye sA hA/ au ka ra ka raT/ ma Ta maT/ dA ra dA ra/ bi dA ra bi dA ra / ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ da d+ha ba dad+ya ba/ ga ra ga ra/ b+haM dza b+haM dza/ mo ha mo ha/ d+he hi d+he hi/ d+hU ba ya
392b6(rgyud): ba ya ra d+ha ya n+yA b+ha ya n+yA/ sad+d+him+ba bA yats+tsha/ sa ma sa ma mA ra ya ma ru s+pha ra la ma pu tra pA tsa nA ya sAhA/ a~M ku ru ku ru sAhA/ oM tu ru sh+tsa ru sA tra/ oM su ru su ru sA hA/ oM mu ru mu ru sAhA/ oM shAn+tiM praSh+Ti
392b7(rgyud): ku ru swA hA/ oM ga ta bri d+hu kr-i bi ta tsit+ta/ ma hA bi d+ha ra gaM ga sa ts+tshin+ti/ ma hA b+ha ya/ pa ra kra ma/ ma hA ha sti/ ma hA d+ha kr-i Na ya/ pra tsit+ta yA mi swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru tsu ru tsu ru / mu ru mu ru
393a1(rgyud): oM Tha gcag ga gcag gcagacag oMn mo nam sAtra/ bzlas pa'i sngags/ oM bta ka swA hA/ zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshogs kyi bdag po'i sbyor ba las rlung bcing bar 'dod na//
393a2(rgyud): kur kum dang / gi'u lang dang / yung ba ser pos rgyal po'i ras la dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi steng du 'i rab rdo rje rgyam sagyis mdzang ba bris la/ yaM dang la rim pa bzhin du bkod nas rnam
393a3(rgyud): dbus su tshogs kyi bdag po byi ba la zhon pa/ kha dog gser bcom lta bu zhal bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po na bgrang 'phreng / g.yon dang por rtse gsum/ 'og ma gnyis kyis zod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba
393a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa/ sna nam mkha' la phyar nas lta ba bris te/ de'i snying khar zla gam ljang khu'i steng du laM ya~M laM bris la/ rnal 'byor pa dbang chen yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas sngags brgya
393a5(rgyud): brgyad bzlas na rlung bcing ba'i mchog yin no// yang thog gam shing gi rtse mo la bzhag ma rlung bcing bar byed do// da ni tshogs kyi bdag po yi// sna tshogs las grub 'di bshad bya// rdo rje rtse gsum gyis
393a6(rgyud): mtshan pa'i// dbang chen gnyis brtsegs dbus su ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rtse gsum dang // b+hin ti pa la bgrang 'phreng dang // a sho ka ni bzung byas te// byi ba'i steng na sems dpa' yo// skyil krung gis
393a7(rgyud): bzhugs khros nas ni// sngon po rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// bsams la la dul phug dang // 'o mazho dang spang dkar dang // mar dang char dang sran ma sha/ bcos pa'i shadang shing thog rnams// dus dang dus su mchon/
393b1(rgyud): byas na// gter rnams 'di yis ster bar byed// yang na bdag nyid mi g.yo ba// zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa'i sku// ral gri mda' dang rdo rje g.yas// zhags pa gzhung ba mdung thung g.yon// khams gsums
393b2(rgyud): ba'i hUM las bskyed// sna tshogs mdog can khro bo ni// du ma mtshon cha rnams bzung ba// rang las spro/ zhing spu byed pa'i// mdun du tshogs kyi bdag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma la// bzhengs te bangar
393b3(rgyud): dang ga zhu 'dzin pa// bskyed nas bcos pa'i shas mchod nas// bsnyen pa stong byas las rnams 'grub// yul gyi tshe dang sa gsum la// tshogs bdag de yi gzugs byas nas// gdong ba'i ming ldan par bcug
393b4(rgyud): na mo nyes mi ngas phyugs ngas sogs// gang gi mtshan nas bzung ba de// gnod pa kun las srung bar byed// 'phags pa mi g.yo bu'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u sa drug
393b5(rgyud): pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las rnams grub pa'i yan lag tu// gces par gyur pa'i sbyin sreg go// tshal ni gnyis te rtsub ngos na// yid 'ong rang gi khyim
393b6(rgyud): du sgrub// sa ni las kyi dbye bas shes// skyon dang bral bas thab brtsig bya// rgyar sor tshad ni nyi shu bzhi// de yi ngos la sor bcu gnyis// dpangs ni de yi rgya las ni// sor bzhi chung bar bskor bar bya//
393b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i dbyibs can rgyar bltas nas// ral gri 'bar ba dgod par bya// zur bzhir rdo rje phyed pa bzhi// thab khung kha la rdo rje yi// 'phreng ba gsal por bskor bar bya// 'di ni 'phrin las kun gyi'o// yang
394a1(rgyud): na khru gang nang khru gsum// rim gsum sum gnyis sor tshang ngo // nang du rdo rje rgya gram bri// gsang ba la ni bsngags pa'o// til dang 'bras dang 'o ma dang // zho dang mar dang sbrang
394a2(rgyud): dang pa la sha dang be shing sogs// me tog dkar po yod pa ste// dkar gsum mngar gyis bsres pa rnams// zhi ba'i las la shin tu shis// sA lungs dang gro dang ni// rgya rtsi che dang nagu la/
394a3(rgyud): sardza gu gul gur kum bcas// tsam pa zho dang nye'u shing // me tog gser ma dog la sogs rnams// rgyas pa'i las la shin tu shos// tsan dan mar dang gur gum dang // ba bo til dang rgya sran dang /
394a4(rgyud): khre dang cung rtse spel ba dang // ba ser po'i bdud rtsi lnga// nag khro dang tsan ngan dmar// mye tog dmar po dbang la shis// gsad la khrag dang dug yungs kar// cha gsum ling gar bcas pa'o// gos
394a5(rgyud): da kar rgyan yang dkar po ste// yo byad kun yang dkar byas dang // bsam pa bzang pos sha ra bltas pa// 'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub// rgya mgos yo byad kun ser zhing // rgyas pa'i yid byas/
394a6(rgyud): byang du bltas// dga' ba'i dkyil 'khor bskor byas na// 'dis ni rgyas pa'i las 'grub byed// rgyad dang gos dang yo byad kum// kha dog dmar zhing sdum gyur nas// myos pa'i ying lta bus bltas na/
394a7(rgyud): dbang gi las rnams 'grub par byed// rgya na gos gnag cing yo byad gnag/ nub pa'i ying bltas khros pa'i skang // 'byin cing lho yi phyogs su bltas// drag po'i las rnams myur du 'khrug/ del
394b1(rgyud): las byed pa'i dus su mi rus la byas pa'i phur pa mi g.yo bar bsgoms na/ sngon du bsnyen pa spong bas dang pos kha/ gnyis pas snying kha/ gsum pas lte ba/ bzhi pas pus mo rnams su dang/
394b2(rgyud): par gdab po// spra tshil las/ thal chen nam/ bag zan la ling ga byas la ske che dang / re lcag dang / nya'i rngog gnob rnams brdungs la khrag dang sbyar nas grog la rdo rje rgya gram bris pa'i dkyil du mi
394b3(rgyud): dang sngags spel te bris pa'i snying khar bcug la/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a mu ku s+ya staM b+ha ya/ kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces gdab bo// bsgrub bya'i shes pa rlung gi steng du bzhag la dbugs dang bcas pa drang
394b4(rgyud): do// gal te g.yo bar 'dod na phur bu dang ming bton te 'o ma blug cing / oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo shA nAM ku ru kurban+tu swA hA/ zhes brjod na zhag bdun nas sos par 'gyur ro// yang gsod pa'i las
394b5(rgyud): bya bar 'dod na/ hUM las skyes pa'i mi g.yo ba long ba zhes bya ba shin tung dmar ba'i mig gcig yod pa/ ral gri dang 'gas pa ca/ kha dog sdang dag rtsub cing 'khrug pa/ ring po che'i brag phug tu gnas pa la
394b6(rgyud): dus rtag par rgya du mchod nas/ gru gsum thams cad kyi dbus su bsams te sha dang / khrag dang / dug dang / gzugs parnang rams zhal du bsregs na myur du 'chi'o// rengs par 'dod pas
394b7(rgyud): rnga mo'i rus pa la dze ta ma dze ta ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad du sreg go// lkugs par 'dod na ra'i sha la b+ha ti ra b+ha tir zhes khri cho gsum sreg go// skyo bar 'dod na khyi sha dang / chang dang / dug sna tshogs pa la
395a1(rgyud): ut+pan+da zhes stong rtsa brgyad sreg go// dgra bo'i mig long bar 'dod pas skyer ba'i shing dang bong bu'i rtug pa la oM d+ha ka ra zhes stong rtsa brgyad du sreg go/ sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dang rnga mo'i rus/
395a2(rgyud): papal mo ha ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad bsregs na rmongs par byed do// yung ba dang tsan dan la dzA ra da ba na ya zhes brgya rtsa brkyang bsregs na yams 'chad do// sbal pa dzi ra dang khyi nag po'i sha la tsi ti dzA la ma pa nas
395a3(rgyud): stong bsregs na mdze 'chang do// khu ba dang / khrag dang / da ru ral su tri tshonang zhes stong rtsa brgyad bsregs na mngal bskams so// gtum po drag po'i nga rgyal gyis// du ba'as gi'u wang ngam la mtha'as/
395a4(rgyud): rgya skyegs pazegs na yams nang dang // 'khrug dang 'jigs dang 'byung ba ldog/ no dang ku mung dang sbrang // bya rgod klad pa kha yi tshol// 'di rnams bsregs na spyo dang dang // nang ngang bu mi thon pa sel/
395a5(rgyud): kye gzhan yang sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis// sna tshogs las rnams 'grub 'gyur zhing // brtan pa chen po'i ye shes ni// 'ga' las myur du thob byed cing // g.yo 'dod sred la bla ma sku// tshig la
395a6(rgyud): sems shi pa doms chol// bag med g.yangs dang ser rdza dang / bags chen snying rje med pas ri// bskal pa brgya dang stong brag tu// bsrubs kyang nam yang mi 'grub ste// lus dang ngag dang
395a7(rgyud): yid kyi sgo// ngal ba las ni gzhan du min// bza' btung zhim po sna tshogs rnams// rtag par nyin re dus gsum du// grogs po kun la byed pas kyang // lan cig bla ma'i mchod pa yis// brgya yi char
395b1(rgyud): yang mi bong ngo // de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i bu drug khris khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba la bstod pa/ kye ho rtsa ba'i sems mnga' 'on kyang 'khrugs 'ang zhing // dga'
395b2(rgyud): zhing shin tu dag kyang rar sna tshogs spras// lha rngabs kun la ral gri phyar ba'i tshe// lha min tshogs kun brgyal zhing rab tu skrag par snang // srid pa'i nyon mongs kud la bsngags pa'i sngags mdzub
395b3(rgyud): kyis bdud rnams brgyal zhing skrag sha 'don skad phyung nas thag ring 'bros// yi ge phyed pa e he'i rol sgra yi ku cos log pa'i phyogs skrag byed// che ba yi ni shin tu cher gyur sku lnga khyod kyi sku/
395b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis shin tu bsngags shing bstod// klu rnams kun 'dus pas ni cha shas lus kyi phyogs par brgyan// lha dbang bu mo rnams kyis rin chen sna tshogs rgyan rab gsol//
395b5(rgyud): spyan bgrang ljags dril stag lpags 'dzin pa khyod la bstod// bstod pa chen po des bstid nas tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa lha tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dga'o// 'phags pa
395b6(rgyud): mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'bum pa las/ dngos grub thams cad yongs su
395b7(rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta a tu lang sa badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mar ba bar d+he chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur ba'o//
396a1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha rA dza sarba ma r+b+ba gu h+ya tarbA nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad gas sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ khro ba mig so mgon po la phyag 'tshal
396a2(rgyud): lo de nas yang dag pashang bya ba// khams gsum zhe sdang can gzigs nas// zhe sdang thams cad zang bu'i phyir// bcom ldan thugs rje'i rang ba ni cang // de sdang mi g.yo mgon por mdzad// chos
396a3(rgyud): nyid kyis dag pa'i bdag/ sngags lha phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang // rnam dag bsam gtan 'phrin las rnams// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// dur khrod 'bar ba 'khrugs pa'i sar// 'dzin pas btud de
396a4(rgyud): nges zhus la// kye kye yang dag khro chen gtso// ma lus rnam dag la gnas phyir// mgon po mi g.yo'i gsung rgyud las// sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin gang // ngo mtshar thar pa nges par gsol// de nas
396a5(rgyud): yang dag ye gsungs pa// dpa' bo dur khrod gnas pas legs// rus pa'i rgyan nges phyag rgya drug/ gnas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid de// rgyu bzhi tshad med bzhi ru gnas// ye shes rtog pa'i rtog pa'o//
396a6(rgyud): rgyun ma chad pa'i dam pa yis// nyi zla shes rab thabs kyi gdan// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas// gyur pa'i mtshan ldan ye shes lnga// phyag rgya drug mdzes byin brlabs nas// dur khrod ma ni 'khyung
396a7(rgyud): pa'o// phung po la sogs thug par gnas// pad+ma rdo rje byin gyis brlabs// srung ba'i sbyor ba med pa dang // mtshan ma bral dang 'dus ma byas// byed pa rnam med rtog pas 'das// sku ni dug 'joms
396b1(rgyud): gnag pa'i tshul// rdo rje nags pa bsdigs gnas pa// g.yon bkyang gnas pa sgyun kya dmar// pad+ma gi gug shes rab tshul// g.yor 'khyung tshim byed rgya bral ba'i// zhabs dang shes rab nas/
396b2(rgyud): dang ratha ma byin za ma nam te gnas// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na'o// rdul rgya gram rdo rje gnas// a las chos 'byung grub pa mo// mtshom char ba drabs so// rter pa phyag rgya lnga snga gnas//
396b3(rgyud): mos pa rnam par grub pa yin// mos pa rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas yang dag bshang bya ba// gnyis med 'gyur ba'i gsang ba ni// 'khor lo mi rgyud
396b4(rgyud): ye shes che// mgrin pa 'phreng ba'i rin chen 'byung // rna cha gzugs kyi 'od dpag med// rus pa'i rna rgyan don yod grub/ thal ba snang mdzad rnam dag go// mig la 'dod chags rdo rje sa// rna bar zhes
396b5(rgyud): ma zhes grags// snga ni ser sna'i rnam pa bor// lce la phrag dog rdo rje ma// lus la rdo rje gti mug go// yid la chos kyi dbang phyug ste// dkyil 'khor lus nyid rngam dag pa// rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te//
396b6(rgyud): ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do// bdud rtsi rnam lnga tsho snga lnga// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo nyid de// so san ba sU tA ra Na// snying gi dbus kyi lte ba nyid// phung po lnga yi gcom ste// khams dang skye mched lha por
396b7(rgyud): grags// 'byung ba sgo ba bzhi nyid de// 'dom gang gru bzhi lham pa ste// mi g.yo mgon po rnam par nges// lus kyi rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// oM Ar+ya.a tsa la ma r+ya
397a1(rgyud): ra ya kro d+ha r+m+ma phaT+Ta/ snying po'o// oM Ar+ya a tsa la kro d+ha bi ba ta sa hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM tsan+dam phra po dang hUM phaT/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// oM ha na ma hi sA swa dzu bo Shar tse d+hu
397a2(rgyud): phaT haM/ rgyan byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM pad+ma po lan mi yaM/ To haM maM bya/ badz+ra pra ta ka ko la hUM phaT/ shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa'o// ka sa mA ra kha na hi mA ra kha ni sa mA ra ya phaT/ gsang
397a3(rgyud): pa'i 'o// sarba a marga me a hUM/ thun mong grub pa'o// a gang da phaT/ bskrad pa'i 'o// sAhA rat+na/ rgyas pa'i 'o// d+harma gu ta hUM/ dbang gi'o// ka ra ma pu ta shAn+tiM ku ru hUM/ zhi ba'i 'o// sngags kyi rnam
397a4(rgyud): par dag pa'i rtog pa'i dum bu las/ khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
397a5(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// khro bo'i tshogs rnams spros nas ni// gtso mo thabs kyi yan lag dang // lag pa g.yas pa gshin rje gshed// g.yon pa gzhan gyis mi thub
397a6(rgyud): pa rta mgrin kha la bsam par bya// rdo rje la ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// dpung pa g.yas par mi g.yo ba// g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o// pus mo g.yas par bsam pa ni// dbyig pa sngon po cher 'bar ba/
397a7(rgyud): pus mo g.yon par stobs po che// spyi bor gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur// gnod mdzes rgyal po bsam pa ni// rkang pa gnyis la dgod par bya// yang na yab yum sbyor ba las// byang chub sems sprin 'du
397b1(rgyud): 'phro las// hUM tshogs khro mor spros nas ni// gtso mo shes rab yan lag dgang // lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma// g.yon ma gzhan gyis mi thub mo// de yi khar ni khro gnyer ma// gsang bar ral pa
397b2(rgyud): gcig ma'o// gzhan yang dpung pa g.yas gnas par// de bzhin gshegs yus rdo rje ma// g.yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi// phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya// pus mo g.yas la gnas par yang // sna tshogs
397b3(rgyud): pad+ma de bzhin gshegs// g.yon pa las ni sna tshogs las// spyi bor nam mkha'i rdo rje ma// rkang pa gnyis las sa yi ni// sa 'dzin lha mo gzhag par bya// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// byang chub
397b4(rgyud): sems sprin 'phro 'du las// gdod nas grub pa'i sangs rgyas rigs// phyung nas lus la dkyil 'khor bkod// de dag phan tshun sbyor ba las// rjes chags chen po'i sgra yis ni// bde gshegs
397b5(rgyud): tshogs rnams bskur bya ste// de dag la ni yang yang gzhug/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ chu las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gsal ba lha yi rang bzhin ni// kun kyang
397b6(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug ste// brjid pa'i khro bo gar dang bcas// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis par// rnal 'byor can gyis brtan par bsgom// dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur// de phyir nan tan
397b7(rgyud): bskyed par bya// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las/ lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas phyi yi dkyil 'khor du// rigs kyi khro ba
398a1(rgyud): slo ba ni// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// rnam par 'phrul par bshad par bya// rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i// gti mug mi g.yo mgon po ni// nal nigs/
398a2(rgyud): dang dkar dang dmar// 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs// dbyig pa 'khor lo rdo rje rnams// phyag g.yas na ni bsdams par mdzad// thugs kar sdigs mjub zhags pa dang // dril ba
398a3(rgyud): dgra lha g.yon pam// dbang po la sogs tshogs bcas dang // mi bzang bgegs ni skrag par mdzad// pad+ma nyim man nas mi/ shar gyi phyogs su bzhugs gyur pa// rnam snang dbu rgyan ldan pa'o//
398a4(rgyud): rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i// ser sna'i mi g.yo mgon po ni// rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyad can// gser mdog nam gsum phyag drug pa// spyan gsum gsus tshe nor bus brgyan// ser
398a5(rgyud): dang gnag dang dmar po'i zhal// mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par rgyu// 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs// rdo rje dbyug pa ral gri ni// g.yas kyi phyag ra bsnams par mdzad// snying
398a6(rgyud): khar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // dril bu dgra lha g.yon pa na// g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// mi bzang bgegs ni skrag mdzad pa// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// lho lo phyogs na bzhugs
398a7(rgyud): par gyur// rang sngags yi ge las byung ba'i// 'dod chags mgon po mi g.yo ba// spyan gsum pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar// zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba
398b1(rgyud): dang 'od dpag med pa'i cong pan can// dpa' bo g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas// 'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par 'khrug/ pad+ma ral grig tur shing ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsdams par
398b2(rgyud): mdzad// snyems dang bcas pas dril bu dang // dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni// klu rnams skrag par mdzad nas su// nub kyi phyogs
398b3(rgyud): su bzhugs par gyur// rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i// phrag dog mi g.yo mgon po ni// don yod rdo rje'i dbu rgyar can// sngo ljang ut+pal 'dab ma'i mdog/ zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar/
398b4(rgyud): zhal ga dang sa la ni rnam par 'gyur// gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa// 'bar ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang // gtun shing rnams ni g.yas pa na// sdigs
398b5(rgyud): mdzub dang ni zhags pa bsnams// dril bu dgra sta g.yon na bsnams// g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni// bgegs
398b6(rgyud): chen 'jigs pa bsal mdzad nas// byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur// de ltar phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs// mthar byed rab tu zad mdzad nas// sems can yongs su btul
398b7(rgyud): byas te// zhing rnams sangs rgyas tshogs kyis bkang // 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//
399a1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsa la ma hA gu h+ya tan+ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gsang rgyud chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
399a2(rgyud): lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po 'og min gyi gnas na rab tu dges shing bdud 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
399a3(rgyud): par zhugs so// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rdo rje chos dang phyag ra rdo rje dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / rdorje
399a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / rlom bu tshur la sogs te ra tu dga' ba'i tshogs dpag tu mang ba dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis barba rak+Sha rak+Sha sU nas gsungs te/ rdo rje thobs phyogs
399a5(rgyud): mtshams gtams so// srung ba'i don du rab brtson zhing // bgegs kyi sbyor ba rlag par mdzad// hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis haM zhes gsungs te/ rang gi thugs ka nas khro bo'i rgyal po
399a6(rgyud): mi g.yo ba phyung ste/ g.yas na ral gri g.yon sngags mdzub// char sprin lta bur shin tu gnag/ sbrul dang thod pas yang dag brgyan// mi bskyod pas ni byin brlabs shing // bde gshegs 'od
399a7(rgyud): zer dpag med 'phros// dngos grub bde ba kun stsol mdzad// oM badz+ra sid+d+hi hU~M/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// A li kA li rab sbyor zhing // zla ba rdo rje sbyor ldan pas// yang dag rdzogs te mngon
399b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su ni// brkyang bskum tshul du yang dag gnas// dga' byed ma ni mdun du ste// rin chen 'phreng ba g.yas su dgod // glu mkhan mo ni g.yon du ste// brtson
399b2(rgyud): 'grus gar bye rgyab tu gnas// 'gugs byed ma ni shar du ste// rnam par 'ching ba lho ru dgod// gnyis med ma ni nub tu ste// rnam par 'phel ma byang du dgod// 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das
399b3(rgyud): sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i dam tshig go// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las/ skye mchog gi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang
399b4(rgyud): bskur ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer spros te/ lha thams cad kyi dbu la 'od zer thim par gyur to//
399b5(rgyud): rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par gyur to// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po ngas pa ru// mchod pa'i tshogs ni rnam par bstis// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya'i lha mo
399b6(rgyud): dpag med de// mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag mchod// kye kye mtha' gnyis rnam par ma g.yogs shing // sprul pa'i gzugs kyis 'gro don dpag med mdzad// 'jigs byed chen po 'gro ba
399b7(rgyud): kun sgrol zhing // srid pa gsum na dgyes par gar mdzad pa// srid pa'i chu bo skems shing mi mthun bdud rnams 'joms// srid pa'i rlung gis ma g.yos thugs rje mi g.yo mgon// rab brjid mi
400a1(rgyud): g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa chen po'i dam tshig go// de nas yang dag pa shang phya ga/ rgyal po rtag ldan thong pa ru// lcags kyu lnga sogs/
400a2(rgyud): gzhag par bya// rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor gzhag/ thod pa ru ni yang dag gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud rtsi chen po'i dam tshig go// de nas yang dag pa shang bya ba// tshangs pa brgya byinag shin rje
400a3(rgyud): dang chu bdag gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sogs// me dang srin po rlung gi lha// 'byung po sa yi lha mo dang // lha ma yin sogs 'khor bcas dgug/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+hamA NAM a d+ya nut+paR+sha tAt+t+wa sAH
400a4(rgyud): oM khA hi khA hi pheM pheM swA hA/ bdud rtsi sha dang khrag la sogs// gtor ma thams cad sbyin par bya// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las// mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
400a5(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// khru bzhi pa yi tshad du bya// gsar pa las ni bkal nas kyang // dkyil 'khor nyis 'khor ring thung la/
400a6(rgyud): mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gangab bo// 'khor lo lta bur byas nas kyang // rdo rje 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// glu bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhir bgyi// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/
400a7(rgyud): dbus su ral gri chen por dgod// shar du rdo rje yang dag dgod// lho ru rin chen 'phreng ba ste// nub tu chos kyi pi wang ste// byang du rdo rje rtse gsum mo// skor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang /
400b1(rgyud): lcags sgrog dril bu mkhas pas gzhag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dgod pa'i dam tshig go// de nas char pa mi 'bab na// stegs bu gru bzhi'i steng du yang // dngul gyi gzhong ba
400b2(rgyud): bzhag nas kyang // bag zan las ni byas pa'i gzugs// pad+ma gsum brtsegs ngag tu bya// steng du klu yi gzugs bzhag la// gur kum gyis ni byugs byas la// mtshams su oM dang
400b3(rgyud): bkod de// tsan dan dkar pos sbyir sreg bya// kha dog mang po sbyor ldan pas// klu yi gzugs ni nges par dgug/ des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na// kham pa'i gab tshe dkar po ru// pri
400b4(rgyud): yang ku yi khu ba yis// ral gri brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bri// rgya mtsho'i ngos las sa blangs la// klu yi gzugs ni mngon byas te// nam mkha' lding gi khu bas byugs// til mar la ni sbyin sreg bya//
400b5(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// kham por ser po'i nang du ni// bsgrub bya'i gzugs gzhug ldong ris kyis// ri rab rtse mo brgyad pa bri// des ni yang dag mnan par bya// shin tu rno ba'i lcags
400b6(rgyud): ngag la// khru do tshad kyi ral gri bya// meN+Dal dkar po'i steng du gzhag/ zla ba drug ni rog pa bzlas// til mar gyis ni bskus byas nas// zla ba gzas zin tshon bsgrub// thogs pas mkha' la
400b7(rgyud): lding bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha sna lnga// grib ma dag la bskams byas te// lcags gsum dag gis dkris byas te// shar bltas zas ni smyung bar gnas// gzas zin tshe na b+ha gar
401a1(rgyud): gzhug/ mnyam par bzhag ste nyi shu bzlas// khar bcug gzhan gyis mngon mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dngos grub chen po'i dam tshig go// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
401a2(rgyud): sa gzhi dkar la zlum pa la// tsan dan dkar po'i me sbar te// ser skya'i mar gyis sbyin sreg bya// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// nyungs kar gyis ni sbyin sreg bya// rig pa 'dzin pa'i
401a3(rgyud): dngos grub 'thob// til nag pos ni sbyin sreg bya// sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// ngur ba'i myu gus spyod sreg bya// tshe yi rig 'dzin thob par 'gyur// seng ldeng dag la phur
401a4(rgyud): bur bya// gsang sngags nyi shu gcig bzlas nas// 'dod pa'i gzugs la dbab par bya// dgyes pas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las//
401a5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su dgyes nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa rnams la rnam par gzigs nas/ oM AHhUM/ zhes bya
401a6(rgyud): ba'i sgra gsungs te mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rab tu dga' ba'i tshogs kyis rang gi bdag po mthong bar ma gyur te/ phyogs bzhi nas mngon du phyogs nas 'di yis gsol ba btab bo// e ma
401a7(rgyud): bcom ldan ngo mtshar che// stong pa'i ngang las ci ste bzhugs// bdag ni tshangs spyod byams pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa kun nas slong // e ma'o bde ba chen po'i sku// tshig kun gyis ni ma spros pa/
401b1(rgyud): bdag ni rjes chags snying rje che// 'gro ba yang dag sgrol bar mdzad// e ma'o dri mang dag pa'i sku// stong pa'i ngang la ma bzhugs par// rab tu dag pas bdag la rol// 'gro ba'i don la rjes
401b2(rgyud): chags mdzod// e ma'o don kun grub mdzad pa// dag pa'i ye shes dri med sku// bdag gis 'gro kun gzung ba'i phyir// gtso bo khyod ni yang dag bzhengs// de nas bcom ldan 'das
401b3(rgyud): rab tu dgyes te sku yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag gsungs so// oM Ar+ya a tsa la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM bad+d+hA ya hUM phaT/ gsang sngags
401b4(rgyud): dang phur bu'i sngags so// oM na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NaM/ badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM hUM hUM tAT hUM/ maM bo haM maM tra Ta hUM ma ma hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ shin tu rno ba'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o//
401b5(rgyud): de nas 'khor rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi don khong du chud par gyur to// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las/ gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
401b6(rgyud): 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra a mr-i ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud
401b7(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying
402a1(rgyud): po rdo rje bdud rtsi gsang ba'i padral bzhugs so// gzhal yas brtsegs pa'i khang pa ma// mA ma kI dang thabs cig tu// bcom ldan rdo rje can rol te// de ras
402a2(rgyud): mos de zhus pa// gsang chen zhes bya cher gnas pa'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog/ sngon du lha khyod kyis gsungs pa// bdud rtsi yi ni sgrub pa'i thabs// bde ba chen pos bka' stsal
402a3(rgyud): 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes bshad// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bsam med zad med phra mo ste// don yod dbang po las 'das pa// dam pa zhi ba rnam dag pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod
402a4(rgyud): pa yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis// mA ma kIr chags dang ldan nas// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang chen mngon sum du ni mdzad// rgyud rnams kun la gsang ba yi// ye shes
402a5(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// brtan por 'khyud dang 'o byed dang // dga' ba'i rol pas mnyam sbyor dang // dbyangs dang sil snyan gar rnams kyis// rdo rje bdud
402a6(rgyud): rtsi rgyud kyi mchog/ de ltar myur du 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi khu ba zhes gsungs te// 'gro ba gsum ni nges bskyed do// khyod la dga' ma zhal bzang ma// de yi sgrub pa bdag gis
402a7(rgyud): bshad// nyon cig de yi sems kyi tshig/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// sems can don du phan don du// sbyor ba'i rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ rnal 'byor gang gis shes gyur na//
402b1(rgyud): 'khor ba'i bcings las myur bar grol// bstan du med ci ye shes che// dngos grub 'jig rten gsum bsgrub bo// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don du// sgrub pa pos ni bde ba spyod// de
402b2(rgyud): pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje bdud rtsi phyung bar bya// b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o btab ste// rdo rje pang zer mA ma kIs// 'o btab rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// bcom ldang rdo rjes de gsungs so// b+ha ga'i
402b3(rgyud): pad+mar 'o btab pas// de tshe dga' ba'i lha mo des// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ba'i// nyams dga' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nus// cho ga'i rim pa gang gis ni// mchod pa dkyil 'khor
402b4(rgyud): brtsam par bya// 'dir ni mchod pa ji ltar te// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// dga' ba chen po thob dka' ba// rab tu dgyes nas bka' stsal 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis//
402b5(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// 'o btab pas ni dgar 'gyur te// gzhad nas 'di skad bka' stsal te// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don dang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho bsgral ba'i phyir// dga' ba chen po
402b6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// mA ma kIs ni 'dir dris pa// zur gsum dkyil 'khor bris ras su// gsang ba'i pad+ma mA ma kI// nang du snying po dang ldan pa'i// pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa ni bya// de dbus gsang chen
402b7(rgyud): rig ma dang // gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// g.yas pa la ni dkar po 'dong // g.yon du dmar por rab gsungs te// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan byas pa// lha
403a1(rgyud): yin bza' me tog 'phreng // lha yi dri yis byug byed pa// lha yi dngos grub byed zhi ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// phyi rol du ni dkyil 'khor yang // sgo bzhi pa ni rab
403a2(rgyud): tu brtags// shar du khro gnyer ma bzhag ste// lho na 'jigs par 'jigs byed ma// nub na rta yi gzugs can ma// byang du tshogs kyi 'dren ma mo// mkhas pas pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/
403a3(rgyud): rig ma brgyad ni mnyam par bri// mdzes pa mo dang zhi ba'i zhal// zla mo dang ni dung can mo// ri bong 'dzin dang dkyil 'khor mo// ri bor 'dzin ri mo yid dga'// yid la bde bar byed ma dag
403a4(rgyud): rig ma brgyad dang dge ma brgyad// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sna tshogs gzugs ni yod dga' ma// phyogs rnams dang ni mtshams dag la// rtag pa ru ni bri bar bya// mchod pa pi wang rnga de bzhin//
403a5(rgyud): de bzhin spos dang me tog sogs// dbyangs dang gar dang mchod pa ni// dga' ba rol pa sbyor ba yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bsgrub par bya// ma dang bran mo bu mo dang //
403a6(rgyud): srin mo gnyen mo de bzhin te// rdo rje bdud rtsi de dag las// blangs nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod// ma las bdud rtsi blangs pas ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi dang mnyam 'gyur// srin mo nad med
403a7(rgyud): na so gzhon// bu mo yi ni 'dod kun sbyin// bran zer mo'i ni don yod grub// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dod byas// lce ni dril bar byas nas su// kha yis pad+mar blang bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba
403b1(rgyud): che de nas myur bar dngos grub bo// bung brtse ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud med thams cad 'dod pa spyod// 'dus dang grub mo dang brkyang ba// yar ba te gzer ni shim tu brkyang // byed pa'i bcing ba
403b2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// sa gsum dag ni bsgrub par bya// sha chen dang ni khrag chen gyis// de bzhin bshang gtso khu ba dag/ de dag rdo rje bdud rtsi lnga// nyin dang nyin du bsgrub par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che//
403b3(rgyud): gal te dngos grub bdag 'dod na// de yis don rnams thams cad ni// sgrub pa pos ni mchog tu bsgrub// dbang dgug pa dang 'thab pa dang // gsod dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi
403b4(rgyud): bde chen pos// bya ba thams cad kun tu bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdorje
403b5(rgyud): bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa'i mngon tshul bstan pa'i le'u dang po'o// / de nas mgu ba'i lha mo re// badz+ra
403b6(rgyud): rgyas pa'i mA ma kI// brtan po 'khyud pa byas nas su// dbang po thams cad la 'o btag// ma mchu sos bzung 'o bta ba ste// sid sgra sngags ni brjod par bya// rdo rje bcings pas sku yang 'dzim/ rdo
403b7(rgyud): can gyis gsang byas te// pad+mar rdo rje bcug nas su// chags na dga' ste 'dod par byas// sid sgra snyan po sgra rnams dang // ko ki la dang gling bu sogs// lha mo mA ma kI dang rtse// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde
404a1(rgyud): chen pos// ru bzung la gzir byas te// ser mor mos gdab par bya// de yang gos ni phung byas te// steng 'og la yang blta bar bya// rgyas pa'i pad+ma ra'o btab nas/
404a2(rgyud): dga' ba'i tshig kyang brjod par bya// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI// lha mo chen mo legs so lags// gtan du 'dod la chags pa yis// bdag gis khyod la dga' bar bya// gang zhig 'dod pa khyod
404a3(rgyud): kyis zhus// khyod la bdag gis mchog tu sbyin// de nas lha mo mA ma kI// tshig 'di dag ni ched du gsol// bcom ldan nyid kyis de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems kyis rnam sprul pa// phra bas
404a4(rgyud): shin tu phra ba yis// zad med ye shes ji ltar rol// de 'dra lha yis dpyod pa ni// dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug pas// de dag the tsom 'byung bas na// bdag ni ngo mtshar dam par gyur// de nas
404a5(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen bshad// nyon cig de nyid mA ma kI// ye shes sbyor ba 'bigs byed pa// shin tu phra ba gsang chen po// ye shes shes bya ngo bo nyid// de ni bdag gis
404a6(rgyud): bshad bya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// mi 'jigs zad med rtag pa ni// gdong ma med cing dbang po spongs// yod nyid dang di meng nyid kyang // dbang po dang bcas dbang po med//
404a7(rgyud): 'byung ba kun tu ma mthong ba// sbyor ba la mo gyis mthong ba'o// sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// phyi dang mang du bcas pa'o// phyi ni gzugs kyi phung po sogs// 'byung ba rnam pa su mardzog te//
404b1(rgyud): sna tshogs g.yo dang mi g.yo ba// khams gsum dang ni ma lus par// de gcig pus ni khyab pa ste// thams cad rnam shes kho na'o// ci phyir sems can bdag med rnams// rnam shes phung po
404b2(rgyud): rten pa yin// blun sems snyigs ma'i mi rnams kyis// 'ga' yang shes pa ma yin no// sems las ma byung sems kyi ngos// ye shes shes bya'i ngo bo nyid// thams cad rnam shes gcig
404b3(rgyud): nyid do// gang tshe lus la rkyer nyid 'gyur// chos rnams dang ni chos gcig 'gyur// dngos po bdag ni de tshe 'gyur// ci yi phyir na chos rnams kyi// mang po nyid du chos rnams kyang // chu rgyun
404b4(rgyud): bzhin du rgya mtsho la// thar pa ni gcig kho na ste// mang po nyid du mi rnyed de// ji ltar nang du cher gnas pa// bla ma'i zhal kho na las thob// b+ha ga'i pad+mar nam mkha' gang // nam mkha' lnga
404b5(rgyud): yis brgyan pa ste// snying dang snying po rnam ldan zhing // 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par klubs// de dbus rdo rje can bzhugs te// byang sems bdud rtsi dang ldan pa// cha shas chas min rnam grol bar//
404b6(rgyud): thig le de yis rnam par spangs// de ras rtag tu zag pa ni// bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi gzugs// khams rnams kun gyi gzhi yin pa// steng 'og tu yang rnam par khyab// des ni mthong ba zos pa yang //
404b7(rgyud): mnams pa dang ni myang ba yang // reg dang bde ba'i longs spyod ni// zas dang me tog 'phreng ba dang // rgyan dang gos kyis brgyad pa ste// ngag gis sna tshogs grags pa yang // blangs pa dngadi bzung ba rnams//
405a1(rgyud): rol dang kun tu 'gro ba dang // 'dug dang de bzhin nyal ba dang // sang pa dang ni log pa dang // thams cad rmi lam mthong ba ste// bzhad dang de bzhi mchod dang // shin tu
405a2(rgyud): yid 'phrog gar dang ni// rnga rnams dag kyang brdung ba ste// sna tshogs pa dag 'dir brjod pas// smon pa dang ri myos pa'i gzugs// gti mug 'dod chags de de nyid// gzugs med mang po'i
405a3(rgyud): gzugs can de// pho dang mo dang ma ning rnams// du ma'i gzugs can kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gzugs ni nor bu bzhin// khyab pa'i dngos kyis khyab nas su// de nyid dam pa cher gnas so// de bzhin nyid
405a4(rgyud): de mA ma kI// bzlas med 'dzin pa yang med de// bgrang 'phreng bya ba 'ga' yang med// zas spangs pa yang mi bya'o// b+ha ga'i pad+ma mchod byas te// mkhas pas bdud rtsi bza' bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde
405a5(rgyud): ba che 'di yis de nyid 'grub pa'o// gang de bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa// b+ha ga'i dbus su pad+ma ste// rtsa gzhan sum cu rtsa gnyis la// de yi dbus su de gtso ste// de dag las gzhan shin tu mchog
405a6(rgyud): rtsa dag dgu ni rnam par gnas// sgo dgu la gnas rigs pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya// 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga lha mo// rtag tu rdo rje can mnyam blta// de bas de dag rab byed na// chags
405a7(rgyud): bral zhes gsungs kun rig pas// de dag gsang chen mchog rab ni// zhal bzang ma kye sbyor bar bshad// sna tshogs rnam snang mdzad sogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes te/
405b1(rgyud): gtan du dga' ba'i yid bde ba// sbyor bas dam pa rab bstan to// gsang ba'i pad+ma mthong nas dang // shin tu rgyas pa'i mA ma kI// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// de nyid bdag gis bshangad par bya/ de
405b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin nyid sbyor ba ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba'i
405b3(rgyud): le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas mgu ba'i lha mo des// hA ra nu pur gyis brgyan te// 'di dag dbyangs ni blangs nas su// sems dpa' chen po dgyes par byed// phyung mdzad
405b4(rgyud): bde chen rdo rje las// bdag gis mchog gi yig 'bru 'tshal bar gyi// b+ha ga'i pad+mar bde ba chen po ste// rdo rje'i don de bde ba chen po lags/ sa 'dzin pa dang sbrad bran dang // drug ldan ma son
405b5(rgyud): mtha' 'khob tshul// sna tshogs thun mong rnam dag gi/ snyan pa'i sgra mis blang bar bya// de rnams dbyings dag blangs nas su// dga' yid bde brdzas sprul gyis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde bache/
405b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pas// de bzhin nyid kyis the tshom bcad// rdo rje can khyod bka' drin gyis// rtag par ye shes bya ba bgyi/
405b7(rgyud): bcom ldan chags pa da'i bral ba'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba 'di// rdo rje theg pa 'byung ba yi// sbyor ba bdag gis bstad par bgyis// dadung bdag la the tshom mchis// mug tu gnyis kyi
406a1(rgyud): rnam sprul pa// ji ltar phyag rgya yang dag 'byung // de dag gi sngags ji ltar lags// sngags rnams gang las skye ba lags// khyad par du ni lha rnams kyang // lha ni/
406a2(rgyud): de dag the tsosam ma// mdor bsdus nas ni bdag la gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'di gsungs// phyag rgya sngags dag 'byung ba ni// bshad de nyon cig mA ma kI/
406a3(rgyud): phyag rgya rnam pa gsum gsungs te// sku dang gsung dang thugs las 'byung // sku ni phyag rgya mchog 'gyur te// gsung ni phyag rgya sngags kyi las// thugs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni// bsam gtan ri mo gnyis
406a4(rgyud): med gnas// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen la// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mi bri'o// phyag rgya mngon sum gzugs yin te// lha ni lha mo bud med do// dbang po thams cad bde ba ru// b+ha ga'i
406a5(rgyud): pad+mar mchod par bya// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor zhing // las thams cad ni 'grub par bya// ji ltar dpag bsam shing chen gyi// yal ga brgya phrag stong can dang // rtsa dang de la gzung ba ni// skye ba'i rkyen
406a6(rgyud): du 'gyur ba bzhin// de ltar bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i na// sngags dang phyag rgya'i yum yin te// sngags 'di rnams kyi skye ba ni// b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/
406a7(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje bcug nas mA ma kI// nyon cig sngags rnams mtshan nyid ni// dang po rnam snang mdzad sbyor te// oM badz+ra arma ta ma hA su kha/ sa bon bzhi dang mnyam ldan la// swA hA yi
406b1(rgyud): ne yang sbyor ro// rnam par snang mdzad yang 'bul te// yi ge gnyis dang bzhi pa ste// bzhi po las ni mnyam ldan pa// sA ma kI li snying po'i mchog/ brgyad la kho na'o dbus pa gang // brgyad sa rgyar gyis rnan/
406b2(rgyud): par brgyad// 'ad ba brgyad la ni sbyar byas te// lha mo sngags kyis sngags phyung ngo // sgo srungs dag gi sngags rnams ni// nyon cig skal bzang mA ma kI// rje yi tha ma sngags phyung ste// sa bor brgyad ni sngags/
406b3(rgyud): rig pas// stong pa'i lha yis gnor byas te// rnam par snang mdzad dang ldan la// swA hA yi ge mnyam por ldan// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin rnams// bzhi ni sgo srungs kyi yin te// bzhi ni spos dang /
406b4(rgyud): dus+ye sogs// ma ning yi ge ga bzhi la// swA hA rnam par snang mdzad kyang // lha mo gsang ba'i mA ma kI// rnga sogs kun gyis mchod par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs
406b5(rgyud): so/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ sngags byung ba'i rim pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u
406b6(rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas sbyin sreg las ngag gi/ cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi cho ga yis// sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las
406b7(rgyud): de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang // 'thab dang bskrad kyang de bzhin du// sngags dang phyag rgya'i bsgrub pa rnams// de kun bdag gis bshad par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying byed
407a1(rgyud): ba ra dkur brten bcas pa sa gnyis gnas pa// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan byas te// slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal gyur nas/
407a2(rgyud): rkang gnyis g.yas brkyang bya ba dang // g.yon brkyang bya ba yang byas te// rkang mnyam dang ni sa ga yis// sa ni sbyong bar byed ma thag/ sa la reg na 'jam skye'o// de nas bgegs rnams bskad nas su//
407a3(rgyud): gzhal yas sprul pa la sogs pa// gong du bla mar phyag 'tshal lo// phyi nas sa yi lha mo dgug/ oM e h+ye hi lha mo che// sa yi brtan ma 'jig rten yum// rin chen thams cad rab rdzogs pa'o// lha yi
407a4(rgyud): rgyam gyis rgyan byed ma// ha ru Na pur sgra 'byin ma// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu mchod// yon 'di dag ni bzhes nas su// sbyin sreg las ni 'grub par mdzod// hri hri hri hA swA hA/ bshang gzi brag dang
407a5(rgyud): khru ba yis// dkyil 'khor sa la gtor bar bya// byin brlabs bya ba'i phyir spos ni// sha chen gyis ni dbul bar bya// de nas rig ma 'jug byas te// gdol pa ma dang sne sham// gar mkhan ma dang bram
407a6(rgyud): ze mo de kho na bzhin rgyal mo dang // dmangs rigs mo dang rgyal rigs mo// dri dang spos kyis mchod byas te// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// yan lag lnga la yi ge hrIH// b+ha ga'i
407a7(rgyud): dbus su yi ge bruM// spyan ma sgrol mgos dkar ma// yid dga' ma bdag bsgom par bya// b+ha ga'i dbus su slob dpon gyis// me tog gtor ba kho nar bya// de nas sngags pas hau khung ni// tshad
407b1(rgyud): mar kun tu bri bya ste// zhi la zlum por bya ba ste// khru gang tsam du thig gdab bo// khru phyed sa la brkos nas su// dkar rtsi tshon gyis byug par bri// kun tu 'khor lo tshul ltar yang // glo ru mnyam
407b2(rgyud): por bri ba'o// rgyas pa la ni khru do ste// de la khru gang brko bar bya// gru bzhi pa ni mtha' mnyam du// mugs dang btsag gis bri ba'o// mngon spyod la ni zur gsum ste// sor nyi shu ni yangs pa'i
407b3(rgyud): tshad nyi shu phyed ni brko byas na// dbus su rdo rje rgya gram yang // 'bar ba 'phreng gis 'khrugs pa bri// de bzhin dbang dang dgug pa la// zla gam yang dag bri ba'o// ho khung yang dag sto
407b4(rgyud): nas su// phyogs kyi cha yang bstan par bya// byang du mngon du kha bsgyur te// sngags pas zhi ba brtsam par bya// rgyas pa la ni shar du yang // mngon spyod la ni lho na ste// dbang ni nub tu khor
407b5(rgyud): bshad// dgug dang bskad kyang de bzhin no// mngon spyod rtag par nag po ste// tshon lnga yis ni dbang sogs bya// 'bras dang til dang 'o ma dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig par// bdud rtsi lnga dang
407b6(rgyud): ldan pa yis// zhi ba rgyas pa sbyin sreg bya// sreg shing rnams kyang thams cad la// dri zhim 'o ma can shing ngo // sna tshogs zas sam gtor ma yang // 'byung po thams cad sbyin par bya//
407b7(rgyud): gtor ma gang yang sgrub pa pos// khrag 'thung phyag rgya chen pos sbyin// gang zhig yid kyis 'dod pa ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// dbyar gyi dus ni zhi ba ste// rgyas pa de bzhin
408a1(rgyud): dgun gyi dus// dpying ka mngon spyod las rnams ni// sgrub pa pos ni thams cad bya// shar dus zhi ba rab tu gsungs// rgyas pa de bzhin srong la ste// nyin phyed la 'am chos
408a2(rgyud): phyed la// rtag par mngon spyod bya ba'o// ho khung dbus su yi dam lha// yi ge hUM gis bskyed nas su// zhal ni gdangs pa bsam byas te// sbyin sreg de la dbul bar bya// sbyin sreg 'bum
408a3(rgyud): phrag 'bul 'gyur na// mdun du mngon sum kho nar 'gyur/ khwa dang po me ni dgug bya ba// lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i gnas// 'od zer 'phreng 'khrugs drag po'i lha// sangs rgyas byang chub
408a4(rgyud): 'grub pa'o// oM e h+ye hi/ 'dir gshegs don mi za bar khyod// me lha mngon sum dngos grub sbyin// drag po khams gsum gyis mchod pa// khyab 'jug tshangs pas phyag 'tshal ba/
408a5(rgyud): 'di dag yon yang bzhes nas su// zhabs g.yon rjes kyang rdo rje can// oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA ka dang po la ni yon 'bul te// phyi nas lnga bshos me tog 'bul// oM lha yi me tog shin
408a6(rgyud): tu dmar// dri zhim shin tu mdzes pa ni// me tog de ring ba zhes nus su// 'dri la byin gyis brlab pa ri gsol// hUM me tog gi sngags so// oMng mar me 'od zer 'bar ba ni// ngan 'gro 'jigs pa
408a7(rgyud): 'joms byed pa// lha yi mig byed bkra shis pas// mar me khyod kyis bzhes su gsol// hUM mar me'i sngag so// oM tsan dan ga pur dang bcas pa'i// dri zhim spos me dge ba ni// mthu dang bcas
408b1(rgyud): bar bya ba 'di// bzhes nas byin gyis brlab tu gsol// hUM spos kyi sngags so// oM sna tshogs lha yi dri nim pa// sna tshogs ga pur rnam brgyad pas// sna tshogs yi ge hUM las byung // dri 'di
408b2(rgyud): 'bul te bzhes su gsol// hUM dri'i sngags so// dang por mchod pa'i cho ga ni// the tsom med par me la bya// phyi nas rang gi yi ma lha'i// bzlas sngags rigs par brjod par bya// dbyangs
408b3(rgyud): dang gar dang zas rnams kyis// rnam pa du mar rol byas te// rig ma dang ni sgrub pa pos// tshogs la mchod pas mnyes par bya// gal te dngos grub dag 'dod na// sku gsung thugs
408b4(rgyud): ni 'grub pa'o// bla ma me lha rdo rje 'dzin// mchod par byas nas rdzogs par bya// oM me lha las ni grub par mdzad// sems can thams cad bde ba 'dren// sku gsung thugs dngos
408b5(rgyud): grub don du// lha rnams las ni rjes su skyobs// me lha zhi bar gshegs nas su// sa gzhi zhi bar mdzad mdzod cig/ rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas pa yis// sgrub pa po dang thams cad dang /
408b6(rgyud): bdag gi bsod nams 'bras 'gyur dang // sngags kyi dngos grub rab sbyin cig/ a A/ i I/ u u/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ oM a/ hUM swAtra/ rdo rje bdud
408b7(rgyud): bde ba che// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen
409a1(rgyud): po las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u bzhi pa'o// khyod la mig sman bshad par bya// tshil chen gyi ni snying po yi// 2
409a2(rgyud): da la ni dud pa blangs// 'ug pa'i mgo bo bsregs nas su// khrag chen dang ni bsres par bya// mtshan mo la ni btag nas su// zhib mor phye mar kho nar bya// bya rgong rje ngar bkang nas su//
409a3(rgyud): mi yi rus pa'i thur mang gis// mig la bskus nas gzugs kun gyi// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis byed// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ba'i// mig sman dngos grub sbyor ba ni// nag po'i ches
409a4(rgyud): brgyad bcu bzhi la// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgrub par bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang 'gugs las byed do// sna tshogs drag po'i gdon rnams dang // zhag bzhi pa yi rims
409a5(rgyud): dang dug/ thams cad med par byed lha mo// dga' ma khyod la bden par bshad// rgyal po'i khab na chen por mchod// dgra bo rnams kyang zad byed de// de bzhin bgegs kyang 'gag par byed//
409a6(rgyud): mig sman ldan par bzla bar bya// oM 'dod pa'i gzugs can mig yangs ma// bshang gci khrag la dga' byed ma// zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i lha mo// drag po'i gzugs can mA ma kI/
409a7(rgyud): hrIM hrIM hUM hUM/ aM aHa ha hUM swA hA/ dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// de kho na bzhin g.yas ni da kar// g.yon ni dmar por de rig nas// g.yas phyogs ral gri 'khor lo can// g.yon du zhags
409b1(rgyud): ba dang lcags kyu// de bzhin rdo rje dril bu yang // b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom byas te// de la mig spar bsgrub par bya// bA ga gur kum gyis bkapa ras// byi nas ling gagazhug par bya// des
409b2(rgyud): brjod par bya sngags ni// oM yig sgra yig phye ba dang // badz+ra a mr-i ta zhes pa'o// sgra sgrog sprin dang phaT yig go// bdud rtsi dang ni mnyam ldan pas// b+ha ga'i dbus nas dbyung bar bya//
409b3(rgyud): la sngags 'bum bzlas nas su// de yis thig le kho nar bya// bud med kyis khyo 'khol 'gyur te// mdun nas don bcas rgyal po yang // skyes pa gang gis de byas na// bud med gang la
409b4(rgyud): skal can 'gyur// rgyal po khab can chen por chod// dgra bo rnams ni zad byed do// dur dur arka'i 'bras blangs te// bdud rtsi dang ni bsres byas na// zhal gsum drag po'i gzugs
409b5(rgyud): dang ni// gshin rje gshed khro bzlas nas su// sha chen dang ni ldan byas te// chang dang bsres la sbyin par bya// rtag tu myos nas 'khor nas su// mi ni bskams nas shi 'gyur ro// oM hrIH
409b6(rgyud): wi kr-i tAn na sarba sha tA na sha ya/ stam b+ha ya// mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ sngags pas gi'u wang blangs nas// b+ha ga la ni yig 'bru bri// tsan dan gyis ni mnyam byugs nas// khyo dang lhan cig gnas
409b7(rgyud): par bya// gnas ma dag ni bde chen te// 'khor g.yog dngos por 'gyur bar ro// bshang gci gzugs brnyad byas su// sha chen gyis ni spos dbul te// dgra yi skra yis dkris byas
410a1(rgyud): nas/ rus pa'i phye mas byug par bya// dgra sgor brkos nas sbas byas na// zhag bdun gyis ni shi 'gyur ro// bshang gtso khrag dang bsres pa yi// sha chen gyis
410a2(rgyud): ni sbyin sreg bya// dur khrod kyi ni sreg shing yang // shing gcig pa dang lam mngon// me yi hom khung bris nas su// nyid phyed nam phyed sbyir sreg bya// khro chen gshin rje'i gshed po yi// sku
410a3(rgyud): la thal bas bskus pas ni// bsgoms nas dgral cher gnon na// gdon mi za bar shi 'gyur ro// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa
410a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ las chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u lnga pa'o//
410a5(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las// dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// sgrub pa mdor bsdus bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pa yang // de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga zhes// khams gsum rnam rgyal
410a6(rgyud): las byung yin// gru bzhi par ni thig gdab ste// grwa gang yang ni khru do'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa la// dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad gzhag/ zhal gsum
410a7(rgyud): de bzhin phyag drug ste// rgyan thams cad kyis yongs rdzogs pa// phyag rgya yis ni phyag brgyan pa// rig ma bzhi dang mnyam ldan pa// u ma'i sra ba'i nu mar bzhugs// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa po//
410b1(rgyud): khro dang ldan par bzhad byed zhal// g.yas pa la ni mnga' bris te// de kho na bzhin g.yon na gzhu// phyag bzhi pa ni bris pa la// phyag gnyis pas ni ru ba bsdams// rig ma thams cad zhal gsum/
410b2(rgyud): ste de bzhin sgo srungs ljags kyu dang // de bzhin me tog spos me ma// dri yang yang dag bri bar bya// sgeg mo 'phreng ba de bzhin dbyangs// gar mkhan ma yang phyag drug nyid// de bzhin gling bu
410b3(rgyud): ma bri ste// pi wang ma dang rnga chen ma// rdza rnga ma dang sil snyan kun// dkyil 'khor la ni bri ba'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las// skal ba bzang po yang bzhag ste// phyag gnyis pa la zhal
410b4(rgyud): gcig pa// bzang po de dag kho na'o// rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa// sgrub pa po yang mdun bri'o// bgrang 'phreng de bzhin rdo rje dang // dril bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya// gtor ma'i gtor ma mchod
410b5(rgyud): rdzas dang // chang skyems ro dang dga' ston mchod// nag po brgyad dang bcu bzhi la// dkyil 'khor lo ni rdul tshon gdab// dbus su gru bzhi bri ba'o// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sngags mig
410b6(rgyud): gcig pa gtso bo ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgrub par bya// phyi nas slob dpon la mchod pa// bdag gam rgyal srid dbang nyid dang // bran mo bu mo de bzhin du// ma dang sring mo dbul bar bya// sku gsung
410b7(rgyud): thugs kyi bsgrub pa yi// dngos grub gal te bdag 'dod na// khams gsum rnam rgyal las byung ni// sngags pas rtag tu bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje
411a1(rgyud): bdud rtsi las byung ngo // bdud rtsi lnga dang mnyam ldan pa// ngan srong thams cad med byed pa// rdo rje se gol mnyam sbyor gyis// dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad 'grub// rnal 'byor
411a2(rgyud): pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i// byang sems rnam par sprul par gsungs// lan grangs du mar rag ma dang // dkyil 'khor du ni rol bar bya// b+ha ga'i dbus la myang byas pa// gang dag dpa' bo sngags la
411a3(rgyud): gnas// pad+mar kha yis 'o byas nas// bdud rtsi khu ba kho nar blang // lag pa yin sor mo la// gnas de la ni blang mi bya// blang bar gyur na 'jig 'gyur nas// mthu yang 'jigs nas 'bras bu
411a4(rgyud): med/ rig ma chen mos kyang phyung nas// rdo rje la yang 'o gdab bo// de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// khu ba'i gzugs can bdud rtsi ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so//
411a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sgrub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u drug pa'o//
411a6(rgyud): de nas lha mo mA ma kI// dga' ba'i rol par cher bzhugs pas// thal mo sbyar nas phyag byas nas// dbyangs 'di dag ni ched du brjod// dpa' bo chu skyes sngon po'i sku// dpa' bo
411a7(rgyud): gzhan gyis yongs bskor zhing // phyag rgya mo tshogs mnyam ldan pa'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ston gyi nam mkha' dang 'dra ba// nga ro bung ba sgra sgrog ltar// brgal bar bzhugs pa skal bzang ba// rdo rje bdud
411b1(rgyud): rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad mdzes// yang dag dbang po lam gyis ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal/ ma lus pa yi khams gsum la// do bdud rtsi dpe med pas/
411b2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi rigs chen mo// shin tu chags pas dga' byed pa// ser mo rjes dang bcas pa'i sku// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bur phyag sngo ba// sangs rgyas de bzhin
411b3(rgyud): gshegs pa rdo rje khyod kyis bdag dang ni// shin tu dga' ba'i rjes su chags pas longs spyod cig/ khams gsum la ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don gyi phyir// khyod ni skyon med dam pa'i stong pa las// yig/
411b4(rgyud): 'brus rdo rjes gyur pa'i mgon po khyod// rgyu dang mi rgyu gang gis khyod mthong nas// de dag 'khor ba ru ni ga la 'gro// de ltar dbyangs ni blangs nas su// rdo rje gar ni rnam par byed// rked pa dang ni rkang pa dang //
411b5(rgyud): dpung pa dang ni mgo bo'i gar// gar gyi gzhung gi mtshan nyid do// rjes thabs rjes su rim pa bstod pa dang ni 'gying bag ste// rgyas dang 'dud dang gsal po ru// rgyas pa dang ni smin bskyod gar// lag
411b6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba yis// stobs brgyad kyis ni gar byed bya// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI// gar byas nas ni lha mo des// rdo rje bcing gis rdo rje ni// rdo rje be con 'o btab byed// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes kyang // 'ob ta
411b7(rgyud): mA ma kI pad+mar// nyon cig lha mo pad+ma ni// de la mchod pa brtsam par bya// bzhugs shig mi g.yo bar rig mo// bdud rtsi bsam gtan brtsam par bgyi// de bzhin nyid mchog brtsam pa ni// bdud rtsi thig le'i
412a1(rgyud): gzugs can te// mkha' yi dbus su zla ba 'dra// stong pa de nyid ched du brjod// 'jigs med zad med phra mo ni// rdo rje sems dpa' 'joms byed pa// lte ba'i dbus su gnas lha mo//
412a2(rgyud): snying po gsang ba'i spyod yul la// khu ba'i gzugs kyis zagasanas su// b+ha ga ling ga'i dkyil du gnas// 'di ni srog chags rnams kyi srog/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po brten// sangs rgyas de bzhir rdo rje
412a3(rgyud): 'dzin// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' kho na yang // g.yo dang mi g.yo sna tshogs pa'i// khams gsum la ni ma lus par// de ni bdag gis rtag tu/
412a4(rgyud): bsam// de las bskyed de bdag dang khyod// tshangs pa lha dbang khyab 'jug sogs// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// shes bya shes pa'i bdag nyid gtso// de nyid dam pa de bsam mo// skye ba dang
412a5(rgyud): ni shi ba dang // thams cad de la 'dus pa yin// skyed pa byed pa po de gcig/ rang bdag gyur pa lhan cig pa// thams cad mkhyen pa kun nas kun// zhi nas zhi ba khyab pa po// ci phyir khang pa de bkang bas//
412a6(rgyud): de bas skyes bur bshad pa yin// lus la gnas phyir lus can te// shes byed phyir na shes par 'dod// bdag la bdag gis rig pa'i lha// de phyir lha zhes 'dod pa yin// 'jug las khyab 'jug/
412a7(rgyud): ces gsungs te// ngag gis rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur// ston du med pa gsang ba 'di// nan tan du ni gsang bar bya// skyon can min dang g.yon can min// dam tshig la ni mi sdang ba// chad par lta ba med pa la//
412b1(rgyud): bla mal chags 'dul ba can// phrag dog chags pa spong byed pa// dkyil 'khor la ni zhugs pa dang // rdo rje bstan pa'i slob ma dag/ de la rgyas pa'i bstan pa 'di// de bzhin nyid mchog bshad par/
412b2(rgyud): bya slob dpon reg ma dang ldan nas// de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
412b3(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las dbyangs dang / gar dang / dbang bskur ba dang / de bzhin nyid cher dmigs pa dag bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u bdun pa'o//
412b4(rgyud): de nas lha mo yang langs nas/ bzhad nas 'di dag zhu ba ste/ bcom ldan 'di la the tsom zos// dam pa'i ngo mtshar bdag bskyed de// zhi gzugs rdo rje can de las/ khro bo'i gzugs
412b5(rgyud): ni ji ltar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor te// khro bo'i gzugs ni rnam par phyung // 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs drag po can// 'jigs byed la
412b6(rgyud): yang 'jigs par byed// zhal bzhi la ni phyag brgyad de// zod pa'i dbu rgyan 'jigs par brgyan// kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bsnams te// thod pa dang ni khrag dga' ba// gtum po rgyu ma'i 'phreng 'khrugs pa// rig ma
412b7(rgyud): brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// dur khrod chen po bzhir bzhugs pa// phaT yig sngags kyi nga ro can// 'byung po ro langs tshogs pa dang // dur khrod la ni rol mdzad pa// de 'og dbang dang bcas pa'i lha// tshang pa khyang 'ja/
413a1(rgyud): dbang phyug che// bza' byed rdo rje car chen mo// dpal ldan khrag 'thung gzugs ni byung // dang po'i rig ma 'jigs can ma// mi sdug gdol pa sme sha can// ser mo rigs can
413a2(rgyud): drag mo dang // 'jigs par byed ma brgyad du 'dod// sngags 'di dag ni bzla byas te// gar yang byed nas dbyangs blang ngo // 'jigs byed chen po mche ba gtsigs// rgyu ma 'phreng gi rgyar skud brgyan//
413a3(rgyud): sha chen dag ni gsol byed pa// dpal ldan khrag 'thung ba dag phyag 'tshal// sgrub pa po rnams phan byed phyir// bzlas pa'i sngags ni bshad par bya// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la// bdun pa yi
413a4(rgyud): ni bzhi pa sbyor// bdun pa yi yang gsum pa ste// gnyis kyi tshig ni gnyis su sbyor// kun la de bzhin nyid ldan te// yi ge phyed kyis rnam par brgyan// drug pa'i bzhi pa phyung byas te// bdun
413a5(rgyud): pa'i dang pos gdan du bya// bcu gsum pa yis steng gnon pa'i// swA hA mthar bzhag sngags ni phyung // dang po rnam par snang mdzad dbul// khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i sngags yin no// sngags kyi
413a6(rgyud): rgyal po 'di nyid kyi// mthu chen nyon cig mA ma kI// lan cig tsam gyis sngags bzlas na// skad cig 'jig rten gsum 'jig go/ khams gsum ma lus pa rnams kyang // zos par byed
413a7(rgyud): par the tsom med// de yis 'dod pa thams cad sbyin// dpal ldan khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur ro// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
413b1(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / zugs kyi rdo rje carang rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud du byur chen po las/ dpal ldan khrag 'brang bskyed pa bstadan pa zhes bya ba le'u btung ba'o//
413b2(rgyud): de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// gzugs ni yang dag bshad par bya// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste// drag po nag po dung ba'i 'od// 'od zer 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa dang /
413b3(rgyud): gtum mos spyan ni dmar po can// dmar ba'i sprin ma ag tshe bas 'bar// drag chen po ni zil gyis gnon// phyag na dgra sta bsnams brtson pa// gtun shing rdo rje zhags pa dang // g.yon gyi
413b4(rgyud): phyag gi sngags mdzub kyis// sdang ba thams cad bsdigs par byed// ral gri phyag mtshan bsgom par bya// rig ma brgyad dang mnyam ldan zhing // sgo srungs dang yang yang dag ldan// gsang ba'i pad+ma
413b5(rgyud): bsgom byas te// 'dab mar rig ma brgyad ni bkod// bdud rtsi ma dang bdud rtsi zhal// bdud rtsi can dang bdud rtsi spyan// grangs med ma dang gzugs bzang ma// mdzes pa'i gzugs can pa de grub pa//
413b6(rgyud): thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug ste// phyogs dang mtshams la dgod par bya// phyag gis pad+ma bsdams par brtson// de dag lha mo gar byed nas// sna tshogs gzugs rnams mchog spyan ma// bzhang
413b7(rgyud): cing rol par mdzad byed do// sngags kyi rgyal po dbyung bar bya// rnam par snang mdzad yang 'bul nas// tshig 'di yis ni yongs su dga'// dang po yi ni gnyis pa ste// stong pa nyid ni gdan ldan pa// stong pas
414a1(rgyud): steng nas gnon pa'i sngags// mtha' nas swAhA sbyor byed do// gtan du shin tu dga' 'byor nas// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi phyung nas su// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi sbyor ba yis// bdud rtsi
414a2(rgyud): 'khyil ba bsgrub par bya// don kun dngos grub thams cad kyang // de yis myur bar sgrub par 'gyur// po 'am gal te mo dag gis// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dran byed na// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum
414a3(rgyud): de yi phyag mthil la kun gnas// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// dus rtag par ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba
414a4(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ dpal bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba le'u dgu pa'o// / de nas ro langs chen po yi// sgrub pa gzhan yang bshad par bya/
414a5(rgyud): nag po'i tshe sa brgyad bcu bzhi la// ling ga gcig dang lam mdo dang // shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri dang chu 'gram de rnams la// las thams cad ni bsgrub bya ste// de bzhin ro langs slong
414a6(rgyud): pab ni 'gags nas shi ba mo rnams ni// mtshan thams cad ni kun rdzogs pa// gdol pa ma dang sme sha can// khyim chos ma rnams de dag ni// mdzes pa bzang ba rma med pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis bsngags
414a7(rgyud): bsteng 'alo na nyi shu rtsa lnga bskyed// bud med ro yi sgra bzung ste// gtsang ba'i chu yis bkru bar bya// sngags dang sman gyi rdo leb la/ ga pur can dan dkar po yos// de la byug par bya byas te// sna tshogs me tog
414b1(rgyud): smos rnams kyis// mchod cing gtor ma dbul bar bya// mar khu cher pos bsdus nas su// srungs kar ngo la brgyag par bya// khrag 'thung zhes bya'i sgrub pa pos// de la dkyil 'khor snang
414b2(rgyud): bri ste/ zod pa zhes bya bla gam mam// gzhu yi tshul gyis btang bar bya// thod pas nye bar rgyun byed cing // rim pa brgyad dang ldan par bya// ga yo khams cad thod pa dbang // kha T+wAM thams cad kyis 'dzin
414b3(rgyud): te zhal gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs// phyag drug ral gri phyag na 'dzin// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol du// smre srungs ma ni rab tu brtags// glang rna dang ni glang chen na// zhal mdzes de bzhi mnal gdug ma/
414b4(rgyud): drag mo zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin// mi sdug 'jigs pas 'jig byed rnams// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis so// me tog mchod pa yang dag bri// rnam pa sna tshogs rim pa yang // dkyil 'khor
414b5(rgyud): la ni mchod pa bri// de nas dpa' bo sgrub pa pos// dung chen gyis ni brgyan byas pa// thod pa'i 'phreng thong bcings pa yi// khrag 'thung gzug ni sgom byed pas// de la cang te'u brdungs nas su//
414b6(rgyud): gar byed cing ni khang par 'jug/ de yi snying khar mnand pa'i sngags// b+h+yo yig de la bzla bya ste// lha yi dkyil 'khor mchod nas su// khrag chen gyis ni gtor bar bya// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags
414b7(rgyud): chen ni// sgrub pa pos ni bzlas ma thag/ khro dang ldan pa'i ag btsar bya// ro langs kyis ni gang sgrogs byed// de tshe sngags pas mi 'jigs te// khrag 'thung sngags ni dran par bya//
415a1(rgyud): langs pa'i ro langs de yis kyang // sgrub pa po la 'di skad smras// dpa' chen po kye las gang yang // bdag la bka' stsol rdo rje can// ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang /
415a2(rgyud): mkha' la rgyu bar 'dod pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni gang 'dod pa// las de dag ni grub par bgyi// de nas sgrub pa po la ni// yid la gang dang gang 'dod bsrang // de ltar thams cad bsgrub bya ba/
415a3(rgyud): rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI// ro langs sgrub pa'i mchog gyur pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung yin// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don du// sgrub pa po yi bde yang 'dren// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/
415a4(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ ro langs sgrub pa
415a5(rgyud): bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor to// cang mi gsung bar cher bzhugs so// dbugs
415a6(rgyud): dgag phyir nas mi g.yo nas// mi 'jigs pa dang mi gsung bar// ting 'dzin mchog la bzhugs pa la// mA ma kIs ni yang zhus te// bcom ldan rdo rje phra mo ni// sems can kun gyi yid la gnas//
415a7(rgyud): ji ltar rnam pa gang gis ni// de bzhin nyid de thob par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bzhad pa mdzad nas gsung 'di ni// spyan yang phye nas bka' stsal pa/
415b1(rgyud): donyi rjor bzhin pa shad pa ste// bdud rtsi gzugs ni khub yim/ bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan byas te// rtag par rgyun du myang bar bya// dzas mi re re'i mthung ga mi// ba shad pa nyon cig smras / ye ge
415b2(rgyud): shes bya sgrub byed pa'i// thub dngos par bza' bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi bslab dor du// khrag tshon rab tu bsgrub bya ste// gang le bud med rnams kyi 'am// bu mo yon rtag tu brag/
415b3(rgyud): khrag chen ngos ni mA ma kI// don ni thams cad byed pa po// drag shul shi brnyed na ni// sha chen po yang bza' bye ste// gsal shing btsugs dang 'gegs pa 'am// g.yul du bsad pa gang
415b4(rgyud): de ni zab cing brtan pas za byed na// tshe dang nang med 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod pa'i bde ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub grub pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'tshe// 'dod
415b5(rgyud): kun 'bras bu nges sbyin no// rdo rje chu ngadang ba shang gci mi/ rang gis bza' bar rig par bya// phye ma zhib mor byas pa la// khrag chen gyis ni bsre bar bya// snga dro de bzhin nyin phyed dang // phyi drol ni
415b6(rgyud): bza' bar bya// dus gsum zos nas rdul 'byor pas// de nas rdo rje chu ni btung // nyin dang nyin du bA ma kI// sgrub pa po gang sgrub byed pa// lus la nang ni meng 'gyur zhing // rgas pa'i nad kyang
415b7(rgyud): meng par byed// skal bzang rgyas pa'i mdangs ldan pa/ rgyal po'i sgor yang rgyal bar 'dren// des na 'dod pa kur spyod pas/ mchog rab de nyid thob pa yin// rnal 'byor de yang kun shes te/
416a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan ldam / 'dod chags zhe sdang las grol nas// brkam pa phrag dog rnam sangs nas// rdo rje bdung rtsi ba chen po// ngoms sgrub pa 'grub pa'o/
416a2(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud 'dzin// don mang gsang ba'i rim pa cad// ma lus rdo rje theg pa 'di// 'di las byung gyur lnga mo kye// rgyas pa'i pad+marbA sa k+Shi sa// 'dod chags kyis ni bde 'gyu rabs/
416a3(rgyud): khyod la dam pa'i dngos bstan na// bdag gis gang la yang mo ston// 'ad no gas chen dam pa yin// yid dag kun gyi bdag la gnas// byang chub sems dpa' ma shes te// gzugs
416a4(rgyud): med stong par mi 'gyur bas// de na de nyid rig chen po// rdo rje spyi gtsug nor bu 'dod// shin tu gas nas gzungs lha mo// pha dang bu la'ang bstan mi bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod ma//
416a5(rgyud): gdan du gsang ba bstan pa dang // bla ma la chags brtul zhugs bstan// de la sbyin nas de nyid bstan// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud 'di ni// bde 'grub shin tu thob dka' ba// yang dag rdzogs
416a6(rgyud): pas skal bzang zhi// snying po ye shes 'dus pa yin// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las// sgrub pa po gang dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// de la kun gyis phyag byed
416a7(rgyud): de phyag ni lan gsum byas nas su// rdo rje slob dpor skal bzang mchog/ de nyid sems can thams cad kyi// 'khor ba las 'dren gci zhes gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdzo/
416b1(rgyud): rjes de gsungs so// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyang chen po// ston pas dga' ma la bstan ras// phra mo'i gzugs su rdo rje mam// de nas brag cher bzhugs so// de ga'i dag shegs pa thams cad tsa srungs/

416b4(rgyud): ka nA thA pany+tsa da sha ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'di ni mchog tu gsong //

417b1(rgyud): 'bab pa yi tshad kyis ni// gnas gnyis po yis goms par bya// de bzhin rab tu dgod byas nas// 'jig rten mgon po'i sku ru 'gyur// gang gis gzhan du bzlas byas dang // las rnams

420a1(rgyud): gros rgya mtsho dang // byams pa la sogs tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// gang yang chos kyi tshig 'di thos gyur nas// rjes su yi rang spyi bos gus phyag byas// rgyal ba'i/
420a2(rgyud): sras kyis mnga' byas bstod pa'am// yang na grwa dang dbyangs dag byas pa yis// sna tshogs gar gyis 'di ni mchod pa byas// gnod sbyin srin po yi dgas 'jig rten dang // sna tshogs bu mo dang ni rgyu
420a3(rgyud): skar dang // sa yi dbang dang lag na rdo rje dang // rlabs rnams sna tshogs can gang gnas pa yi// klu yi bu mo zur gos lta bas blta ba dang // sa 'og skyong dang lha dbang grub pa'i bu mos mchod// dri za'i rgyal
420a4(rgyud): mo nu ma shin tu rgyas pa dang // rig pa 'dzin dang mi 'am ci yi chung ma dang // gnod sbyin chung ma ri yi bu mo'i bu dag ni// gang yin bdag cag skyabs med ces ni 'di skad smra// gang phyir skyabs med skyabs
